name: Divij
tagline: There is a non zero possibility that...

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: I came at least a day later than everybody else and I am really glad I came late because that got me a room on the 4th floor and got me close to the people I call friends today :) (It was also easier to sneak out) Meeting Group 1 peeps in-person felt really amazing too! Go G1!

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Organizing Felicity in my 2nd year was probably one of my favourite campus memory! It was an overall new experience, and I had the time to spare for it as well. That was also what got me into Clubs Council and introduced me to a lot more people.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Friends. I am already missing them, evenings are way too quiet compared to hostels because of my friends who were constantly coming to room every couple hours. Life was very happening in college and the dip in that activity is surely going to feel like a void for a while.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer:
I have become a lot more lax and not necessarily in a bad sense. When I came to college I was already very much into anime, gaming, fooling around but I was still focused on studies (was on-time for class, made notes) but that's something that changed overtime and I like it better this way.

Finishing assignments and projects at the last day has given me more memories than I would have gotten otherwise if I had done them on time. Grinding at the last minute is where life is at in IIIT :)

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: I mean, I am probably gonna be living 20 minutes from campus so would be able to meet my DD friends anytime but yeah, it's a new path for all of us single degrees starting from here and I hope we all end up successful wherever we are. Friends who made it this far and friends who couldn't, I would like to believe that this friendship will last a lifetime!

testimonials.text: He doesn't just watch anime, he lives it. He doesn't just play games, he wages digital war. He's also a human jukebox of tales – insert coin (or just be near him) to hear his classics. Again. And again. And we wouldn't have it any other way.

Divij is the ultimate college buddy – and engineer se jyada gamer! Gaming ke beech bhi har course mein A grade laana is normal for him. Clubs Council ho ya Felicity ya fir course projects ya long random discussions, har jagah mazedaar moments share kiye. Ek baar padhta, toh hamesha yaad – insane retention! Sabka dost – students se leke guards tak. You made my 4 years unforgettable with endless fun. Bas ek hi advice: waise hi rehna, bas thodi si exercise bhi kar lena 😉

Divij is the perfect go-to guy for the best advices you would like to have for literally anything! Yes, this man helps you easily with his quick wit and great knowledge of all things under the blue sky, make sure to interact with him when he is not sleeping. The person who lives in the virtual world and popularly addressed as the "guy with headphones around his neck", his video games, music in his free time and random news channels meant a lot to him. All the best for your future, best roommate!

Divij is like a big brother who I look up to. He is probably one of the wisest and most mature people I know. He is good at every video game that I aspire to be good at. Even if luck isn't on his side most of the time, he has proven himself to be a fighter! A singular action of his, back in first semester, determined the rest of my college life and I am very grateful for that.

It's rare to stay close for four whole years. Divij was the first friend I made here, and I’m grateful we grew closer with time. I admire his ‘Debator’ personality -extroverted, sharp, empathetic, and sensitive (my favorite), and always up for deep conversations. He's now synonymous with college for me. What I love most is his healthy competitiveness-that'll let him thrive in any work he takes on, while still being mindful of his well-being. Thanks for putting up with my antics bro. Atb for life

Best bro i could have asked for. Always the funniest and smartest guy in any room hes in. Will always remember that he was the person who first took me to the gym(as unlikely as it seems XD). Always there to share a laugh or to bitch and moan about college. Have countless memories with him and hope to make many more.

Hey Divij!

Working with you on the CC Executive Board and in SERC was wonderful. Always loved your frank opinions during various debates about policies and stuff, and am grateful to you and Bhav for showing how to defend one's beliefs and opinions.

Hopefully, we'll stay in touch in person also, if possible, apart from social media.

Wishing you the best in all your future endeavours!
Bro our conversations — whether academics or random stuff — were always interesting and full of new things to learn. It was truly great spending time with you. Let’s stay in touch. All the best!!
A very fun loving person with whom I have a lot of discussions. Knows how to manipulate talks and make fun 😅. A very helpful person and learnt a lot from him!

Divij, thank you so much for helping me with my course. I honestly don’t know how to thank you enough it really means a lot to me. You’re one of the sweetest and kindest souls I’ve ever met. Wishing you all the best for your future endeavors. Stay amazing and keep shining!
Friendliest guy in the town! Thank you for the best date Divij! Loads of love and I hope we stay in touch whether its for anime, games or just having fun!

Divij is the laughing Buddha of the batch—always calm, always cool, and somehow always cracking the darkest jokes. His music taste is top-tier, his vibe unmatched, and conversations with him just hit different. One of the easiest people to be around. Wishing you all the best in life, bro!

You were my constant lab mate to go to for any doubts, any bitching, ranting, or to just find out stuff about people, I was always amazed at how you seemed to know so many things about everyone, and how you achieved the amazing feat of writing a research paper on a new idea in a single night. You honestly helped me get through lab work past 2 years xd.

Divij bhai, you are a really jovial and a nice person. You keep the atmosphere vibrant. 
Aapke woh games aur anime suggestion kaafi cultured the ;) aur baaki DASS mei toh kaam kiya hi tha.  

Aap ke saath pata nahi chala ki 4 saal kab bit gye. 
Aasha karte hai college ke baad bhi milte rahoge.

Got to know you during Megathon, it was good to work with you. And Pandavas won the first prize! You're the chillest guy I've seen in the batch, with a lot of contacts. Keep chilling in your life ahead. Will be in touch!

Hiii Divij! I still remember first meeting you at DebSoc events , I knew you were someone special. You’ve always stood out with your brilliance, whether it’s debating, logical thinking, or coding. But more than that, it’s your clarity and calm that I admire the most. In CC, whenever I felt confused your advice grounded me being always thoughtful, always fair.Microsoft is lucky to have you! Wishing you all the success in the world — don’t stop being amazing, and let’s definitely keep in touch!

Divij, thank you for tending to all the weird TAship questions I had, whether OSN or DASS you've been very helpful. Though they weren't very easy, but with your help it became a lot more bearable. Thanks for that. And I will never forget the fall in Soapy Football XD. 
Wishing you all the best for your future!

Spoke to you only for a few days, but I had an awesome time talking to you. Planning the batch trip was one of the best parts of my last days in college. I’ll miss your teasing. Wishing you all the very best for your future may you find success in everything you do!
Fun person to work with. Was fun organising batch trip, and Felicity with you. Also I can agree that he is an amazing OSN TA xD
Samosapaglu

Headphone guy 
Will always even remember the color of ur headphones

Bhai ke paas har cheez ka jawaab hai. Stack Overflow ko bhi yahi saare solution dete hai! Har problem ka ek jugaadu solution ready hota hai — witty in conversation, excellent in execution. Research mein bhi phod rhe hai. Aise records set kiye hain ki abkoi tod hi nhi sakta. Bas bhai, thoda fit ho jao ab — baaki life mein toh tu already all-rounder mode on mein hi jee raha hai. Keep shining and setting new bars!

If there’s one man who mastered doing the least for the most, it’s Lakshya Shastri. From smartwatch-for-attendance deals to ₹15 vape hits in Room 244 (a cultural landmark in itself),  he played college strategically like a game, focusing on the only objective that mattered: fun. Money? Optional. Opinions? “it depends.” Like a seasoned politician, he dodged blame, shaped outcomes and though was rarely seen, was always unforgettable. The show's far from over, and I'm eager to see the next act.

But what I know is that 500 characters arent enough to describe you. I know jab bhi delhi aunga to finest plan banega, finest times create honge. journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: I clearly remember that day. I never thought I'd end up in this group, but I'm so glad I did. I was alone in my room watching "DJ Tillu" when I met Vedanivas, and the rest, as they say, is history.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: If I had to pick one thing, it would be the moments Nikitha planned for our Telugu gang—whether they were spontaneous dinners, campus events, or trips, I enjoyed them all the most.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: My room, along with Vedanivas', Ravindra's, and Abhishek's rooms, holds a special place in my memories. In essence, the entire Bakul Hostel is where I forged some of my most precious and enduring memories.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Wow, it's wild to think how much I've changed in just four years! I'm definitely not the same person, and honestly, I have no clue how that's all gonna play out in the long run. But yeah, I'm kinda excited to find out!

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Graduation (Seriously I have to graduate god please make it happen)

Hey man, you are the best keeper I ever bowled to (maybe a tough competition with Anubhav Sharma :)) The levels of discipline you've showed in everything you do is truly inspiring, and that's not a joke. I hope you do well in everything you want to do in life... everything that's important to you.... and i really hope I get a chance to meet you some time in the future.

IIIT was worth it because of you. You're the smartest, hottest guy I know, and every moment with you was filled with laughter and joy. You take my breath away and always will. I'm so proud of the man you've become—you’re destined for great things, and I can't wait to see you achieve them all. We were short-lived, and maybe it was meant to be that way, but I’ll always remember you.
Funniest guy af, never seen this guys face without a smile brother always lightens the mood wherever he goes. Will miss ya bro keep in touch
bro i will never forget the night cricket match you guys played. it was at some 3 or 5 am but i would come and watch that every day of the year. good luck for your phd :)

You're one of the chillest people I've met. I'll miss watching f1 with you during the online and offline sems, and also cheering on your amazing wicketkeeping (it's seriously the best I've seen in college!) MBC was super fun with you too. I'm very excited to see what you'll cook in the future. Enjoy Austin!

My keeper!! Trust me i still how dk how to bowl that googly, but somehow you know it!! That defines our relationship ig :) Pizza zone with you, from discussing strike rates of 50 to averaging 50 :wink , from doing ANLP together to visiting CVPR twice you just have been a real all rounder haran! I am sure something big is lined up for you, and I really hope you get the best! But all I have is one request - do not forget me :) i might need a job later :))

one of the sweetest guys on campus!!
an amazinggg teammate, the bestt keeper i've ever seen and that outstanding final season with the batttt
i've loved playing with you for 4 years haran, will cherish it forever.
and coming to the more important part, i've interacted with you more as at a personal level over the last year, and i fell in love with you ever since!
you're so sweet, veryy helpful and a fun guyyyy aaaa i regret not getting close earlier
love you!
Very hardworking guy, all the best for your phd and don't forget us after going to us. Also party for RL pending.

Ni**er, I'm glad you struggled to figure out the vpn installation. That shit led to a brother, getting myself the best younger brother mutthi, big don uncle who's like family, and many more. 
Ik you're gonna kill it in Austin and i pray there's a lotta happy and good things coming your way. 
On a random weekday in bed, staring at the ceiling, i'll always remember 'Let me not die ingloriously and without a struggle, let me do something great that shall be told among men hereafter'.
Love you ni**a
Ntg good for you , all the best for phd , no option to write a testimonial for Mr. Raajesh

Not gonna lie, I underestimated Haran at the start. But he quickly proved himself to be a smart, resourceful person while being an absolutely sweet heart. He is kind, handsome, charming and always has a smile when talking to people. (No wonder Sreeram fell for him).  Hopefully, we will meet in the upcoming months, I'm not done with him.

Haran was perhaps the first online friend I made in college! Chill, focused and fun guy to be around. He is the only reason I managed to submit most of my DSM lab circuits haha (really got carried by him there XD)

Man was also there when I was down at my lowest in second semester and helped me keep going! Thanks a lot for everything man and I hope to stay connected in future too :)
All the very best buddy :)

Haran enjoys the best of all worlds-his humor spans sharp wit to brain rot, and he balances being effortlessly cool with genuine humility. This pattern manifests in other ways as well - he is too cool and modest at the same time, engaging with all kinds of people.Absolutely loved our time in Group1 which is now an inescapable core memory for me. Thanks for putting up with all my (and sreeram’s) antics. You such a cutie patootie uwu. Wishing you all the love and success ahead

Hello Haran Sirji!

I would have said, 'take care of my Poorvi,' but aap toh pardesi baabu banke nikal liye! 😔 Lol, I love teasing you with my Punjabi Hinglish jo aapko samajh nahi aati! It was lovely having you around in college.

I wish you all the growth and happiness in life. Keep in touch, byee!

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: I came to campus in the morning, and we were supposed to be in quarantine in the hostels for 3-4 days. The day was quiet, but at night I met a few people on my floor. We had a good conversation, it felt nice.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: There are many...

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: I'll really miss the Telugu Peeps group. It gave me good friends and countless memories.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I was very quiet in my first year - it was difficult for me to start a conversation, even with people I already knew. But by the end, I was able to interact better.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Looking forward...

testimonials.text: You are the friend that I found when I was at my lowest. We were together in sorrows, we overcame those together. Now in happiness, I hope we will be the same. Cheers, to many more re-releases and to many more badminton plans. With lots and lots of love to the kissik queen

My TA and a close WhatsApp friend—charming, honest, and someone I truly admire. One of the few people I’ve had real conversations with about life, and undeniably very smart. Wishing her all the very best for everything that lies ahead!

Naaku starting lo nee meeda chaalaa respect undedi chaalaa ante chaalaa, mana sem ki 1-2 meets inka gurtunnaayi, kaani internship lo banglore experience tho chaalaa manchi friend and akka aypoyaav, inka naaku aa respect undi, you are one of the most hardworking persons I know, happy gaa undu lonely gaa feel avvaku eppudu, nenu unna ani gurtinchuko :). All the best and stay in touch

Rommiee... Bayatiki kalisi ekkuva poyindakapovachu kaani room lo koorchuni esina sessionlu... Discussion lu mastu enjoy chesina neetoh... Nuv eppudu itle self independent ga undali ani korukuntunna... Hyd vachindani marchipoke nannu... Kalustu untan nen ninnu kachintanga.... Wish you good luck nuv anukunnavi anni avvalani aasistunna....

Meghana, ee last sem lo bond ayyi nantha manam mundhu kuda ayyi unte bagundu. I want to spend more time. Hyd lo ne untav ga lets enjoy. Naku baga gurthu unna moments Trip lo chala unnai. General ga evarikina call cheyali ante siggu padta, but ne daggara naku adhi ledhu. Sarcastic ga matladatam naku alavatu, you handle it well. Aanandham ga undu, aa aanadham lo nannu kalupu. Itlu mee pittla dora.

completeness of my college life. Had best time in solving DSA assignments with you. Quarreling with you on very irrelevant arguments was always fun.. Taking little moments of internal jokes to long chats at nights.. You have always been a boosting partner for me. My first longest trip on a bike is with you. Thanks for understanding me with no words expressed and taking actions for me and our bond. Things that are not noticeable were always valued in our bond. Adi develop aynanduku chal happy.

Most inspirational , kacchithaam ga unddee, competitive and one of my closesttt friendss. first nunchi chepaali ante kalisi lows chussaam, placements tym lo chusa nee dedication, vere level asal. manadi oka tom and jerry story adi NEEKI kuda telusu but in the end we are great friends. Manam kurchoni bitching chesina benches, reading room and lib lo adugu pete ante nee valle . last lo baaga emotional chesesaav akkaw.Twarlone manchi khabru vinipistaav ani korukuntu, mee well wisher. will miss you!

College starting nunchi we’ve known each other, but somehow, in the last few months, we got magically close.
From all those love-hate group studies, late night movies at workspace, our badminton "streak" (if you can even call 5 ,6 consecutive games a streak 😂), to those random pizza nights and morning dosas – every moment was just so much fun.
Honestly, had an amazing time with you. These memories feel so special now.
And I know All these moments are just the beginning of our new journey….

The photo girl sagam trip photos antha nee photo le untay emo asala😂. Kassi pro max nuvvu asala. Dm assigment ki party kuda ivvaledu asalu nuvvu. Andaritho baa matladthav chala hardworking. 
Ilane undu Hyderabad lone untav kabatti kalusthu undam, All the best!!...

Mana rivalry ela start enduku start ayyindo telidu, but teasing you was fun! Mahesh Babu nijanga thop actor, don't know why people can't see that. SSMB29 FDFS ki try cheddam! Eppudu Tollywood ae kaakunda, English/Hindi kuda choodu; there are more than 650 good films and songs. Hope we’ll get to go to many more movies together. Manam manam okkati, unity tho undaali.

Manaki peddaga parichayam lekapoyina, projects valla interaction ayindi. Iddaram mohamatasthule kabatti matladadam kastame sometimes, but still we shared some nice moments. Trek chesina time especially, I really enjoyed. Campus lo kalisi chadivam, thinnam, and enjoy chesam. Though limited, the time we spent together was memorable. Had a great time having you as part of my journey. Wishing you the best ahead — stay in touch!

Hi meghana. Naa gurinchi neeku antha thelusu. Eppudu nannu nuvvu ardamcheskuntav anukune anni share cheskunna neetho. Yeah, i have happy moments with you. Eppudu nenu "Sai Ram" anukunna ventane nannu thaluchukuntunnava antaav. I think i'll miss that. Nenu edchinappudu neeku call cheyyochu ane oka support la unnav. Be happy and achieve all that you want. Thanks for being there.

Meghana, you are so sweet and disciplined and talented and hardworking. There are lots of ends possible but sticking to these top 4. Always had good times together. I still remember talks we had post devara movie where we4 sat the whole night together and had breakfast the next day. snaps share chesthu undu. touch lo undham. malli kaludham. Miss youu.

One of my friends since the beginning nuvvu, all those discussions, late night walks during early years anni chala enjoy chesa. But konchem distance vachindi between us and I can understand that. I miss that Meghana. Adhe sportiveness tho undu. Don't change a bit. All the best

My lovely chellama! Starting lo nuvvu anna, annappudu I didn't really understand the significance, endhukante eppudaina nenu janalu meedha depend avvadam thappa, opposite lekunde, but after a while I really did understand. You were the best I could ask for ra, even though I might not say it all the time, you are very important to me. Mana mandi meetings eppatiki saagali, nuvvu every rakshabandhan ki naaku raakhi kattali ani korukuntu, selavu theesukuntunna!

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: It was COVID quarantine day. We were offered food to the rooms and I made some new friends.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: The late night walks with my friends. The birthday party nights in Bakul.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Playing Call of Duty for hours.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: COVID GONE and everything back to normal.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: JOB

testimonials.text: Such a resilient man who persevered through tough times when luck was not on his side. Very bright guy and very sweet. Hope you go to great heights man. Good luck with your future bro
Amogha bhai, apne convos hamesha badiya hote the. You are a really high spirited person and it was amazing TAing DS alongside you. Let's catch up soon! All the Best!!

One of the most committed people towards studies. Your dedication in everything is fantastic. It was a pleasure interacting with you during placements. I wish you all the best for your future and hope you get everything you need.

Thank you for helping me so much throughout college. It would have been really hard without your help and we took many courses together. Playing pool with you was very memorable and we lost many times too :). You have been a very selfless friend, lets stay in touch

Amogha is more chill and humourous than he lets on when you first talk to him because he saves that side for his friends :) Really fun guy to be around and to talk to in general, and it was REALLY fun messing with my roommate while you were DS TA in last semester XD

I had lots of fun talking at dinners and at random times when we had the chance man and here is to hoping that we stay connected over the years as well!

Amogha bhaaiiiiii, Second sem mai jab tune dsa ka ek code bheja tha tabse baat start hui thi terse, tt khela saath mai, pool mai ashutosh ko haraya humne, saare sports khele humne. bahut help ki hai bhai tune 4 saal mai meri inlp se leke om tak, padhai ke alawa bhi terse bahut baatein ki ipl ki. iss baar rcb jeetegi ipl chinta mat kar. you are gifted bhai pune mai koi zaroorat ho toh pakka boliyo, baaki all the best mere bhai jogging chhodiyo mat. see you!!
First ever roommate of IIIT. Had the best time with in quarantine! Epic rants, even better memories. Keep growing! (Also, reminder to help me meet Yash!)

Always had nice chatters with you. Will always remember aaj and kal convos. Those COD nights were to be cherished. You are a very smart and hard working person, and so active and punctual. Hope to stay in touch!

Amogha is a sincere, focused and a hardworking guy who is very sportive too. He is the perfect web series binge-watcher! You could easily see him stuck to his laptop, either for studies, or for watching web series or IPL Matches!. Room No. 252 would be the perfect place of watching IPL Matches and discussing about RCB's fate (he is a die-hard RCB fan). What struck me most was his spirit of achieving his goals. All the best bro for the future and whatever you want to achieve in the near future!

Amogha bhai chad hai! Bhai you are a very genuine guy.
Have a good time with you playing kaboo and eating in mess. Will always miss playing doubles with you in table tennis. Keep contacting and best of luck for your future endeavours!

Amogha, you’re truly a chad 😎. We’ve made so many unforgettable memories — late-night cricket talks 🏏, watching movies and series( Money Heist & Paatal Lok),  COD MVP grinds ("pelo isko"), mess walks("dosa") and your classic 12 AM “aaj has become kal” visits. From our Ooty-Mysore trip to Codeforces chats, every moment was gold. 
Thanks for making sure we are awake before exams. Wishing you the best ahead. Stay in touch, bhai!

Ekdum sorted banda, lekin bolne se pehle sochne ka time nahi milta bhai ko :). Dil ka saaf, kaam ka dhurandhar — aur jab bhi musibat aaye, hamesha saath khada milta hai. Interview dena ho toh bhai se mil lo — hai har company ka experience hai bhai ko! Aur haan… jab tu Hindi bolta hai na, dil aa jata hai — thoda broken sahi, but asli feel aati hai. Aise hi bolta rehna bhai. Solid banda, solid dost!

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: I came to the campus during the covid period and we had to quarantine for a few days. We were only allowed to be in 1st floor wing. Got to the assigned room and unpacked and connected the LAN. After the quarantine period was over, I went around the campus and ate rubber bhindi in Kadamb for dinner.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Did not read the mail which was sent the morning of the Science endsem that the exam was 2 hrs instead of the usual 3.Woke up,gave the exam at 9 am and realised it later and was very scared.Got more than average marks and did well which tremendously boosted my confidence.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: The evening cricket matches will always be special. We would forget about our phones, our worries and play till sundown which would energise us to face the rest of the day. Who knew that what started as a way to get an alternate to sports credits would become such a beloved part of my campus life?

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: When I first came to campus, I was very anxious regarding campus life because I had lived all my life in the same city and with my family. I was also under-confident and used to question myself too much before doing anything. Having spent some of the best years of my life and facing the ups and downs I am much more confident in my own capabilities, with a friend group that is super fun and supportive and am not anxious anymore about new experiences.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Research paper is in the pipeline.Will try to apply for Masters.Will always be looking out for new & interesting topics to immerse myself into. I will be starting my corporate journey but I don't imagine myself ending up doing that for all my life.Will keep doing side projects which I am really interested in.Hopefully one of the side project is so interesting that it takes up most of my time and ends up being a startup.I also want to become more healthy.Also a yacht does not sound too bad.

testimonials.text: My sweet Yash Prashant Adivarekar. I've gotten super close to him for all the wrong reasons. I suppose it all started when we locked eyes in Bakul's hallway and immediately conducted double aggravated assaults on Swayam. That and other reasons to lock eyes in a Bakul hallway (*Winks). At the expense of sounding super generic, I must confess that he is one of the most wholesome individuals at IIIT and that he can possibly charm his way anywhere with his amazing persona. I'll miss you!!

Hello bhau,
Teri bold personality genuinely bohot inspiring hai. Logo se deal kese karte hai ye terese kafi sikha hai bhai. Neuro mai kafi maza aaya tere sath kaam karke. Ab to weight 65 paar pohochane ke liye ghar pe teri tarah khana shuru karna padega 💪🏻💪🏻
"Milenge to cricket khelenge aaram se !" yaad hai na ?
Take care, brother.

Adivarekar - Tujhe surname se jaana jata tha Bakul mai. No moment was dull with you. Apna connect kafi badiya hai. MI and ICT discussions se lekar life ke kafi memorable moments share kre hai including CT Final (and hopingly aage bhi karege). Apan ne jis level pe campus par bakchodi peli hai wo to internal mamla hi rehna chaiye, baki wishing you the best for future! Lets stay in touch. Also "Namak Haram" will always be goated!!

Yash Adivarekar ("Avg mumbaikar") is one of those few guys with whom you can always have a postive fun discussion about literally anything. Bro has knowledge regarding even the most niche thing ever in all domains ("ghoomta firta reddit"). He is quite understanding and can always be relied on. I will fondly miss the times where we used to play cricket almost everyday in the final year and the time we spent roaming around in Bombay (I still want to go to the Oberoi mall pizza place 🫣). GLHF :)

Teamed up with this gentleman for my POIS project. This man passes the vibe check fr. Thankful to you for lightening up the mood during the last few days of the project when we were under nerve-wracking pressure. Never fail to catch up with him whenever we meet in Yuktahar (especially to get some more gossip about Swayam).

Yash is a fun person to work with. Had a great time in the painful project of POIS xD xD.  His chill and easy-going attitude is what makes me think that he'll be amazing at whatever life throws at him. All the best bro
delhi chale ja lekin rahega toh mumbaikar hi. lets try and keep meeting, warna online toh baat chalti hi rahegi, jab tak matches chalegi 😀
og mumbai gang member. will miss you, have great life ahead

Hi Yash, 
You are an amazing person. Loved spending time with you. 
Would miss playing cricket and football with you. 
stay happy and keep in touch,
Manav

name: Chikkala Sri Lakshmanarao
tagline: still figuring it out, but faster

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: It was my first time being in a hostel. So I was terrified and homesick even before stepping into the campus.I got my room with my friend Adithya the first day,so it helped me to calm myself. From then, it was about surviving each day away from home, not knowing all the crazy times I would have have

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: There are many memories, from all the workspace nights to the random walks and the dlf nights. The time I spent in my room would always be memorable to me with Adithya, Naveen, Hanish, Anirudh. All of them randomly coming to our room, just chilling and spending time together is special to me.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: I would miss the people I was with during the college years, the college and hostel life and the student life in general as I don't know  If I will experience it again. Getting to know these people, spending time together and having good memories with them is something I would cherish my whole life.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: To say I had changed from my first year would be an understatement, From my physique to my mind, I had changed a lot from the first year. I have learnt and experienced a lot from the people around me and I hope to carry these lessons with me.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: For now, I have nothing on my mind regarding my future. Another chapter awaits me, joining the corporate world, leading an independent life completely. I don't know how it would be like when experienced to the full potential, which makes it all the more exciting and scary at the same time.  Again I am what I am from all the people and learnings I had, And I hope to carry those with me.

testimonials.text: We always had ups nd downs in our relationship... I know I took some time to get over it... But trust me I am over it... Nen eppati lekke unna unta kooda... Just that last sem lo chance dorakaled ekkuva maatladaniki.... Bangalore lo kaluddam enjoy cheddam.... Have fun in holidays ekkuva alochinchak... I wish you all the very best for your future....
My dear bhai and the only other MI fan in the group! A truly honest, kind, and genuinely nice person. Wishing him all the very best in everything ahead!

Only two meets in a semester- that's how it continued till 3rd year. But internship appudu chala baa anipinchindhi. I will remember our successful pg hunt, random plans and all the good memories in Bangalore. Naaku dengue vacchinappudu, nuvvu lekapothe kashtam ayyedhi. Placements appudu chala moivation icchevaadivi. Chala genuine and honest person nuvvu.
Give your best in everything and may all your dreams come true. All the best! Keep smiling...

Most random discussions cheskunevallam manam. Chala chesam kalisi. And bangalore lo kuda cheddam. Happy ga undara baguntadi. Not to sound cheesy but hanumanthudu lantodivi nuvvu. Don't waste that potential. Keep focused. Chill avudam

bhai, you are genuinely one of the calmest and coolest person I've ever encountered and let's not forget, a truly great bowler in cricket!.
All the best for your future, bhai. Go shine

Good friend at all times. Thanks for being there when i laughed, cried and the most when i wanted to vent my anger. Its so good to be a friend of you. Same school, same college, same office.. evaranna vinte navvutaaru. But mostly anni assignments, projects anni kalise chesevaallam. I think i'll miss those days in ws #onedaybatting before exams. One of the special persons to me. Thanks to that one train journey, we became close. Baaga express chesko ninnu nuvvu and edupu vaste edu. Tankuuu....

The first F1 fan I met in college. Fellow Verstappie. Still remember about the time when we were DnA teammates. Thope chess player in Blitz and Bullet formats. You’ve always had a great helping nature. Good friend and an even better person. Hopefully, I'll keep seeing you in future too..office lu pakkapakkane kabatti
Those internship days in Bangalore, we have a lot of memories together. Fun loving person. Best of luck buddy!

Best passionate techie actually interested in problem solving. Always wanted to spend more time with you. Nuvvu unte nannu LPDE lo evaru fail chestaru mama(#Kattapa). Be more expressive and share all your internal thoughts.. I always wanted that comfort from you.
Touch lo undu..  Best of Luck!

Very very genuine person and loyal friend asalu. You are too sweet anpisthadi. The only regret i have is ekkuva matladaledu manam. I really hope we can make this up if i get blr as my location. I'm very proud of myself neetho manali bus lo dance epinchina anduku and also that aayudha pooja practice was fun. F1 group lo active undham manam ippatnundi. Have a great career(because you really deserve the best) and also have a great personal life as well. Be happy ra

You weren;t just a friend, you were my go-to person, my sleeping partner and the one I spent most of the time with. From late-night talks to shared silences, you made everything better just by being around. I’ll always miss those moments we had and the sleeping aid. You have this rare quality of making everyone around you feel at ease, and your sense of humor, loyalty, and quiet dependability made even the most stressful days bearable. All the best.

Badminton, TT annintilo thodu icchav bhai. "The punk", kanipinchav kaani baa adthav bhai COD asala. Asalu COD nightouts mamul crazy kadu asala. Best person chala cute ga matladthav. Banglore ki vacchinappudu kalustha bhai pakka.
Snap lu pamputhu undu life updates ivvu. Malli edo roju COD match lu badminton lu anni adtham. All the best bhaai!!..

Chala silent ga untav, andhariki help chestav. Maa intiki oste papam maa mother enta food pettina calm tintav. Chala shy ga untav. Mana spend chesina time workspace lo, maa intlo inka manam kalisi bayataki vellina time chala memorable. Meetho nenu chala enjoy chesanu. Meeru eppudu nannu oka frnd laga choosaru meetho ekkuva time spend cheyakapoyina spend chesina time chala memories ki ichayi and chala enjoy chesanu

You’ve always seemed like such a kind person. I really enjoyed hanging out with you guys in Bangalore, it was so much fun. Wishing you all the best for your future! Looking forward to making more memories in Bangalore.

Manam baaga close aindhi, sem break lo chats nunchi, without context, random chats bavundevi ra, aa late night talks, intern ki velle mundhu andaram badminton aadevallam bakul lo, COD lo marii naa antha thop kaadu gaani, manchi competition icchevaadivi, cricket nets lo, nee bowling action and nee pull shots ki big fan sir, manaki daily talks lekapoyina kalisinappudu heartfelt talks ayyevi ra, missing those. anyways bangalore lo rock cheddham.

Starting lo silent ga unna, over the years baa kalisipoyam......mana net sessions, box sessions proper drippp.....enthaina nee bowling sometimes unplayable tbh......hoping future lo kuda ila cricket sessions continue cheddam....

Lakshman, always stay happy ra, find ways to be happy. Chinnapati nunchi mana alma maters mostly same ae. You know what makes it special, adhi planned kadhu. Most of my college memories lo nuvvu untav. Konchum touch lo unte chepta, neeku kavalsindhi, chusko malla.. All the best ra, best wishes.

Lucky boi...em cheppanu ra nee gurinchii. epdu navvutu untaav. cooolest and charismatic person ra nuvvu. andaritho vibe avute navvutu manchi relangi maavaya types ( ani janaalu ni namistaavu... nee lo unnaa dark bad boi naaku telsu). jokes aside banglore inka manade kummedaam!!!

lucky bhaai!! mana 6th semester, is the one I focused more on personal and self development and achieved with your support. badminton and cricket lo nee greatness underrated. Let's make the the world to know it soon in Bengaluru. See you soon there in badminton courts and cricket nets bhAAii...

Neetho kalisi aadina COD sessions, Batminton matches eppatiki gurthundipothayi.
Had a great time in Bangalore too, asalu nannu ontarithanam nunchi kaapadesav bangalore lo. Hoping for a wonderful time ahead togeather.

Wishing a great future.

"Annaaaaaa" ani vinte first gurtochedi nuvvu. Assal nuvvu thop Annaa. Nee fashion sense ayina, nee cool composure ayina, edaina nuvvu thop anna. Automata course lo rock, paper, scissor game code gurinchi discuss chesinappudu artham ayyindi nee thopness gurinchi. Assal ela Anna ila. We are a very good COD team Anna, Captain ni Naveen ni mingeddaam. Dooram unna touch lo undaam Anna, malli COD aadudaam!!

testimonials.text: Akhill bhai, Idk where to start. You have been a pivotal member of MKG, and the most savage person I know. From your "behind the cooler" speech in the 1st week to the late night hangouts is your room, it's been an amazing passage of time over the years. Stay the way you are! All the Best!

Akhil bhai I’m truly grateful to college for giving me a friend like you. Your humor, energy and those fun badminton sessions will always be missed. You're one of the funniest and most genuine people I’ve met.... but dw I'm going to learn roasting properly and come back stronger when we meet next time, so be ready !!!!!Wishing you all the best for your future, let’s catch up soon!

Especially, I was shocked ki teri intern nhi lagi still you showed that you are not a person who breaks when things gets worse but a person who gets up, fight and gets best of the best (google).
I really hoped we were as close as we are now from starting, but koii na yaar apan life long dost rahege I hope

Aur Akhil Bhai, tum to bas mast insaan ho, itne ladki pataye ho na ki kya hi batau, bechari ladkiya badi bholi hai, they don't even know you don't want a relationship. Har doosre din kisi na kisi nayi ladki se video call karta tha, fir bhi khud ko single hi batata tha.

Bhai all i have are wishes and love. You can be much bettter that this and you know it bhai. All the best.. I ll be there

name: Khushi
tagline: Sunfa Sunfa Krte Jao, Sunfa ke Gun Gaate Jao

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: totally overwhelming! All my friends at the gate, so many new faces, went to Dominos. Mad rush to meet online friends in person. Then, into the hostel & accidentally scaring my roomie with my Punjabi-Hinglish accent XD. Epic start!!

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: So many memories! Late night walks, cards in hostel corridors, DSAC games, dancing at events, late nights in Srujana, workspace nights (sleeping, working, movies!), seeing friends off home... But OMG, the best? Lying on faculty area roads, watching stars in total silence. Truly, there's ALOTTT!

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Will miss being a student, that 'benefit of doubt' before adulting hits. Gonna miss EVERYTHING: friends, sleep, my room, our deep/silly talks, BT hangs, random fun, drunk college days, DSAC games, group Instamart runs... It's just too much to leave!

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: people say I'm less of a 'gundi' now, and honestly, I feel it; definitely more toned down. Still emotional, perhaps even a touch more so these days! But alongside that, I've genuinely gained confidence in new areas, found some truly amazing friends, and even feel more organized and responsible. Guess this is adulting, and it feels like I'm really evolving

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: 9 to 5, adulting, work, living on you own, making food, working out ...read more

testimonials.text: My roomie, My lesbian partner, without you I wouldn't be half the person I am today. You love unconditionally and that's something I wish to take back from you. Day 1-er. God bless the rooming gods who paired us up, cause I couldn't have handled anyone else as roommate. Your one of the strongest people I know and I hope you stay the same forever. The world is not ready for you and I can't wait to see what all you have to offer to it. PS. drive away all the creepy men for me pls <3.

You were the first person I ever had a chat with after joining college, and since then you have been my all-gossip sharing buddy. Thanks for introducing me to dsac peeps, it was always fun being with you, Rhythm and those juniors. Jitni bitching aur gossip tere saath kari hai, I don't think I have done that in the whole of my lifetime, thanks for being there when I needed friends the most...par ek bache ke saath galat kara tune (iykyk)

Meri gundi madam.... Kabhi kabhi lagta hain teri tarah bold banna chahiye mereko bhi... Stand lena seekhna hain... Itni achi qualities hain tere mein kya hi likhu limit dediya inhone... Inspirational hain tu bahut....I will miss all the gossip sessions i will miss partying.... Hyd mein hain toh bhool mat jaayiyo... Milte rehna... Mein bhi miloongi.... You plan like a pro, fight like a firecracker, and always call dibs on everything— especially the front seat during car rides! You’re full of confidence, charm, and that Sunidhi Chauhan voice — truly the whole package. What I love most is how effortlessly you understand me — I don’t even have to speak. Stay exactly the way you are, keep slaying, and yes — I cannot wait for your wedding! Milte rehna, always 💖

Babbbyyyyyyyyy. Maine apna testimonial chitthi mei likh diya tha to repeat karne ka fayda nhi. Par mai sunfaa ke saath hi rehna chahta hoon humesha. Hum dono saath rhe aur khoob grow karein I pray for that. Keep loving baby. Your kaka.

Khusssi ji you are a perfect blend of BRO and sister and one of my best friends ever. Had so much masti in college, played so many different games (though you lost😁😁). Itni chhotiiii si hai phir bhi panga leti rehti hai. Always in for any Craazzyy Crazzyy masti opportunity. Milte rehna aur ghoomne phirne chalte rehna. Will miss all those times

I love you so much Khushi . Thoda raste pr lane ka treeka darawna tha but genuinely u helped me to grow a lottt. Mai hmesha se hi teri jessi caring ek best frnd chahti thi, tu thodi late mili pr koi nah. Khushee.. One of my first and closest friends in college. I still miss the crazy energy of our first and second semesters. Yes, we've had our share of ups and downs but the last semester and the Goa Trip made it all worth it. You are hands down the best Hindi singer I know - your Darkhaast performance still gives me chills. Also, nothing can replace those iconic jugalbandis of you and poorvi in Room-304. 

Thank you for all these memories! . Apan toh Milte rahenge.

Khusii, Bhangra partner... was so fun teaching with you. Will always remember the moments we've spent together. Tere saath punjabi cheezo pe relate karne mein mujhe bahot mazaa aata hai lol, missed Punjab a little less because of you. Stay as beautiful and caring as you are :) Baat karte rehna and keep shining!
Great friend, sister, daughter(???!). Enjoyed every time spent with ya hope to see you achieve great things in the future. Keep in touch

Oooooooo didiiii, Thankyou for taking care of me.. har cheez me duniya dari ka gyan sikhati hai. Gusse me ni sunta mai lekin sochta zarror hu.
Thankyou for being one of the very few people who stayed with me in my all time low. Rakhi bhoola ni hu mai or tu bhot bhoolne degi. Kabhi to gift de hi dunga acha saa. Take care

Hi Khushiii, I am definitely not lying when I am saying that I definitely considered you to be my best frienddd <3 I love how street smart you are and how you are good at literally everything. Hello, genuinely bohut achi dost hai too  , tere sath bohut achi memories hai . Khusiyaa, our Pro Juaari lol. You've always been the one person who is there for help kisi bhi time pe, and I'm very thankful for that. I've had a lot of fun with you. Thank you sab kuch itna memorable banane ke liye <3
I'll miss your lively energy, mast maula insaan attitude XD, and patte shuffle karna skill. All the best for Google, ab life enjoy karo :)
Keep getting bhand and keep enjoying (merko bula lena jab hotel chodna ho XD). Will miss youuuuuu babygirl <3

Twinnnnn Barbeque nation pe cake bhi katw liya >-<

google partner <3 tumhrare saath humesha bohot maza aata hai. holi, cult night, goa kaafi kuch kara humne saath mein. hyderabad mein toh saath mein hi rahenge aur bohot maze karenge. i hope you keep smiling and achieving everything you want. stay happy :)
Khushi Ma'am, literally one of the coolest chicks I know. You are such a powerful singer. Apex, parties, dancing, everything has been so fun with you! Always be funny as you are <3

Khushiiii

You're so cool and sing so incredibly well

You were my first friend here—someone who once meant a lot to me. Over time, things changed, but I’ll always remember your vibrant, outspoken energy. I wish you all the best. Keep slaying like you always did. We may not be the same as before, but I hope we find a new way to stay connected!

Kuso <3 You’ve been an incredible friend, always there for me during tough times, understanding me better than I understand myself, and motivating me without even needing to ask. I’ll truly miss you, our fun talks, third-wheeling hugs with you and Rhythm haha, one more thing forever funny and secret thing bw us is the basketball court lmao..Wishing you all the happiness and success in life. Let’s definitely stay in touch! friends like you are rare<3 vaise tera ASS bhi kuch kam nai hai sexyass ;)

Thanks a lot Khushi for all the memories we shared.
For the moments we shared it was so good and remebering you as a true sister.
Stay in touch always.
Best of luck for whatever lies ahead :)

Pls stop singing 😞.

Jab main tujhse baat karta hoon, lagta hai jaise main kisi full-stack londe se debug kar raha hoon—thoda macho vibe miss ho rahi hai! 👨‍💻

Waise, tu agar ladka hoti, toh shayad zyada chill hoti 🧒→👦… par phir Google ke “Premium” feature miss karti! 🤣

Lol, keep rocking 🤘🏻and stay happy—Rhythm ke sath beat pe beat! 🎶

Hi Khushee,

I still remember all the fun we had in the initial year—from coming to Hyderabad, being called Nichku, and what not!

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: We were in quarantine, and Hardik Mittal was my temporary roomate. Had fun meeting a lot of people, couldn't go out of Bakul, but had real fun inside the corridors, playing cricket, running, etc. Had fun meeting lots of new people who would go on to become my closest friends in the years to come :))

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Celebrations of birthdays, playing mafia and bluff with everyone. Time spent in Coorg with my friends was heavenly. Also, I specifically remember celebrating my birthday in 3rd year, we had gone out for go karting, and paintball, it was a super fun time enjoying with my friends.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Apart from my friends obviously, I will definetely miss all the canteens, Paneer Karam Dosa and Aam Rass at BBC, random juice combinations at JC, coffee at VC and Damam bhaiya, and extra masala veg fried maggi at Davids

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I am a lot more focused than before, and I only care about the things that matter deeply to me, including my work and my close friends and family.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: MS CS in UCSD

testimonials.text: A man of focus, commitment and sheer freaking will. My best roommate and a constant inspiration for everything I do. You're just like Rancho from 3 Idiots, literally saari features match! I love that you always wait for everyone to finish before moving on, however it may cost you. Teri "explore everything" ki philosophy is something I admire a lot and will always incorporate in my life. One day we'll complete that 42km marathon. Tu hamseha mere bhai jaisa raha hai. Bahut miss karunga yaar tujhe!

You have the strongest will of anyone I know,not just in research,but in everything you do. You’re also one of the most hardworking and focused person.I’ll always remember our 4 AM runs to David,and our discussions about GS.You’re full of life, and you’re always smiling with one of the most amazing smiles I’ve seen.I’ve learned so much from you. Of everyone leaving,I’ll miss you the most,Keshu. Wishing you a life full of joy,meaning,and discovery,can’t wait to see all the great things you’ll do.

Keshav is a monster in any sport but he's truly a beast in running, there's a reason why no one can catch him for birthday bumps. Keshav is the kind of guy with such an amazing work ethic, grind, and discipline that makes it so clear that he's going places. I'll always remember Keshav as someone who always has my back, whether on the cricket field or a last second assignment

Such a great number of small episodes from our college life I shared with you. You were always so energetic, be it TT, marathons or late night KCIS hide and seek. And you always had such an attachment with whatever you do. It was always great to see you enjoying your work, and be completely immersed in it, ignoring the outside world. Long conversations we had about cool things and research are very memorable. Great to see you reaching where you always wanted to be, and hope to meet you there too

Keshav is the most happy-go-lucky person I have ever met. He will not read moodle emails, prepare for GRE in the last 7 days, and still so smart that he aced everything. Your first birthday on campus was the most memorable time, along with Coorg. Hope you achieve all the success there is to achieve in life!

The most eligible bachelor, the sweetest guy, works harder than he should, and is very dedicated.
The best long-distance runner (😻).
The best person to have as a friend, I hope his smile never fades.

Keshav, one of the most dedicated souls i know. i have never seen someone work for long hours at that concentration level. i am sure you would be an asset to any research group or lab you go in.

all the best in life, and in research!

UCSD bound n research grinding since day 0, throwback to that cursed dataset annotation, pain was real but made it fun somehow 💀 Big brain moves always, no surprise u goin places. Proud of u bro. Catch u in cali soon maybe 🤞 Stay killin it 🔥
tu mera one of the first friends hain, I still remember those TT sessions, those groping XD, love you<3

Hello ji! :) Bro always greets me like this with such a good mood, I can't help but to return the favour. Insane work ethic and extremely messed up sleep schedule. I have no clue as to how he still manages to look majestic (goated hair btw). But I think your hardwork paid off with the crazy MS admit. Take care of your health too bro. You'll for sure achieve great heights. Keep in touch
Keshav is the computer vision guy with a good heart and solid vibes all around.

Keshav bhai hai apna! Always an elated person having smile on his face. 
Your vibes incorporated happiness in me. I enjoyed  linking your name with girls 😅. 
Wish you best for your research and future endeavors!
Keshav , my fellow litclub coordinator, is a great person to be around. He looks innocent, but conversations with him can get wild really fast xD.  Had fun working with you, bro.  Go rock UCSD
Fun and hardworking guy. I enjoyed and learnt a lot working together. Won't forget those Yuktahar convos. Best of luck for your future and do keep in touch!
Thank you bhai. Keep your values high bhai as you are till now. I believe that you will uphold those and remember me as you go to furthur heights in Research in US.

Keshav bhai, you are the most humble person I have seen on campus. Simple, cool and jovial, aap se baat karke dil khush ho jata hai. Ye energy banaye rakhna... 

Aur haan, college ke baad zaroor milna...
Docking 😳

Bro is the perfect mixture of smart, handsome, work and play.
The most professional casual dancer and runner I have seen.
Lot of fun memories, from Holi, to Megathon, to shouting when I saw you dance for the first time, and all the crazy pizza and mafia games we had :)
All the best and hope to be in touch :)
Such a sweet CV TA u were... Had fun talking to you nd ranting abt LNP.... G5 days were so cute... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need

One of the most sincere and genuinely helpful people around. Simplicity and clarity define him, and his CV skills? Next level. Always calm, always sorted. Wishing you a bright and successful journey ahead...

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer:
27th march -- sent straight to parijaat for quarantine! 
30th march -- out of quarantine -- the first class was ISS lab. 
the first actual lecture was linear algebra -- it felt surreal, the lecture hall, everything. had my first veg puff at VC on that day iirc, one of my favs at VC always...

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: cvpr 2025 paper got accepted! it was 1 am in the night, i had already slept, woke up suddenly to find the results, saw "Accept" on overleaf! that night had a different magic! the cold and the sweet coffee that followed -- all fresh in my mind.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: the cvit summer school -- i remember how excited i was to finally be joining cvit, it was the beginning of a completely new phase, and the freshness of those moments is something i will cherish forever. the album of music teacher would be a very nostalgic one!

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: have become much more mature and confident, especially in the last months. but still a long way to go. will forever take the lessons i learnt here close to my heart.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: on the road to become more confident, mature and overall a better human being. i hope i am able to stay in research and able to contribute meaningfully, that seems to be the best career goal as of now. and being able to give much time to family and friends.

testimonials.text: Vaibhav is the lab resident—always buried in research, focused like a laser, and practically lives in the department. And is the ~worst~ best piano player I performed with.

bhai, I will always remember the late night deep talks and secrets, I don't think I had with anyone yet. Mein sabse sunta rehta tha ki logo ko kitne kharab roommate milein, but kabhi relate nahi kar paya, kyuki mujhe toh kabhi koi dikkat hi nahi hui. love you and your ass <3.

Really hardworking guy. Always amazed to see his dedication to work.
Equally fun person to be around tho, whenever he is available 😜.

Studious mode 24x7, focused like crazy 😤 But when it's time to chill or celebrate - man's a whole ANIMAL lmao. Love that switch, always fun when u around. CVPR king and still humble, respect 🫡 happy ur staying back for a bit, now come play bb with me, i’ll train u up

Vaibhav :)
My idea of friendship has always been about sticking with people who are passionate about what they do, who stay focused, and who lift each other up. I’m really glad I found one in you.
Also, maybe it’s time to cut down on the coffee... and give your girlfriend a little break? ;) Maybe try a new one for a while and switch back if she gets interesting again ;)
All the best, buddy, always there<3

u are the only person with whom I've interacted from online sem till my last day in clg.iot & esw projects,sitting in nilgiri lab entire night,kcis roof @13.00(1.00 :p), and all those moments we shared together.  when i think of u, I'm reminded of u waving at me when we walk past each other & having that smile on ur face hamesha. im grateful for a friend like u, u are such a hardworking person & I wish u all the happiness in future. stay in touch always:)

No. I am NOT gonna talk about it. We're not gonna discuss it. There is no way I'm gonna mention anything remotely related to research :P This man is a MACHINE as unrelenting as the Terminator. He just never stops, like bro...it won't hurt to take a break 😭 Insanely talented and works even harder. One of the purest souls I've met on campus. Absolutely love all the chats we have in the mess. Keep in touch (you're not getting rid of me that easily anyway). Come out of the lab atleast now bruh 😭😭

Ahh, Vaibhav. OG Yuktahari!
Embrace when I talk good about you for once.
Crazy smart guy.. It was very fun discussing with you, be it the quantum discussion we had in CG class, or CG discussions we had in IQIC. lol.
Oh and yuktahar discussions, I think everything from Quantum to Philosophy to finding how to draw lines on old Manuscripts ;)
Can't think of a person who can make drawing lines on a manuscript more fascinating.. lol. Never lose your inquisitive mind..

Vaibhav is the most passionate guy I have ever known, I would love to learn the piano from you someday bro! Always remain your good-ol' jolly self -- your most authentic self. It is an honour to get teased by you bro, your humour is legendary, saaddd bhaiii!!! I will always cherish the time we spent in Coorg together.

One of the sweetest people I met on campus. Will always remember running into you at VC and ranting about random stuff while we headed to our labs:)

Keep working hard, and ab toh hum dono dulle hain so milenge in 5th year :p

Vaibhav - Apne Research Street meetups and campus walks hamesha yaad rhege. The discussions we have had were crazy and I hope to continue them in the future. To describe you - very grounded person, always excited to share knowledge, keen listener, not judgemental and there are many more which I may not be able to fit in here. You have been an amazing friend. There is a lot to learn from you.I hope you are able to achieve all your goals! All the best! Stay in touch (jaldi milte Blr mai)!
Bro , you are a good mate in CVIT all those rubbish nerd talk about conferences is something I will never forget and for a fact you turned into DD now so we have more conferences to make

Man is the most stoic guy I've ever seen. I meet him every time I try going on walks. Absolutely engrossed in studies, I feel sometimes he takes stuff too seriously or too close to heart🥲.
The voice actor of Pathaan 2.0, man, those last-minute recordings will be remembered for ages.
I will definitely miss ur wise words and PJs and ur laughs🤣, and hope u have a wonderful future.

Bhai tu bada passionate aur bada mast banda hai , bohot maza aaya 4 salon mai hope karta hun teri aage ki life mast rahe and hope you push the existing boundaries with your passionate research, hope we can still be in touch.

Vaibhav is kinda inspiring, passionate about learning and research. At the same time, he was one of the most active, lively, and fun people to talk to during the online semester. I loved those days and kind of miss them. The irony is that the group was named “G1 Forever” (lol). Thanks for the memories, bro.

Hello sirji,
aap toh roz hi kahi na kahi mil jate the xD
I have so much respect for you vaibhav. You're so sweet and down to earth (you never flaunt how smart you really are). You've been such a genuine and reliable friend and thanks for that!
You've chosen a rather unconventional path for yourself and I know you'll do really well. Have faith, don't doubt yourself and we're all rooting for you, fellow dulla xD

Bestestestest friend. Always enjoy the subtle roasts and burns. Yuktahar buddy. Always there for me, especially at the last minute moments, be it near an assignment deadline or phone charge at 1%. Extremely spit conscious, don't know how he is going to manage in future :)).
Extremely hardworking, and absolutely loves loves loves submitting to the ICDAR conference.
You have always inspired me to work hard - even when I dint feel like it. All the best for ur future, bahut miss karunga tujhe yaar.

Vaibhav is the resident music genius + CVIT king. He nonstop grinds passionately on all tasks and is a coffee addict. I'll remember Vaibhav as the guy who always lifts up the vibe during parties and cracks those hilarious jokes. While others might think they know Vaibhav well, they don't know about his insane crack side that comes every blue moon. It's truly a sight to behold and one day I wish to see it again. :))

Vaibhav :) I had so much fun practicing and performing with you during Freshers and Octave. I'll always remember your cheerful Hellos whenever we met :D You're very fun, chill and humble, always stay the same. Take care and keep in touch!
Hardworking and knowledgeable guy. It was nice interacting with you and learning stuff from you. Good luck for your future. And keep playing the keyboard, you rock!

Vaibhav, you are the only one I know in campus who gets deep pleasure from understanding any concept and who would put days of work to understand it just a little more. Both of our love for understanding CS brought us together and I had a great time learning with you, and can never forget the xv6 assignment. Always remember the basics, keep on enjoying and learning CS even more and let that thrill of researching never go away. Keep being dedicated and keep making ppl around u sway with ur piano

You are the person who I respect a lot, for your work ethic and your ability to get things done. I respect how many efforts you put (while also enjoying the process) to achieve your dreams. You always add more spice to the fun we have in our group (I am sure Akshat would agree with this :) Glad that we still can be in touch and see each other regularly. And we must have more karaoke nights next semester, may be   in my house XD

Hi bhai, I remember our friendship from 1st year itself. It is great having you as a friend. Although in the later half, we didn't talk much, but you'll be my friends forever. Zada research karli bhai tune XD.
May your research take you to next level. Let's stay connected.
Sale OSN TA nahi bana👎

You’re the most focused, hardworking person I’ve known.From library days and OSN struggles to CVIT nights decoding PyTorch and chasing chairs in KCIS, it’s been a journey. I’ve learned so much from you, not just in work, but in life.Even when busy,you were there when I needed help, and your perspectives have shaped mine.You’re the one I look up to most,and the one I strive to be like the most. I hope life brings you the success, joy,and fulfillment you truly deserve, both in research and beyond.

Got to know you through frnds... Such a sweet and humble person you are... Smile suits you a lot keep it wherever you go... Kassi ho bahut:)... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need

Hi cutiepie... 
You are the most like minded person I saw in CVIT. Our endless discussions about our futures, challenges have also brought so much peace to me. You have always been a motivating person for many the challenges and hurdles I faced during college life. Wishing that your dreams and plans come true.. All the best for everything in future... Stay in touch...✌️

Vaibhav and his headphones. Can't find one without the other. Of all the places we  would meet in yuktahar most of the time, or I'd find you lost in thought in research street. Those discussions were some of the best :)
bhai you are one of my closest persons of all time, I would remember time spent with you. A perfect mix of arijit and einstein. Progress well and become a very brilliant scientist. I trust you.

You are such a kind hearted person. the fresher nights were so much fun and the 13:00 (am?) kcis terrace moments were equally special. i appreciate how sincere you are to your work, but equally humble and polite. all the best for the future and stay the same always!

Vaibhav Sirji!

I loved the time I spent with you during the first year because of the IoT project, lol, it was so much fun! You're such a motivation, and literally one of the sweetest faces I see around campus. Keep on growing and achieving more and more in life!

Keep in touch, byee!

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: First time away from home to a new city, new people. I started worrying how should i live alone. My first day was filled with lots of tensions, worries and i cried a lot after my parents went. But at that time i didn't know i would be this crazy with people who were complete strangers to me.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: andaru sankranthi ki traditional dresses veskuni photos teeskuni, tarvata ws lo cards aadukovadam....❤️

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Cant say one...All the birthdays at jc seem like get togethers. Chatting with my friends, sharing each other random stories, scrolling memes on instagram and laughing like idiots, imitating each other and many more. Nenu pavani kalisi insta chustu paadina songs. Dressing up together.so many memories

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: May be konchem extrovert ni ayyaanu.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: May be real life.

testimonials.text: Potti.... Dance reel cheyyaniki ready ga undu banglore lo.... Topper akka...Itle happy ga navvutu navvistu undu... I am always there for you.... More of a WhatsApp buddy (if that’s a term), but one of the greatest academic achievers I know. A very nice, kind, and charming person at heart. I wish her all the very best in everything she sets out to do!

Remember that I'll always be there for you to listen when you want to share something ..even though we don't talk daily.I always wish that you stay happy in your life no matter what. Wishing you the best in everything!!❤️

I will always remember our crazy moments and all the fun we had. Let’s meet again in Bangalore. All the best for your future.

A truly great friend to have. Hope you stay in touch after college also. Wish you all the very best for your future. Felicity appudu nuvvu chesina help ki truly grateful and lastly, next year pakka wish chestha..

Special person, kind-hearted, genuine, and someone with a soul that shines. The person I would trust in any situation. Chaalaa saarlu cheppa kaani, eppudu navvutu undu — chaalaa baaguntaadi and spreads happiness to everyone around. Always amazed on how well you understand me, which I don’t know how. When you are happy, world feels so much fun and happier. Anduke inka chaalaa miss avtaa ninnu. One of the persons who has changed my college life. Anyways, be happy and be you. Thanks annitiki.

Pitta koncham kootha ganam ki proper example. The amount of efforts you put into a bond and how much you value people is something i really admire. Udyamam la songs paaduthu, manali trip lo dance lu eyyadam, and kissik ki best dance partner i could find. Smh we couldn't talk so much but naaku blr osthe let's talk and meet full ga. Roju ki okate sari biryani lu thinakunda, please please eat 3 times. Please please be happy and have lots of fun.  I will miss you ra geethikaayyy.

My first singing partner. Eppudu anukole stage meeda padtha ani but dairyam icchav nuvve. Naku dam dare song nerpinchav.
Chala chilipi chesthalu chesthav which makes you unique alane undu.
nee chuttu aa positive vibe untadi which makes people around you happy and banglore poyaka marchipoku ilane patala kacheri pedthu undu.Malli kalsinappudu kacheri pettudham. Naa chicken guttu rattu chesav naa patiki nenu madipoina dosa tintunte. Edo roju full ga tinta nuvve surprise avvali. Keep singing!!

Different varieties of food try chesa nee valle. Thanks for your support you gave me when I was down with dengue. Kalisi cheyyadam valla la taship easy ga chesesam. Peacefulga undu. I will remember your self love club t-shirt. All the best!! Keep smiling..

Eppudu support kavali anna chala support chesav. Nee lanti frnd okalu unte chalu life chala baguntadi. Sorry nenu neeku same ivvalekkapoyanu, ekkuva time spend cheyalekkapoyanu. Future full enjoy cheddam kalisi. All the best, life lo neeku anta best avvali ani korukuntuna

akkkoouyyii...the most chilllest, cooolesttt, funnieesttt girl of our batch. bongu muutthi bhaama, corresstena?? manam ekuva kalisi undale but adi ento epdu kalisinaa edo long lost friend feeel vastundi , malli aruku lo bitching night or else manali...i will remember those forever. elago bglr ne gaaa..vacheyiii kabzaa chesedaam!!!

Very close and truthfull friend.I miss annoying you the most.Roju ala room lo dorlutu unde vaadini , ekkadiki veldam anna vaddu anna chivariki oppinchi teeskelnanduku thanks.Nenu enni dhoola panulu chesina nannu bharinchi nanduku kooda.Roju ala Kalisi jogging ki velli chivariki udipi vilas lo tiffin cheyadam, matladukuntu campus lo tirigadam ,bayata tirigadam chala miss avtaanu.I admire the positive energy that you always have.Malli Banglore lo kalludam, baaga enjoy cheddam.

Hello Pappa!! A cute and strong bond we had always gave a lot of comfort to me. Hmm nuvvu lekunte nenu chala courses fail ayyedi... Your assignments, and mentoring is the only reason I passed some courses in college. Random Open Gym talks and talking about colors are best memories... LANGA/SLANG lo inko L unte bagunnu.. You’re such a sweet and warm person ra! Wish we had a few more chances to talk properly and get closer — koncham late ayina, still hoping for more girls’ nights😆 (It was soo fun and got us more closer)
And I know you're as much into K-content as I am, so we’ll never run out of things to rant about. So definitely keep in touch... drama recommendations and random gossip await! 😉

Biryani kaaranga unna edusthu, nemmadiga entha enjoy chesthu tintaavo! And I have to admit, maree ekkuva edipisthu unta ninnu, manchi reactions istaav, that's why I do it! Just konchem fast ga naduvu, please! Wishing you all the best for your future, become faster!

Sorry sorry sorry. Chala things ki sorry. Deeni gurinchi manam detailed ga discuss cheskundam. But first things first one of my closest friends nuvvu. Everything, those random outings, deep discussions in open gym, lunches and dinner are nothing without you and thanks for getting me passed in exams:) eesari bangalore lo Wonderla ki pakka teesukeltha. 'The Boys' most eligible member. Sensitive and Short. Nee chuttu andaru always happy. Alage nuv kooda happy ga undu. (Konchum navvandi bro.. ) . All the best for your future. Kaludhaam andaram and trip kooda veddam. (Wonderla ki veldama?).

Garden, nee gurinchi alochinchina prathi saari, I think how does someone so small have so much energy ani, actually emi thintave nuvvu? Eppudu lively ga, untav, seeing you puts a smile on my face. you are one of the most friendlest guys ever and one of my first friends in campus... the vibe and the atmosphere around you is extremely warm. keep this spirit and energy in you always, hope you never change, and be extremely successful in life, also shaadi pe zaroor bulana :)

Nikunj Bhaisaab,
Teri harkate yaha likhne layak toh hai nahi, kahi leak hogayi toh tujhe property se nikal dege XD. But lucky that I was you neighbour, you were my go to buddy, your room had such good vibes, and always welcoming.
I am gonna miss coming to your room, and you coming to my room and doing what not. Mee you Vansh Umang and eventually Rayaan and so many moments in our room. Will never forget those nights and the day you were leaving when Arush though us so much.Sweet & Harami bhai NG.

Hi bro :) Enjoyed all the chats we had in Yuktahar and thank you so much for the pointers to the PGs 🙏😭 You have my sincerest and heartfelt condolences for the 80km daily trips that you made and will have to make going forward. Atleast I'm happy that it's not Bangalore. Have fun bro!
Best partner to discuss random things and tease Pranav (my roommate)! An optimal mix of seriousness and funny, Nikunj is a fun sport who also knows how to take a joke himself!

Nikunj bhaiiii, the amount of fun that I had with you in college is just not comparable. The evening walks, the morning after breakfast walks, gossip in my room,and of course the things that we did in the room ... everything holds a special place in my heart. You are the person I used to come to if my mood was not right because I knew that you understood me and could relate to me. Even the internship period was pretty fun and I am excited to come to Gurgoan because you are there!! Love u bro :)

Nikunj, it’s been great knowing you! You’re a genuinely sweet person and a talented badminton player haha!! always focused and full of positive energy. Wishing you continued success and happiness in everything you pursue. Keep shining on and off the court. All the best for the future!

Nikunj bhai, you are a really nice person with a nice outgoing personality. 
Aap ki wajah se atmosphere becomes fun and jovial around you. (except for being a TA...) 
Keep this energy...

Nikunj bhaiiiii, discipline toh bhai koi tumse seekhe. Itna laser sharp focus and balancing acads with masti is not easy man. you did it.
Last semester me, I got to know you better, especially your naughty side XD. Had meaningful discussions and joyful badminton matches with you. You are really a good friend of mine. I wish all the best for your future.
And me koi business karunga toh tujhe zaroor bulaunga, saath me karege 2 baniyee.

Nikunj bhai, you are a full sorted uncle for me. You know what you want to do, what you need, prefer and all. When you told about your college life in Vansh's room, I could see you have that bakchodiness and that good friend in you but bhai tu harami bhi hai, patani teri vahaj se vansh ke room me kya kya dekha tha bhai. Anyways, milte h bhai.

Nikunj is the most disciplined person I met in college. A funny, optimistic and a chill guy, he completes all his "daily routine tasks" effectively. It was fun to argue with him over Haldiram vs Bikanerwala debate (bhai decide karle Haldiram better hai ki Bikanerwala). A true rasmalai lover by heart and the person who gives free advices to everyone, this person impressed me with his strict schedule for the day. All the best for your future bhai!

Nikunj bhai, it’s hard to believe how quickly the last 3.5 years flew by. From random street food walks skipping dinner, post-exam and birthday dinners, to facing your deadly Muthia Muralidharan spin balls 😂  it’s been a ride. Your obsession with item songs(u know who 😄), killing dance steps, & those legendary talks about your “advanced background,” “12 atomic bonds,”, “protein body 💪” , "dulhan ki tarah sharmana" will always stay with me. So many unforgettable memories. Stay in touch, bhai!

Nikunj bhai, you are go-to man for walking around in the campus. Whether it is academics or sports, it was great sharing knowledge and spending time with you. Will always cherish those TT times and playing cards with you. Let’s stay in touch. All the best!!

Nikunj Garg — roommate by chance, brother by choice. From business talks that made us feel like startup founders, to late-night life crisis debates that needed no solution, and of course, endless discussions about hm hmm — we covered it all! Breakfast buddies, overthinkers, and full-time friends. This bond is forever, bhai — life may change, but dosti fixed hai.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: My first day in on campus went in quarantine, scamming the guard to somehow end roommates with Pratham. On that day, all of my friends from KKK got close rooms, new members and we started our forever lasting journey.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Playing games 24x7 with friends

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: DSAC board game sessions

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: no more spontaneous responses without thinking

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: work for a while

Gaurav handing anoop and random discussions is always fun with you! Hope i graduate on time too lol

Most passionate Valorant player ever ? Jokes apart, crazy smart person, keep rocking and outshining those around you.
will never forget all the fun chats that we used to have at random places and times. prithvi practice se lekar obh mei bakchodi karne tak kaafi crazy time raha hai. best of luck for your life!

History defining partnership, you gave me so much confidence that day bro, you don’t even know!! Only pizza zone would know our friendship and cute stories we shared with each other, to many more championships and wishing whatever the astrologer in hidden castle told about you to become true 🤭
A very hardworking guy who becomes expert at anything he puts his mind into. Good at both games and academics. I am sure you will achieve great feats in life. Do stay in touch : )

Hey man, you're one of the nicest people I got to know. The memories we shared on the cricket field will always be precious to me,  and your passion for the team was awesome! Good luck at Nvidia buddy, and please stay in touch!
Hey Gaurav! It was a pleasure teaching you, Prithvi, and the batch dances through the years. Thanks for brightening all the practice sessions. All the best for everything the future holds!
gb, merko toh kabhi similarity nhi dikhi but suna toh maine bhi bohoto se hai lmao. tera valo rage is fun to watch, thodi cricket ki bhi practice kar liya kar lekin
