Bhai tera aur Yadav ka room best time on campus🎀😘

"mein malaysia raha hu, mere papa forbes 500 mein hain, mein ranji khela hu",...., saale tu khudka favourite hain maalum hain, cutie. I will always remember you whenever I will see a helicopter. seriously tu smartie, cutie, bhola, sab hain, will miss you :(
Nice 🐣...

name: Ishwar B Balappanawar
tagline: Swear to shake it up if you swear to listen

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: I think I had it easy. Most of the day was spent in quarantine, locked in a room. But that night brought joy as we played games like Mafia and hide-and-seek.  On the third day, once we were finally let out, the real fun and adventure truly began, foreshadowing 4 years of nonstop chaos and fun.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: That day I was out till 4:30 - Seeing the city thriving and alive at that moment was livening. Peaceful, just standing in front of the gate - admiring the beauty of the sight - with perfect lighting for the vibe and with cool wind gushing past your cheeks. I'd never felt so alive before.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Sitting on the benches in front of VC, enjoying the weather and the ambience.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I've changed a LOT since my first year. The biggest change has to be that I've now learnt what truly matters.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: 2 more years of uncertainty and grinding. Hopefully the leap of faith I am taking will work out fine.

testimonials.text:
It's never a good idea to bet against Ishwar.....
Therefore you always want him to be on your side. And I'm extremely lucky to have had him on my side for more instances than I can count.

He is fun, He is smart, He can effortlessly switch between brain rot and deep philosophy. But he is still human, he cares, he likes drama but not conflict. He trusts me, but still is the biggest skeptic ive met. He is a contradiction, hard to understand, but is a puzzle worth solving.

Best person i met in college. Always funny and up to craziness. Only dude who could match my freak XD. Will always remember the dinner dates with netflix and chill and the deep debates we had on random philosophy. The most hardworking person i know and a guy i would trust with anything in my life.

Ishwar is a sweetheart, and one of my earliest friends in college (Clusters actually did something for once!). Whether it be days laden with course work or nights about our adventures in Dungeons and Dragons, Ishwar has managed to sneak into each of my key memories (and I love him for it!)

The way he balances his life around his heavy research work abd still manages to tag along with all our tomfoolery is something I have never managed to unravel. Thanks for all the memories Ishwar!

Ishwar, you’re my favourite cat on campus, mischievous and always up to something, from plotting against TAs to trolling in course groups you’re not even in. You’re smart, playful, and a furry who won’t even pet a dog.You have this sweet, kid-like presence that somehow makes everything feel lighter and more fun. You’re thoughtful, creative, and the best person for the most weird conversations.I’ll miss bumping into you, teasing you endlessly, and hearing your random UwUs. Love you, my furry cat.

My dear tooty frooty cutie patootie, I'll badly miss you deer ;( Carried each other through so many courses and way too many ups and downs with the gay brainrot memes (were they memes tho?). Ok the brainrot was mostly mine :P Who's gonna randomly come to lab when bored and drag me away from work by saying "Hey cutie" 🥹🥹 Will miss having someone to hard carry the projects by "helping" with coding. Obviously, cannot end this without talking about the life-saving clutch results you got for RSAI🥰

Ishwar is a pure class character, who is always ready to help you with literally anything. I have had the pleasure of working with him closely, and I can safely say that you cannot get into trouble with him being around. He will somehow manage everything and will get the job done perfectly without showing any attitude. He is quite fun to talk to (fondly remember his passionate explanation of DnD and his writeups) and very approachable. Hope ours paths cross again in the future :)

A funny, sweet and simply brilliant guy. It was always fun hanging around with you. Would have loved to hangout more. A master (de)bater, with many questionable interests, but thats for another time. You always light up any conversation and I only hope you continue to do so. All the best for whatever comes your way!

Hii my fellow IPT TA! You somehow made paper checking actually fun— that’s a talent in itself. Always such a fun person to talk to, and I’ll never forget that you’re the only horror book reader I met on campus! Also, Wattpad?? Reader and writer? We need way more gossip sessions about that .Wishing you all the best for CMU and everything ahead — see you soon!

I love Ishwar. He's basically perfect.

Perfect in the ways that he's perfect in - no one could be a better Ishwar B B than Ishwar B B.

Allow me to explain - this man can be an understanding and caring person, and a freaky force of nature, in the same breath. Crashing into him in Bakul's corridors have contributed to some of my most rewarding experiences as well as ones that I might never heal 

As I said - Ishwar is perfect. The world be worse off both with one less, and one more Ishwar B B.

I had a lot of fun working on DASS project with you (even though the project was a PAIN towards the end 😭). Though we didn't speak a lot during clg I'll remember those random rant sessions we had about courses. All the best for your future!

Ishwar is a brilliant, hardworking researcher with exceptional skills in AI—truly someone to watch! His talks can get… interesting [and creepy] (especially with Pranav around), but his dedication is undeniable. Wishing you great success in your higher studies—just go easy on the ‘PK fan club’ moments! It was good to know you and be friend. Ending words - uwwu.....

uWu Ishwar. I have loved the Philosophical discussions which we have had and hope to continue those sometime in the future. You are a pretty organized person and SE would not have been as much fun without you. Keep working hard and I hope you achieve all you want to in life. Let's keep in touch. All the best!

One of the sweetest people to ever exist❤️, and probably one of the smartest too. Thanks for making the online sem fun, those G1 meets made the online sem honestly one of the best semesters of college. I wished we could have spoken more on campus, but you always were one of favorite people on campus. Again, I'm sorry for the fact that you had to deal with Sreeram all these years (and again at CMU).  Love you buddy, and all the best at CMU and please stay in touch

We had some great moments together. I remember how we could talk about random stuff (with each discussion growing more and more weird :) and yes obviously the first batch trip. I actually wished I've joined the Lit Club with you. Having your witty remarks in our chats was always a delight. It would be wonderful if we could continue our conversations about research and life even in future 〃⌒▽⌒〃
Really sweet dude. Will miss all our conversations (and crying over badami leaving us here :\ ). I hope you fulfil your goal of getting a fur-suit some day.. have fun in cmu!

Ishwar is one of the most loyal friends I know. He always came whenever I called him to BBC. Most (including me) saw him as a hard-working and smart kid who aced his academics. But having known him up close, he never lets others feel that way. He's a very humble person. He helped me out with my research work without making me feel dumb about those silly probability theorems. Truly one of the truest friends I've had in campus. Thanks for making those semesters at BBC special, meow:))
Take care of your goblins (and yourself) while you're away <3

On my first day, I walked up to him and talked. I never expected us to have a friendship that lasted so long from such a brief moment. I like your easy-going and carefree nature, and I'm happy we got to share so many things together. I will miss our nights watching anime together. I know you'll be able to face any problems you face, but I'll cheer you on regardless. I'll always be a friend to you, and I hope you have a great journey at CMU

Ishwar :) One of the very few people I am still friends with from G1! Yes, those G1 days were indeed memorable, and would always bring a smile to my face whenever I would think about them. You are one of the most studious and smart guys I have met in college, and I wish you all the best for your future, I am sure you will do great!

Yo Ishwar, you’re a really nice guy to talk to, had a really great time at precog with you and all those WUs😂, and your jokes hit different bro, have a great time at cmu, all the best and keep in touch ra

Brother is so humble, nice and intelligent + is a total cutie-patootie. Your dedication is infectious! Econ team didn't happen, so lets team up for a game or two the next time we meet :P All the best!

Heyy Ishwar!  Although I had limited interactions with you primarily as a part of those G1 meets online, and that PNS TAship we did together, one of the things I have held on to since first year is greeting you. Really smart and fun to talk to, I will miss the random meows you introduced in those conversations. I wish you the best and hope we stay in touch.

U⩊U ♡ 
Funny character, personality as bright as his hair :D 
Have had so much fun interacting with you especially in the good old G1 days of the first year.

Ishwar, you look like you are the most innocent guy on campus, you have got the cutest puppy face ever, but when one actually talks with you, do they realize how savage you really are. I have seen your love for books and movies while having many chats with you. You are extremely smart and thoughtful. All the best for CMU :))

Ishwar is such a cute guy, I loved every time I hung around you. I'd just plop down next to you and spew the weirdest stuff. Loved our little conversations, and I went to my first concert with you! I had a blast, couldn't ask for better company. I really should've gotten to know you sooner, We'll play some dune and dnd yet!

My favourite guy in college wishes we could have spent more time together.
I like u a lot, the way ur so chill and calm and take things so nonchalantly. And I am not qualified enough to talk to you about how god ur in studying.

Ishwarrrrr; You're an amazing person and there's always more to uncover in you; I always look forward to talking with you cause its so fun and you're outtake on things are pretty interesting; Goodluck with CMU!! and I hope to meet you here on the 1st/2nd week of Aug

Ishwar sir,  you were really a jovial and a funny person. 
we met on a skit and soon became good friends. We even became educators for Bhargav sir XD. 
You are a chill guy, just keep that forever... 

And let's connect even after college... 
UwU btw.

Hi Ishwar, Any day, I don't know if I'll meet my close friends, but I'll definitely see you outside my room everyday, wearing your shoes, leaving for lab, coming from lab etc.
And yes, thanks for carrying DPCN xd.
Hope you get in life what you dream of. Lets stay connected.

Really talked with you a lot throughout college. We went to office together. Had a few weekend walks, where we explored areas because we had nothing to do. It was always insightful to talk with you, when you came up with interesting facts i did not know. Thanks for carrying our team in ANLP :). CG5 was obviously fun. I remember you winning in rock paper scissors to decide which song we will do. We did play a little in office too. Was fun having your company all this time. Wish you all the best.

Ishwar comes off as a very serious and demure but he is really chill and actually a pretty fun person to be with. Ishwar is a very deep thinker and even his jokes are full of complicated references. Had a great time with him in the POIS project which we took lightly after the midsem and had to grind in the last few days xD. He is innately smart and I am sure he will do good wherever he goes next. All the best!

Heyaa
You're a very sweet and wholesome person, and it was always fun talking with you about anything and everything 
stay the same:) 
Good luck for USA!

Ishwar is a sincere, thoughtful and an inquisitive guy by nature. He is a playful man who bonds well easily with anyone. A hardworking guy by nature, his playful nature combined with his focus is something that makes him stand out of the crowd. I have full faith and confidence that he would be able to achieve everything he wants to achieve. All the best bro, for your future!

When I think of Ishwar I think of https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rlkSMp7iz6c

You're insanely smart, witty, and poetic. I am infinitely grateful to have you as a roommate, consistent and reliable throughout all 4 years, and hopefully 2 more xD

leon's biggest fan :) jokes aside, you're a very sweet person (and very meme-able), and i'll cherish all the memories we've made together over the past few years in college. i admire how you are so chill (sometimes too chill) no matter the situation you are in. retigaaaaaa (musical); You're an amazing person da and you can make any moment fun! Call chestha undu, and keep in touch, mawsssss.

I hope RCB ki okasari cup vastundi after 2028 endukante next 3 years cup .....

Kudirte raa hyderabad ki

ayyyy naveen man! i remember asking you whether we can be roommates in the gallery area of bakul. since then i have always told my parents how kind, sweet, and genuine you have always been. all my friends told me how you used to smile always and how lucky i am to get a roommate who never created any fuss. from putting cloth in between the door so that the door noise does not wake me up to having the most sweet converstions with you it has been one hell of a ride naveen.all the best man see you!!

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: The day kicked off with parents dropping me off in the campus, met my room-mate and other friends with whom I had interacted online, also got scolding from the guard for gathering a lot of people in the room due to covid scare lol. But yeah it was mainly interacting with batchmates on day-1.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Long campus walks with friends, discussing about a variety of topics from life issues to gossiping. And yeah the amazing group of friends I got from the campus will be the most memorable thing for me.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: I’ll miss the late night hangout’s, roaming the campus and the post assignment submission bakchodi and ranting. Nothing beats a set of friends sitting in a room and talking bs for 3 hours straight.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I think I have matured a lot since first year, I used to be really competitive and insecure but now I’ve become much more calmer and have my priorities really straight. I have started worrying less about what people will think of me and have started to accept that things happen for a certain reason, that there is no use worrying about the future or crying over the past about what could have been different.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Starting a new career in tech and hoping to create impact from the work I do. Apart from this, looking to make more friends along the way, stay in touch with the current ones and yes roam a lot of places (in and out of India).

testimonials.text: I'm not even sure where I could begin. I think I've spent more time with him than my other super-close friends combined. There's so much that I couldn't fit here and even more that should never see daylight. So, I suppose I'll leave a cryptic message with random terms - sweet big man, frickin amazing story teller, high-minded individual, PYQs finder, omg he's so tall, and a few "short"-comings.

Heyyy Mitanshh,

Okay let me tell you — you are honestly the most knowledgeable and humble person combo I’ve ever met. So full of gyaan, yet so down to earth — I absolutely respect that. 

Even though the TAship was probably the weirdest one I could’ve chosen, you made it super easy. The best moments were definitely during the DS TAship — that’s when we actually started talking, and it was amazing working with you! 

Bangalore mein mast catch-up karenge!
Meet you soooon in BLR.........

Sabse banger ICPC teammate :p loved the absolute unhinged nonsense we would do even during the online round (annoying Prakul>>>). You are super competent and the most chilled out positive person ever. Will lowkey miss the MMiB grind and rants; continue working hard, doing well and retain your optimism and enthusiasm towards everything:)

We are defo going Kapoor's cafe again very soon :O

The glue that keeps the group together! One of the most dedicated and hardworking people I have met. Always fun to have a convo with you. Thoda load kam lena seekh ja. Looking forward to making many more memories with you

Hii Mitansh,
Apna kuchh khas connect hai yar. Mehnat to kafi log karte hai bhai, but tereme ek alag hi passion aur focus dekha hai mene. Koshish karunga esa focus mai bhi la pau. Tu bohot caring aur well-behaved hai bhai, with ZERO arrogance (sach me kafi rare cheez hai) and team leading skills to in-built hai bhai tereme (jo mere jese lazy logon ka stress bohot kam kar deti hai 😂).
Thanks for never being judgemental towards me.
Take care, brother.

Mitansh :) one of the nicest friends i know. i would forever miss your heartfelt gaaliyan. 

forever DIP teammate. i am sure the excellent work we did there would continue to benefit humanity XD.

as soon as mitansh would see you in the distance, he would spread out his arms T, and run towards you (to give you a hug), and you know you are about to feel a lot of pain when the collision happens !!! i will miss that pain so much now.

Los of love buddy, all the best in life!

The point of origin of legendary MKG group ;). OG Mumbai groupwala. True MI fan. Cricket buddy. Your enthusiasm and dedication never ceases to amaze me. From the late night discussions to the evening cricket matches and cricket streaming together I will forever cherish these moments with you. You are very knowledgeable and I have learnt quite a lot from you and I am sure you will have a great life ahead. Let us catch up soon. All the best bro!

Best person to meet in group 5.... Some how sab log Tereko kassi maanke chalte hain but I saw your masti vaala side also.... Hamare video calls courses ke baare mein discussions cricket ke bhi kabhi kabhi will miss those.... I wish you all the best for your future and I wish you get everything you need...

Bhai iss saal toh Ferrari nahi jeetega. Very nice person, loved discussing F1 with you, hanging out when I was still in Bakul, all the stupid stuff you used to do, all the Mumbai meetups. Don't change man, atb for whatever you pursue - you're definitely gonna kill it. Keep in touch!

Mitaaaanshhhhhh🥰🥰 Literally a gentle giant. I'm surprised that so few people actually know who you are as a person. To quote Vander from Arcane (great show btw), "You’ve got a good heart. Don’t ever lose it, no matter how the world tries to break you." Such a hardworking guy who's got his priorities straight. I'm still in awe at your honours decision and how you worked hard to make it worth the risk. Hope to achieve your leve of work-life balance. Keep racking those Ws. Will miss you a lot 🥹
Mitansh is one of the most jolly people I've known on campus. He is a very loyal friend as well, never backing down about helping others. Hope all your dreams come true, lets remain in touch!

Mitansh I feel you've become so much more mature over the years. You make me believe in hardwork, how putting in all the efforts can bring one the best of the outcomes. I enjoyed being in Group-5 alongside you and having conversations with you is always fun! You for sure made me fall in love with Yuktahar 😂 Stay in touch and keep growing!

Hello mits
You have such a warm personality yaar. Every conversation with you reminded me to take lite thodha, that one can be both ambitious but have fun. You are one of the people I look up to, genuinely. Your outlook to life is smthg I aspire for. You always have your friends back and you're so humble inspite of being very good. Work hard, enjoy life and keep reminding people around you what's really important in life
Stay in touch, milte hai bangalore mein:)

OG mumbaikar bro, really had a fun time with you. Right from the beginning you had my back, hamesha sahi time pe sahi advice di hai tune. Will really miss the fun time we had during matches and playing cricket, hope to meet u soon <3 atb for your future

Mitansh is the tallest, kassiest topper you'll ever meet—smart, chill, and always fun to talk to. I still remember the night he got rejected and crashed in my room; we ended up laughing for hours. Also, hands down the worst TA ever 😤. Do well in life, man!

Mitansh has been my roommate for the last 3 years. He is the real embodiment of sheer hardwork. His ability of constantly working towards something relentlessly till it is over to perfection is truly incredible. He is always more than happy to help you in any ways possible. Just seeing him grind all day motivated me as well to get up and do some work lol. Hope he take a lil less stress now after joining a job. Thank you for putting up with me (will still trouble you a bit more in blr though 😈)

A very good friend of mine and one of the very few with whom I have remained in constant touch throughout every semester. Glad he could make it to my birthday as well. :). Would love to remain in touch with you throughout my life, buddy.

mitansh youre a really smart guy, and its amazing how you know exactly where to optimize your efforts to maximize your results. its been fun discussing f1 with you, or making fun of vineeth or just getting through hs courses together. hope we meet again in blr sometime
mumbai gang member, atleast ek bandi bana lio, mumbai ka naam kharab kar dega warna, will miss you

kassi bro

Keep smiling man! All the best in your life!

Hello bhai, 
Hope we remain friends forever. As far as I know, you have been full with values obtained from your parents despite some of your jokes etc. (jo bhi bhai mazaak), keep up with that. I hope we both keep up with that and don't get influenced in our future journeys.

You are such an amazing and hardworking person. No one else I have seen put so much effort and thought behind work. I have huge respect for you for putting such genuine effort into all your TAships as well. You are a rare gem.

Code debug karna ho, written assignment bhejna ho, ek baar me bhej deta tha bhai tu. Thanks yaar. Agar koi bhi dikkat hogi, I'll definitely take your advice. Already you are the highest-earning person of the batch; keep it up. Really LUCKY to have you as my friend. Best wishes.

You’ve always been so helpful and smart! Never thought we’d bond this much, but Goa trip with you was too much funn seriously so many fun memories! From all the random fights about planning the trip to having so much fun on beach -so many good memories! Also cant forgot Rakhi celebration, now I guess I have to send you a rakhi every year haha. So glad we became friends, stay the same, be in touch and keep doing great things! ✨💛

Hi Mitansh, 
You are a very special friend. You are really supportive and motivating friend. I will always remember the help in assignments, previous year endsems which you shared. The most kassi and focused person I have ever seen. Loved spending time with you. 
Also, a fan of your high network from where you extract information. 
Will miss the fun with you in hostels. 
Stay happy and keep in touch, 
Manav

Bhai bahut maze liye tere, aur teri biwi ke lmao... Tumse better combo nhi ho sakta roommates ka! Always enjoyed coming to your room for time pass. Loved how we stayed in touch throughout college, MKG zindabad! You are one of the most sincere and hardworking people I've met, stay this way. Thanks for helping me whenever I asked, stay in touch. All the best!

Mitansh bhai, badhiya aadmi ho yaar tum. Hamare cricket discussion, college mei bakchodi mei kaafi maza aaya. 
Mast aadmi ho, you keep the environment around you relaxed and positive. 
Stay connected, milte rehna!

While the campus is filled with smart and creative minds, when push comes to shove, very few prove to be truly reliable. Mitansh stands out in this regard. I’ve seen him effortlessly thrive in leadership roles—whether in course projects or as a TA. You can count on him to be anti-fragile when it matters most, and that’s what I admire most about him. He’s also a great person to talk to—a perfect mix of no-nonsense and brainrot. Loved our time in SE + a special mention for you contributions in DS

always used to hear abt u from keval & so glad to actually know u as a person & a brother for life,so genuine & warm hearted.All the time v got to spend together from coldplay to goa r some of my fav memories w u.thankyou for being the baap of the grp & making sure all things r decided before time, w/o u things would have been a mess lol.u truly care about the ppl around u & it shows in every little thing u do.atb for what the future holds for u & yes will be rooting for u to finally get that gf

Mitansh is always open and chill guy. We got closer during the DS TAship and it was great learning alongside you. Thank you for helping me academically especially during interview preparation. Let’s stay in touch. All the best!!

Father of the Goa group and the OG ICPC team! From day dreaming about WFs to GPL on your birthdays, everything has been very fun with you! Over the past few years, you have grown so much as a person in so many ways, and it was very cool to see. I want to be the first person to know when you find your special someone Hope to keep meeting throughout the years, and to see you kassi less after graduating :)

Mitansh bhai, you were unarguably one of the most hardworking and ambitious people I met in college. Still remember you dancing in our room after the historic IND-PAK T20I win . From temple visits to fun mess convos — all were memorable. Being our DS TA made life tougher 😅 but rewarding too. Thanks for all your help 🙏. Stay the same and definitely stay in touch, bhai!

"Aeeee Bansal". MKG ka sabse bakchod member, har photo mai tera presence rehta hi hai! The late night talks and hangouts would not have been the same without you. Hamesha mood upbeat rehta tha gang ka teri wajah se. Lastly, thoda chuna kam lagaya kar :0. All the Best! Let's stay in touch.

Only one wish from god to give you your hair back, nhi toh pta chle agli baar mile toh upar se pura saaf ho gya, aur agar tere ball curly ho gye toh samaj jaunga kha ke lg waye hai. One of the closest freinds, thanks for being there

My first room neighbour, I remember meeting randomly in mess and then asking you to go a and have a falooda near by the IIIT campus, service road. One of my very first friends in college and also the situation when we went to a gurudwara and we were not able to come back in Cab from Ameerpet. All the time that we spent together was so amazing, I won't be able to foregt it

An amazing friend, scarcasm to the fullest.
Stay Happy, Stay Connected

name: Kapil Rajesh Kavitha
tagline: having a psyduck headache every day

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Bakul quarantine :| most of this day was spent playing uno and bluff with people. Met a bunch of ppl I interacted with online, also saw some others whose face I hadn't seen before (was genuinely shocked seeing Aryan and Shashwat)

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: First birthday celebration. It'd been at least 5 years since I'd gotten to celebrate with friends (for several reasons) so I was very touched to have my closest friends "surprise" me with a cake at midnight. Also got a few cute pikachu gifts to make the day more memorable!

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Night cricket :( it's so cool how we defied expectations of usual friend grs and the friend grp size actually increased I the last 2-3 sems! Was so amazing to see the subculture -> NC transition.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Being able to make friends I can consider "close" and whom I can open up to

kapeeel, you've been so much fun to hang out with and are one of the nicest, funniest and helpful people I know, your work ethic is crazy good, wish I had your level of persistence, and also the go to guy for biryani places to order from, will miss all the fun stuff we did in college including all those TAships 😂

kapilll!! name: Rudransh Agarwal
tagline: Made mistakes. Made memories. Made it out.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: I came with my parents, all nervous at the gate, the guard said turn right for Bakul Nivas. That's how it all started. Met with my roommate, went around the campus, made a lot of friends on the first day itself. Spent the whole night discussing what we liked, what movies we watched. A good start.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Initial days of college we didn't know a lot of people. I randomly ended up in my friend's room, a lot of people were sitting there. What started as introduction turned out to be hours long time spent cracking jokes, getting to know each other. We stayed friend throughout the college!

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: All those late night discussions, ending up in someone's room randomly and having a conversation for hours together. Those late night campus walks across the college, especially after it had rained.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: IIIT has given me the confidence to go ahead and try to achieve my dreams. It has taught me how to learn and grow. It's something I will carry for the rest of my life.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Moving to Bangalore for the time being, gonna work in corporate for a while and see how it goes.

testimonials.text: Cutie you are the best roommate I can ask for , I fought with you in our third sem and did a lot of mess , I always regret that I was never able to tell you that directly but that is the only thing I always regret , Being your roommate is the best thing which happened to me , I learnt a lot of things , had great moments . I wish we were roommates longer .

Hi project partner, pehle toh thoda kam kassi ban. It was great doing the project with you, though last minute xD. Usme bhi kaam kam idhar udhar ki baatein zyada ki hai hamne. I also got to know what a gossip aunty you are :), shakal se bahot shaant lagta hai. Stay in touch and keep achieving in life!

Bro please don't go to US bro, they will shoot you down pakka!! My biggest kassi and saanp, and stop pulling that hair reading through those papers and stuff, only balding only will happen. 

I thought you were a cute, nice, innocent person bro, but hell no way, (i'm kidding) "Chota packet bada bomb" i think this was the line somebody used on you, 100% true, keep in touch bro, united by politics divided by our grades xD.
Topper sir.... Shared very good conversations with you... Will remember them... I wish you get everything you need and all the best for your future...

I love you, man. I can never forget the hours we spent bitching about random people and random things, ranging from Modi to people who might end up in a medical shop :) I never hesitated to speak my heart out to you. You are probably the hardest working person I know. The hours you spent grinding CP after DE Shaw will be a source of inspiration for the rest of my life. Don't forget me after you become a millionaire in Bangalore.

Heyy my ultimate kassi gossip partner! Don’t forget to catch up when you’re in Bangalore… nahi toh maar dungi
Its been great knowing you man. Miss our bitching sessions. Hope to stay in touch with you!!

I haven't had the pleasure of knowing this man as well I would've liked to. I do hope that changes later but in the brief spans that I have spent with him, I've found that he has an uncanny ability to extract information out of anyone, anywhere. He's a walking, talking gossip library. 

Now, for the lesser important benefits of knowing him - he's very nice and is always, literally always, ready to help. One just needs to ask him and Rudransh sir will fix it. A generally wholesome, affiable dude.
Gossip paglu of the gang... Majority gossips tere pas hamesha milti thi... Very hardworking and one of the most knowledgable person I know... Stay the way you are!

Despite our limited interactions (primarily during the online semester), I think Rudransh still managed to sneak into my core memories. G1 wouldnt have been as fun without you saying "Heyy Ishwar" every time we met lmao.  All the best in your life and if our paths ever cross again lets revivw the old times. <heart_emoji>

A man who knows how to work hard and party even harder. First impression was he looks so seedha saadha but man looks can be deceiving. This guy is the kind I would be grateful to have by my side in a roast battle, cus god can he spit some fire. Its never boring hanging out and having a conversation with him. Hoping to stay in touch even after college and not drift apart :)

Hii Rudransh,
You are truly one of the most hardworking and smartest people I know. Your focus on your goals is incredible, and your sense of humor is one of the best I have ever come across. I really hope you never lose that.
Wishing you all the best for the future!

Rudransh is the definition of a clutch-god. He just relaxes till the last moment, will swoop in just around the end and will get the best job done (be it any exam/assignment/or writing a testimonial 😂). But fr, he is one the smartest people I met at IIIT (bro is so good at everything). His clarity and command over things is just incredible. I will fondly miss the discussions around everything including academics,research,US immigration 😭. I am sure he will excel at everything he pursues. GLHF!

Really good friend. I have so many memories with you. You have been my teammate for most of my projects. I remember each and every struggle and each and every 'jugaad' that we did. Went out with you a couple of times as well. Really fun talking to you, you have a good sense of humour. Particularly remember one of the evals that we gave where you saved our team by speaking well :), wont write more than that here :). All the best for your future, buddy.

Rudransh bhai, apne convos hamesha badiya hote the. You are a calm and composed guy. It was truly great spending time with you. Thank you for helping me in my academics. COD ka time yaad rahega. Let’s stay in touch. All the best!!

Rudransh, you’re one of the most amazing friends I’ve met . Those long gossip sessions with Akshit about what’s happening in the universe were truly memorable. From “not studied anything” to scoring well — you’re the real chuparustam 😄. Watching you grind hard in COD 🎮 and being around you was always fun. Wishing you all the best ahead. Stay in touch, bhai!

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Fortunately skipped quarantine, got a good room mate since he also came at the same time. Never thought i would get this connected with the random guy in the next 4 years. Had to taste yuktahaar food on the first day itself 😑, since all other messes were closed.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Cheering for the performances during felicity, felicity buzz, freshers, and navrang is a unique memory. Those performances were truely awesome. I wish i was that great in dancing, but unfortunately i am not.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Late night COD, smashkarts, among us, cards, movie streaming sessions with friends is one thing which i would definitely remember for the rest of my life. I would miss them the most.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: The amount of carelessness in academics went up a lot 😂

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Just a simple job with little to no risk. hanging out with friends during weekends. Have not planned anything much.

Bhaai, maa parents nannu eppudu marks adigina ippatiki Abhinav ki entha ani adugutaaru, nee instagram and twitter fan wars ki big fan, all the best and Banglore lo kummeyacchu

Hi abhinav, Bangalore lo anni rojulu anni places ki vellina maatladataaniki naaku bhayame. You are one of those persons from whom i inspire a lot. But bangalore times were fun..  I hope next time we meet, we talk more..

Through my very limited interactions with Abhinav, I've come to respect him and how he goes about life. Cool guy (can't believe you had to put up with GP's shenanigans). All the best for your future bro. Im sure you'll do well

The GOD, Abhinav Reddy Boddu! Starting lo nee skills, quick-learning, humbleness ki chaala respect undedi. Ippudu respect ledani kaadu, but entha pedda ___ gaadivo artham ayyindi! Insta thagginchu ra, ayina insta lo enduku ra? Ninnu tease chesthe thop feel vastundi ra. Eppudu piracy lo movies choodakunda theatres ki vella ra babu. Tvaraga CEO ayipoyi maaku job istaavani korukuntunna. Selavu! 🫡

Boddu bhaiiiii aka 10cg bhaiii,motorq kosam pranam istav ani telsu but kasta appudappudu koncham mamlni, srh ni gurtupettuko. Srh fanism vadalaku asle next 3 years manade pai cheyyi. So cup vacheyachu
Free ga unte/cheskoni kalstuu undu, hyderabad ki elago vastav ga

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: I snuck in as an outsider for felicity and later while we were hanging out we were outside Nilgiri and saw two people on the top floor. We all collectively "saw" that they called us up and went. Turns out we were interrupting a couple. We stayed awake till 8 am and then I slept in Ronak's room.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Less of a memory and more of a people told me and showed videos of what happened, but my first time visiting JC Hut. Had to visit Apex too after that.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Being able to meet everyone as often and impromptu walks around campus.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: My eyes don't turn as red anymore.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: I have no clue.

testimonials.text: gossip queen + nashedi crazy combo. you're my only competition for worse drunk day stories and im glad i was around to see it. fellow "do it for the plot" partner. a good wingman lmao but even better at calling out bs. thankyou for all the emotional support from almost failing courses together to ranting to sherlock-ing. very good listener 10/10. keep giving us updates because where else will i get goss from?

jaikar, you were my best friend in college. the amount of times we've stayed up having deep talks or gossiping till 4am was straight up unhealthy. you're a very good guy, and i admire the goals you put for yourself. i'm so proud of you for being where you are now and dont let anyone take that from you. thanks for listening to my brain rot i could always tell you anything and you (most of the times) gave me good advice. keep being goofy and unhigned.

jay, you’ve come such a long way, and i’m so proud of you. it’s been amazing to see how much you’ve grown. you’re so much fun to hang out with—always down to party. also, thank you for being our main gossip source. you’re one of the few people i’ve been close to since the very beginning of college. thank you for always being there for me. you’re someone I know I can always count on. i’ll miss all our random, interesting conversations—from deep talks to just us bitching. I’ll miss you. love you.

Jeeeekar, i still think your name is jaycar it makes you cooler anyways so be happy. You're a cheeky guy and i always have a good time with you. You'll always be my college boyfriends sidechick, and tattoo partner ( at least I motivated you to get it xD, and you inspired me too to get one two years later lol). Stay happy and lively as always <3

jaikarrr, idt I can cover everything in 500 characters. Ive got so many great  memories with you. Always loved our bike rides, uncles trips , khajaguda trips and many moree. I’m so proud of how far both of us have grown and I couldn’t have done it without you for which I’m always gonna be grateful for. It’s so easy to get real with you and there would  absolutely be no judgement. let’s always stay in touch and ilysm bestie:)).

jaikarrrr, my uncles bestie forever, partner in crime since first year, thank god i have you for another semester <3 cannot imagine the day you'll be leaving too :( from having a crush on the same girl to "wait a minute who are you" to becoming kassi and to helping me be kassi for my last exams ever, we grew up. you are the only one who surpasses my energy and i love that. i love you for always being there for me and always giving great advice. ilysm <3

telugu don jaikar sai muppidi. keep coming to my room with an offer i cannot refuse anytime. will miss all our wingend sessions and nights wasted doing nothing (scooty dhundne mei 2h lag gaye L). best of luck for your life ahead!

Jayy! If there is one good thing that DS did, it's our friendship, and honestly, I wish it had happened sooner. You're lame, crack, and dumb :) Low-key, you give amazing advice, and somehow manage to be fashionable and hilarious.  Also, nobody does your mom jokes like you; my mom would be proud ;) I love how we bond over the finest things in life: Ronak. I will fight you for him. You're a total sweetheart. Don't change, and don't disappear. PS: stay away from Ronak. And my mom. But mostly Ronak.

Jay, u r one of the hypest and chillest dudes. I've loved bonding over rap (Ronny J on the beat) and the Weeknd. I like that we can talk about anything. I'm impressed how you're just naturally curious about the most random things (never lame acad shit ofc). I've seen you change and transform a lot throughout college but I'm glad that you haven't changed in the things that matter most - being there for others, seeking out new adventures, and just having a good time with friends.
Bakchodi nhi rukni chahiye behenchod. Thank you for making Akshit Princess as lively as it is! Tu Fookna chhode yaa naa chhode you’ll always be saved as Jai Snoop IIITH😎

jaikarrrr its been such a wild ride being basically roommates for 2 years. who thought this would happen in 1st year lol. getting a tattoo together and then getting into the nift after party were two of the most fun things I did in college both thanks to you. once you get a crazy job you can sponsor both our turkey trips :p
thanks for being so cool and coming to wing end at weird times at night, will miss you buddy

Heyy Jay, you are such a crazy fun person to chill with and go out with. The first batch trip was nice because of you and the stuff we did then were too lit. The stories you tell are so entertaining and you live in such an exciting manner. You are a genuinely good person who cares for others. You were missed in Pondi but Goa nights were better coz of you. We should go out more and do stupid stuff like the Plabo night and the Vijetha night. Won't ever forget these things man.

coolest tpe partner and fav gossip girl... will miss our yappathons and our pure hater energy for you know who. very glad we met last year. ty for always validating my hater energy <3 keep me in the loop about all the tea after we leave also. wecare 4eva 😍😩
p.s.: this is a standing e-vite to my wedding (whenever it may be)

jayyyy im so happy we teamed up for tpe, genuinely one of the most fun i had doing a course project. i loved spilling tea, bonding over shared trauma </3, exhibiting hater behaviour (i cant match up to you and muskan though), ranting and basically doing everything but work (jk we worked also). i hope we can step on more doctor's toes. keep slaying

you were also the first person i ever spoke to from iiit and one of the closest people I got to in iiit. online sem peaked. i loved educating you about indian culture 🤭 and solving your girl problems (including making u believe u liked someone and were in denial lmaooo). running the confessions page together was so fun, though you were much better at it than me. genuinely good times. whatever happened, happened but I'm really glad we spent all that time together. all the best. ur rlly funny.

jayyy, you are the most fun person to be around in the campus. always with some crazy ideas, and that smile. won't forget the swidesweep grind semester in dsac, best science-2 endsem prep partner :-*. 

i'll miss you a lot man

j hi da u r like best person, still remember besties flex group lol. U r the first person i met on campus when we came back and those first 2 years of timepass we did was so fun we and that to right before exam day. We ranted so much about random stuff. u r like so nice and thank you for being so nice. Thank you for being there for me in first 2 years. Good luck for ur future. Hope we meet again.

Hey Jai! I’ve known you since our Shrek days and how we almost got a Spotify family plan together. I’m grateful for the friendship we’ve built over the years and especially for the parties with you! Goa was a blast right from the beginning with Don Bosco and the frisbee XD. I hope you achieve all your dreams. All the best for your future!

Assal first jal interactions lo choosi asal ee abbayiki telugu vacha anukunna then realised mana batch ee ani.... It was always fun talking to you... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need

Even tho we haven't interacted as much as I would have liked, you seem like a really chill fun person. Every conversation, albeit limited, was just gossiping or ranting about UIUDP (It wasn't even my course :)), and a whole lot of food ordering. Hopefully we hang out more often and hopefully I become more decisive in the future :))
best tea giver out there!! keep cooking more
muppidi
Though it stated late (our friendship) I am glad it happened! Super fun to talk and all the gossips we ever discussed 😭, I hope we continue playing bb and frisbee lol!

We friends from school but never spoke with each other that much , but things have brought us together . Most of my moments in college life are with you . These are one of my best moments. You were with me in my best and worst , all of them . Can't ask more from a friend .
Man speaks consistency. Bro hits the gym everyday and inspires us all! Keep it up man

My first roommate at IIITH and proud member of Room No. 331. A gym freak, ML genius, and devoted TFI fan. One of the rare few with a crystal-clear vision for life—driven, grounded, and genuinely pure-hearted. Always a joy to be around, full of energy and good vibes. Still can’t believe someone with his qualities is single—truly one of a kind.

I started our bond by saying you were like my imaginary annayya, but you truly stood by me and made that bond real.Chala support chesav.You inspire me in many things.We had arguments, we stopped talking at times, but we never let go of that bond. Less meetings, short talks, but many unforgettable memories and a strong bond—3 years and  still counting.. Movies plans ki pilusta annav, marchipoku😅.
Forever my kesavanna!! I hope the bond continues...
Wishing you all the best in whatever comes next!

My first friend in college. Be it glassmates or 12 am coffee pals you were always there. Tfi kattu banisa and my rerelease buddy. Some day oka company petti naaku job isthav ani ankuntunna. You are that friend who i could call without any mohamatam. Please give your appointment. Thagubothu fellow. Nen upsc prep start chesnappudu I'll come for guidance, please don't discourage me. I will miss you so so much. I really hope you will miss me as well hehhehhh.

Arey drunkard, firstly stop forming the monthly once philosophies, I saw you aging from a cute, lean college boy to an "uncle" of all sorts.

Naa first friend raa!! I am still sad Madhu misplaced his phone that day, and he dialed me with your phone and since then it has been a downhill ra :laugh.  

Ik you will accompany me in the college as neither am I graduating nor are you leaving Bharatgen any time soon.

English line tho end cheyyalante: See you at the movies babe!

Full close kelli rarely maatladukune stage ki Ela vachindo telvad kaani.... I miss those beautiful 1-2 days with you ra... Nee lekka chuttu unde vallatoh happy ga undadam nerchukoniki try chestunna nen kooda.... Nee antha gym freak ni eeda soodaled nen.... Konchem bharatgen ee kaakunda life ni kooda choosko.... I wish you get everything you need and all the best for your future....

naaku telisinantha varaku best glowup and gym freak, nee discipline ki take a bow, Bharat Gen ni kaapaadu and gurtupettuko Banglore ki vacchestaa annav nee gurinchi waiting, all the best and will miss u raa, also SRH 300 ippudappude kottadu :)

kesavvv! Love you ra!! eppudu kalusta kalusta antav, eppudu raavu :(  busy man ra nuvvu. I really enjoyed all the random discussions we had about life, research, career and just random shit. I'll miss all of this ra. Please dont forget me once you become a bigshot in bharatgen ra. youre super fun to be around ra. always laughing and making others laugh. remember, small room beside the gym, cloths kukkadam XD. To many more such discussions!

kesavvvv. Nuvvu unte oka happiness vastadi ra. And thanks for making a cute nickname for me "garden". I really enjoy ur company ra.. be it 1 min or 10 mins. That one gym freak but who is also a TFI banisa. Mana height difference chusi navvochina glad that we took pictures atleast in the last sem. Manali and araku were more fun because of you. Nuvvu vese kulli jokes anni i enjoy more. Hope we meet again ra. Miss you.. #kandalarayudu

Rey best character arc I have seen ra. Huge respect for you man!! Nuvvu ippinchina internship jeevithanne marchesindi.. also aa ganesh gadini manam tittukunantha evadu tittukoledu emo. Always fun to talk and you are the biggest TFI banisa I know ra. Lastly nuvvu, TFI eppudu top lo undali. Hyd ey kabatti touch lo pakka touch lo undam ra

Mows, issokk srh e season poindhi inka, kani mari antha bhayapaduthu chudaku prathi match, have some faith in your team : ) Velithe rcb fan ga maripo. Jokes apart, always enjoyed your company. The way you make time for everything is a huge thing to learn from you ra. nenu clg lo gym cheyyagalagadaniki one and only reason nuvve. Manali lo snow lo manam gadipina moments eppatiki marchipolenu, thanks for the reel ra. Loads of love...💗

orey koshav
2-2 summer lo cvit phase lo manam pettina discussions marchipolenu bhai, ivaala ms ki vellali idi adi ani clarity undi ante adi appatlo ah discussions valle 
ippudu andanantha paiki vellav, pakka edo oka rooju company petti denguthav please ra edo oka udyogam ivvu
neetho sollu vesthe bhale untundi ra nee movie references tho.. work lo leenam ayipoyi marchipoku, kalustu undu yedava

Naa best gym buddy. TFI banisa edi kelli pattukosatavo telidu reference asala. Nenu eppudu ayna gym chesi manchi body vasthe nuvve naa coach ani tag chestha ide naa aana. Ivi anni pakkaki pedthe neelanti cute boy ni chudaledu ra eppudu.Entha pani unna help ante vasthav andariki time isthav baa manage chesthav.Bharatgen lone munigi pokunda matladthu undu. Edo roju HTC tho trip podham manam anukunnatte. Oka pilla ni set chesko ra keshav leda nee gym body ki aa matram lekunte ela.inka rayali kani..

TFI's kattu banisa.....hardcore SRH fan (some extent lockdown fan :))).....mee room lo SRH matches streaming proper vibe undedi whether manollu bokkala aadina kuda....nuvvu still aa roju LSG match ki rakapovadam was too regretful.....but will miss those drippp streaming sessions with you and Hans.....

Koshav, will miss you the most. Literally okappudu best buddies ra manam (and still are :) emunna neethone share cheskunevadini and kalisi chala chesam. Not to mention the genius you are and the life changing influence you were in my life. Truly the most eligible bachelor in our gang and all the best for your future ra. Hyderabad ki vachinappudu eesari pakka party istha
Yo! Gym boy! Anni tamare chesthe inka mem em chestaam saar! Legend in Acads, and gym! Kaastha maaku kuda konni odulu

Kesav bro :) Love the random discussions that we have with each other. Will miss some of the late night discussions at CVIT (now those have been shifted to mid-day discussions at VC!). 

Keep working hard, and all the best! Happy that I will keep seeing you because I am a dulla and you are in BGen!!!

Maws😭😭 Persian rajyamlo..Sulthan..entha pedda samasya vachina thana balamaina sainyaaniki kooda cheppakunda..okkadike cheppevaadu..Ravi Kiran ka Salaar..Telugu Peeps ka Salaar..Venkata Kesav Venna🔥🔥 Bharat Gen lo vibe check masterclass antaga. Mawa nee positivity ki nee smile ki nee caring nature ki fida avvani vaallu undaru. Gym dedication aithe peaks. Telugu meme references ela testaavu ra babu anni🙏 BharatGen CEO position kosam grinding maatrame kakunda mammalni kooda kalustu undu pls 🙏

gossip mate nunchi glass mate varku...u have been a gem ra. nee character arc jnrs ki teliste savsraalu tadabaddi matladukuntaaru. bharatgen stocks nvidia range ki teeskellu ra. ae maataki aa maata nee working culture chaala baguntaadi ra. okka family la untaaru andaru bharatgen lo. manam 3-2 lo gym lo ese sollu, nee room lo esse sollu i miss them all man. will miss you a lot ra. gym chestunddu chutu janalni motivate chestundu. all the bestuuuu

Hi bhai,
You are a great person whom I met in college time. Thank you for all your help and support being it during tough times in honors project or in guiding me throughout the last 3-4 months.

One of the first friends I made on campus. I was glad we stayed in touch through out the college and I hope we continue to do so. Truly inspired by your gym arc! One of the most fun guys on campus, love your carefree energy.
Hi ra gym boy, ne antha fit ela avvali ra . Elago hyderabad ee ga , atleast week oksari edo okati plan cheddam. Kummedam. Cinemas matram miss avvadu ra manam theatre lo.

Hi Maws!! Starting lo chala gattigane thrigam.. But after going to CVIT we got diverged in our paths... but I always loved the fun time with you and mini chit chats we had in room. Nannu barinchinanduku chala thanks ra 😅. Wishing you all the good in your future! Happy ga undu! Stay in touch ✌️.

Asalu ISB Road lo mana late night talks about literally everything – from batch gossip to serious discussions about future – are sooo good always. Manam enni rojul gap ichina, we know the bond never goes. We built that strange rapo!
Anyways, nuv Hyd ae kabatti antha deep maatalu enduku le😂.Appud appud alaa maa office ki ochey😂. Kaluddam, and let's go to more rereleases and thirugudaam raa! Nuv malli 'time ivvatledu', 'busy' anakunda, please mee office bayataki ra.

Kousav, kaasta bharat gen lo hardware roles open cheyy ra Hyd lo paduntaa plzzz...
nee walking style, dressing style, hair style andarni uppongistondii. nee cute cute muscles andarni pichekkistunnayii...
most chillest guy ra. gym ki motivate chesinanduku always thankful. will miss you always ra. let's plan more and more trips ra...

name: Neeruddula Veda Nivas Chowdary
tagline: Love is Temporary, Friendship is Permanent

testimonials.text: I got to know him better during the later years of college, and I'm grateful I did. Charismatic, selfless, and undeniably the "rich kid" of the group, he's been a constant presence through the highs and lows of my life. As they say, "Love is temporary, but friendship is permanent." Here's to staying in touch and keeping this bond alive, no matter where life takes us.

What a turn of events and misunderstandings, idk how public are these testimonials, but I absolutely do not care! I thought we would properly vibe meeting you on day 1 raa, but sadly it did not turn out well.

Oka rakamaina, vintha energy needhi. Actually infectious, my co-Messi fan, and a fake-football watcher (didn't even know who Yamine Lamal was).
One final request: TAKE ME TO ABU-DHABI GRAND PRIX and other things Dubai is famous for :wink

I don't know where to start, I'm thankful to every small issue that made us reach this point in our friendship. Smh if I'm sad and I'm trying to control my tears, one word with you and i start crying. I think that's how comfortable i feel with you. Also thank you for being a lot of roles for me(my son, my bro, my frnd, my frnd's frnd lol). I know you won't be the one to msg me first, but i will still msg you and i know you will reply ani kuda. Take care, please very please eat 3 times in a day.

Your way of talking is good... that's how it started. I shared many of my insecurities with you, but you never ignored them - thanks for listening to them. Asala judge cheyyakunda vintav, selfishness lekunda untaav - very rare person anipistundhi. Will remember your strange expressions. Unknown rivalry, just for fun.
All the best! Keep smiling.. 
Hoping that we will have more fun.

Annaaa, ninnu dobbadam miss avtaa. Chaalaa sweet and kind person, Will always look out for everyone in the room, no matter what.. and you give your heart for anything u like. Will miss you anna, stay in touch and marchipoku mammalni

vedii, eppudu edipistu untav.. but i enjoy it. The vibe you give to people around you is so great. Alaane kothi veshaalestu eppudu happy ga undara. Peddayyaaka serious ga aypoku, ilanti kothi panulu chestene neela untav. Appatikappaudu kanipinchavu ani eppudu kanipiste appudu bye cheppedaanni. Miss you ra..

My brother and my best friend. Naaku em anipinchina em advice kavali anna eppudu nee daggaraki ochanu future lo kooda ostanu. Andhari gurinchi alochistav care teeskuntav. Kodiga manchiga food tinni nights paduko mrng kaadu. Eppudu ilane happy ga kalisi undam. All the best for your future.

My saviour Ta,I could say you saved me from brink of failing on both nauseous courses.Also the most richest of all I known,kinda personal bank anytime.I hope that all your never-ending energy goes on lit even after adulting.The mystery I never got to solve is that are you smtg like hidden genius,hehe. Anyways whenever you are on spree just ring me I will always gladly take part.Mainly don't forget to call me when you guys get delivery,I can anytime sneak into ur office.

Vedanigas firstu JG gadi baaki teerchey....leda maku free treats sponsor chesey....ippudaina nee own account lo nee COD skills penchuko, asalke bro kuda undadu nee danilo aadataniki......will miss those OG overnight COD sessions for sure and those fake skills of reel SonicMaxedOut....hope we continue those sessions later too....ippudaina hand ivvaku tournament roju laaga friends kosam

nigga okkate maata!! moosukuni public cheyyii. Break the suspense which was kept secret since 3 years (may be more).
you are like andari bandhuvaya!! very very loyal to friendsess...
will miss you in BLR. Dubai nundi appudappudu gifts teeskuni ra vachetappudu.

Rey ved ni.. okka typing mistake tho bale peru vacchindi ra neeku. The most awaiting question ki answer eppudu isthav.Nee future enti ane dani meeda andari drusthi undi.Koncham maatho kuda matladthu undu hyderabad lone edustav kabatti.Microsoft lo kummey elago nee dream comapny kada.Nee tindi ki neeku sambhadame undadu ra. But thinakunda kuda intha la transform avtharu ani telikunda poindi naku Ivi anni pakkaki pedthe dance mamulga kummeyyav nuvvu.Sare le migatadi tarvata cheptha le hyderabad lo

huge thanks for conducting cod tournament we had lots and lots of fun when we were playing cod. jokes vesthav and thiskuntav. ninnu dhobbithe chala fun osthundhi. will miss you. Love is temporary but friendship is permanent. 🫡 😂

My co-thunderbuddy! Nee opika ki, dance skill ki fida.. You always gave a lot of comfort with minimal times.. a bond that I always wanted in my college... I have a lot to learn from you. Your patience is the first thing! I always wanted to play lot of games with you, but em chedam kudarledu. I know you might find very few situations where you might want to call someone.. but never forget that I will always be there for you.. 
Thunder-buddies will definitely miss you a lot..

Nuvvu unnappudu i feel very fun ra, will miss your trolls on me.
Nee sleep schedule ki oka dandam ra. eppudu tintavo, eppudu padukuntavo, eppudu chaduvuthavo evvadiki teliyadhu. 
But one thing..., 4 years lo okkasari kuda UAE nunchi CHOWcolates theyyaledhu ra nuvvu maa kosam 😒😒
Nuvvu lekapothe COD lo nene most noob ipotha emo unfortunately.

Wishing an extraordinary future

The person whom I can trust blindly, chala reasons tho aa trust build ayyindhi ra. Many special moments, a sensible person. Manchi friend doriki nattu undhi life long. Cheppindhi vinu konchum. Phone pakkana petti janalatho undu. Ditch cheyaku ra snake. Enni unplanned dinners, movies, screenings. next year kuda ilane unte baguntadhi. You are one of the best things that has happened to me in college. Thala ekkaki kurchoku, ra snakeee

Unintentionally funny ra nuvvu. You are that one guy whom I could call even after 50 years and our discussions never miss a beat. Chala times lo you were there for me and a very special friend. I'll miss you ra vedanivas. More than you know. Idhantha formality ee but I wanted to write something about you even if we talk often some way or the other. All the best ra. Gurthunchuko hyderabad ki vachaka first nee room ke bottles pattukoni vastha

"Love is temporary but friendship is permanent" ani oka mahanubhavudu cheppadu 🥶🗣️💯 Naa darkest deepest secrets anni extract chesi neevi okkati kooda cheppaledhu yedava. College life antha alaantidhi em ledu ra ani cheppukovadame saripoyindi kadha ra neeku. Edaithe enti..MSFT ki vellaka aina sukhapadu. Entha oil wells unte maatram salary mottam orders meedha kakunda koncham sarigga manchi food tinu pls. IMB chats kooda open chestu undu. Will always be there to annoy the shit out of you 😁😁

best buddy till 3-1 ra. dani tarwata emaindo network busy ho gyaa. will miss those days le, the days when i tried to get the confession out of you. the days when we use to gossip and bitch about others. baaga kastapadaav and at last got what u really wanted... hope you also get what you really needed iykyk. enduko niku closure ivvani feel vastundi, maybe it was meant to be that, maybe future lo kalisi will look back to these days and laugh. will miss you neighbour!!!

name: Pranjali Bishnoi
tagline: Came in with wide eyes and a suitcase. Leaving with under-eye bags and a drive folder.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: I met my roommate and we bonded over north-south cultural quirks. I also had jc's oreo shake for the first time, love at first sip <3

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Sitting in the reading room, going to vc every now and then, taking evening walks in the campus, sleeping all day long sometimes.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: I wasn't earning a penny in college, but I was richer in freedom, friendships and fun!

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I started complaining and crying less and began accepting more, doing more and growing through it all.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: I am moving to Bangalore to start working at Flipkart.

testimonials.text: Pranjali, you're such a go-getter I know you'll do amazing things in life! You're so sweet and yes ESW project will be one to remember always. How we got that motor run i have no fucking clue lol.
smartest team partner after zaid, I got, lol. tomper, have a great life ahead, bye.

Thankyou Pranjali for everything you have done for me from taking my favour to giving me advice. I am sorry for only talking to you regarding work but meko thoda phobia hai girls se baat karne ka 🥺. I fell like, if i will talk much other than work then i might loose you as friend 🥲. But me try karunga ki me isse overcome karu.
And i hope we stay connected and our friendship is forever🤝.

Kabhi bhi kuch kaam pade just call me anytime, I will try my best to help you.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Straight into quarantine—let me stress here on how horribly it was planned. Stuck in one Bakul wing with bad food, awful washrooms and sinks. Triggered an existential crisis. But a lotta random friends helped me through it - taking it one day at a time. But yeah, that was ass beyond belief.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer:
Haran & Mago, if you're reading this, Ik you're laughing
There was this girl who I felt was p cute, and the boys convinced me to get outta the room, approach her to say what's up. Man I had the balls to walk up to her, but folded horribly, walked past her, & spoke to 2 random boring humans instead

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: It's got to be the company of my juniors - Ananth Rajesh, this one's a golden retriever in the way he loves me, Amol Vijayachandran, this one's very nonchalant and can't talk to women for the life of him, and one along the autistic end of the spectrum - Siddharth Mago, this one's a special case.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Coming to the realization that in the grand scheme of things, shit don't matter bruv. You'll figure it out man, it ain't worth breaking your head.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Never let em know your next move, good try diddy

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: I still remember walking in into hostel and parents were not allowed due to Covid. I left my luggage and walked around campus meeting all those ppl who were in touch during online. Then went to jc nd had oreo milkshake(aaj thak meri fav).Then sorted my luggage nd that day jc ngt pe kuch yaadkar hua

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: The day when I got placement. I still remember moving from nilgiri to workspace in so much stress and confusion and in some kind of clarity clarity ki I will not pull this. Somehw that day got my job. I sat in WS called everyone and informed abt it but wasn't sure it was happening fr. Was so happy..

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: I will miss kadamb biryani, jc shakes, tantra double egg chicken fried rice, david fried maggie fs.. But smtg more that I will miss is my POR which made me what I am today. I will miss being apex a lotttttttttt. Ofc I will miss my friends sooooo muchhhhh without whom idk hw would i survive..🥺🥺🤧🤧

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: One biggest change is finding my happiness in others was me in first year but now I find my own happiness most of the times(still in learning phase). Because of this change I am more happy and peaceful in my life. Apart from this I hv improved my eng, grown confident, came out of my grp nd explored clg. In this process I understood ppl don't hv same mood everyday, we need to perceive a situation from their side as well. Also one biggest change in ms is from a funny jr into a strict sr..Jk 😂😂😂

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Nothing much.... Haven't planned life a lot... I hv got a job and I will prolly continue it for 3-4 yrs and then think of company change or who knows if destiny has other plans... I am aiming to get a car for myself if not atleast scooty. I also wanna explore INDIA. Who knows prolly will take up solo travelling as well... I am actually so excited for my future... Wanna meet new ppl make new frnds... Wanna explore blr to an extent ki i will hate it😂😂😂.Nd last but not least wanna get a makeover

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: The first day has been successfully archived into the 'Too Much Information Overflow' sector of my brain 😂. I'm pretty sure there was a lot of confused wandering. Did it even happen? Evidence is inconclusive.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: After 4 years of collectively losing my mind, there are way too many—chilling like we had no deadlines, pulling last-minute all-nighters like academic ninjas, and somehow surviving it all.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Gonna lowkey miss fighting for every single mark during paper showing—nothing like turning into a lawyer for that +1. And of course, the late night coffees and chaotic all-nighters that made me question all my life choices.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Pretty sure my body is now 60% caffeine and 40% panic (but no iron 😅). My sleep schedule now resembles a quantum state – both existent and non-existent.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Still in beta mode—figuring out what I actually want to do with my life. For now, just exploring and hoping the next update brings some clarity!

testimonials.text:
Friend forever. Thank you for being with me since the last 9 yrs. In all the chaos amidst the college life, at the end of the day I know that I always had your shoulder to cry on. The endless gossip sessions, the endless misunderstandings, we have crossed every barrier and stuck together till this day. I know that after 9 years we are not going on the same path, I know we won't be able to talk everyday, but we won't last the charm we always had.

Love you tons.

Every moment is engraved in my heart, from the silly fights to the deep conversations, the last-minute exam preps to the spontaneous trips. Wishing you success ahead and always remember that I am just a call away. #104

name: Hardik Sharma
tagline: Find people around whom you can be who you are, starting from yourself.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Felt unreal, something like a dream, I would wake up and get ready to play cricket in the morning with my friends, but I made so many more here that now it feels like that day was 2000 years ago. Played a lot of games ( on laptop for a change ) with my new mates.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: No single memory as such, but working on projects last minute with friends and being so sleep deprived that literally anything starts sounding funny is something which kept happening and despite the toll it took on sleep schedules, would do it all over again exactly the same.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: I guess the biggest privilege that hostel gives you, is when you think about having a chat with a friend, you don't pick up your phone, you barge into their room and just start talking. I would miss being a few rooms away from my friends than being a phone call away, the most.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I no longer play Valorant till 5 in the morning, I guess that would be surprising for my first year self, I started focusing more on health as well, something that had taken a backseat for a long time.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Everything that I want to, with a sprinkle of things I have to, with a lot of trips on the side.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: My first day was so emotional. I still remember my parents dropping me off and how I broke down in tears right after partly because it was my first time away from home, but mostly because we were immediately quarantined due to COVID. It was a strange and quiet start to college life I'll never forget

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: One of my favorite memories has to be my birthday celebration. My friends went out of their way to make it special — with surprises, decorations, and cake at midnight. The joy of being celebrated like family, far from home, made that day unforgettable.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Mess biryani. That, and my amazing friends — especially the late-night hostel gossips, impromptu hangouts, and the laughter that echoed in our corridors. It’s the little things, the familiar chaos, and the comfort of that life I’ll miss the most.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: A lot changed, especially after I faced some academic setbacks. Learning to manage my workload, balancing priorities, and becoming emotionally stronger was tough but necessary. I’ve grown more mature and self-aware, and I’ve learned how to bounce back when things go wrong.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: I’m joining Chubb Business as a Software Engineer — excited and a little nervous, but ready to take on this new chapter. College gave me memories, lessons, and resilience. Now, I’m stepping into the real world with gratitude and hope.

Will miss all the intellectual talk and studying together, will miss craving for korean food and pasta together, will miss your random bak bak about K-dramas, will miss sipping juice together on our favourite bench, will miss sharing secrets with you. Love you a lot! I hope we end up at the same college if we go for higher studies xD. Keep shining as always and you deserve the best !!

More of a close WhatsApp friend (if that’s a thing), but a genuinely nice and kind person at heart. Got to know her better during the later years of college, and she’s one of the smartest people I know. I wish her all the very best in everything she sets out to do!

First time chusi entha introvert oo anukunna..Kani nuvvu antha matladthav ani neeku close ainavallake thelsemo😂.
Nee alochanalu, dreams vinte enti manushulu ila kuda alochisthara anipisthadhi. Anyway vatillo okkataina fulfill avvalani korukuntunna..anni okesari avvalante kastam kabatti. 
I will miss our random fights, doing projects together (especially the tension in the last minute), watching random movies, hanging out, reading every subject together before the exam and mainly your talks.

Aaaa Shravyaa....The best in bangalore. I feel happy listening to u and try my best to serve your cravings. Chaala happy ga anipistadi neetho share cheskunna or manam kalisi order pettukunna or kalisi bayatakellina. Felt so great being your bangalore companion. I hope we'll be each others stress busters and laugh like minions over all those silly jokes. Manali antha kalise unnaam and i enjoy ur company. Neetho unte eppudu introvert la unde nenu extrovert aypothaanu. Miss youu...with love.

Hi Shravya, Chaalaa saarlu maatlaadadaam anukunna but kudaraledu, Very sweet and fun loving person. Mana internship days ni marchipolenu it was so much fun with you. Malli Banglore kadaa lets enjoy together and hope we talk more, atleast about Harry Potter :) All the best!!

Cute little panda..🐼, I always enjoyed talking to you. We had some good time in the Manali trip and good memories as well. You were completely out of your comfort zone at that time, which is always good. I wish I had spent more time with you. miss youu. All the best for your future.

Very calm, cheering and positive person. Manam room lo starting lo andharamu kalisi enjoy chesina time chala memoriable. Ala maggie cheskuni tintam, ends ki prepare avvatam , assignments cheyatam eno memories. Full enjoy chesam starting lo mana room lo. Manali lo manam kalisi trekking appudu spene chesina time was great. Iddaramu kalisi ala random ga matladukuna matalu as roomie miss avtanu. All the best for your future and hope you get everything best in your life.

journal.answer: Got jacked and shredded. Gain 15 kgs of muscles
