journal.answer: Do something big that future generations will remember

testimonials.text:
'I'd marry him if he were a girl vibes...." Pranav is smart, fun, and degenerate like I am (that is degenerate in a good way). He is capable of talking, theorizing, analyzing, yapping hours about the most random things. And I love that about him.  He is a good friend (perhaps more? probably one of my best friends) and does care. So a combination of Chaos + Order that is part of multiple core memories of me. Love you bro. 
Also guys,  DO NOT HEAR HIM OUT when he asks you to xD

Pranav is a true bro. Whether it be "high" times or low times, he has been there for me throughout college. Whether it be me drinking Tang in his room when down or whether it was us cussing at college after getting drunk in Pondicherry, Pranav has been there for all my cherished memories in college.

A true homie, and a true friend! Good to know that even after finishing college, we will continue to live together and enjoy ourselves even more.

I was quite intimidated to talk to you at first. You were too scary, too outgoing. But we eventually bonded over griefing Ishwar, which will always remain the highlight of our time spent together. Finding someone who can shut Ishwar down was a miracle to say the least. Apart from that, you are very pragmatic person and have a knack for philosophy. You have changed my view on a lot of topics including utility of research, etc. Thanks for making the later part of my college life memorable!!!!!!

Pranav, you’ve been my best friend and I’m so glad to have you in my life. Gonna miss our rants, poker games, and jokes about your “girlfriends” !!  Thanks for always being there. Also, I’ll miss tying you rakhi this year, but don’t worry courier karungi! Let’s meet soon and make more memories. Wishing you all the best for your future, Stay the same... and batadena abhi konsi gf ki number chalre lol

Travelling with Pranav is always a blast! A math genius and a true ‘girls’ hunter,’ he’s got his own unique theories and lifestyle—often unconventional, but never boring. We may disagree at times, but his presence always spices up the group. Just one request, bhai—settle down with one girlfriend instead of switching! 😄 Fun, debates, and madness—that’s Pranav for you!

Pranav’s love life has more plot twists than a soap opera—somehow always in a relationship, but none sticking around long enough to make it past the intermission 😂. We’ve all lost count at this point, but he stays unbothered and ready for the next chapter. Beyond all that drama, it was genuinely fun working with him on so many projects. Wishing you the very best in life!

Fellow guy abandoned by Badami :( you've been a really great friend ever since online sem (thanks for all the help in DS). I'll miss all the "hear me out" debates the 3 of us had in 114 for hours on end. Really hope we keep in touch, and we need to find badami and teach him a lesson someday.

Pranav bro, you can't be underestimated at all, from breakup to poker, the time spent with you was all great and epic. 

Stay happy, stay connected.
Mister, you are in possession of a valuable specimen which rightfully belongs to me (totally not because I'm jealous). Leave him (pls 🥺🙏)
Do bhai dono tabahi 🤝
G5 days were days.... Missed a last outing though:(... I miss seating days... Always had fun talking to you.... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need to be

Gonna miss those long conversations that we had at JC or in the workspace just before quizzes :). Lol itna timepass exam se pehle maine kisi ke saath nahi kiya hai, aur vo karne me alag hi maza aur confidence aata hai :)). Never gonna stop listening to "Jenny (I Wanna Ruin Our Friendship)"  😂. Tune sahi me mera worldview bohot widen kiya hai in all those philosophical discussions at JC.
Gonna miss you man!

The strongest,most caring & beautiful person I have ever known! ill never forget how everytime we met, you ALWAYS had the biggest & cutest smile! mai nhi bol paunga, how much ill miss everything-the long walks, yellow lights, tripping fooling teasing endlessly, hope and ws nights. tumhare saath ive had the best years. you’re my bestest friend & biggest inspiration- for always pushing through and being so kind. thankyou for always being there, always be happy, for me youll always be butkiii 💕

You were the best friend and roomie I could have asked for. I remember we named you "romica mumma~ hostel wali mumma" in 1-2 and every single time I was down with fever and then typhoid, i felt mummy wali care, hehe. Thank u for always being there for me even on the days when I came to your room crying 😂😭. I just have sm memories w you- from ikea to farewell. I'm gonna miss u sm.. pls meet me soon (whiskey also).. and recreate monopoly trio<3

Hi prettiest girl, it feels like yesterday we were just awkwardly saying hi & now? It’s memories on memories-some hilarious, some so deep they’ll stay with me forever. U’ve been part of so many of my good days. Can't believe our friendship grew this much, really couldnt have imagined. U’ve seen parts of me that not many have, and never once judged. Our late night talks, walks, gossips will miss every bit of it. U have to meet me everytime u come hyd😤. Keep smiling, hope life gives u everythin❤️

You’re the kindest, warmest, and most emotionally thoughtful person I have known.I’ve always admired how motherly you are,always ready with something to eat in you bag. I am so glad Keval introduced us because otherwise I’d have missed out on knowing an absolute gem.Some of my fondest memories are visiting the dog park,where your face lit up at every tiny dog,and wandering the mall hunting for Sriteja’s birthday gift. Stay happy, keep smiling and never let the world dull your warmth and kindness

Keval has introduced me to a lot of people, and you are one of the best! You're an amazing friend who cares soo much about everyone. College has been a much happier and more memorable experience because of you! I'll always remember the time we spent together. I hope we can stay in touch and make even more amazing memories after college :) Wishing you all the best!

Hello fellow cricket lover. Thank you for always being there to talk to and making all the broing cricket moment a lot more interesting with your amazing reactions. Will always remember how it used to take so much effort to convince you to come to udupi :p. Never thought to find such a cute and sweet friend with whom i can talk and discuss any single thing about virat. Thanks for always showing up. 
Always Stay Happy and Hope you achieve everything you dream of.
Please ek match dekhlo saath mai!

You’re one of the kindest souls I’ve met in college. Our friendship may not have gone exactly the way we hoped, but I’ll always cherish the time we did share—those late-night study sessions, the endless gossip, and all the little moments in between.
I really hope we keep crossing paths at Google (and maybe even find a way to reconnect the friendship that got a bit lost somewhere). You’re really smart, and ik you’re going to do amazing things in life. Wishing you all the success and happiness.❤️

Hii Romica, I must say, you are one of my favourite anime watchers. And you love action and fight scenes!! So cool. Lmao, thanks for listening to my elaborate aot explanations XD. I wish we could have started sooner, we could have watched so much more. Still, I am definitely gonna bother you again, make you watch more animes.

Wish you atb in life. Have fun and do great. You are one of the sweetest people I have met. So glad I met you. 
Thanks for being more gullible than me btw :p

It was always fun talking to u and I wish our group could spend more time on Monopoly/movies in the last sem. Thanks a lot for inviting me to hang out everywhere, time spent flied by so fast. Days at Goa were truly special, I underestimated the memories we would make. Should we make it a tradition to meet every year at Goa? You always had a great positive energy around you, and all of us felt that. Do u remember when we went to dog park? I wish u always remain happy and carefree like that day :)

Romica :) one of the best friends i have made in college! 

a friendhip that started from an online whatsapp group (G1), i think you are the only person i am still in touch from that group now XD. 

will cherish the time we spent working in iot and esw teams together. all the best in life!

Hey Romica - RebelKid Paglu, you are always in a jolly mood. You’re a really sweet and hard working person, always keeping people in check lol… Coldplay and Goa trips would not have been as much fun without your presence. Your bargaining skills are amazing as well. Wishing you the best for your future endeavours! Let’s keep in touch!

Ig our batch got the best of both worlds by having the first sem online. it brought together people who would've otherwise never spoken. Group 1 is a core memory for me, and Romica was the most visible person there and a fun person to talk to. Love the chaos we as a group thrived in—the online meetings, the gossip, etc.I distinguishly remember her pranking us all by impersonating a TA lmao. All the best for what the future holds for you, and thanks for the memories.

Hello broo.. I like the way you smile when we see each other.. that's a cute smile. You talks always so sweet. Always be like that sweet person only.
I enjoyed monopoly game a lot when we all played together, that's a great memory. Let's be in touch. All the best for your bright future.. keep smiling 😊

Romica!! One of my first friends at IIIT, ill always remember the time we shared during the online sem, tera 'Hao' XD!
Always stay beautiful and happy.
Keep in touch :))
Had a great time during the trip lots of laughs and fun moments. Always enjoyed our random talks in the mess too. Good vibes and easy to be around!

One of the nicest persons i met... Still remember first year mein ek hi floor mein the nd used to randomly meet in corridor nd talk... Stay the same as you are... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need
teri dadi ko bura bola kabhi kabhi, lekin acha laga, mast insaan hain re tu, yaad toh aayegi. bhul mat jayeo, ly

Saara hydro bhai ne sambhala hai. And you've always been super helpful towards everything. From kkk mein bakwasbaazi to hydro mein ma'am se ladai, we made a lot of memories together. Also, bhai really appreciate your consistency and hardwork in the gym. Its very inspirational

hamesha mujhe tang karta hai, par andar se hai to cutie, no count kitne assignment tere chaapkar aur paper ke beech washroom mein discussions karkar pass hua hun courses...4 saal mein ice cream due clear kardiya maine...
but genuinely, one of my closest friends I made in college and a bond I would cherish forever whenever I would remember my college days

Official third wheel toh charu chhe! [Saying sorry only due to ethical reasons :') ]
Also thanks for introducing to green garlic eggs & lochooo!
Lambaaa, daantless , one of the closest friends, harr bt mai saath , ticketpaglu , bangalore <-> Hyderabad aana jaana rahega

Fir chid gya 🥰.

Massage lena ata rhio free main deta rahunga hmesha

Thnx bro for carrying and supporting me all throughout college. Blr nhi aaya to kuch nhi touch mein rahio. Will always have office visiting pass ready for u 😏. 100kg bench press soon. And beware of south Delhi girls they danger af.

Said "nipun bhai" sooo many times and always meant it literally. Constant teammate throughout college, best synergy. Had too much fun together. Tumhari reels waali recommendations best hain bhai. Bhole log ko bigaadne mein tumhaari sabse important bhumika rahi hai. One of the most fun person to be around. Love you bhai milte rehna. Best rahega delhi hi aaja. Aur bhai ab daant ko bhulkar kahin bahar chalna chaalu kar vaapsi😁 .

Most fun guy on campus, can't forget our prism experience together (Probably the most fun I had in Hyderabad). Thanks for taking the bullet for me in the Prithvi House, I won't forget it and always helping me out. Do stay in touch :)
Will miss Science - 2 moments for sure, iske alava you have a great personality and I like how you balanced acads and masti at the same time. Was great to get to know you. All the best bhai!

Haldiram saab, 
saale randi start walking properly, straight and not tilted
love you bro, i know i will keep in touch with you and see your ass in bangalore. 
Anytime anything, i'm just a call away for whatever you want bro. One of the solid gujjus, love you bro.

One of the nicest and smartest people I got to meet. Himanshi was lucky to have you and thanks for all the RL help. Have fun at GS or wherever you end up, and I'll see you in the US soon when you do your masters. Stay in touch❤️

Hey Lamba!! You’re seriously the coolest brother I could ask for. I’m definitely going to miss you. Don’t worry, this time too, I’ll send you your rakhi by courier. I love the way you call me “chota” and all those annoying habits of yours, I’m going to miss them so much. But honestly, you’re such a sweet person. Thank you for being there for me last year at the felicity in 2024 I’ll never forget how you comforted me that day when I was cryinggg!! wishing u best in all!! miss u and love u loads..
Bro any doubt I used to call you man , had good time with you , most of it was on phone , will miss you calling Sai Bro.

There will be no retalitation bro, I support Nipun 
Always greateful for the memories we shared
Indeed Hoppery was a great experience
Wanna recreate that after 10 yrs :)

Nipun bhai, tum ekdum msst insaan ho. Balancing acads and backchodi koi tumse seekhe, dono cheeze top level pe. I don't remember when we met, but really glad that we are friends. Best of luck for life. koi bhadiya dhanda karo toh bulana saath me karenge.
Gujju baddie💯😘
Nice 🐣...
assignments debugging buddy :) always ready to help out. Good luck! I am sure you will achieve whatever you aim for. Stay connected.

Nipun bhai. College khtm ab to. Tera to pata nhi kab masters shuru kardein. One of the most intelligent and hardworking people I know. Badhte raho bhai US mei ek ghar hona chahiye kabhi aana ho to aa sakun :)

Hey Nipunn Sirji!

You're such a jolly and loving person to be around, and your company is super entertaining. Full-on Gujju mindset, and utterly smart and hardworking. So grateful to have you as a friend. Jo peeke tune harkatein ki hain, lol, they were super entertaining to watch! 😂

Hamesha maze karte raho aur aise hi grow karte raho. Bomji ko live-in partner mil gaya, lol.

Keep in touch, byee!

Ashutosh is such a talented Hindi-speaking Kannada guy.
It was a great time talking with you.

All the best for the future, hope you make endeavors in life. 

Stay connected,
Ashutosh the type of guy to almost have a personality

Ashutosh (the rizzler) cant stop flexing his looks at any point he is not asleep. Ultra looksmaxxer, PhD in rizzology, man thinks he is Bellingham (he is not). When you call him, he will speak as if he has not eaten in weeks and is about to kill himself from depression. (makes you want to kill yourself too!) Will say the most 'mom' thinks in between conversations. Unjustified hate for siddharth singh. Overall nice guy.
Absolute chad. I am so happy to see you work hard and achieve so many cool things:) Tejas k kamre me random bc was so much fun; I hope we will get to do all that again sometime.

Hello Ashutosh Bhai! Kaise ho? Waise to hm ache dost hai aur thank you so much for supporting in all ways possible bhai. Aur hn tu itna confident hai ki NIFT me jake seedha connection nhi direct baat aage badhata hai, ye mujhe bhi sikha de bhai :')
Waise jab bhi Banglore aaunga to call krunga, jarur se aa jana milne. Chalo abhi aaj ke liye itna hi, baaki batein milkr karenge, tab tak ke liye- Keep smiling :)
Bro I am truly grateful for all your help and support in preparing for the HR interviews. It was always learning something new with you. Let’s stay in touch. All the best!
Cutest guy in campus.

hatt saale tere liye kya hi likhu, khush reh kabhi sochiyo mat log tere baare mai kuch bhi bolte rahe teri strength hai vo, proud to have a driven friend like you. Kind rahiyo, sweet rahiyo emotions control karliyo apne har baar koi bachane nahi aayega terko. baaki kadar to tu karta hi hai logo ki. see you in blr!
G5 days were so great... Missing those.... Had fun talking to you... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need

Heart in the right place, mind in the wrong, physically no one ever knows! Never seen anyone hustle as hard as this guy. Authentic but mechanical. Always tryna rizz up girls. I hope he never realizes his true potential, otherwise its over for everyone else out there (JK! I hope he does). Sings really well too! Truly takes a special person to live up to the highest standards of friendship, he fulfilled them all

Ashutosh bhai, you’ve been a great friend. From our DL assignment discussions to being a solid project partner in DS, you’ve always been a dependable teammate. Your presence in our birthday celebrations and that simple, genuine smile made everything better. Stay in touch and wishing you all the best ahead!

testimonials.text: A dear friend of mine, and I truly hope he keeps that smile shining bright. One of the smartest people I’ve ever met, and I wish him all the very best in everything he pursues.

Hey Pranit - When I first came to know you, I thought you were always this extra studious and only into "academics". However, our friendship has really evolved over time, and I've come to know your fun side as well. It was lovely being a part of your birthday party in 2023, and I hope you are able to achieve all your goals. I also wish you great health! All the best, let's stay in touch!

From generating fireworks to scaling the universe, working with Pranit has always been a treat. He has a sense of humor that is rare to find. He is a battle-hardened warrior, who keeps getting nerfed and still rises above all and for that he has my undying respect and admiration.

Looking back at all the boring classes that we sat through together makes me sad, for such moments may never happen again. Hope to stay in touch! And sorry for all the time I gaslighted you.

Pranit is one of the most amazing people I've met on campus, I massively respect his perseverance with everything he has gone through in life. Pranit is an extremely smart person to talk to. But more importantly, he has this really profound view of life which often make deep conversations with him so memorable. I had fun going to the office together with you lol. Will be missing all of that. CG5 has ro be a core memory for me especially because the video turned out so great. All the best & UwU

One of the smartest guys I came across on campus. I enjoyed all those projects I did with you, all those clutch moments and those tricks we came up with. Had fun going out with you and I hope we get more such chances. I wish you the best for everything

You are one of the most hardworking and intelligent people I have met. I wish you would have stayed with us in hostel, would have gotten more chances to hang out. Had a great time working with you in a few projects. Lets stay in touch, will try to meet you whenever I come to college! Wish you a happy and healthy life bro.

journal.answer: Coming to bakul for quarantine, going to my room but then immediately going back out because there was no chair in my room

journal.answer: Playing american football in research street at night

journal.answer: Walking back to obh from thub every night

journal.answer: i would rather have a roommate than not

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: who knows? its looking like msr and then ms (extrapolating, it should be m after that)

testimonials.text: Im extremely grateful to night cricket and anlp and dip. Youre amazing at basketball and badminton and just a little okay at tennis. Youre one of my best friends and you mean the world to me. I cant imagine a world where I didnt meet you but I know im a lot happier in this one.

How tf are u so good at everything u do (even at brainrot without insta). Funniest and most creative guy I've seen, bro coined rotigga. Love making fun of Raghav / Vineeth with u. Also, when do i get to meet Buddy? E325 really was the best, I really wish we didn't have to move to single rooms. Goated music taste, loved working on projects with u in the first two years (we still have to whoop Raghav's ass). I really hope u get MSR, all of us can hang out some more, but always keep in touch! 🐊🛩️

Shrikara, Sharikara, u r like cute nice silent fellow da, I dont I have talked to u in the start of the college but last few years i realised how nice u r and u r like my closest friend now. U r super smart , good looking and crazy good speaker. U r like perfect fellow and u r so nice. U like dramas and uk so much and u dont tell. And u r so brainrotted without insta.Goa was so fun. Hope u stay in bangalore and keep meeting.Dont die doing stupid shit and u ll become famous ik u r smart.

Shikuu!! I know no one calls you that, but it just feels right. You’ve been such an incredible friend and lab partner. I genuinely learnt so much from you. From long work days to writing our paper, and flying off to Denmark to present it in front of famous people, I’ve made so many memories with you. You’re insanely smart, ridiculously hardworking, calm, kind, and somehow always so composed. I hope we cross paths soon :) And don’t forget me when you're out there being famous and brilliant ;)

shaq, shaqinator, amazing bb player (obv), types so damn fast, I remember when you used to be an arch linux simp and then went full on apple 😂, hope we someday get to build out that decked out system as a home media server/vpn server etc, admire that you can work for a goal consistently, pls stay in blr before going to Georgiatech

Fellow Ferrari fan (you ditched us now so sad). Most brainrotted among non social-media consumers. You're probably the most disciplined guy I've seen in college, not just sleep schedule but in general. All the best for MSR and GATech, I'm sure you'll ace it there too!
Will miss the BB nights/cricket games in college and all the other fun stuff we used to do. Come back to hyd/blr soon

I'm not sure how to describe him. I'll try nevertheless - an emotion-less machine who becomes one of the most caring, deliberate and sweet persons in existence when it's demanded of him. That's it, I suppose.
i will miss playing basketball with you cos you're the only one who cuts in perfectly like i envision. keep killing it everywhere you go (ik you will)

You're a really smart and sweet person. From our first cf team contest together to the sqe BT, you've always been a person who's carried us to better results in every course and endeavor you've taken up. I also feel that your "cool"-ness is something which people have regularly underrated. I hope you have a great time in Georgia or MSR (or both), wherever life takes you. (PS: i'm also rooting for sainz and Williams this year :) )

you're so cool and super fun to hangout with and literally one of the smartest people ill ever know. im super grateful for all the memories we've made together and i know you'll kill it wherever you go, be it the US or bangalore (i hope its this cause i can hangout with you more 😭).
you are such a god shrikara anil. thank you for carrying me in everything karthik. ill miss coming to lab and sitting behind you forr suree. Best of luck and have a great future!! (I know you will 🤫)

shrikara, you are one of the smartest and most hardworking people I've ever met. you are so focused on everything that you do, and you inspire me a lot. keep being this way and I hope you achieve everything that you wish for. night cricket was fun because of you :) (the grp and the actual tournament) somehow you're also so good at basketball and other sports that we play. cant wait to have more fun in blr! (whenever I am in blr 💀)

Ayoo Shakira! Mad respect for how hardworking and smart you are. MS or work, honestly doesn't even matter - everyone knows you're gonna absolutely own it wherever you land 🔥 Always a blast choppin' it up about the NBA with a fellow fan who actually gets it, and also picked up skills crazy fast! 'Lakers in 5' forever 😂 Go be great!

shrikaraaa

you're super smart and very cool! so glad we got to hang out so much this past year :)

keep on rocking :D

Sudo Shakira - I have loved our F1 discussions, and hope to continue them in the future (Forza Ferrari). You are a really calm and composed personality, it was wonderful working with you in I&D and SE assignments. All the Best!

Jawline so sharp it can cut through diamonds🤫🧏‍♂️🥶 Insanely cracked guy this gentleman. I'm still flabbergasted at how quickly he gets stuff done. Perfect example of "Actions speak louder than words". I am really jealous at how he is able to stick to a good schedule and stick to it while not compromising on the work quality. Guess he's there where he is for a reason. Sole reason why I couldn't have Vineeth for myself 😭🤠 Love making it awkward for you with my uh..interesting convos 😳

What da macha, full scene we made in Bakul. Come to Whitefield macha, I'll pop you. Proper goofy being you are, no? On a serious note, thank you for being such a good friend and wish you all the best in whatever you do in life

shrikara saxenaaaa!!! you're insanely smart and fun to hang out with!! really enjoyed goa and also playing BB lol; I know you'll do great wherever you go and whatever you do; keep in mind to make more friends (but obviously cant make better ones than us) and stay happy!! Hopefully lets meet soon

hi shirika it is 11:01 i hope this gets saved i just wanna say youre really cool and smart and funny and so nice youre really helpful as well and again funny. just stop supporting rcb. and being kannadiga. if you can.

I respect your work ethic and discipline, you've achieved some serious things in college. I enjoyed the conversations we had about politics and I certainly enjoyed the book you bought me. You’ve been a great study partner through the science electives we took (Them Copics) and by far the most tolerable bangalorian, and that’s no small feat.Big Brother might be watching, but I'll be watching for your texts - let's stay connected!

name: Siddharth Mangipudi
tagline: If it is possible, as far as it depends on you, live at peace with everyone.

journal.question: First day on campus?

journal.answer: My single degree.

journal.answer: I grew a beard.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Finna earn dem fat stacks and smoke it all away.

testimonials.text:
Bro I will never forget you, You are the most crazy and mature person so far. I loved your company and vibe. 

And pls forgive me for anything wrong I have done. 

I hope you will remember me also and stay connected
Mangi, we’ve been friends since 1st year, and our conversations have always been a mix of deep and funny.Good luck for your future endeavours
os
You’ve been a really good friend to me dude, not giving up on me and also consistently trying to get me on track. I’ve had some fun times with you and I’m grateful to have a friend like you.

Mangiii bhai, Anytime uncles buddy. Mangi bhai never hesitates and passes the wildest statements i have ever heard with a waiting wild laught. Mangi bhai we always had those evep walks, idk how many people knwo but mangi bhai thinks way too deep.... 
Mangi bhai we had fun together buddy

A very good friend with a nice heart. A very fun guy and a fellow gamer. Very hardworking, and I'm sure you will achieve your goals. Can't forget our time together in Delhi. Would miss hanging out with you.

bahut hasi aa rhi hai, hai , bahut hasi aa rhi hai, I laugh today also when I think of that moment and also the day of naam ladai and aftermath of you smoking first time,. Also the time when u got naked after drinking anf running in whole bakul, and also the videos of you dancing still make s me laugh. 
All the best bro for one more year in college.

The giver of idea, the bringer of stray sticks (and cigarettes and violins and f(g)) and the taker of scooty keys. Too funny the first time you saw me and thought i was a ug3 senior. Scooty thodi dheemi chalaya kar, zindagi lambi bhi honi chahiye sirf badi nahi mangi sahab.  There’s simply too many Mangi quotes to jot one down here — and, perchance, it is unnecessary, for the utterance likely already resides in the mind of the reader who is lucky enough to know about IoT based soln.

Dear 🥭, you have been a constant inspiration in many ways. One of the most grinders I know. Although I feel you try to fulfill people's expectations of you too hard. Don't be too harsh on yourself. I know you'll achieve big things, and I hope you achieve them soon enough. Abhi to 1 saal hai so hoping we graduate within that time 🫡. Keep grinding, and you'll eventually get what you deserve 🔥🔥🔥
Them Copics

I met you at the very start of the online semester, and for the whole semester, I thought you were built like a pixie, couldn't even recognise you on campus. I've probably related to you a lot through the years, from the games you like to the social experiences you've had. I might've only been around for some of your ups and downs, but I wish I were around for more. You're a great friend to have in my corner, mangi. Keep in touch

greetings my deer mango pudding. I will always remember those 4 am walks to varalakshmi and the masala dosa with filter coffee, and the day you took us to south for breakfast saying the pesarattu was great only to be met with not-pesarattu. the batshit IRE project and those crazy nights in 24x. here's to more of those in the coming year :D

thank you for all the good memories :) 

great sense of humor, he would make jokes in an apocalyptic setting, 10/10 would recc talking to the guy

goodluck with the future, hope to see u soon
Legit the best Manggipudi ik 💯

Real g :) ill never forget how you got your intro taken by bala during our first week on campus lmao. I'll miss the time spent thru coping crew (you were probably the most genuine friend i made thru there). We should play pokemon and beat ek together sometime :)

"Chalo jaldi se intro do", bro came rushing to the lift and said sorry. I didnt know you that much back then, but look at us now. I miss the times when we would be going to gym together, pehle having small talks, telling each other how much work we had. From discussions of idea and irony, we would go at length into much deeper topics and what not. From you running towards us in the corridor and hiding under the table in function. Well well... I will just miss this government registered resident.

well well well — its been quite a ride hasnt it? will hopefully continue for some time more, achcha h dual convert kar liya (the world will have to wait one more year before mangi is unleashed 🥀🥀🥀). Have been in so many goofy situations and argued as well so much, and kept having fun through all that. Its been a pleasure spending the past couple years with you — lets hang out more in 5th year. thoda phookna kam kar de tro 💔 manifesting research and job success for my mangi in 2025 🪔

Dear Mangi,
You are crazy. One of the most impulsive, hard working people I've ever met! The way you make friends with anyone you ever meet is exceptional. Meeting you was surely one of the most moments in my life. Hope to see you soon :)

Aur bhai roommate, it’s been a pleasure to share that little fan of yours in the worst of heat. The most intense kassi I have seen in exam seasons, soon going to start indie games in your honour. Thanks for providing the boom boom speakers in every single shrine screening, all of them would be incomplete without the best sound setup on campus. Best of luck for the remainder of college and then whatever you choose to do. Stress relief thoda kam karde bas :)

Pudi bhai always enjoyed talking to you. It was surprising when you literally came to faridabad just for a trip but that was fun too. Tujhse baat karke English toh seekh hi li hai xD. All the best for your research man and let's keep in touch!

Mangii!!

Totally loved our character deep dives and deep talk walks during our first year!! You're such a hard worker, and I hope you achieve more and more in life. Keep in touch, byee!

testimonials.text: Siya, you're so pretty , I love your smile and style. I have fond memories of making fun of Nikhita together and all our Prithvi dances!
soyaaaa ill miss you!!! the nicest and most genuine person ive ever met <3 loved sneaking into thub with you in first year

The sweetest and prettiest girl, I literally can't imagine my college life without you. From a lovely Wonderla trip to Manali, thanks for being there xD. I still have to show Kasturi to my mom (i cant yk why 😭) cheers to those badminton evenings, to playing XO and pool, you made me realize "winning is not all." From those constant cricket support (i get performance pressure btw 😭) to holding me when I lost big (iykyk). I am scared I have to eat fries and coffee alone now, I miss you more, ly:)

My go to person ee nuv... Nuv life ni choose vidhanam mastu nachindi naak Edo okaroju nenu ala chooste chaala happy ga feel avuta... Boldu sarlu naaku help chesinav entha chirak pettina nimmalanga koorchopetti cheppinav intakanna em kaavali cheppu.... Neeku banglore vachinte mastu khushi ayithunde.... Em parled hyderabad ayina nen vachi kalustu unta ninnu... Naa college life lo one of the best things is you... Marchipoke nannu nuv... Nee lekke undu nuv.I wish u all the best for u r future aunty

I wish I had talked and interacted with you more often and met you earlier in college. A very nice and kind person, always a joy to be around. Truly sorry for any inconvenience caused, if any. I hope you continue to soar higher in everything you do and wherever life takes you.

You are the only one whom I've met in the online semester and stayed till the end becoming close day by day. There are many days where we hv laughed together and cried together. You r the calmest and peaceful person I've ever met.  Thank you for being with me in all my toughest times, correcting me if I do something wrong and guiding me to do the right thing always. I'll definitely miss our talks, exam prep days, dancing together, hanging out.Remember that u'll always hv me in all ur hard times.

Sometimes I feel like we’re so alike, our thoughts, our tastes...
Our cravings for ramen, pasta, and all the random food orders were always so much fun. I really miss watching movies and series with you, chatting about the series we watched, talking about random stuff, complaining about courses, studying together and gossiping. You’re truly my soulmate and I’m really happy I met you and got to know you. All the best for your future.
Don’t forget to come to Banglore :)

siyaaa, one of the sweetest people ive met. im so happy i met you in first year. youre so prettyy and i loved going to prithvi practices and dacning with you. im so excited to be office buddies with you, looking forward to our new chapter in microsoft <333
cutest smileeeee ever!! love you loads siyaa and all the very bestt!! seeee-ya siiiiiiyaaaa

Siyaa...The best roommate i could ever ask for. I really miss those nights with all the silly jokes, serious discussions and all the advices u've given me. I clearly remember how i fought with everyone(iykyk) to make u my roommate. Really miss hanging out with you. Such a kind hearted person. Naa slang neeku vachesindi ani mee parents cheppinappudu vache aa happiness e veru. I hope you achieve everything that you want. Thanks for being there in my hard times.u r so lovely.Happy ga undu..my love

We haven't really spent time recently, but I still can picture us struggling for weird esw project, and worrying so badly about the osn course. The innocence and the naivety that you have, makes you a lot funnier. Hope you never lose them and never stop being funny and crazy the way you are. No matter how far we drift, I’ll always remember the way we were back then. Okati marchipoya, you were amazing in aasa kooda performance, couldn't take my eyes off you.
See ya..👋

Hi Siya,
All the best for your future endeavours. I hope you will rise high in future and be as morale as you are right now. 
After all being from an army family (if i am right :)), you have shown great patience and helpfulness in campus time. I still remember when in 1st sem, you invited me to visit your home in Hyderabad, when offline classes were about to start.
I would be delighted to do so when I visit hyderabad again.. You are most welcome to our house in Delhi, whenever you visit.
You are very kind, and I always enjoy talking with you. You have a positive way of communicating that makes every conversation uplifting and easy.

Baa matladthav andaritho. Nak telsi first time neetho asrith valla bday party lo matladinattu unna major ga aythe last sem courses valla koncham parichayam perigindi. Dance chesthav patalu kuda first time naku appudu manam andaram practice chesinappudu telsindi😅. 
Elago hyderabad lone untav touch lo undu karaoke ki podham andaram kalsi edo roju. Microsoft lo kummey !!

name: Rushil Kaul
tagline: Kaul me Kaul, better call Kaul... Blessed with punny surname :)

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: When we came for our initial 3 day isolation, I didn't know most of our batch well thanks to the disconnect caused by the online sem. Initially, getting to know so many people so fast felt a bit overwhelming but soon after, all of us had so much fun doing random crap during isolation :D

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Recurring trips to DLF or canteens before they close, to stock up snacks or food for all nighters

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Regular mango shakes at JC when they are in season. Also TVRQC, the one club I joined 🙏

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: The hair?

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: For now, it's work. Over a longer period of time I'd also like to figure out my niche further and find something that excites me.

testimonials.text: Komedy king. Cares about his friends.

When I first met you in 7th grade, I certainly didn't expect that we'd end up together in the same college. I love that TVRQC gave us the chance to pursue our common hobby together, and I admire your enthusiasm to keep the ship running even when you didn't have sufficient support. I hope we get more opportunities to organize/take part in quizzes together (and i wish i IDed arshad nadeem sooner :\ ) also pls stop jinxing sports matches :)

The most handsome, nice, thoughtful, and responsible girls have missed out on being in a relationship with, I know of. 
A very nice human alarm. 
Tries his hardest to work his way through situations and helps anyone unconditionally without a second thought. I don't think he ever said no when asked for help, and I relied on him way too much, probably never will meet someone like him.
The jokes and existential discussion about the future and current should be ensribbed in stone
When you need some subtle humour or some quality quizzing, you Better Call Kaul!
the true jinx king! i've had so much fun discussing cricket with you. you're super sweet and really fun <3

Really glad that towards the end of our undergraduate years, I found a new and really cool friend. Still boggles me how I've never seen him even remotely pissed off, whether it's on the football pitch or the most hostile situation on earth (IHS paper showings). Will miss all the cerebral and timely jokes he used to crack (or not, if we can meet again in college given he's in Hyd, which I hope we can and will :))

Best dasa student I met, definitely suck at football, cricket and almost everything but ethics and geospatial courses. Good sense of humor and great friend for sure. 
Do remember
Csk >> dc

From Goa to Sikkim, had 2 amazing trips with this guy. Bro is the chillest dude i have ever met in college and isko dekh ke kabhi lagta bhi nahi tha ki ye sala DASA hai. Guy used to be our ATM machine in all trips and always had a front little pouch hanging to his waist everytime we went out. Where are we going next ?

Hey Rushil, To a truly kind and pure-hearted person I was lucky to meet recently thank you for being so patient and helpful, especially while teaching me (I genuinely don’t know who’ll guide me now). Wishing you all the best for your future. May success and happiness follow you always!

LUCKY KAUL!! seriously though, one of the most level-headed takes on cricket enthusiasts. just stop jinxing my team every time 🥀 and of course a great quizzer and tvrqc co-ord (especially for letting me participate 😀). always laughing, I don't think I've ever seen you get angry with anyone and that's pretty impressive. I wish you all the best for your future and hopefully we will meet in the wild :)

You're a very unique character in college, always culturally active though hidden among the ones in the limelight. Keep up the singing man, you have an amazing voice! Loved performing with you in Octave both years, was pretty cool when we won the trophy. See you soon in the near future!

a fking engine man! loved playing with you, tere saath bhi ek turf ka plan banayenge, bas aa jaiyo mana mat kariyo :)  football sessions felt better with you bhai, always a very fun guy to be around, all the very best aage bhai, see you

He brags about being a DASA student (international), conveniently ignoring that our monthly expenses are way lower than his. Claims to be a global champ in nearly every sport. Puts minimal effort into personal hygiene, barely brushing his teeth or bathing. Crams all his slides the night before, struggling with us to memorize everything. Boasts about his world tours. Always wears earphones with no music playing—still clueless about it after four years.

Finally I will be free of your marking on the left wing. Man has decent footballing skills, insane goalkeeper, a pretty chill guy, always in on the joke and one of the og of the Casual Strikers. All the best bruv.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer:
My first day at campus was really okay . What I knew was we were sent directly to the quarantine. however, the day was really nice. 
Got to know a lot of people that time, some of whom I never saw online and some of them i saw online in first semester.Good day!

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Winning the skit for our house in first year.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: 4 years of college

journal.answer: A bigger friend circle.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Focus on career and meeting with friends...

testimonials.text: you are one of the most friendlest guys and one of my first friends in campus... the vibe and the atmosphere around you is extremely warm. keep this spirit and energy in you always, hope you never change, and be extremely successful in life, also shaadi pe zaroor bulana :)

Aman bhai, you are a simple and sweet guy.
It was a great time to work with you in a team. 

Happy journey and Stay connected.

I wouldn't have known how much of an anime fan he is if he didn't tell me about it himself. Man is cultured and has refined taste. Really chill to hang out with and I had tons of fun explaining to him the entire plot of games that I have played :P

Our roll numbers were adjacent to each other, so it was inevitable that we end up meeting, and I am very happy that we did. Aman is one of the most respectful and polite people I know. I got through many boring classes only because he was there cracking jokes and keeping the atmosphere fun.

But beneath all the smiles, lies great power. Aman is extremely skilled when it comes to math and adjacent fields. He is downright overpowered and isn't a threat only because he chooses to use it sparsely.

Aman is one of the GREAT personalities I've met at this college. Love his no-shit, chill-going attitude to life. I've had the pleasure of talking about many intellectual things with him (from politics to weird business models).  Loved his anime suggestions and him being one of the first frisnds I made in college he is in my core memories now (this happened over a random house skit btw)

Aman bhai,
Tum to bhai ho apne hi... Yaar tum jo ghumne jaane ke liye hamesha available rehte the... aur hum jo JC pe daily jaate the... vo best tha. All the best bhai for future, hamein bhi yaad rkhna and ham to hain hi aapki seva me haazir.

Aman bhai, kya badhiya bande ho yaar tum, mauj masti, padhai, friendships, sab manage kar lete ho.
Mere ML ke aadhe code toh tumne he debug karen aur samjhaye hai XD. Kya knowledge hai yaar tumhari, salute. Har domain me tumhe idea reheta hai kuch na kuch. I really admire you for that.
Saath free fire khelna hamesha yaad rahega.
best of luck for future, keep in touch

Aman bhai - Apne cricket discussions hamesha yaad rahege. Apan ne jitni bakchodi college mai machaya hai wo inane hai. From cooler to danda we have seen it all lol. You are a really smart and sweet person. You don’t shy away from helping others and the way you explained concepts in Science and Math courses hamesha bachaya karte the. Thank you for everything. Wishing you the best for your future endeavours. Let’s stay in touch!

Aman Bhai! Tere saath baat karke hamesha mood light up ho jata hai. Will miss those conversations at Davids at 3AM while eating veg fried maggie :)). Bahut hi genuine insaan hai yaar tu. Hamesha aise hi rehna! 
All the best for your future!
G5 buddy... Those days were so great... The interactions the calls omg... Missing them a lot... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need

Aman Bhai you are a very chill person and have an easygoing personality. You have the ability to relax the tensed environment around you !
Aapka takiya kalab "yeh bhi thik hai" 😂. Have got a lot of motivation from you and get to know that JEE can be cleared without coaching. We have very good conversations in college and will also continue the same in future!

Aman bhai aap out of this world ho. Apke saath table tennis aur cricket khelke bohot maja aya. Anime discussion aur aapke recommendations mein miss karunga. Forever CSK paglu and Thala paglu ho aap. Will miss you bhai. Let's keep in touch. All the best!
Had fun doing SE with you. You make good jokes. Best of luck for your future mate, keep smiling!

Aman bhai tumhaare bina internship wouldn't have been any fun at all. Thanks for always hanging out with me and talking about random se random topic. And tum toh chhupe rustam nikle 🌝. Will miss walking 4km just to find a place for lunch and then actually walking back xD. All the best for the future bhai and let's keep meeting!

name: Kommireddy Bhargav Srinivas
tagline: "Break Conventions, Not Rules" - Former King of Norway

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: i tripped on the stairs of the auditorium. Met my roommate - who is now a lifelong friend.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Walking around campus with Ishwar, discussing random shit, while listening to the Pikachu song, and drinking some JC drink (would've been nice if it was strawberry).

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: my friends

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: im not a slave to grades and numbers anymore

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer:
masters in CMU hopefully, in the short term;
world domination in the long term

testimonials.text: Meeting Bhargav was serendipity at its finest-a random bus seat arrangement and boom, best friend. Bhargav carries an invisible yet powerful aura around him rooted in a quest for greatness. Almost like I sense a destiny waiting to be quenched.And while all this manifests outward in the form of curiosity and sharpness, the real trait I admire and value is his perseverance.  He is a person worth knowing and I am glad that I did. He listens your heart. Here's to more fun and meaningful days ahead.

I always felt that you have a unique way to deal with your problems, always chill and funny. Especially during exams. My time with you was one of the best memories of college be it future planning, hot chicks discussion, or just normal chicks ;)  History really is full of bad jokes. I will really miss you. (Not gay)

PS : Best roommate i could've ever asked for.

You’re one of the most brilliant people I’ve known,a true hacker always breaking into things. I’ve learned so much just by watching you take on wild CS challenges like writing stuff from scratch in C or Assembly. Your “this ain’t gonna stop me” energy is truly infectious.You’ve explored so much in CS and somehow mastered it all. Beyond that, you’ve been a rock-solid friend.I’ll always remember us geeking out, figuring things out, and laughing at CS absurdities Keep hacking your way through life.

One of the first friends I made in college. I love how you are always curious, eager to explore and had your own side quests. During the college you were the only one who could get "Wow" out of me. Always filled with ideas, energy on how to break things and build them back. I value a lot our conversations on cool things we had in past years, where we would see something original and start discussing it. Hope to see you in person in few years on other side of ocean

Bhargav is a wonder kid, he eats up technology for breakfast and doesn't even realize it. His curiosity at certain things in our early years at college really had me admiring him and wanting to be more passionate at all of it like he was. He is a really amazing friend and teammate, and really made our Felicity trip special!

My most distinguished memory of him from our early days is him finishing an IoT lab under an hour before I even got to the lab (I overslept and yes, I totally got carried)

You are so scary smart its insane. I still remember the times when you had SQL injection as the recommended autofill. I hope you never stop messing with people but I also hope you never use any of your exploits on me :)

PS: Tone down the investigation attempts a little bit xD

One of the smartest and scariest people I have ever met. It's definitely scary how smart you are, you deserved to get paid for the amount of security vulnerabilities you found in iiit's system. Thanks for making the online sem fun those G1 meets definitely made the online sem one of the best sems in college.  All the best at CMU buddy, and please do stay in touch. Sorry you have to stay with Sreeram, annoy him for me, will you?

A very good friend of mine. Has saved me on many occasions. And one of the most brilliant minds I have met till now, always exceeding my imaginations about what the human mind can do. Very fun to be around with too. And quite witty with his jokes.

Brainiest person in college i know. It was so much fun making fun of Ishwar with you and having a laugh. Will always remember the pondicherry trip with you as it was a highlight of my college life. Was always a blast to discuss a technical or philosophical question with you. Only regret I'll have is not having started talking to you sooner

Bhargav sir, the most OP and the most intelligent person I have ever seen, while having zero ego. 
Your seat was always beside me, and ig a mutual friend was also there. 
You are a nice guy, cracking jokes and keeping the atmosphere jovial. 
Hope we stay connected after the college also...

I still remember Bhargav putting up the video of the snake from snakebattle on the whatsapp group. Humble as always, he mentioned the snake could be improved. And I saw potential, in the snake, and ofc in him. That was the most memorable time I had in my first sem, just making that snake code with you and sreyas. And then we also spent some time on the MIT challenge in java. I enjoyed my time with you and will always remember it forever. Lets stay in touch, Bhargav!

Bhargav :)
One of the first friends I made in college. Its crazy how dedicated you were to battlesnake, motivating me to work as well. The perfect mixture of work and play.
It was a lot of fun working on battlesnake, psycho project, screw that, even discussing ethics with you was fun! You just have this ability to make any conversation really interesting with your perspective and the lame jokes.
Stay healthy and hope to be in touch. ~ Secret Admirer :)

Ishwar has a very peculiar name for you 😳 Last-minute clutch god. I still can't get the Pokémon website out of my head. Insane that you did it in 1-2 🙏 Goated sense of humour from what few interactions I've had with you. Extremely down to earth and soft-spoken. Wish we'd interacted more. Very happy for you and very well deserved for where you are going now. Have fun :)

You are a wizard. Thanks for saving me every now and then from my skill issues. I will miss the small chats we had in the 5th floor corridor and at VC after classes. There’s no doubt you will do awesome things, looking forward to seeing them.

I've never realized how much time we shared in all our pursuits, but I realize that we've had some amazing moments together. I wish we had done more things together, and I wish you the best in your future career, no matter which continent you end up on.

Bhargav is a genius—don’t be surprised if he casually ‘hacks’ things just for fun (watch your data!). Polite, introspective, and wildly intelligent, he was the youngest yet sharpest among us. Proud to have known you—just promise to use your powers for good!

Bhargav!
IIIT is filled with a lot of insanely smart people. But I think most of them wouldn't even come close to how insanely talented and smart you are! Your work ethic and ability to learn is astonishing! Add onto that how humble you are. You are an inspiration for me, for us. Keep being the amazing person that you are. I am glad to have met you.

I'm so glad I got to work with you for our DASS project...it wouldn't have been the same without you (you carried our team through the entire block chain part I still remember 😭😭). All the best for everything!
Thanks for setting the bar so high for people named Srinivas, and also for not going by that name among our batchmates for some reason, otherwise I would have claimed ur achievements🙃 as my own.
