testimonials.text: i love you my fellow hater <3 your hair is great and i think you should embrace it. i love us eating biryani together every week, and i'm glad u actually watched jjk with us. you're one of the three people in our little group with any real sense. love you and always remember that every building has a ground floor <3

people thought we were twins?? aparna neighbour and a very sweet person. i have never seen someone who panics about courses as elegantly and funnily as you. im glad we had so many courses in common to panic about and especially tpe and mct together as our bonding moment. fellow orgho bullying partner when mmt hehe. also how did we end up taking so many bad courses?

you definitely should have done a better job at helping me become meaner (－‸ლ) jokes aside, there's not many friends i value more since you always talk to me and help me in all the times i need it, even when its something you can do nothing about. i will always value it and i thank you so much for everytime you've done that over the last few years. you're a really cool person and i will miss bitching about random things with you. good luck and you better come campus every now and then (-_-)
Muskan, you’re so fun to chit-chat with! Being neighbors for 2 years was awesome, and our talks in the corridors always brightened my day.

loved hanging out w you <3

you make the best kahvah :) core memory fr

muskaaaannnn im so glad I asked you to be my roommate cause those three years in 306 are times I will neverrr forget. I love how we would always yap right before exam szn when we did not want to study and how I could always come to you for apples :D Still never trusting your movie recommendations

DASS would have been unbearable with you. I am so glad you were there to listen to my unlimited rants for Q20 (stupid kids sach mein). Thank you for being so helpful. Wishing you all the best pretty lady :)

Your name suits you very well. You are a ray of sunshine and I hope nothing ever dies it down. We will continue to bond over thirst traps and outrageous stuff we put on our stories. Have a great life, Muskan.

Hugs and Kisses,
Poorvi :)

I still remember group 5 online sem mein hamari Masti... Exams mein kabhi kabhi cheating assignments sharing.... Woh din were best.... I miss those... i wish you all the best for your future and I wish you get everything you need....

Certified mom™ friend and brainrot bestie. legit don’t know how I would’ve survived college without your help (or your complaining about every course). going to miss not listening to lectures just to do all the nyt games and duolingo with you. will 100% show up uninvited at your place for those delish brownies and cookies. PETROL TRUTHERS 4LYF <3.

Musi Musi cat <3
Just love how you're so cool and composed in any situation. Made some amazing memories in first year and I'll cherish them forever. Won’t forget the late-night visit to T-Hub terrace with you and Maanasa. Stay in touch cutie !

Muskann you're my favorite hater and I love how savage you are. One day I aspire to be that passionate about hating something. Please stay funny and witty, I'll miss our lil tpe yapathons that somehow occur only a day before a deadline of sorts. weDoNotCare <33

You know what imma miss the most? your judgemental complaints about everything under the sun and moon lol. I loveeee you so much, i swear if any of my friends had a braincell, it would definitely be you. It would also be you if we were talking about heartcells? (empathy fr). Anyways don't forget me and come visit me in this shithole of a place (or i can just come to your office ;) kay byeee )

youre one of the first friends i made in college and im so happy you sat next to us for orientation. i cant imagine going through college without your sarcastic quips and insults. i loved talking about books, crying about assignments late at night and scrolling through our phones doing nothing. you made me feel really comfortable in college and i think we make really good project teammates :3. invite me to your wedding please

muskann, i’m so glad we met through DASS—i can’t imagine not having met you. from being in almost every horrible course together, you definitely made them more bearable. you’re so fun to talk to and hang out with. i won’t miss you because i’ll probably see you every day and spend even more time together than we did in college <3

muskaaan, thanks for letting me (and the rest of us) practically live in your room half the time. although, now i feel it wasn't enough time. tbf any amount of time will never be enough. i love your humour and i love your ability to lighten the mood in any situation, no matter how bad. i wish you all the best things in life. hoping that i still see a lot of you no matter where you are.

muskaaaan you are so cool and funny. i wish we spent more time together. but whatever we did it was always way too fun. fun run was sooo good and even eras tour. I'm so glad we both ended up at nice places after all the intern bt we faced together hehe. i hope you stay this hardworking always and achieve everything that u wish for :) we should def hangout more cause both of us will be in hyd anyway
Thanks for writing that on my scribble tshirt <3 and take care <3

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: It's been very long, don't remember much than being scared and very excited for btech, whether I'll fit in, blah blah blah

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: 12 am coffee at jc, coming out of classes once attendance is done, movie streaming in workspaces

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: I'll miss literally everything.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I have gained weight lol :(

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Next enti, ee golenti 🤦😂

testimonials.text:
To My Penny,

Thankyou for meeting me in college and helping me come out of my interaction hurdles. One of my closest friends in the girl group. CG Grinder. I hope you get whatever you wish for in life. Kind person at heart but not so funny in comic sense. One of the very few persons with whom I can openly talk about life. She deserves all the success that she achieved and I hope she continues flying even higher.

Regards,
Sheldon Cooper

It’s been 9 years since I’ve known u, from those awkward hellos to the great bond we now share, we’ve come a long way. Memories ante ekkada start cheyalo kuda thelidu, enno conversations, trips, a few theeta panulu, and laughter that echoed late into the night. Every moment is a piece of our story. Life may have placed us in different rooms today, but the memories v made in #104 will always stay close to my heart. Wishing u all the success ahead, and always remember that I’m just a call away.

Nine years and a lifetime of memories! From last-minute exam preps, late-night gossips (especially bw exams 😅), fights, laughs — every moment was soo much memorable because of you , my unofficial #104 roomie. 
From the day we got so excited we got into IIITH, you’ve made everything more real and special. 500 characters aren’t really enough to write about u. 
Gonna miss you a lot❤️. But you know whether you need to talk, rant, or anything at all, I'll always be just a phone call away for you.

Oyyyy, neekante pedha thaagubothu ammayini nenu eppatiki kalavanu ane anipisthundhi. I still remember all the fun times we had, you were one of my first friends in college, and we've been through a lot together. Manam kalise times ki madhya baane gap unna, eppudu ninne matladam ane anipisthuntundhi. Anyway, manam idharam local kabatti, prathi re-release ki potha ne untam le. Please touch lo undu ra, keep calling, and yaaa Thaagudhaammmmmmm!!

Writing this was so tough, because 500 characters can't even begin to cover what you mean to me. Remembering small things about me, the way you care when we meet, and your brainless episodes of hysterical laughter – all these have truly made you a special friend of mine. I'm incredibly grateful to have met you. Apart from setting up my marriage, you've been a good mom. Even if we go long periods without talking, I hope we can always reconnect and chat as if no time has passed.

From the moment we started that internship, something about late-night talks :), weird food cravings, and the chaos turned us into partners in crime. Since then, it’s been nonstop laughs and your classic overthinking (which, honestly, I low-key enjoy). You’re more like the one I’ve always admired and hoped to have by my side. Sometimes I still wonder if there’s any chance you can just end up in Gurgaon again — just saying, the city’s a lot less fun without you.
Always...💛

Tell me why did our friendship die down first!! Fuck our relationships (i am kidding). I honestly felt sad that you hated me and called me "cringe"  (uk i am not). Thanks to kesav that one night not coming for coffee, naa life eh maaripoyindhi! DASS A4 nights, AAD nights and most importantly uff my lovely open-hearts! inkosari open-heart kavali ante isthava? No 1 taagubothu, smoker - ani nenu ananu, but tagginchu, naa nunchi konni manchi habits nerchuko! Somehow stay in touch re, please :(

Chaos ki care of address eh nee burra.. baboiii. Missing all that chaos already lol. The way you value people in your life can't be compared to anything. I just hope this(graduation) is just a beginning of something very big. PS - So sad that we weren't able to see those peacocks.

Unexpected bonding, had the best time with you. Osn and esw teammates but last year lo chala close ayyam. We were together during our lows and shared happiness in our highs. Placements appudu nuvvu lekapothe kashtam ayyedhi! Badminton partners and ice cream lovers. Special mention to re-releases(some plans failed but waiting for more😂) and random conversations. I hope we continue to enjoy many more moments together. All the best! May you get everything you wish for.

Sorry for missing so many post‑sprinklr reunions. Thank you for helping with OM notes and basically saving my last sem. Will always remember the "gurugramam" group despite the hatred I have for the city. Keep watching F1 but never forget that Piastri is the most overrated driver in recent years.

Oka positive aura harshita needi.... Nuv eedunna aada environment mazak mazak ga aanandanga untadi... Etlati ollani anna kalukopothav... Nee patience ki hats off asala.... Neek banglore raavalani mastu korukuntunna.... Miss ayithunna nen kooda gossip sessions ni... Inti kaada kaluddam oka roju malla eskoniki... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need...

You are the best person to spend time with. Sometimes I wonder how you keep that energy and happy mood for everyone around you. Chala innocent ga undedhanni padu chesesav 😂. Chuttu undevallaki alage gnanam panchuthu undu. Nuvvu chuse aa pichi show lu(utuber peru gurthuledhu), nee manyyy random crush lu, appudappudu vaage pichi matalu, (actually eppudu anthe anachemo) ivanni chusthe ..nobody can be like you anipisthadhi. You are always a special person. Miss all our gurgaon days !!

The moments we shared are precious, nannu MP sir ani pilavadhu ani first neke cheppa. SVM bowling day, most memorable, daniki 2 reasons, bowling lo chesina panulu and ORR daggara. Nannu judge chestav anna thought kuda ranivvaledhu eppudu. Araku, Manali ayyayi map lo, inka chala unnai.. Navvuthu undu, navvulu panchutu undu. All the best, make the best choices each time, as you always did.

harshithaaaa.. neetho chala matladali anipistadi, but naaku unna mohamaatam valla or bhayam valla antha maatladanu. But i really think we can vibe with each other. i really like how u interact with others, spread happiness wherever u go. You are very cool and sometimes clumsy :). I really hope we stay in touch. Your cute jokes, subtle smiles, item songs and i really miss navrang, where we danced our hearts out. Practice was more fun with u.Stay happy and u are very strong.. dont lose that.Miss u

Hiii! Naaku neetho chaalaa maatlaadaali, chaalaa share cheskovaali anipistaadi… but kudaraledu :( Chaaalaaa sweet and at the same time mature person. Also, marchipoku — I will always look for your snaps. Nuvvu bus lo dance veypinchaav, adi marchipolenu — thanks for that. Banglore vaste chaaalaa happy feel avtaa. Thanks and all the best nee future ki, hope you achieve all your dreams.

You are one of the few people with whom I can discuss most random stories I've ever written 😂 and one of the most intelligent and honest person I've ever known nuvvu. You are one of the positive influences I had in my college life and eppudu matladina oka welcoming feel untadi naaku. Inka chala cheppali but I'll miss you the most and pakka hyderabad ki vachinappudu kaluddham

Naa co telangana manishi nuvve. Naa basha ardham kani janalaki inko vintha jeevi unnav ante ninnu chupinchocchu. Mamul active kadu andaritho manchiga matladthav. Kassi of the batch mamul transition kadu 2nd year kelli peaks kassi aynav asala.
Intern time la workspace lo kusoni chadivinam madhyala adi kelli inka eppudu taggadam chudale ninnu.
First year full bayapadtunde ninnu chusi ippudu kadu anuko. Hyderabad lo unte kalusthu undu kassi tagginchukoku. Kottha buthulu kanipetti janalaki nerpinchu

Hey paapa! your first impression of me was like most popular girl of our gang,kinda unreachable status but at last I had a lot of mental brkdown fun with you.The most stuck memory of you was you locked up for prep of placements,just respect gurl.Going forward fr I hope you get to enjoy your ripen fruits. You are just perfect,don't forget that I'm your fan club president,hehe.Disclaimer: pick tops>>tees while gng out.I'm gonna always google you for fun company...miss you my crush*

ipdu nee gurinchi raasthunte Once upon a time ani start cheyaali. the sanest girls i have ever met adi niku vanda saarlu chepi untaa! a great friend who truly understand who you are alantidi nee bond andaritho.everyone around you enjoi themselves. I hope you get whatever you ask for and konchem kassi ni taginchu akka google lo. good luck for your future and im sure it is just as bright as ur smile.

Chala manchi frnd, nee nunchi chala nerchukovali. Nuvvu ediana goal fix cheskunte aa goal reach avtam kosam chala kasta padatav last minute lo kooda give up cheyavu. Ninnu nee lame jokes ni miss avtanu. Manam kalisi unna time ni chala enjoy chesanu, chala memories ni icharu naaku.Nee mood swings nee carvings inka mana kash conversations ni miss avtanu.Assala kalisi nappude matladatav kodiga dooram ga unnam msg chestu undu. All the best for your future ra.

"ECE vallaki emm pani leda, eppudu kaali ga tirugutaaru" that way my first impression, but after gurgaon (where it all started) you're soo matured anipinchindhi, nee thoughts, nee perspective is totally different, Gurgaon lo gyaan, naa first car drive, placement prep in reading room, re-releases, first theertham, deep talks with panipuri, class ki rammani rooju call, last minute assignment explanations, treats, movie plannings, can't imagine any of these without you. Alwayss... blr occhey kadaaa

I genuinely mean it when I say neetho chala free ga matladachu anipistundi irrespective of the stigma that is instilled into us here. It always felt like we knew each other for much longer with how easy and good it felt talking to you. Nannu chusina prathi saari without fail aadukovadam maatram anyayam..aa compliments entamma asalu 😭🙏I'll have my revenge someday. Very happy for where you are in life rn. Keep carrying yourself as well as you do. Very very lucky to have found such a good friend.

Always wanted to spend more time with you in the ug1 coffee nights.. Thanks a lot for pulling me in into your group back then.. Vibe match avthunna manam eppudu time spend cheyyalekapoyam, but would have been nice if we found more time get together and know each other more. I always find you are very motivated and committed if you consider anything serious.. but it always took time for me reach and spent more memories with you. All the best for everything in future! :-)

im soo happy for you harshithaaa, you're one of a kindd
asala nuvvu 2-2 nunchi kottina transformation is trulyyy inspiring 
nenu cheptunte nuvvu bokkale anukovachu kaani there have been multiple instances where i've drawn motivation from you ❤️
im very happy for the two of you, inkevvaru unna intha happy undevadini kaadu, konchem gay ne iddaram but not completely i promise 😔
im sure inka inka thop things chesi next level ki velthav nuvvu, good luck harshitha!
Ne valla naku A- ra CP course lo all thanks to you , I passed many courses because of you I will never forget that.

Harshitaa!!

My fellow Noogler! I loved the time we spent in our first year. Loved having you around! You have such a good Hindi accent, lol, I love it!

Keep in touch, byee!

If sweetness had a name. 
Swayam is easily the most reliable person I've seen in terms of responsibility. He can always be counted on, and people around him are lucky to have that.  Just know that if you are in a team with him and things start to go haywire, he WILL carry you. (He also gets bullied for no reason lol)

My one word summary to describe him: Anti-fragile (someone who doesn’t just withstand disorder but thrives in it.)

Swaaaayam - Roomie, MKG bakchodi ka central bakra, workaholic, thoda emotional. Kassi banda hai ekdam, dassi master(saare courses fodta hai still stress bhi leta hai). He's really smart and hardworking guy. It was fun playing cricket with you. Thoda BT kam liya karo and sleep schedule sahi kar lo. All the best for your future endeavours!

This man has singlehandedly cut off 10 years from my lifespan through second-hand stress. I still like him and enjoy being with him. Why? Dude has been one of the most supportive and understanding persons I've ever met - late night drama / counselling sessions, listening to my rants (half-heartedly sometimes, haha, but bearing through them nonetheless) and letting me annoy him anytime. I don't have a very convincing concluding sentence that doesn't reveal certain details around him so, "Madras".

Bhai tu itna phodu aadmi kaise ho sakta hai? Bro's so good at anything, picks up everything so easily. One of the hardest working people I've met, loved working with you in RRC. Gonna miss all the time pass we've done, atb in everything you pursue in the future man I'm sure you can achieve anything you set your mind to. Keep in touch man.

Hi Swayam, 
Really supportive friend. You are one of the most hard working, focused person I have ever seen. You are the friend whom I can always count on. Swayam is the another name of Perfection. BTW, amazing at each sport I have played, would miss batting on your bowls. 
Keep working hard and please keep in touch even during masters, 
Your bro, 
Manav

Kassi would be underrated for this guy, really talented, intelligent hardworking and goal-oriented. I hope you achieve whatever you started  out for, you deserve it! Had wild convos, shared great laughs, shared plans about that American dream. Stay in touch and all the best!

Swayam is one of the most unique guys I have met in my life. One moment he will be working on his research on his laptop, the next moment he will start singing the song playing in his earphones, the next moment he will start insta on his phone and laugh at the reels. You are truly one of the smartest and one of the most hardworking people I have met. Sharam kar aur thoda sleep schedule theek kar le. I am sure you will do well in whatever you pursue in life. All the best !

Meetha Rajasthani mf. Claims to be a Gujju but conforms to all Rajasthani stereotypes (the problematic ones also, yes, that particularly bad one too) Gossip queen this gentleman. Insanely hardworking and talented. Works way too much for his own good. Really grateful to you for having that discussion about impostor syndrome. My quality of life has gotten better ever since. Love all of our philosohical discussions too. Keep taking breaks once in a while bhai. Food also 😭🙏No more chikna look pls.

Hii Swayam (SWAG, Aegislash, woodspirit, schlechter, khudko papa bulane wale,..)
Apan ne sath me bohot achha time spend kiya hai bhai (terese ye genuinely keh raha), teri masti ko bohot miss karunga. Incredible focus ke sath goal tak pohoch ne ke liye khudse hi efforts marna (in many creative ways) sach me bohot inspiring hai. Kabhi US aaya to terese zarur milunga but tabhi hath zarur milana mujse (in your own annoying manner) !!
Take care, brother.

Swayam,I had the absolute fortune of getting to know you properly during our final semester, and I’m so glad we worked closely till the very end of 4th year.I really wish I’d known you this well much earlier.You're someone who never gives up, constantly brainstorming new ideas no matter how hopeless things seem or even if the conference deadline is literally the next day. You’re smart, hardworking, and full of persistence.Bas aise hi phodte rehna, aur life mein thoda kam pareshan hona mere bhai.

A very humble and honest person. Extremely dedicated to work, and  every time we meet we always have some interesting conversation. Bahut help kari hai yaar tune meri for my MS applications. I was literally so clueless, tune hi aadhi chije batayi mujhe.
Thanks a lot! All the best for ur future!

Pranaam sir,
Aap jaise researchers ki bohot aavashyakta hai iss desh ko...:)
Bhai you have always been helpful to me in acads. You have also been a great host for me in Gujarat visit. The point in see some challenge in a work , I think "Swayam to itni mehnat krta hai,...mai nhi kr sakta kya?...", iss type ka challenging attitude hai tereme...

Remember me in future, whatever your post is. From my side, be assured, I am always there at your help sir !

bhai sky city mai ek bangla dila de yaar, kab tk nandanbaug jaunga mai.
All the best for future , keep in touch, keep hustling.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: new faces,new campus,new lifestyle,it's an overwhelming moment.It made me feel I was lonely,all others enjoying felicity n my roomie locked up yea Covid it was.I told myself while I go out of this campus,I wanted to be surrounded by a large grp of ppl who really enjoy the fest with me,n uk it's ✅ 🤘

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: It's hard to choose,but I could say the last days were as like my first day, I felt for the first time jealousy on balu, missing srihitha,asking asrith all, irritating ved, asking all qns ft harshitha, interaction with all these guys,made me so better me. It's just so cinematic yet my btech stry.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: other than my people.. it's my vc bread omlette(bf), sittings at blue room, rainy walks, late night cravings with dlf,summer sleep ft ws,my personal basement dance room,parijat outfit selfies, grp movie waits at open gym, dance practice at amphi,gym like stairs for 4th floor,my homecave💗(my room).

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Definitely my go-to contacts 😂.. I never thought I would have made friends whose missing can make me emo, it's destiny rgt✨..I was so lucky to have beautiful people like balu,srihitha,ved,harshitha,sathvika and others who were always there even though I pushed them away.It was so true, that I could become Lil bit more open n closer.Though I wasted a lot by being anti social kinda managed my last sem to build some good bonds with my people. Now I can say that I found my tribe happily:)

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Heyy for future me😂, listen though u fell the lowest in this journey,it taught all of ur faults clearly and also shown even without anything ppl are gonna be so lovely with you.So, just be connected to ur people n do ur things for peace that's gonna take you to ur tailored destination 💗

testimonials.text: Em rayanu ela cheppanu! You are my light of hope in darkness. Clg anthaga ekkani prathi sari you were my best company and will be my best my company.. Starting from long walks (upto 12kms) to randomly dancing together in rainy nights, we had many things to share and enjoy together. Always proud of having you as a friend.. And a skillful photographer in our batch.. Chala sarle ditch chesav but I could never leave you at any any point in my college.. Inka chala cheyyali together.. 5th yr kummedam❤

To my crazy friend (in the best way possible, obviously 😅) — we’ve always been friends, but the last few months just hit different! From all the wholesome workspace days to random hangouts and movie nights (still sad you missed the girls' night gossip 👀), it’s been a wild, fun ride.
Just saying — don’t overthink or go into that vanishing mode again. Don’t hesitate, its always okay to talk. And anyway, I’m just a call away.

Gonna miss you loads!

proper merupu theega vi, kanapadedi thakkuva sepu but the impact and memories of you are chala ekkuva. From borrowing your clothes to studying with you for endsems, madhyalo chala ante chala fun moments. I dont think nuv kakunda naatho impromptu ga reel no one can make it happen. Neeku appud appud oche pichi qs laki ans lu kaavali ante call karo ji :). Naku hyd osthe next year motham nee room lone undabothunna mundhu chepthunna. Love you so so so much ra, my dance paglu and crazyy friend.

Good songs and a dance floor. Chalu, poleramma la ayipotaav! Assalu entha energy vachestundo akka gaariki. Next level energy, next level dance moves kuda. Ee madya ee lokam lo bathukutunnaav, unlike previous sems; alaane maatlaaduthu undu jenaalatho. Seriously, one of the craziest girls I met amma nuvvu. Psych complete cheyyi, chaala thop series, then we can talk more about Juliet O'Hara.

Dance partner.... Asal dance ante naa brain loki nuvve vastav... Inter kelli em maarale suneetha nuv... Ade chinnapillavi... Atlane undu.... Keep in touch.... Insta stories atlanti manchi manchi petti inspire chestundu.... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need

Though we didn’t spend a lot of time together during our journey, whenever we met, we were never distant. We made it a point to create memories and eventually grew closer. Nene overthinker anukunte nakante ekkuva alochinchavu I guess mingle avvadaniki but at last u made it there. I really enjoyed the time we spent. Trip ki vacchunte inko thop undedi but parle we have time veldam. Let’s make more memories in the days to come. All the best for your future!

Known her since 8th standard, and she’s truly one of the brightest people I know. Always fun to talk to and carries positive energy wherever she goes. I’m glad we can now talk eye to eye, and I genuinely wish her all the very best in everything ahead!

mee dance ki pedda fan andi. first friend i got in this college.Very stylish,friendly,cute,lovely person. Dont lose that swag u have. Keep dancing wherever u go. You are very pretty. Naatho evaru teliyanappudu,maatladanappudu nuvvu naatho maatlaadav. You are very special to me. Kalustu undam. Farewell roju, we vibed with eachother. Be happy and i hope success follows you.. Miss youu..

The most talented dancer , photographer , active what not everything anocchu. Nee daggara kelli photo graphy nerchukunta edo roju.Asalu farewell night roju teesina photos aythe inka mind blowing.
Andaru dance cheyalani chesthe nuvvu matram passion tho chesthav thopu asala. ilane stories peduthu undu mammalni inspire chesthu undu. Dance choreo lu kavali ante nerpiy eppudu ayna em ayna story lu pettali ante nee suggestions kosame vastha adi fixx inka😅

Hii! Chaalaa manchi dancer and chaalaa sweet person anipistaav. We are DnA and Data systems team mates telusaa :). Nuvvu notice cheyyavu emo but your energy is contagious so keep smiling and be positive, all the best and hope you achieve all your dreams
Even with little conversation, you’ve always been nice.
Hi Rohan, I enjoyed bonding over acads with you in the first semester. I believe in your potential and I feel you will do amazing in life :))

While we haven't spent a lot of time together, you've always been a great friend to me. You're such a needlessly nice person, and I like that about you. It feels like anyone can talk with you freely. I'm happy for the time we shared, and hope you achieve great success in your future.

Rohan, you are the person who is extremely funny and always in a mood for talking and playing around with people. I have always loved talking with you. I got to know a lot of random facts about anything in campus, be it courses or something about Ravi sir. Your love for detecting bold, italics and underline in a document is insane, and I hope your CV journey takes you miles ahead. Had a great time spending with you, stay healthy and political always :))
Love your witty opinions man. You knew about a lot of things going in the college. I will miss the days, we laughed a lot together. Best of luck in your life ahead!

Rohan bhai tujhe PM ke liye apply karna chahiye. Tu bahut hi accha neta banega. Yeh italic bold detection me kuch nahi rakha hai :)).
Placement season was pure chaos and really fun. Learnt a lot from you.
Tere saath hamesha bahut maza aata hai yaar, bahut miss karunga tujhe!

Rohan bhai, aapke saath ye 4 saal kaise beet gaye pata bhi nahi chala. Kaafi maza aaya aapke saath. Raat ko JC, ganesh chaturthi etc. kaafi maze aaye. Shukriya Rohan bhai in 4 saalon ke liye. 
College ke baad bhi milte rehna!

I remember our conversations and chats in G5 WA group. We used to talk a lot and you helped so many times. We even thought of going on a trip after coming to campus, which didn't happen unfortunately :(. I miss those good old days. You are a very nice and genuine person. I wish you all the best for your future and hope we meet someday again :)

Haldirams paglu. One of my earliest friends at IIIT. Rohan is one of the most honest, supportive, and dedicated guys I have met in our college. He was always ready to help me out with anything whenever I asked. I had a lot of fun working with you in multiple course projects and exploring Bombay. Hope that you will stay in touch in the future. Good luck :)

Rohan is one of the nicest and most principled people I’ve met in college. Always great to talk to, open-minded, thoughtful, and genuinely kind. He’s the kind of person who restores your faith in humanity, someone who’d rather take a loss than compromise on doing the right thing. Truly rare to come across someone like him, I hope we stay in touch beyond college too :)

name: Ashna Dua
tagline: One chai away from a good mood 🫖 😌

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: I was nervous, scared, and excited all at once. Leaving my emotional parents and little brother in Chandigarh to start life at IIITH was overwhelming. The first few days were scary, but then I met my roomie and we had a lot of fun watching our 1st movie when I was supposed to be in quarantine XD

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: There’s no single best memory, just a biiiiiig cluster of them. Every event I took part in, the fun and chaos with friends, weird moments in class, rant sessions at canteens, being a TA, working on research, learning from profs, Chai wale bhaiya… all of it made campus life amazing.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Living just a door away from my closest friends, knocking anytime, scaring them, 3 AM Monopoly Deal and dumb charades, deep talks till 5, JC and David visit turning into campus walks, studying together, getting ready, going out, basically sharing each moment together. I'll miss my friends the most.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I was very shy in my first year, rarely talking to people. But then I grew out of it and made so many friends. And well, I started drinking chai 😂

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Corporate Majdoori at Goldman Sachs. Saare dost to doosre shehar ja rahe and it’s hard to leave behind all the memories and step into work life. I’ll miss the random laugh sessions and carefree days. But I hope to keep meeting friends and stay connected. Life at IIIT was different, and amazing, one I’ll always cherish. I will alwayssss carry a part of my campus and friends with me.

name: Prisha
tagline: "meri production hai ye","darna kisi se nahi hai"

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer:
It was peak Felicity—music everywhere, and I was quarantined.
Homesick and stuck inside… that day sucked, not gonna lie.
Missed home a lot, won’t ever forget it.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer:
Honestly, it’s hard to pick just one. I think it’s the little things—late-night chai, random laughter, doing nothing but still making memories.
Somewhere along the way, I felt what love, comfort, and home truly mean.
Everything was just… the best. 💛

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: What I’ll miss the most? Definitely those random Mondays where I could just choose not to do life and stay in bed.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: You’re talking about change, while my height hasn’t changed in the last 6 years!

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer:
What’s next? Honestly, even I don’t know!  Joining corporate life, maybe playing a sport, maybe becoming a health and yoga freak—who knows?
But yeah, that’s kind of the vibe I’m going with for now!

name: Anuhya Nallapati
tagline: had a good time not a long time

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: seniors were trying to get us to do felicity/kalakshetra work, but rev, nan, and i somehow escaped and went on a long walk in the phd quarters. after that, we met others, ate pizza in krb, and explored random parts of campus with random people.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: during our second year felicity, it rained almost every day. on one of the days, my friends and i brought a speaker and danced in the rain in front of the basketball court — it was so much fun.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: spending so much time with my friends and being so close to them.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: i think i’ve just grown up a bit.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: i'm going to work for some time and then figure out what’s next based on how I feel.

name: Kyrylo Shyvam Kumar
tagline: Btw do you know about RMS-Prop?

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: First day on campus was in quarantine. I came just in time to enjoy my first Felicity (and play table tennis on tables in quarantine, when guard was not looking). People with whom I played TT (or discussed group theory ;) in next days, became my best friends for next years.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Winning Megathon in my second year. Discussions with friends we had, were really fun, and we pitched it really well. I liked time spent with friends, and we became much closer after sleepless nights.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Many things - Vibes during night walks; hours spent doing projects (and watching movies in parallel) during SMAI; the dopamine during the revisions, hours before final MR exam; so many good moments when playing Catan. Will definitely miss the cool people I met here.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: My look on CS changed, I got much more interested in deep learning, and joined Cvit. Definitely grew as a person. Meeting different people with various interests and lifestyles also changed me.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: I hope I will continue seeing my friends in person, even after many years, even thousand miles away from here (especially those who want to become RS in distant lands). It would be great to see us grow professionally, and then observe if we achieved happiness while choosing very different paths.

testimonials.text: Kyryolo is the tech talker-in-chief—always dropping random facts, always hungry, especially if it's non-veg on the table.

Hi Kyrylo, I remember when we first talked in the ESW team, never thought it would lead to so many amazing memories. Zomaland was just the beginning, and after that, we went to so many places I’ve lost count. That year was the best part of college. You were the best project partner, and I’ll never forget our blue room study sessions followed by movies, and long night walks on Microsoft road.  Thanks for all the laughs and support. I hope you achieve all your dreams. All the Best !! 😊

Seriously can't WAIT to actually invade your kitchen and cook up some crazy good food - say goodbye to those tiny room experiments, we goin gourmet! 🧑‍🍳 Get ready for non-stop hangouts at your place! And bro, you better start prepping those Russian lessons, I'm expecting to be fluent by next year. Keep killing it with everything! Good times loading! 🔥

darylo shvyam kumar :) (i hope you got the psych reference!), is that guy who would always leave out time to spend it with friends, no matter what. i cannot appreciate that quality enough.

your PICHHLE SAPTAAH would always be a centerpoint of our jokes XD. the only guy who has almost memorised wikipedia to the heart! and sundar pichai's favourite gemini user.

happy that you are staying back for a while, hope to meet you  regularly. all the best, lots of love!

Underrated. On the surface, he might not seem like the flashiest person. BUT THIS MAN KNOWS HIS SHIT. We did soooo many things together from contests to courses, and throughout them all I could feel the competence radiating from him. It's captivating.

Apart from that, I am lucky to be able to claim you as a friend. You have let me tap into fields and groups that I couldn't otherwise. Even if most of our conversations were about work, the camaraderie was as clear as diamonds. Thank you for shar

My name is Kyrylo Shyvam Kumar. You are one of the most mature and well-rounded people I have met in my life. After all, you are the gentleman singer of Ukraine :P. I will miss those deep talks we used to have just walking around campus. And ofcourse, no one can forget your preflop raises in poker. I wish one day you can give me a masterclass on how to make trades, not only in Catan, but also irl!

Kyryllo - We've known each other for quite some time, but the memories we made in Goa will be the fondest ones I take forward. Goa Trip would not have been the same without you, the hangout sessions, duo trips to beaches and yes the casino! You are a really hardworking person, and that's a key thing that highlights you. I've really enjoyed the discussions we have had about various topics. All the Best! Let's stay in touch. And yes, "Don't sleep on this" :).

The guy who silently shaped our academic journey at IIIT. Decided all the courses of our group. Has a great memory, and an unstoppable urge to share the most random facts no one knew they needed :)).
Super hardworking, dives deep into whatever he learns, and always curious for more. I can never get bored with you man - always soo fun solving some online puzzle or a JEE question together. You always turn my half-cooked rubber duck ideas into a real beautiful solution :). Will miss you a lot yaar!

It's such a shame we met only in our last year. We have so much in common, and it will be hard to meet again. I'm happy to have had you as a friend. You give off that air of confidence wherever you go, whether it's in talking about your future or bluffing in poker, and I admire that about you. You are one of the few people I like holding Ethical and Philosophical debates with, because it feels like we live on the same wavelength, and I will miss that. I hope you burn bright in your ML career.

Kyryl is a true man of culture. When he isn't explaining RMS-prop or the latest tech news, he grinds elden ring or reads berserk. Kyryl is a very unique character, and one whom i've become very accustomed to calling a close friend. He always makes time for us, coming to our room for poker/catan even though we stay on the opposite side of campus. After I left non-veg, Kyryl became the only one left for our taco tuesdays and la pinoz days. I'll always remember you and treasure our friendship :))

Kyryl is one of my earlier friends at the college, starting with the batch trip. Kryrl is funny, smart, and a fun person to be around. You can initiate conversations around a lot of topics with him. Love his approach to the subjects at hand and life in general. Kyryl is part of many of my core memories for me. Will miss all the random pizza sessions we had (both in room and out).  If we ever happen to meet again, lets finish that one chopsticks match we started. All the best for your life, uWu.

Kyrylo, you have an insane drive for knowledge of all kinds. Be it CS, AI, or anime, you are uptodate with everything. You are extremely thoughtful and the way you reason about daily day to day decisions is inspiring for me. Many times you don't show this, but I know you are extremely emotional and you care deeply about the people around you. I have enjoyed a lot with you, from playing hide and seek to being TAs together. You are my brother. All the best for Typeface and ur future MS plans :))
Glad to have interacted with you, I wish I had had more conversations with you. You are a very grounded person. Keep learning and smiling. Best of luck in your life ahead!

u r such a sweet & genuine person-always carrying a smile on ur face & 1 of the only ppl who's always ready for a plan(& easiest to convince lol)whether zomaland or goa.goa wouldn't have been the same w/o u,u enjoyed so much that v enjoyed seeing u enjoy😂all moments spent w u were so fun-pizza party @thub terrace,games in microsoft & all the convos in btwn.wish u the best always:)Kyrylo Lovers has its name for a reason and thanks for picking up those pretty sea shells & marbles for me to keep💖
Docking 😳

I’ve probably had more conversations with you than anyone else, our late-night chats,research chats,and Keval barging in late with his usual chaos.I’ve learned so much from you.I’m lucky to have had the most interesting,colorful roommate experience.I wish you a life filled with meaningful,exciting,and hard work,one that’s as interesting and colorful as you are.

journal.answer: My hair. I had to cut my long hair and since then they have been short. Miss the lore :(

journal.answer: Plans are to join the corporate. Will decide the future based on advancements in the tech, specifically AI world. The world is too uncertain right now to fix onto anything.

Most mehnati insan I know, brother would be working like 15 internships at any time. Keep impacting those around you, cheers.

We know each other through Khushi, and from what I have heard and seen, you seem like an awesome, sweet and kind guy. You guys are good for each other and I hope it stays the same. Your easily one of the smartest people I know and you have a lot to offer to this world. 

Stay the same and good luck for the future..

Sunfaa!! You ARE the most precious friend I have made in this college. I am thankful that this college happened to me and I met you, beauty. The innocence you carry with a hint of calmness just fits right with the world where we are together. You have been there during my highs and lows, and always were there to cheer me up no matter what. My food partner, my partner in crime, my partner in life, I love you. esa lgre vows likhrhi hu🤭. Mere Boga Woga :kisses:
Most baniya guy ever, kanjoos makkhi chus hai but bhai apna hai. Will miss ya brother keep in touch

Hii Meerut sweets wala from Delhi! Dude, you’re honestly one of the smartest and hardest-working people I know on campus — full-on baniya, haha.Thanks for all the financial advice you’ve given me. Stay the same and keep in touch, lol! Wishing you all the best ahead!
A genuinely sweet and hardworking guy — an inspiration to everyone around him. He proves that with dedication and the right mindset, anything is possible. Going to miss hanging out with you :<
Rhythm bhai! Forever DNA team mate... One of the most hardworking person Ik, keep the grind on(thoda aram bhi krliya kro though). Atb!

Rhythm Aggarwal is one of the most determined AND hardworking people I have ever met on campus. Your amazing work ethic aside, you're an hilarious guy to be around - Never a dull moment. Rhythm Bhai you've been a great friend to me through these years and have always been there to help me out, in whatever way you could. I still remember fondly of the time you showed me around delhi and stuffed me till my stomach couldn't take it.
Bhai , thu tho acha teammate tha bhai aur uske bhad ache dhost bi tha.I was able to call you almost any time for anything .

Hey Rhythm, you’re such an energetic and funny soul the vibe you bring whenever we meet in the college lanes is something I’ll truly miss! I’ll miss you calling me “Santhuuu” with all that drama haha, those third-wheeling hugs with you and Kuso, and of course, our secret basketball court joke LMAO, unforgettable! Wishing you loads of happiness and success. Stay happy and let’s always stay in touch!

Bhai apan bahut starting se dost hai, but abhi bhi tu mere aur chirag ke naam me confuse ho jata hai lamaoo. Koi na still we are friends and will be.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Well...being a DASA student my first 4 days in campus were spent in quarantine XD. But after quarantine ended I remember feeling that I might get lost in the campus but then I realized that was not the case within a day.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Late night walks in campus. Somehow the campus feels more alive post 12 am than in the morning XD

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: The freedom to sacrifice my sleep just to finish a book (corporate life T-T)

testimonials.text: Anusha, you’ve been such a sweet and genuine friend, my next-door neighbor for years. Through all the rants about deadlines, pressure, and the rough hostel conditions, you were always there, and I could truly count on you. You’ve been one of those friends I could always rely on. Good luck with your job in Bangalore! Stay in touch! 💛

Anusha, I’m really going to miss you. Coming to your room to help pick out dresses, heels, and even fixing buttons became such a fun little ritual for me and your support always meant the world. You were there for me in so many ways, just like I tried to be there for you.....
The corridor won’t be the same without you. It’s honestly hard to imagine being here without your rants, and those chats we used to have.Can’t wait for us to meet again soon love you loads and let’s definitely stay in touch

Hi Anusha!! I got to know you so much more in the 4th year of college and I feel we are so similar, we totally match each other's energies when talking. You are one of the only person who matches my horror for lizards hehehe, loved lizard tracking with you lolll. You're such a calm, sweet, innocent, honest and a very hard working person. I love how you have the guts to take hard decisions to stay focussed on your goals!! Stay in touch :))

hi roomiee, you've been a constant for 3 years of my life. The first time we talked on the landline after our orientation would have never let me imagine our intertwined paths years down the lane. I loved our late night discussions (complaining about courses, discussing books, series and more) from our beds. I wish you the very best for your future and I hope we get to always keep in touch!!

we haven't talked that much in college except for a short span in second year but i won't forget the fact that you were someone who definitely made my transition to college easier during online sem. thanks a lot for that time; you're a good person at heart. i wish you the best wherever you go :)

Ig our batch got the best of both worlds by having the first sem online. it brought together people who would've otherwise never spoken. That and our interactions in the batch trip. Loved talking to you Anusha. DASS was doable only because of how you helped a lot while coding while sitting late night at workspaces. And yes discussing courses and professors was always fun. Thanks for these memories. Hope you do really well in your life and all the best.
hello :) although we haven't talked much recently, I will always remember cp journey and the tons of delicious dishes we saw on a daily basis 😭

hey.... we've known each other since online sem when you were all the way over there in dubai.... it was fun hanging out with you.... talking about random pop culture shit.... its unfortunate we drifted apart the way we did... i hope you do well and are happy in life no matter where you are... all the best!!!

Hello... You will forever be the most memorable part of my time at IIIT. We have been through the best and worst days of college together. Life was easier with you by my side. Thank you for being my best friend in college. Find happiness wherever you are, and if you can't, go wherever you can find happiness. Wish you all the best in everything!

you are one of the most friendlest guys and one of my first friends in campus... the vibe and the atmosphere around you is extremely warm. keep this spirit and energy in you always, hope you never change, and be extremely successful in life

Bhai table tennis training ke liye thanks! You are the guy with whom I spend my evening hitting smashes in TT. We even used to play TT during exams time and it was so much relaxing.
You initially just used to laugh on other's leg pull. But later you also learned to make jokes on others 😂. Bhai thoda bol liya kr chup mat rehya kr.

Have a good time with you. Keep contacting! and best of luck for your future endeavours.

Ishit, you’ve been my only roommate throughout college . A true champ in tennis and chess ♟️ — I really enjoyed our tennis matches. You're calm, composed, and always helpful. Thanks for being my project partner and helping with assignments. I’ll never forget our card games (Kaabo, Bluff), night cricket , Ooty-Mysore trip , and all those random chats. Stay connected and all the best ahead!

Ishit is a sincere and hardworking guy. Be it academics, coding, or cricket, it was always a pleasure exchanging ideas and learning together. I truly enjoyed the time we spent watching movies and talking about cricket. Will always cherish playing chess and TT with you. Let’s stay in touch. All the best!!

Ishit yaar — chess ka champion, maths ka magician! Calculator bhi sochta hoga ‘bhai thoda ruk ja’, Aryabhatta ko bhi complex de de. Pehle thoda chup-chup tha, ab apne savage one-liners se humein hi chup kar deta hai. Born genius, effortlessly talented — aur upar se ekdum grounded. Aise hi chamakte raho bhai. Keep shining...

name: Sriya Venepally
tagline: i want it but i'm lazy

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: got roped into kalakshetra, ate veg biryani :((. but met a lot of good people so it was fun overall.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: winning against vnr in our college tournament. it was a very close game, going into ot and it was the first time we beat them.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: being able to sleep at any time during the day. gonna miss being joblesss enough to just hang out with friends doing nothing for hours.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: started being more active in college events, participating in things outside my comfort zone.

testimonials.text: future roomieee thank you for getting me through college. without you forcing me to study and being my project partner i would've failed in half the courses. wisest advice giver and the smartest person i know. from talking through a mutual friend to being my constant parijaat partner and sessions and cake baking gossip sessions, i cannot wait to be your roomie in blr. will forever simp over you playing bb and i promise to be a good wingwoman (not that you'd need it xD), 42X and sherlock ftww

I don't want to say goodbye but here I am. I can't even count the number of times you've saved my ass in every way possible. Thank you for all the advice you gave patiently even though I didn't listen sometimes. You've been there for me all my best and worst moments, college wouldn't be the same without you. You're an absolutely amazing person who deserves so much. I really look up to you and how awesome you are at everything from academics to sports. 

Keep killing it and wish you all the best!

sriyaaa, I’m so grateful we both decided not to go for buzz—because without you, i don’t think i would’ve survived the rest of college. i love how, whenever either of us was bored, we’d just go to each other’s rooms to talk or silently sit on our phones. our conversations are always so fun and full of the most random but interesting topics. you’re so pretty, honest, and such a good basketball player. thank you for always being there for me. i’ll miss you. don’t go to bangalore :( love youu <3

Sriyaaa, I’m so glad you exist—you’re the only one I watch great movies with and ofc my GOT bestie. I was so sad when I found out you were moving to Bangalore but let’s keep meeting regularly!. You’re hands-down the best DJ at my house parties and ofc best project partner. I’ve never said this, but you were the only one who checked on me in Goa after the Anu incident and made sure I had fun—it meant so much. ilysm, bestie :)

sriyaa, my osn guru, my dance student, my basketball crush, my pool partner, my first and best date ever, i seriously love being around you. the way you describe seafood, made me wana try it and i love that. dancing with you is so fun, i love how you always match my vibe and get me higher. you look so hot always, but you are such a cutie and i'll miss you so much. i hate you for blr-ing ;-; but its fine cuz that distance isn't enough to keep us apart. ilysm <3

Hi roomie! I can't believe it's been 10 years since we first met. That's cwazyy! I've literally seen every side of you. Happy, excited, sad, mad, sleepy, sleepy AGAIN. I'll never forget our 4am talks about everything and nothing. You always listened to my endless rants and stories like they were actually interesting. You are so talented and effortlessly good at everything you do. I admire you for that. Now that we are going to break our 10 years streak, I'll miss you. Love you endlessly, always.

Sriya, you are one of the most talented people I know. You're that lazy genius that has carried me since the start of college. We've played literally every sport there is, and you seem to be a natural at all of them. I respect that you don't compromise in life, you do what's best.    It's really easy and fun to talk to you. I really like the way you maintain and value the friendships in your life. You are dependable and trust-worthy, thanks for always being there for me.

I apologize (jk, you're welcome) that I dragged you out to hangout randomly. So glad I found someone to watch football with,supporting rivals only makes it better. That and ofc simping over Pat. Watching that IPL match together was one of my most memorable weekends in college. We both know I go easy on you when we play pool. Wish you luckkk and lets hope I don't see any less of you. Maybe you're not so heartless after all :)
To anyone reading this if you're over 6ft, here's her number - 8790X...

Sriyaa hi, you are such a fun person to go out or chill around with. You're a very kind person and its amazing to talk to you. Pondi, Goa and Coldplay, we had so many trips together and they were all amazing thanks to you. Its still scary to ride on a two-wheeler with you but i like that adrenaline rush lol. I love watching and playing sports with you. Thank you for carrying inter college and batch teams, you are just too good at ball. Once you come Bangalore, we can party hard. Stay the same :)

Sriya, sexy ass bitch you are. You're our sporty queen and the pride of IIIT basketball. Gossip sessions and night outs with you are the best. I love you and you'll always be my number one lover, promise. You're super funny and no guy is good enough for you so just come with me bbg :)

woman does everything and makes everything seem kitna easy omg. Thank you for HARD-CARRYING prithvi in everything(sports+music+DANCEEEE) and being the lovely fun person you always were. Best of luck for your future. I want an autograph before you're famous 😼

I really never thought you would cook so hard in basketball raa, felt very proud and happy when you crushed VNR in our tournament. 

I will miss those 1 lakh+ relationship stories of yours, random cricket and tennis evenings! Stay in touch, was very fun to hangout especially our IPL gang!!

Hi Sriya, You're one of the best basketball players ik <3. I think you're extremely talented and very fun to hangout with. I wish we continued to be how we were in sem-1 throughout college. It was really fun even though it was online. I'm glad we started hanging out more again. Stay in touch :)

Best food choices, good music taste and great advice. Thank you for being there for me when I needed it. Ice creams at creamstone and cinnammon rolls you made ... all yumm and form very fond memories. Love Don and Siri. You are a vibe and everything is always more fun with you in it. Thank you for teaching me basketball, could not have learnt it from anyone better. You are a great sportsperson and an even better sport XD. To more memories in Blr.

Baskestball champ!!! I am so glad we found each other! Its been an honour playing with you in (almost) every sport and winning (almost) everything. Never a dull moment partying with you either. Such a gorgeous being! Our football celebrations XDD. All the best for your future, I will miss you so so so much!

sriyaaa, hi da, thank you for helping me in so many courses. I remember automata rock paper scissor thingy which u got and helped me out, and other times like in dsa exam. thank you for being such a great project teammate. u were the first person in college ik of who read game of thrones that time. u were a great  seat buddy (i dont have any other word for it) the first 2 years when we were forced to sit on assigned seats. U r really good basketball player and pianist. Good luck for ur future

You will definitely go down in my books as the most talented girl I know. Sports (15 kinds of sports ffs), music, (apparently dance!?), acads, leadership. You name it, you got it!
You've been super inspirational since the start, and I'm super grateful I had amazing memories with this felicity dance partner!

youre one of the two people i had such a hard time playing FIFA against. you making salah run down the wing was soo scary. its sad my laptop went for a toss in the last sem and we couldn't play much. you're an awesome basketball player and i hope you come to campus and play with us sometimes. good luck!!

How on earth do you manage to do everything... and i mean everything you do.... so damn well.... it was an honour to play alongside you for prithvi (although you did most of the playing; i just played the one sport girls don't play, you'll surely be better than me if you try playing it :))

You are one of the main reasons for me continuing cricket when i wanted to quit the sport.. thank you so much for that

Please keep in touch.... PRITHVI RULZZZ!!!
Sriya, you’re calm, pretty, and your smile brings positivity.Stay awesome

i know you're surprised with my testimonial here cuz my ass didn't reply to that text yet 😂
solid peeps, wish we could've hungout more in uni but it's cool cuz you're coming to blr anyways so we're gonna chill there. (lot of substance abuse)
Take care budddyy

coolest, most badass person i have met. practicing for octave to sports to prithvi after-parties, always had the best time with you. love your vibe and keep coming to campus for basketball!!

and, don't forget the pact.

Hey Sriya!

We haven't hung out much after our first year of college, but I'll always remember you for your shy-yet-sweet smile. You give me the vibes of someone who seems indifferent when looking from afar, but gives out a serene feeling when talking. Hope you cherish that side of yours!

Stay in touch, and wish you the best in all your future endeavours!

Best sports women of the batch.... Hv seen you play so effortlessly and lead pruthvi in an amazing way... It's always great to talk to you... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need

One of the nicest persons to have nice random gossips and discussions lmao
I loved all the times we just randomly sat and spoke about everything and everyone. It’s very funny when you speak in Telugu and i like how I force you to do it and papam then you speak kashta paduthu 😂
I hope we meet more often in Bangalore and do nice gossiping

Sriya.. Tug of war winners fr.. you're one of the smartest and most athletic person I will ever meet in my life. We have a long overdue clubbing experience left to do.. Nevertheless, stay the same cutie.. and all the best for your future <3

Heyy
You've always been one of the best athletes in our batch — super dedicated, passionate and always giving your best. Whether it was on the basketball court or in any college event, you always stood out. I love your energy and enthusiasm.
You have also been really sweet to me whenever we have interacted, and I have always appreciated that 
Wishing you all the best for whatever comes next! I hope you keep playing and enjoying every sport you take up

Hey Sriya. The only word that comes to my mind when it comes to you is "All Rounder" in everything, whether its sports, music or any cultural thing. You are such an easy person to talk and creative as well when it comes to music, it was in octave when we get to meet first time and then after we had great time. Keep growing and keep smiling.

Hi Sriya,
You're an incredibly talented musician and athlete. Take care and good luck with what the future has in store!

Aakrit, Felicity Kalakshetra genuinely wouldn't have happened without you, and you made it super fun and successful. You're pretty funny too, and a great person to party with. Hoping for a FAP 2.0 someday!

Logistics team was one of the best memories of my college life... Thanks for making it special... Kalakshetra ke baad baatein karna cheezo ko laane ke liye idhar udhar ghoomna planning executing everything i enjoyed a lot... Will miss those days... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need...

Akuuu, You may not have spent much time with me daily, but your care always showed. You were my first bestie in college, and no matter how often we talk, you’ll always hold that place. I hope you find time for me this one last year I’m here. You’re one of the most genuine, kind, and hardworking people I know. And honestly, describing you in just 500 freaking characters? Impossible. You’re way more than words could ever capture. Always stay the same, and stay close. love u always<3

Broo, you are one of the most helping people I have ever seen. Hamesha available for all of us. Tera thoda acads bigda hua hai, but seriously you are very, very good at dev.
Me toh HYD me he hu, milte rahege, aata rahunga campus.

Aakrit bhai - You are the hidden gem of MKG, hamesha savage responses ke sath ready rhta hai. "Say no to free things" - Goated statement lol. Almost har MKG treat mai tu hi pay krta tha, kabhi bhav nahi khata tu. You are really hardworking bhai, keep the grind on! All the best, let's stay in touch!!

Bhai tu ekdum dildaar aadmi hai. Ekdum chill and bindass. Tera room toh hangout spot tha apne group ka. Bohot saari yaadein hai tere aur tere room se judi. Let's keep in touch. All the best bro! I know you will do well.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: my first day was right after felicity ended and everyone were busy and i went to north alone and i didnt where to put the plates so i had to wait 5 minutes to find someone to follow to  know where to put the plate. Most of the day went in meeting my roomate and staying up  with others

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: i will miss obh room, south snacks , timepass talks all of us had in corridor, basketball we played at night, extensive sleeps , running to class for attendance or when badri comes, random going out plans, cabo nights, movie nights, arguing about random stuff.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: i changed da like idt im the same person I am more mature like crazy mature and I am 21 years old its crazy

journal.answer: Idk ig job or ig MS or just get rich and get a villa and chill

testimonials.text:
antaaaaaaa
I'm so glad we went for Coldplay together, best decision ever! You're the only comparable drunk guy to me lmao, have had some really fun times partying with you guys. Watching horror movies with you is always fun. Will miss the fun times we had in college.

We really need to go karting again once

re Anus, nainital is waiting bro. the one guy I knew from before iiith. your DS project titled rightly so, after you - yapster. a literal god at anything related to math, bro was reading particle physics like it's English. I support your team sometimes (Nuggets) because their dark blue color is really nice and I hope they win. The expressions you make when youre drunk are wayyy too funny, and if you decide to go there, Chennai should feel very lucky to have you.

The last 2 years were goated, we should make ur 1 trip a month thing a tradition at least among us 4. loved doing tp with y'all. Sooo many things we've done together da, from OM to TPE, u became one of my closest friends in less than a year. 🏐??2👍. 🐊🛩️>>

Sup anta, thanks for everything. You are literally my best friend, you make everything really fun, even during the tough times you somehow make me laugh, make everyone laugh. Im gonna miss hanging out with you. You are the only friend unlike others, who I made on day one and still stuck around till the very end and I hope it doesnt end in the future. Even thought I will meet alot more people later, I never want to forget my time with you. Good luck with for everything you have ahead.

you're the only one who can match my ranting and just like that we once ended up ranting for 5 hours. i still dk how. the true drama queen. my go to when i was overthinking sm. so many courses ka project partner. thankyou for teaching me math and helping me in so many assignments and quizzes and making sure i didn't fail courses. very selfless and a very good advice giver. but then you became obh hibernater lol. see the sun a little when in job and keep in touch

antaaaa. we've become such good friends after 3rd year and im so glad about that (especially considering you showed so much attitude to me in the first 2 years 🤭). i've loved all of the timepass we do together, the coldplay trip was so amazing and we need to recreate something similar for sure in the future. you're also insanely smart and i know you'll be great at whatever you do! keep coming to blr and don't forget me 🔪

You're a very smart and goofy person, and I wish I'd gotten to know you earlier than I did :( You make all of our days brighter and more fun just with your presence (peralta has nothing on you). Enjoy the ECR beaches. I'll make sure I pull up to your wedding (coming soon)

youre really smart and youre gonna do crazy stuff. keep killing it everywhere. come back some times to play basketball, it's fun playing with you. thanks for letting me execute my first anklebreaker :P

anushhhh

loved air punching and playing that dumb hand clapping game with you da
you're damn funny (2nd funniest in night cricket heheheh :0)

so glad I got to hang out with you so much this year - hope we get to do it a lot more in the upcoming years :)

antaaa 🫡🫡 ur so fun to hangout with (esp when drunk 💀) all night cricket dinners were so fun with you and I cant wait to make more memories <3 you are really smart and sweet and I hope you continue to be this way :)) i wish the best for you always. my fellow low tolerance bestie <3

anush anand, thanks for helping me pass courses. you taught me a lot and carried me in pns (both course and taship). you're also game of thrones maniac and thanks for watching house of the dragon with me

anush anta what anta come anta go anta!! anush, you're so fun to be around and the best PNS teacher out there. i'll miss all the time we spent together in the first few years of college. i'm so glad our paths crossed—wishing you all the best for your future.

Anushanand !!!
I still cant get over the first and second year memories with you. The dog following us, our long walks and endless talks. Miss them a lot. You are so smart and so kind. Hi ra anush!! The first 2 sems with you was very fun. Like you were like the cute kid who i could talk to freely and all. Lucky to have had such a joyful person to be around. Foosball with you was crazy fun. Let's stay in touch <3

anush anta is a big smart teddy bear basically. big because of height (and strength) though it does not translate well to bb skills. smart because youre smart and focused, and super good at math. teddy bear because youre sweet and friendly and very easy to talk to (or get gossip from), you can fall asleep while wearing your shoes and you text straight from your thoughts. do a flip next time trampolining, ill teach you.

Best of luck for everything ahead!!

Anta, Anta, Anta. I've saved your number as Anush (Anta) Anand. I never imagined that it would have gone beyong Anush Anand IIITH CSE '25.  I'm super proud to count you among my closest friends - particularly since I always expected you to be an academically rigorous, unrelenting machine, and found that you were a corny idiot which gave me a strange sense of familiarity since now I could be a corny idiot with another person. Haha.

anta im so sorry i am rushing to finish rn but bro i love you sm so good funny smart so much fun to hang out with i loved coming to your room and doing timepass and im definitely going to miss hearing you talk coming up the stairs from my room and coming over to the lobby to intercept. also mf tell me when dominos has offer. the movies we watched together were so much fun. ive had a really good time in general and youve been a big part of that. i hope youre happy and get whatever u want in life

Hi da first roommate.... I know we never spoke too much... but always remember just one thing






If you want to sleep just call me ;)

Math god and flex god (jk) but truly you lived up to your hype bro, crazy how you ended up with some insane academic expedition (big words lol) thanks for all the teachings bro from LA to PnS to TAO 🙏
Hey Anush, you're a very cool dude and kassi nonetheless. Thanks for all your courses advice and help , keep being awesome !

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: I’m just preparing my heart for whatever God has prepared for me

testimonials.text: Universal chelli.... Random walks random muchatlu mastu untunde.... Random hospital visits kooda...(Jk:))... Wts so ever always had fun talking to you... Health jagratta... Hv fun in life... I wish you all the best for your future and I wish you get everything you need....
Had the opportunity to interact with her more during the later years, and it’s been a pleasure. Very fun to talk to, with a genuinely nice heart. Wishing her all the best in everything ahead!

Hii! Chaalaa cool and collected person, No matter how much or how little we talk, I always feel relaxed and at ease with you. I will cherish those random discussions during exams and preparation we have. Nuvvu ekkada unna intlo meet up marchipoku :). Stay safe and stay in touch. neeku blr vaste baagundu. All the best !!

Will definitely miss ur home food and the crazy talks that we have. nuvvu chaala sweet and emotional, konni sarlu athiga alochinchi feel avthav, adhi thagginchukunte, manalni evadra apedhi antu thirigeyochu nuvvu. nenu elanti jokes vesina u enjoyed and laughed so hard, and took them sportively. you laugh at my lamest jokes as well. Thank you mi intiki invite chesthu unnadhuku, I always felt like home at your home. miss youu.. and ur hospitality. aunty ki kuda thanks cheppu, will miss her as well

Asalu akka madhyalone close ayyi madhyalone intiki vellipoindhi. Edo oka roju nee ipad, mac ammeyaali ankunna but avvale. DSAC lo kurchovadam, ala nuv nen kalisi chadavadam placements ki, anandam paneer biryani, chala ante chala memories unnay ra neetho. Appudappudu ignore chesthu unta nee msgs ki sorry for that, but adento koncham mathimarpu ochindi. 104 nundi KASH ayyam memu nuv add avvadam tho. Asalu most homely person, intiki pilchi food petti, wah wah asalu. Love you ra, missing you kuda.

Edo teliyani bonding, very emotional, very caring friend. You are very strong, responsible, sincere and kind. I want you to know that we all care about you. chaala sarlu mee home food thinna, and it felt like my home. Eppudu bayataki vachina em thinavu..adokkate baadha. Be happy and confident. Sarigga thinu and i hope you find happiness and success in whatever you set out to do.

The time went spent in open gym, nenu evaritho antha sepu lenu. Nuvvu urgent ga location mari hyderabad ki vachai. Ekkuva pressure tesukoku deniki, nuvvu eppudu call chesina nenu unta. DLF lo pani puri, ae gurthu vastundhi nuvvu DLF antunte. Campus walk ante open gym lo sitting ae gurthu vastundhi. Thank you for all the memories you gave. Naku mee mother ante kuda chala respect, eppudu navvtu palakaristaru and intiki vachina prati sari baga anipistadhi. All the best, non blood sista

You’ve always been someone who notices, remembers, and cares a lot about people. Nee memory ki mechukovali — you remember even the tiniest details.  It’s been nice having you as part of my college journey. Will miss your phone!! Good luck ahead, stay in touch, and food thinu baaga!

Firstly neek cheppedi enti ante nen msg cheyatle ani ankoku . Nen koncham naa lokam lo  bathukutu untaa you know that But I will always be there when you need me. So appud appud msg chesthu undu I will too. Have been my go-to partner for veg days.  Will always remember our amazing KASH moments. Hyd ki vachinappud kalustu undaam. Nee rich pelli ki pilavdam marchipoku😂

Anupama, oka pedda pichidi. Anupama, oka pedda ammamma. 21st century lo unna Suryakantham. Ammamma laaga rojuki 40 times "baaga tinu, baaga paduko" ani tidtu untaav. Intiki vellinappudu sweets testaav, chepinchi maree bajjilu testaav (sorry nenu tinalekapotha Bakul jenaala valla). Entha ammamma ayina, chaala mentally mature avvaali inka, especially konni vishayaalalo 🙄. Assale intlo sambandhaalu choostunnaaru. I know you'll be "rolling" in money. Ee money valla mammalni marchipokandi.

Akkaaa.. manam kalisi chesina courses anni disasters eh 😂😭. I still remember me driving you to secunderabad in peak traffic.. daaniki treat aythe inka gurthundhi.. Boledu treats ichav akka nuvvu.. nenu inka ichi undalsindhi 😭. Sarle eesari kalisinappudu nen istunna. Inka nee valla aa ala liberty ki enni sarlu vellano.. sarle its a good place only. Kalusthu undham.

First time ninni kallu tirigi padipoinappudu chusa FG lo😅 appudu telsindi nv unnav ani. First year nunchi chala baa health develop cheskunnav. Loda loda vaagi mammalni entertain chesthav open gym add neeku manchi sollu veskunnam akkada. Intiki vellinappudu alla manchi food pamputhav miss avtha nenu adi.Hyderabad vasthe kalusthu undu matladthu undu. Loda loda matladam aapku neelane undu. Pune lo places chusi pettu memu trip ki vastham chupiy maku anni. Miss you! Baa pani chesi naku referral ivvu

Maatladindhi chala takkuva aina chakkaga maatladedaanivi. Very jovial and very sweet. Antha takkuva tintu ela sustain avutunnavo kaani great asalu 🙏 Respect to your devotion kooda 🙏 Kaluddaam eppudaina malli. Have fun and good luck for your future :)

how are u mann. nuvvu epdo college vadilesi ellipoyinattu undi. missed u in the last sem itself. nee dsac lab gaani, ala dlf walks gaani, mana leg breaking skids gaani( and also thanks for that ) . i will miss your teasing. health issues unna kuda anitni daatukoni u achieved more than what you wanted. pune lo ela untaavo telidu. but remembe banglore ki vaste second family anta ikkade unaaru. you are always welcomed. touch lo unddu akka. and also pelli ki thapansari ga pilavali😉.

First neethone matlada anukunta clg ki vachaka. First day vachinappudu luggage kosam kastapadthunte ..4 floors mothham luggage theeskochi help chesavu. We have spent really good days in the beginning. Chala misunderstandings avvakapoyi unte manchi friends laga undevallam like first year. All the best for your future !!

We always had many stories to share and many talks to continue.. Always remember my voice of "Anu". It would have been better if we spent more time. 
Stay healthy and All the best for everything in future! Touch lo undu!

Never thought I would consider somone as my sister in clg. Too many things ayyai le kaani, avi anni pakkana pedithey. A very underrated and very smart person. I truly wish that you achieve great things in life. All the best.

Anu Upmaa! Eppudu iphone launch ayina first kontav, first lo choosi who is this rich lady anukunna but aa phone lo anni telugu peeps and manali memories 🤍 It’s good that you stick to your beliefs no matter what and do what you like the most, something I should learn re! Just college nunchi exams ayipogane leave ayyav which is the only sad thing, keep texting and stay in touch!

Trekking together in Manali is a special memory, we really challenged ourselves on that trek. I’ll miss our random bedtime talks. Take care and all the best for your future.

naaku telusu nenu chaala vishayalalo improve avvali, avuthanu.. neeku oka better annaya ni avuthanu

"Oh bc" hota tha hamara reaction, but same reaction us din bhi tha when I saw you last in your room, khair tum to 30 min dur ho, but I hope mai mute na hu. Miss you!

Uncompromising in wit,discpline and in the quality of racing games he plays, slithering away on the highways to greatness. Mr Harshit,
The man who could.. didn't but then did. Glad to have met you. The sass is off the charts? the bad tam eez of off the charts here. One of most polite and kind and helpful people I've ever met. I have no doubt we'll be in contact :)

Rich and techie guy, with purity 99.9%. 
Nice to have you as a friend , all the time we spent will be memorable.

Stay safe and happy

Stay connected
thank you for making btp bearable lmao, it would be so boring without you. you're so sweet and so much fun to hang out with! we need to play some game together fr at some point 😭

Caught you in 4K 92K ultra i9 10980XE 4.6GHz RTX 3090ti Armaggeddon Voltron Bronze 235FX Power Supply With 120mm LED Fan (550W) Silicon Power 500GB ASRock B450m Pro4 mATX AMD AM4 Motherboard & Intel Core i7 10700K 5.0GHz! THREE Nvidia RTX 3090s Flat Screen TV 66 Inches Curvey 18G
my go-to guy for anything related to gaming, image/video processing and technical specs. wish you the best for the future!
Best neighbour one can get. I will always miss those sober interactions.
Vansh! Super talented dancer and multitalented. TDC was fun with you and even all prithvi events too! Keep killing it in everything you do!

Hello Vansh,

You and Arya are an amazing twin duo — let me just say that! Always so full of energy, and your excitement to meet is something I truly love.


Keep the same energy always, stay just as excited, anddd when you come to Bangalore to meet Arya… milna mujhse bhi! Hehehe
