Best CO TA.... I will miss those days.... Dance karte ho art karlete ho topper ho aur kya hi bacha hain karne ke liye.... One of the all rounders i have seen.... I wish you all the best for your future and I wish you get everything you need

History class was a riot with you 😂 I genuinely loved hearing all your so-called romance stories — even though we all know there was no actual romance happening .But seriously, it was always a blast. Pois Bois FTW! Amazing dancer, who is part of arguably the best dance group of our batch. Such a chill and laid back guy and so sweet too. Amazing Yuktahar buddy and my fellow soldier in fighting for the common cause of later closing times of mess breakfast. Got to know much more about you thanks to the weekly registrations (and the damn frog obviously) :)

Bhaiii what can I write about you, some things can be felt only and not written. You are my brother not a friend. 
Whenever I had any problems I used to discuss with you and get the solutions. We have a very strong bonding and understand each other better. We achieved a large number of things together and you have been my constant support in college. 
I am very excited to join Sprinklr with you and waiting for the fun ahead! Love you bro! :)

Mera first college-wala bhai, my comfort zone, and og rizzler. So many unforgettable memories with you. You are the one who always kept the group together, you are our communication link when something goes wrong, always looking out for everybody and trying to get everyone involved. The one who turns a casual dinner into a game night. Awesome shayari writer, and a great sportsperson too :)

vansh, a.k.a love guru. You always gave me confidence to ask a girl out. Always supportive. The time i spent with you was one of the best times be it gym motivation, talks or long walks. Love the way you get frustrated when you loose in badminton XDD. I will miss it. be happy & fit and stay in contact..

ps: don't stop hustling i know you will soon find the best girl

Hi Vanshi, my cutest brother, an amazing friend, and an extremely fun and lively human. The Joey of our group, who can make anyone cheer up within seconds. College life wouldn't be the same without you and your harkathe. Also a very talented, smart working and a dedicated person. You've made so many of my days more happy just by being there. From being that twin guy who once texted me on Instagram to becoming my comfort person and family, we've come a long way. ATB for your future!! Keep smiling
One of the most sober guys in the club, but still the one with the best moves. Keep rocking bhai! Hope to hear more stories from you when we meet again.

name: Shah Manav Devendrakumar
tagline: Trained by bugs, shaped by deadlines, driven by curiosity.

testimonials.text:
Hii Mr.Manav,
First of all, Apna safar 500 characters me nahi aa sakta. You were with me from day 1 to day n ❤️, never judged me and always pushed me to do better. Apan sabse zyada teammates rahe hai, kafi masti ki hai aur achha kaam bhi kiya hai. Believe it or not, you make things look easy and specially when it comes to exams. Strongest guy (mentally) in my opinion. Keep working hard and respecting money !!
Take care, brother.

The first person whom I had a "real" conversation with in the online sem. Easily one of my closest friends at IIIT. Humble, determined, and tenacious would be the main adjectives I would use to describe you. Right from the start, you have always been there for me whenever I needed _true_ advice, help in any matter, or simply someone to listen. You've had a great influence on me by showing that with proper focus and hardwork you can achieve literally anything. Thank you! See you soon :)

Foduer Shah Manav - Gujjus gang core member, hamesha help krne ke liye ready rehta. Cricket group ka OG all rounder, you are a really good person at heart. Your dedication and passion towards work is amazing and you are a really hardworking person. I really love how you value the “why” behind doing things, especially when it comes to tech tasks and I’d like to incorporate that approach within me as well. I wish you the best for your future endeavours! Let’s stay in touch!

Manav, The Superstar of Petlad, is a very sweet and friendly person. Loved the times when we played cricket,football,table-tennis together. You are very competitive (especially in sports) and you pushed me to give my best. You are very smart, hardworking and your always positive attitude will surely help you to achieve whatever you may desire. Let's keep in touch. All the best for your future!

tere saath football khelne me maza aaya bhai, thanks for vo interview advice, baaki blr mai ek din turf par khelne chalte hai bhai, good luck!
bas kabhi cf par cm banne ki tips mil jaati toh...

Manav Bhai, you are a good person at heart and a really good friend of mine.
Stay happy and motivated for life.
keep in touch

name: Ronak Dhingra
tagline: Some chase dreams. I chase rebounds, cold coffee, and the Joker.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: As a Hyderabadi resident, I was lucky enough to make it to Felicity in first year. My friends and I basically started our campus life with the highest levels of josh possible before DSA came and cooked us.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Every fest, every sports event, and every week after exams when we had zero work and desperation to just have fun.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: It can't be just one thing. Competing in inter-batch and inter-house sports games and having JC cold coffee at night were some of the best parts of college. But I will miss my friends the most - late night drives, going to DLF/Indiranagar, cards, or literally nothing but walking in campus.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I'd like to think I came out of my shell a bit. I've definitely become less shy to trying some new things. I've basically learned how to have much more fun and just enjoy life than I did during school and JEE days.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Who knows? But all I know is it's gonna be Legen-wait for it-dary.

testimonials.text: Hi Ronz! You're hands down the best person I've met. You've been my closest friend, and I can't imagine what these years would've looked like without you. Funny how I thought you were rude at first :P You're sweet, caring, calm, too smart and unfairly good at everything. We vibe the same, think alike, laugh at the same lame jokes. I'm still funnier XD. From movies to you teaching me tennis and even getting me to kick a ball, I've loved it all. Thanks for getting me hooked to cc. Love you Ronzoo!

Hey Ronnie, I always thought all you cared about was studies but damn did that opinion change so quickly in the start of college itself. We had so many great times together, especially the late night drives where we had amazing deep convos lol. Its always amazing to play sports with you, preferably on same team coz you're too much of a beast to go against man. Coldplay and Goa were fun times, we should soon do the abroad trip we keep talking about. Lets hope my job is in Hyd so we can chill here

ronakk, you're the reason i passed college. for doing every course project together and for teaching me math, thank you. that summer we spent during internship was amazing,  i'm so glad i got close to you then. you became my personal therapist. i love playing sports with you and thanks for teaching me tennis. you're a very good guy and you always show up. you're very cringe but somewhere in there there's one joke that is actually funny so dw.

Pretty much the first person I spoke to. glad we've been close friends throughout. Youre very smart and sweet, just not (a) desirable sadly.  Random discussions when we found no-one else about most random scenarios were super fun (mostly my sg)Thanks for teaching me squash and also being the dedicated driver of the group. Playing sports with you is amazing. Ill still take your secret to the grave. Thanks for letting me live in your room. 'You’ve got a good heart. Don’t ever lose it.'

ronnieee you're such a solid friend. i knew if i was doing a project with you i'm getting a good grade for sure. our random talks about life are so fun and you'll always be the one person in every course that i try to beat and end up failing. you are so mature and were there for me so many times. i know we ended up having diff courses and interests and i barely saw you in campus the last few semesters but i know i can count on you anytime :)

ronzzz, my most diligent dance student and my basketball guru, i will admit that sometimes your jokes are really funny. bro i love you for introducing me to the good jc cold coffee guy, literally saved my endsems. and i am soooo happy that you embraced your agni in our last cult night. don't forger me when you are superrrr successful. hope we can hang out as co-workers soon <3

You know where this is going... ofc Rule no 1. But lets modify it for once, "Ronak is the cutest and sweetest". You are really very sweet omg, please start eating vegetables, I love the family-man side of yours, it actually pushes me to dial up my parents more! Bro, you are rich enough, take us to Pizzerias and please pay the bill :laugh. I saw your basketball carnage unfold in the last sem ra Ronnie, sorry I let you down in Inter batch tennis, but reiterating "Pattu is the cutest" hehe.
Will miss seeing you dance.... I will also miss your que "Hw is life after placements"?.... Coolest person ever i met... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need
you're the sweetest and nicest person on campus!! i've had a lot of fun hanging out with you whenever we have and you're super cool. also how are you so good at literally everything you do 😭😭

Hi ronnie, you're one of the cutest and sweetest people i know. I really love you for introducing me to Jamie's and chilly paneer (never gave u credit for it). I genuinely admire the kind of person you are and how you are with everyone around you. Winning in agni alongside with you is one of my best memories in college. Be it playing ball in apollo tournaments or alley-ball in the pool in goa, hanging out with you made every one of those things memorable. Love you.

THE Ronak Dhingra. He's easily one of the sweetest and best guys on campus. We didn't talk that much but I've always loved your vibe, and the immense positive energy you radiate. 
Stay awesome my dude. You're absolutely amazing

ronny you were barely on campus for most of college (except last sem) but it’ll feel different now that you wont visit everyday. I really appreciate the out of the blue deep convos we’ve had over the years. I love that you’re always so excited to listen to new music that I wanna share. You’re such a positive person and I really admire your work ethic, you’ve always been the stars I aim for. I’ll miss acting stupid with you and we should play more kings (prolly the only sport I beat you in).

Ronaksi, Hi da u r like super nice and super intelligent. U get all the work done like crazy fast and efficient. It was great challenging u in courses and losing miserably. I am better than u in math no doubt. I think u were the first one who recognised me from fiitjee and texted me Its crazy how its been 4 years. Keep loving pizzas and dont stop making bad jokes and keep being super nice. Hope we meet again in future. Good luck

ronakkk, ik we haven’t spent much time in MDP, but in college i’ve gotten to know the real you and I’ve always had fun hanging out with you . You’re easily the sweetest person i ever met. ofc youre my gutenberg bestie. let’s keep meeting regularly and play pickleball!!. I  loved having you in my house parties since you’re soo funn. and also the best SPC I had. I know you will achieve great things and let’s stay in touch. ilysm bestie:))

Hii Ronnie!! Let me first start by saying " You are the most athletic person I know hehe" I love the numerous sports you taught me how to play. Tysm for that. It was damn fun. Idek where to start... from tweety, cute things, lots of gossip to serious convos... you are always there :) I love how dedicated you are and manage your time so well. You are an all-rounder truly. And I have to mention this, I love how close you are with your family. You are so well-cultured. Keep being you :P
I'll always remember how we met for the first time on the BITS Hyd group. Getting to know you over the years was amazing. All the Best! Stay the way you are!!

Hey Ronak!

It's a delight to talk to you and learn your perspective, especially given your friendly, light-hearted and caring nature. You're also an amazing athlete, and I love how you blend well with any team. I hope you continue to cherish and nurture these values!

Stay in touch, and wish you the best in all your future endeavours!
Keep being a pizza lover and keep being so smart! Would love to see a ronak dhingra pizza place in hyd some day :))

Ronniee

Legit still seems hella funny that we took part and actually won it. 
Let's keep in touch and hangout.

name: Vanshika Dhingra
tagline: operating on a single brain cell so just keep mum !!

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: I came to campus on March 20, 2022 — it was Felicity day and Arjun Kanungo was performing, but I couldn’t go because we were in quarantine for 3 days. My parents dropped me, and I remember settling into my room that day. Everything felt new and exciting.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Felicity '24, day 3 — when Nikhil D’Souza performed. That day was amazing, we had so much fun. After that, we all ended up at the H-105 afterparty. The vibe, the music, the people — it’s a memory I’ll always hold on to.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Living like neighbours with my friends. Any time during the night, we’d just start talking or playing something. It was all so fun and comforting. That kind of closeness and spontaneity is what I’ll miss the most.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: I’m moving to Noida to join Microsoft as a software engineer. Let’s see where life takes me from here — hoping for good things and new adventures.

name: Pranav Gupta
tagline: Life is like a mirror. Smile at it and it smiles back at you.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: When I first arrived, I was a bit nervous about what was next as I also arrived a day later than everyone else. Still, as soon as I arrived, I was allotted Room no. 456, where I met Divij, my quarantine roommate, who I had already known beforehand. From then on, things started to build gradually.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Some of my best campus memories are walking to mess with my friends, having fun-filled discussions, late-night talks, celebrating birthdays of my most cherished friends and teasing some of my closest friends while in college.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Some things I’ll miss the most is the friendship bond I formed with all of my friends in IIIT. I would really miss them in my future since some of my best memories were made here in this college.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: The friend circle I formed while in IIIT was the biggest change since first year.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: I'll look forward to focusing on my job now, while still being in touch with the friends I made in college time.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: I was a shy, introverted girl who barely stepped out of her room. I wanted to make friends but was too nervous to talk. The best part? No strict rules like my old hostel(Narayana), so I felt a little free and happy to be here.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: My last year at MP was amazing! Every moment with friends was special from scooty rides and cafe hopping to our unforgettable Goa trip. I loved when my friends called me down from Parijat for random walks around campus. Those memories will always stay close to my heart.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Hanging out with friends anytime without any time limits. Those carefree moments of laughter and fun are something I’ll truly miss.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I’ve grown a lot!! stronger and wiser. College taught me how to handle problems and people better. Beyond friendships, it gave me life lessons I’ll carry forever.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: I want to settle down quickly, earn well, and after 3-4 years of work, start my own business. Excited for what the future holds!

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: My first day on campus was relatively uneventful. Going on my first campus tour (thought the roads were confusing XD) and getting my first JC Oreo shake treat was really fun until I had to run back because I forgot to collect my mattress from Srinivas who threatened to leave without giving it to me.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Theorising about what was behind the "haunted" Vindhya door until it finally opened to reveal one of the coolest labs on campus. This list is of course incomplete without mentioning Sreeja’s microphone and the impromptu karaoke concerts held in 306.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: How easy it was to sync schedules and make impromptu plans to go out; some of my favourite moments were getting ready with the girls before heading out. Will also miss the long walks around campus sharing gossip and laughing about random things. One thing I wont miss? Washing my plates in mess.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Learnt how to do my own eyeliner. Went from waking up at 7am every day to occasionally rolling out of bed at 1pm. But more importantly, I started feeling truly confident in myself and comfortable in my own skin.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Corporate :)

Campus beauty, love to talk to you everytime i step out of my room, had so much fun on our little trip to lenskart and udupi. Always helpful with everything, is very charming and cute xd.

Dance partner..... Kaash ham thoda zyada dance kar paate... Best teacher hain tu.... Tu jab bhi merese milti Hain hi bolti jo mein bahut Miss karoongi... Keep in touch... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need

Amritsari chole kulche khila do nanako didi!!!!
Apart from this, You are one of the most sensible woman I've met! Its always a vibe, kuch bhi karna ho readyh rehti hai hamesha. New new ideas masti karne ke hamesha ready rehte! Our music taste is so goated I cant describe! 
Lets be in touch ( I mean obviously, aise thodina)
You’re such a genuine person. Wishing you the best of luck for your new job in Pune! You’ve always had a very warm, welcoming vibe

We became close friends pretty late, and honestly, kaash pehle jaante hote. You’re one of the most mature and positive people I know. You are always ready to help, always there to listen and always so comforting. You give off such positive vibes. Humare group ki you might be the funniest and the most normal member. Thanks for tolerating all my thappads and my chillana. I'm really gonna miss having you next door 🥺❤️

Mahajan.. Thanks for being the caring, kind and logical human being in all of our lives. You are so drop dead gorgeous, funny, hardworking and overall a fantastic human being and friend. I will never forget all the time we spent together, felicity, JC nights, My birthday (*wink wink*), the late night conversations and all the bakchodi..
Stay in touch and hope Pune treats you well..

Loads of Love,
Poorvi <3

I remember the first time I met you, and the way we connected instantly! I will really, really miss being neighbours with you - randomly going to your room if I was bored, needed someone to talk to, or even needed a hug. You have always supported me and helped me stay positive, even when times were tough for all of us, and I will always be thankful for that. Please keep in touch and keep calling, whether it’s just to tell me about your day or about some new K-drama that you found. Love you!
XOXO

Vanshitaaa!! You are one of the most hardworking and smart people I know and you have that spark in you to just kill in everything you touch. I wish you never lose that spark and always keep on achieving more and more. Tere sath bhangra choreograph krna and gappe maarna hmesha meri college ki best memories me se ek rhega. You just feel SO homely and close to me. Thankyou for being my friend. :hugs:
I will always keep in touch. Love Youu <333

Ah, yes, my favourite Punjabi. I love sending her random music that I find and her glares when I insult Punjabis. Oh, and also, she's one of the nicest people I've met and hope that she never, ever changes.

A humble nice person on whom i can pull all the pujabi steriotype jokes.
Idk the real traits but you have been really softspoken and humble person over all. Also next time you climb somewhere, make sure there is someone who can catch you. haha keep in touch

Vese hamari baat to bhot limited hui hai, but jitni bhi hui hai interesting thi.

It was a nice experience to work with you in SE team, though mene jayada kuch to kiya nhi 😅

But ek baat jaani thi ki, par lite 😅.

Vese you are very simple but life is hard (cope up).

Also i liked the way you are always ready to help your friends.

Stay happy n safe, get ready for future endeavours 

Kuch kaam ho to btana.
Stay connected

Hi cutie, u are such a sweet and lovable human <3 Hamesha aesi hi rehna, it was so much fun last summer office saathme jana aana, partiesss... will miss all of that 😭. Merko bhul mat jana, jab bhi free ho bs ek baar call lagade, and pls stay in touch. Wishing you endless success and happiness ahead! ✨

Intern time gave me so many memories with you — from random rants to breakfast catchups you are such a lovely and determined person.
Gonna miss you in the MS Office squad now... breakfasts might feel extra empty now 😅.
Let’s definitely catch up when you are in Hyd next. All the best for the new journey...

One of the chillest person on campus, always a great person to chat with
Will always remember the adventures we had while reaching home at the end of first year XD
Stay smiling and may you get everything you desire :)

Vanshita I have to say that youu are sooo effing prettyyy and one of the most beautiful souls I have ever come across in my life, I didn't know college ending would make us so close but I am deeply grateful to CSAI for making our friendship stronger. I have to appreciate you for how honest you are and I also have to say you are a reallyy hardworking person, soo never give up and keep the hardwork on my girliiee. I only wish the best for you and yess Pune is onnnn 😎

Vanista (XD) we had such a fun time together ...I’m really going to miss you. That lunch day was so special and even my mumma still talks about you! and I love spending time wid u!! Your support, your care and the way you’ve always been there for me will always hold a special place in my heart. Let’s never let this bond fade. Stay in touch, and we’ll meet soon for sure. Love you always

Hi Vanshita,
You are so sweet and truly it felt like sharing a personal feeling with you when we first met
The way you carry yourself so smartly. I loved every bit of it
I remember the times of that late night blue room project discussions
Every memory with you feels like living it again 

Thanks for all the memories and moments we shared
Indeed it was truly a wonderful experience 

All the best dear for everything that lies ahead :)
Stay connected always, hoping that we meet again soon

Vanshita :) I would forever cherish the music performances we have done together, whether it be the freshers night, where we sang together (naina da kya kasoor..., papa kehte the... :) or for agni (saibo...). You have a beautiful voice, keep singing :).

Wish you all the best for future!
Always liked your vibe and had a really nice time in designing stuff with you at Ping (sorry for annoying you sm though :|)

Hi Vanshita,
All the best for your future endeavours. Hope your finger is now fine...
As far as I know, you have kept your values high throughout the college and I believe that you would continue it in future. Based on what I have learnt and followed, I believe morality can open many new ways in long term, keep apart short term. I hope you would always keep your morals high despite any peer pressure,etc..

HI vanshita, you are a very sweet and hardworking girl. I remember 2nd and 3rd sem, and together we did many OJ submissions in workspace, your gang and mine were always sitting in that left workspace, doing work, masti, and a lot of talking.
I wish you all the best for Nvidia; let their stock price go up. XD.
Keep in touch.
Always pleasant to talk to and easy to get along with. Kind and respectful a genuinely nice person.

Hey Mahajan, ye tu hi hai na kyuki tera surname nahi likha. Anyways you are such a good punjabi dancer man, such a good energy you have. The talks that we had, I just loved all of it, I don't know how we talked for hours that night. Tere saath dance karne me bhi bahot maze aaye, I wish we could do more. Milte hai NVIDIA me vase bhi, pura Pune chaan marenge.

vanshita dancing with you is always so fun (thanks for teaching me so many dances throughout the years skkssk). don't know how fast time passed from freshers to cult night. all the best with everything :)

Hi Vanshita null, lol, working with you has been an absolute pleasure. Whether it was brainstorming project ideas or sharing tips during intern prep, you've always been dependable, smart, and insanely hardworking. Wishing you all the very best for everything that lies ahead. I'm genuinely proud to have shared this journey with you!

Will miss u a lot Mahajan. Bhut maze ate. We had very great and fun days together. Sare ups and downs sath mai dekhe hain. Talking about random stuff in night, those movie nights, ranting. Love u a lott🥰. Bhoolna mat kbhi mujhe and hmesha touch mai rhenge. All the very best for your future , or thoda stress kam lia kar🫶🏻.

I thought tu kaafi introvert nerdy types hai jab mein pehle mila tha, but bilkul nahi jab batch trip ki bus mein maze karein tab  malum pada tu toh bohut chill hain, gussa bhi aata hain 👀 , agni mein dance kra, cv ke assignment tepe, bohut maze aaye, I hope kabhi future mein bhi milenge, maybe banglore, maybe hyderabad, let's see. enjoy kario  ab toh corporate life, mein yaha pe hopefully ek aur saal. bye <3

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer:
Hahahaha, covid. So, we had to quarantine. I remember coming in and seeing my roommate - Yatharth - relaxing on the bed.

I shouldv'e realised that this man would probably be the most chill and one of the most wholesome people I would meet.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: My friend was sick. I spent the entire day walking him around and taking his pictures.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: The egg maggie at BBC.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I stopped keeping a beard. Gosh, that was an awful look.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Idk what I'm doing. Reading the testimonials written by my friends for me, it seems gross injustice to be in such a state. I suppose I'll just have to figure it out :)

testimonials.text: Where do I begin 🥹 Partner in crime, in courses, RRC, gay memes, brainrot, rants, everything. The lab is gonna be very empty without you. Heck, I am gonna feel empty without you 💔 Just observing what you do made me realize the difference in levels and what sets people apart. Extremely well-planned and a total workaholic. Couldn't have asked for a better lab partner. Constant source of motivation. Obviously, you'll absolutely crush it wherever you go. Have fun. Keep sending degenerate reels😳🥹

Vineeth, my rommie for all the time I spent in college. I really enjoyed the room time with you. Talking about your life goals (they change daily lmaoo), talking about your new crushes, your date experiences, and little acads. It was really fun.
Such a disciplined and driven person you are. I have learned a lot from you about planning and executing things. You are really good at it. Though you do RR about some things, trust me, you have always handled them efficiently.
Stay connected bro

Most academically talented person I have ever known. I'm sure you'll do great in life, as if you aren't already xD. You're extremely hard working and don't take anything for granted, which is something I need to learn from you.
Acads apart, very fun person to hang out with, keep up your singing as well, and pls reduce your fouling rate.

Vineeth MF Bhat. The man, the myth, the machine. Imagined that you'd be a scary academic god, but you're really sweet and supremely helpful. Will always remember the fun conversations and Vrinda roasting sessions.

Im changing your testimonial so what youve written for me doesnt really make much sense. You're really good at dancing, and singing, and a menace to play basketball against. Its nice when you pick this friend group to go out with over the other ones because youre very enjoyable to be around :)

lil vinty, words can't describe how insanely smart you are. keep leaving everyone awestruck wherever you go. your never ending achievements give me passive pride as your friend. best of luck. you're gonna make it very big very soon and i cant wait to watch it unfold

Fellow 4-year bakul resident, and the smartest person I've ever met. You've always been someone whose level I have aspired to reach - be it your academics, research or strong sense of self-respect. I hope your situationship with Carti gets resolved :) I really wish you'd stayed longer in Goa with us though. Also, this may be an unpopular opinion but I would love to see you with longer hair again (how many buzz cuts :\ )

hi da come off bengaluru macha full scenes we'll put off peaceful it'll be 

pls stop overachieving I can't keep up with all your badass possible career paths 

so glad I got to hang out with you so much more this year - and we definitely will do so more, going ahead :)

keep rocking <3

Mr Gmbh himself. After 1-24, I really hope u find whatever ur looking for soon. Keep coming to hyderabad (and prepare sleep on the street coz ur still banned :)). Don't become a workaholic, if I don't see u going out once a week at least I'll come and whoop ur ass. Probably one of the biggest differences I felt after moving to obh was u annoying me in the morning, so glad it ended. 🦈👟  🐊🛩️  🐘🌵

i dont think ill ever meet a person as smart as you. you're so fun to hangout with and im so grateful for our memories together. luckily you're in bangalore now, so you cant escape hanging out with me 😁. keep being the fun, goofy person you are!

Yo sir, thanks for introducing me to all the bands and artists to which I now probably listen to more than you do. Best and most consistent song recs and meme exchange buddy. Keep sending me more songs as you find and keep rocking the buzz cut hehe.. Keep achieving!

bineeth find someone else to whizle bro, there's so many people in this world, super smart and down to earth guy but thinks wayyy too much into the future😂, non standard Goa guy except he loves fish - nice, can't forget the random stuff I saw in bakul and your list

You are destined for great things in life and I can't wait to see you seize it all.. See you in Stripe, Baldie and Good luck for your future. 

Poorvi Akka :)

An idiot who will never let his ego take a hit. Kinda like me, so cant complain. I'm sure you'll do great in whatever field you choose to persue, dont let go of your ego, and try to have as much fun as you can. College wouldnt have been the same without you ~getting gaslit so easily~ ; You're welcome for getting an awesome college exp (and a lesbian wife), and thank you for the same

Vineeth bhat vins,kassi fellow hi da u r like so mature and nice.Like u r a kid sometimes and suddenly u act like my dad.Its crazy how u can be so mature at this age.U are like extremely smart and i think everyone knows this.U have such a deep voice and u sing really good.Ur football defence is insane and basketball fouling skills too.Im pakka sure u ll become famous one day. Also goa, pondi was so fun we need to go more trips. Keep being touch and dont forget . Thank you for being a nice friend

The kassi of the batch! From strangers to the ultimate bro-sis duo — what a journey 😂 I’ve genuinely loved our endless gossip sessions (even if you alwaysfind new ways to irritate me and be mean — so annoying!!). But I’ll give you this: thanks for listening to me and giving solid advice when it mattered. Also, shoutout to your mom — she’s so cool, unlike you... please take notes .See you around, bro — don’t change too much!

Vineeth, our certified 'Unc' for real! Bro, your studious mode is next level, sometimes it's actually scary, ngl! Legit feel like I gotta activate 200% brainpower around you. Absolute MENACE of a defender on the bb court! Still kinda sad I never got those cooking lessons from you 😭. And yo, enough with cracking all the interviews - pick one and stick to it for a bit da, I can't even keep up with where ur going! 😅 All the best, legend! 🔥

One of the smartest guys I have come across. I will miss all those late night meetings we had discussing random things which made no sense at all now that I think about it. Damn intelligent and hardworking, you deserve everything you have achieved and even more. Sure hope to meet you in Bangalore and have fun there!

Hi Vineeth! Just read your testimonial, thank you for the kind words. You’re also incredibly understanding and never judging. The way you have clear goals and work consistently towards them is rare and inspiring. People like me are often confused, so your focus really stands out. It’s a pleasure having you as a batchmate and a friend..
Also, I’ll definitely call you when I’m in Bangalore!

vintyyyy. for real idk how you do it all but somehow you do it and I'm so proud of you. your reel likes are so funny to spot randomly. i knew our reel blend would be so good 😭. the only man in iiit to crack MSR, De Shaw, and Stripe. there's just a million things to learn from you. your hard work, your discipline, and your focus. i hope you continue being this way and we spend time together whenever we are in the same city :) from parliament debate to night cricket, everything was so fun with u.

if one ever needs to test an ai writing detector, test it on vineeths writing. everyone including you knows youre smart and youll do some cool stuff academically, but you have so many cool interests that many people dont know about, like your poetry. youre always very real and honest but somehow a lot of your humor is sarcasm.

Vin - Bestie, apna Research and acads Grinder :0. IOT grind se leke bhai ab last day study marke bhi top krleta hai (kassi!!). Sweet at heart, always ready for bakchodi (irrespective of situation). Have shared my best moments with you and will always remember them. Thoda load kam liya kar sab achcha hojayega life mai. The phrase "One Thrust" is goated forever. The late night unhinged convos and roaming Blr with you will always remain memorable. Hope you achieve all your dreams! All the Best!

To me, Vineeth is that one guy who helps me realize my own state every now and then by simply asking "Wow you look dead what happened". One would think it's a joke, but more often than not, that was true and it's a good thing to know that I look dead at least :P 

Cheers man, thanks for looking out!

It was pretty nice running into Vineeth again in college. I genuinely enjoyed talking to him and annoying him during class. He had weirdly insightful takes and ideas and was actually fun to chat with...though it would be nice if he stopped being such a kassi and actually watched the reels I so painstakingly curated and then sent (-_-). Still, 10/10 class neighbour. Would absolutely bother again.

Vineeth is an all-rounder, bro is so good at everything he does. He is also very fun to talk to, you can always learn one or two things by just talking to him. The way he creates his own paths to get something he wants and his ability to just get things done is quite motivating. Hope he takes less bt than (and from) me. I will miss the discussions with him which just gave pure existential crisis and would make me question everything around 😂

Vineeth is a cutie both literally and metaphorically. Love how we were able to talk for hours about the most random stuff (while at the same time discussing about life with great clarity).  I admire how he carries around his academics and being such a rizzler. I'll definately miss poking you across the corridor. I expect so much from your future endeavors. And if we do happen to bump into each other again, lets have one more round of those "intellectual" discussions (wink)

# Kassi number 2
Stay kassi and stay connected xD
VI NEET 🗣️🗣️ BEST TA

Vineeth Bhat is VERY close friend for all the wrong reasons.It started when I was walking down the corridor and passed your room when our gazes connected through the sliver of space the door left open.I remember the times we caught up while he shaved at the corridor basin, a towel draped over his back.Somehow all these times Swayam bore the brunt of our attacks.But seriously, you're the sweetest person I know, and being a kassi/tompr, you'll breeze through any challenge.I'll miss you a lot. ATB!

lives at fern, street name: lil vinty. so tall. taller than me. big. also very smart. smarter than me. also very hot 🥵. the drive and discipline you have is admirable, and talking to you always makes me wanna get better. knows a lot, and if he doesn't, he will. fellow reading and oswald enthusiast. I still remember the time we went to the library & did greddit together. I had been having a rough time & that evening played a significant role in me finding the motivation to snap out of it. so thx

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Spent it in Quarantine. Also played Uno with Mahajan and Mahika

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Felicity 2024

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: My friends

testimonials.text: "Beh".. i know this is how you'll feel when you no longer have me as samne wala neighbour :P I'll miss you troubling me Waduz, and I'll miss troubling you. We connected so quickly in offline sem. I'll miss discussing movies, books and kdramas with you and the fact that you find all movies weird xD. I hope tu noodles, pasta and cheesecake khaati rahe. Don't ignore our calls and texts after college at least 🔪 Love you.. keep shining!

Hi,tune mujhe bohot jhela hai,mere phone se mere liye messages type kiye,mujhe ladna aur chutti katna sikhaya,aur bhi bohot kuch.You’re one of my few first-year friends aur meri B section ki partner. Billi dekhni ho toh mirror mein dekh lena 😂.I’ll miss your bleh, tera bag peeche se pakadna, aur tu kitna irritate hoti thi😂.Tu debate karne aa jaati thi aur mere paas points nahi hote the😭.Will miss you a lot.Thanks for everything.All the best ❤️.Aur haan noodles ke ilawa bhi kuch kha liya kar.

THUB chale? Tera sapna poora karne? Wadz, thank you cracking my back and PUTTING tel in my hair. Apni ajeeb BLR ki language merko bhi sikha di hai tune, u noodle lover. Papa Ji, agli baar trip pe jayenge to restaurant mein so mat jana. Agli baar poori pani ki bottle daal dungi mein XD Ham dono ne college ke sabse AJEEB courses survive kiye hain, flat mein bachelor life bhi kar lenge ;) Meri rants and complaints sunne ke liye thank u. I won't say I miss you, because abhi to party shuru hui hai <3

Hii Waadusss,

Brother, let me just say — I loved the time I spent with you. You match my vibe, and that’s something I reallyyy value.

Bhai, we share so many things in common — not only moochon ke baal but  enjoying the moment rather than photu kheevchna

Bhai tu mast hai yaar! Hamesha aise hi rehna. Bangalore mein milte rahna, and always stay in touch.

Love you waadus, always will remeber parlour aunty moments with you!!

all the best for future
-prishaa

You’ve been around for so long, we have witnessed  so many of your endless rants, dramatic stories, and those stupid dumb, contradicting opinions. Our very own Papaji—always ready to sleep before the rest of us have even finished dinner. Thoda room se nikal liya kar yaar! And please, live up to your name—stay Khushi always.

Wadhus Hyd mein Pura time party krenge, be ready.. My bangalore baddie, cutie and loudspeaker.. You have been very kind to me and been a good friend. I loved spending felicity with you, all the late night conversations and me and mahika pissing you off (Sorry about that btw :)).. Can't wait to see you create a life for yourself here..

Good Luck Kiddo,
Poorvi <3

Shortie. So short she is. Like this much: |..|

Ok, sorry, I'll start now. Khushi (yes, I still call her that and not Wadhwa) is amazing. She sends me instagram reels everyday and is very, very, very adept at pointing out non-sensical things (and people). If I say anything more, I feel that I might get beaten up so byee.

Really fun person to be with, always happy and cheerful !
Aakash buddy, always fighting for those extra marks and the first rank :)), you were always crushing me tho lol. Lots of fun in the ESW Project - our "model is still training" ig :)). We should definitely keep a DEENS get-together.
All the best in life!
So random and fun meeting you in college again. I'll always remember tumhari budday vaali parijat night. So fun xD i wish I could have gotten more but next time i guess XD

You’re one of the most confident (and kassi) people I’ve met on campus — in the best way possible! I’ll never forget your iconic aree yaaarr waali awaaz  Our Mysore trip was such a blast — and I had no idea you loved animals that much! Just one request: thoda room se bahar nikalna seekh le, please  Wishing you all the happiness and success ahead — have fun ! 💫
Best project teammate had fun dng DS together.... Those days will be missed.. I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need
Literally my go-to troubleshoot person for inlp! That course would have been hell without you. Sweet and charming person, always ready to help others.

wadhwaa... my sports attendance buddy! I'll never forget those first few days of quarantine, randomly assigned roommates still it felt so amazing. Watching the most epic movies in the first few days and laughing at the dumbest stuff was for sure amazing. Teri woh iconic "yaarrrrrrrr" wali cheekh in frustration will always be legendary. Every team project with you was a mix of chaos and fun. My fav bhandi milte rahenge Hyd mein for sure. Don't change and all the best for your future :)

Wadhwaa!!

My Atlassian partner! You're such a hard worker, and one of the loudest people I know (after me, lol)! I think it's a 'Khushi' trait! 😉 I totally admire your ek hi jagah pe baithe rehne ki shaktiyaan, lol! 😂

Loved having you around. I hope we keep in touch <3 Byee!

name: Yash Shivhare
tagline: Mujhe kya mei toh batak hu...

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Was on the 4th floor completing lockdown. Still managed to play corridor cricket and gave my first intro to the UG4s.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Ohhh.. have lots of them! From randomly heading to Ananthagiri at 3 AM, to long night walks with friends, chilling in Room 305, THUB 7th floor, exploring the most random places, and those scooty rides... But the best has to be the moment we officially formed our group — #JCWaale.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Mere dil ke North aur South :D

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Learned how friends can truly change your life — and help you cope with anything.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Whatever life has to offer!

testimonials.text: One of the craziest person I have met. Bakchodi koi tere se seekhein karna. The dances, assignments, projects, late night deadlines, tera cursor, your relationships, your famous chiji, sab dekha, bade maze aaye. Koi bhi dikkat ho to phone kardena, subah SBI se paise ke liye utha dena. I will miss that a lot. Koini ek din Kabir Singh jaisa ban jaega itti tension na le, apni aurat ko Pril ka pouch deke aaiyo.

Hi Batak, I still have your number saved as Batak Shivhare. Anyways, you are one of the most caring and understanding people I've met. Mature yet have a childlike heart. All your double meaning jokes, I somehow understand in an instant. We've had some really good memories together too. Anything I do, love the way you always cheer me up so much. It gives me so much more confidence. Keep smiling and keep bringing smiles to everyone around you. Hope you have a fantastic future.All the best brother!

My bestie, my jaan you’re not just a friend, you’re my safe place, my constant. I still don’t know what I did to deserve someone like you in my life. Thank you for every moment, for staying, for understanding me without even needing words. Life truly won’t feel the same without you around. Thank you, Santoshi Maa for bringing someone like you into my life. I’ll always love you, miss you, and pray for your happiness. Stay close, always. <3 Anyway how can I describe you in just 500 words?Imposible

GDE partner, city tour buddy, scooty ride buddy, kabaddi buddy, exam study buddy, my dump-anything-on-him-and-he-will-keep-the-secret person and omg what not. Love how you are always there for everybody and prioritise your friends over anything else. Can't wait to see you in Bangalore!

Yashhhhhh, my city twin! I still remember how excited I was when I found out you’re from the same city — felt like an instant connection. From OSN assignments to being RSAI and history teammates, our college journey has been filled with so many great moments. Doing coursework with you was actually fun (who would've thought?). I’ll always cherish our deep, long conversations — they meant a lot. Stay awesome and keep in touch! 🌟

Hydro wouldn't have been possible without your help... Thank you for letting me panic and bearing with me for all the end moment assignments. It was quite fun!!
All the best for your future 😁
Yash, you're a really really good dancer. Tumhara duos performance was amazing! Keep shining!
The underrated non-striker batsman ;) IYKYK
Evadu emanna we are still SRH fans ra, and jayam manadera

Nuv chaala strong ra... I still remember the days you fought back after your accident... I still remember your rakhi chocolate you have me.... Stay the way you are.... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need...
Captaaiiin , inka ardamkaadu nee dream 11 picks elaa work avtaayo kaani nee laage undu, chaalaa sweet person vi. stay in touch, all the best raa in both career and personal life, will miss you

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: My first day on campus was full of emotions- leaving my parents at the hostel gate, meeting my then roommate and new people. I met so many dogs and especially Lily (the sweetest girl ever). Well, not much to add since we were quarantined for the next 3 days :(

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Some of the best memories I have is sitting w my bestf late night, talking non sensical things while sitting w Lily- sitting w my girlies and playing monopoly throughout the night and definitely getting bhand on felicity events😭

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: The dogs(chintu & alex specially), getting bhand, late night talks & walks to ISB road & DLF and JC & Chimken biryaniiiii from kadamb🤤🥰

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Throughout the 3-4 years, I feel I've matured a lot lol!! I have started liking my own company and how to be at peace w certain things which the 18 yr old me didn't know how to.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: A life with loads of happiness, good people, doggos & paise toh chhapne hi hai!!

testimonials.text: Tere jaisa roommate har kisi ko mile. Thanks for the incredible two years of rooming and four years of friendship boss! Here's to many more to come...

I'll always hold his demeanour as a virtue that I hope to achieve.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: The first day -ah ,we were supposed to be in quarantine, but rules were just suggestions. A bunch of us snuck out like prison escapees and ended up bonding over an intense game of UNO (yes, friendships were tested). Ironically,some of those sneaky delinquents are now my ride-or-dies —zero regrets!!

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Lohri 2025 was fire, but my birthdays? Now those were campus festivals.We had a Goa afterparty in Mahika’s room - then danced around campus like unpaid background dancers in a Bollywood movie. Gym sessions and campus walks with my pookies I shall never forget :) (Spilling tea is so necessary lol)

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Campus walkssssss—my daily therapy session, GYM community lol, and gossip hour all rolled into one. Nothing hits quite like a 2 a.m. existential stroll followed by meeting up with friends at chaiwala at jc. This place somehow turned into a home away from home.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Honestly? My attitude towards life—and my entire personality had a software update. First-year me was all wide-eyed and “I’ll attend every lecture.” Current me? Running on vibes mostly and last-minute submissions. Character development? Absolutely. I would definitely win an Oscar. (I am serious ;))

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Adulting starts ;-; (only one in the gang who'll be in  Blr, Hiii Blr folks btw)  joining Walmart to fund my cafe hopping, dance  addiction. Maybe a master’s if I survive corporate life. Long-term dream-  A book café that serves cake and dance moves—because who needs logic when you’ve got vibes?

testimonials.text:
