Vrinda - the ultimate Gossip Queen who knows every campus story - from juniors to seniors to faculty! Brave, determined, and a fantastic dancer, she fights for what she believes in. Loved working with you in CVIT and as Clubs Council secretary - you made every moment memorable!

Vrinda is an absolute roller coaster! Did I interact with her too much in college? Well not really but it's something that you can tell right away about her! She is straightforward and doesn't make things too complicated, if she doesn't like something she says that to the face and it's something I can really appreciate. She knows how to get stuff done and she can take control whenever the situation demands it from her!

Go go steering committee!!

Hey ! You are without doubt one of the most talented and coolest people I know in college . I will forever be in awe of your confidence and self assurance , especially when it comes to talking to new people. Your dances were such a joy to watch. I had a lot of fun with you on the mysore trip,and would love to go on another such trip with you . I will really miss all the randon late night corridoor waali chats and gossip sessions. I wish you all the best for your future , and lets keep in touch !

Vrinda Sweetheart, my flirt tester, co-captain, we shared the same set of friends too, and we tourchered the same set of juniors too. You try to be tough but you blush the most, smile the loudest and party the hardest. You are damm bossy, but its good you stay by ur point, I like your attitude and the bold nature. Alwys be the cutie you are sweet and beautiful. It was so awesome getting to share so much time with you. Will miss you a lot and lot, Vrinda Agarwal

Vrinda Ma’am!! I am so glad Akash House brought us together. I have made such amazing memories with you. I’ll never forget those late-night practices, stage performances, and the thrill of winning cult night together. Couldn’t have asked for a better cultural captain! You’re the most graceful dancer, and your Kathak performances always leave me in awe. I wish you the best—keep dancing, keep shining!!!

vrindaaa, you are such a nice person. i always love talking to you. your dance skills are crazy good and i am gonna miss getting to see your dance performances next year. all the best for the future <3

To my first ever friend in this college, I don't know how I would have gotten through the online sem without you. You made this scary experience of college more bearable and taught me that there is so much more such as beautiful friendships like this. You are so beautiful, stunning, so kind and smart and I love you. I hope we are always in touch and heres to more in the future. All the very best to wherever life takes you, love you!!

U r honestly one of the kindest & sweetest person I know, literally making everyone around u feel loved. U have such a pure heart, it was always so much fun spending time with u, will miss all of that especially our walks while listeing to bollywood music :p. Love ur dance. I know you’re going to do amazing things ahead, so merko bhul mat jana, stay in touch <3 & May your future be as bright as your smile! 💖

Hey Vrinda - fellow DASS team mate, was lovely being part of the DASS team with you. You always kept the morale of the team up. It was a lot of fun bitching about Vineeth with you. I hope you achieve all your goals! All the Best!

One of the best dancers I've ever seen, no exaggerations. Every time you're on stage it's so so captivating. You stand out in the best way wherever you go. I really admire your personality and all your hard work in college, especially with CC. BMSID, MCT, doing your makeup, even back when we argued over club stuff, it was all so fun with you :) Keep dancing and keep shining!

I wish we'd gotten to do kathak together more often, dancing with you in spotlight was very fun:)
Stay in touch and keep dancingg!
Super friendly and fun to hang out with during the internship! Had a great time chatting and laughing together. You're a really talented dancer too. All the best for whatever comes next!

name: Chavali Sasidhar
tagline: Bhagavan acha kare tho saadhu bicha karega

testimonials.text: One of my closest friends. My go-to person for debates. Got very few things that we agree on. Best comic sense among the folks. Cinephile. Chess Master. Non-Vegetarian. Pace Bowler. Owner of Room No.338

I think I still didn't clear one box cricket split to you sasii, but lite VIjayawada Chaitanya manadhi, only giving loans, no taking back. SIlent TFI and cricket kattu baanisa, I still believe Praddy gaadi kante neeke ekkuva knowledge ani, I stand by it!

Manam mastu takkuva maatladukunna maatladinantha varak mastu manchiga maatladinde... Random ga holidays lo TXT cheyyadam... Movie suggestions teeskovadam... Miss those days.... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need
Best cricket and movie knowledge, nee action tho antha pace elaagaa ardamavvadu, coolest and kind personality needi, all the best!

Agrahaaraniki brashtu pattinchina unmaadi. UG1 lo chusinappudu nalane introvert ankunna but I was wrong. Multi-talented person.Greatest lyric writer and singer of all time.Expression king. Future chess world champion.Nuvvu focus pedte result ela untado nee chess graph chuste chaalu.Food and exam stress vishayam lo nee nundi chala nerchkovachu but patinchadame kastam. Best sense of humour among the people I've met. Very responsible person andari vishayallonu.Stay how you are.Wishing you the best

Only person who addresses me as VSS....most mature cricket (DADA) fan...most consistent in quickfire cameos of 400 SR...deadliest bowler after our Jasprit JG....accuracy ka king...best partnerships with JG with both bat and ball....OG Cric07/09 buddy
Mana discussions Mark Nicholas-Richie Benaud level feel istadi asala
Nee sticker sense and sense of humor peaks bhai....literally fans aipoyam
Hope we continue our OG net sessions and box cricket sessions along with OG cricket discussions toooo bhai

General ga connect avvataniki naku time padthundhi, but somehow neetho chala fast ga sync aypoyya, and I fell lucky for that. Naa tastes kuda neetho connect ainantha inkevvaritho connect avvavu, be it movies, food, or general opinions. 
Nee chillness ki dandam ra dootha, ela ra antha chill, 4 years lo okka sari kuda nuvvu kopadatam, tension padatam chudaledhu. Konchem aa chillness naku kuda pass on cheyyi. Hope we stay together as long as possible 🤞.
Wishing a fantastic future.

The man the legend ante nuvve bhai. Insta ki addict avvadam chusa kani chess ki addict ayna mahanubavudivi nuvvu.
Eppudu night cricket adtham anna kuda manchi box lu patti antha chuskunnaduku thank you bhai.
Nee lo oka dancer unnadu ani marchipoku first year freshers lo chesindi dachakunda munduki teeskellu.
Naku IPT course suggest chesi guide chesi nanduku shukriya. Samsung ki velli kummey hyderabad ki vacchinappudu cheppu box ki podham ready andaru ikkada.
Last days lo maa food sponser🙏🏻

Sasi bhai, one of the most funniiest person to hangout with. I always enjoyed your jokes and one liners you leave. I was never bored at south mess breakfasts when I'm with you. I had lots of fun when I'm with you talking, playing cricket and badminton. lets stay in touch and keep texting in telugu cric priyulu. miss you so much.

Bowling tips of the day with Mohd. Shashi - Best bowler of Telugu Peeps (evadra Surya). Protein peru cheppi agrahaaraaniki apratishta techipettaavu kadha ra. Antha perfect ga cinema results predict cheyyagaligina vaadivi Game Changer FDFS..adhi kooda early morning vellavu ante🙏But very good taste bhai annitlo except..😳 (Salaar, right?) Nicknames and jokes aithe on point. Next Magnus Carlsen at your level of commitment to the sport. Hope to be able to take it easy once in a while like you bhai.

Chala takkuva sarlu matladanu, kani matladina pratisari baa receive cheskuntav and easily approachable. Placements appudu chala help chesav. Last day veltuna ani msg cheste ochi kalisav and chala sepu unnav. Touch lo undu and all the best for your future.

Hardworking and fun to talk with, I still remember meeting you during the yoga class we attended in second sem. Loved the way you speak Hindi, and thanks for teaching me some Telugu words. Keep in touch and wishing you all the best for your future!

Ee ra ela managing non-veg intlo 😆. Ela ra intha diet control ga untav. Entha cheddam anukunna na valla kaadu. 
Miss your songs while playing chess. Nuvvu nammavu ga you are superb singer ra. Sarigga focus cheste next chess master nuvve ra.
Best moment neeku vachina medal, eppatiki marchipolanu. Aa video for it superb🤩.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Trying to not catch covid

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Hanging out with friends near canteens and after lectures

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Dammam uncle’s chai

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Started taking everything much less seriously

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: No clue to be honest

testimonials.text:
Bhai mere roommate, now I can't write about intimate stuff here sadly... woh mein personally likh dunga *wink*. 
But dude, thank you for adopting me in my first year. My college journey would have been totally different if you hadn't found me.
I will always cherish the time we spent together. Thanks for being my wonderful roommate. You have actually made me grow from this naive immature person into who I am today (still a bit naive).
Wishing you atb in life and make sure you don't forget me ;)
Sharing ig brainrot was default fr. 561+552 were very memorable. All the best for Mumbai; hope the long days are manageable. Keep working hard!

You are the gateway drug to hating (no regrets). You are incredibly sharp, and hard working, but most importantly, you are one of the funniest people I know and you shaped a lot of my humor. Never change.

So grateful for all the time we’ve spent together, couldn't have asked for a cooler person to experience college with. Always jealous of your wit. I used to look forward to our evening chai everyday, with possibly the only bigger dammam fan than me. Will miss returning to the most concerning stuff on my laptop when left around you. You're so uniquely smart, funny, thoughtful and just the right amount of dumb :P Keep being you please, idk if you realise what a rare kind of amazing you are

You’re honestly one of the smartest people I’ve met. Getting to know you has been one of the good things that came out of APT. It was a lot of fun having you around during the DSA taship. I really hope someday you realise that what you think is "real music"… actually isn't. Wishing you all the best for the future—I know you’ll do wonders!

A smart, calculated person with a unique sense of humor.  I remember back in online sem, everyone referred to you as the sigma guy. It is most certainly true in person as well. I enjoyed all the discussion and banter we had after classes. I know you have all the skills that you need to achieve your goals, I hope luck is on your side too!! Good luck!
Rizzlord?! Left everyone behind at most things you have tried. truly weird sense of humour, or maybe im not cultured enough lol. Good luck with everything ahead!

Do not be deceived by the stoic-like personality he puts on and throws around. Arnav is actually a deeply caring and sensitive person. He is extremely smart and proud of it. He strongly believes in certain values, and I respect him for that. I loved the time we spent together; I just wish we had spent more.
All the best bro

My roll number neighbor—it's always been an honor to interact with him. One of the brightest people I've come across, and I’m truly grateful for the time we shared during the initial years. I have no doubt he will excel in everything he sets out to achieve. Wishing him all the success ahead!
it was really fun hanging out with you in our 2nd and 3rd year, you're super cool and really funny!! you're also one of the smartest people ive ever known
negi, i had a good time ta-ing dsa with you. you're a really smart person and i wish you good luck. keep achieving like you already do wherever you go :)

we havent talked recently, but the times I have spent talking with you about stuff and the things we have done together (feli quiz winners 💃) will always be a part of my experience here. one of the smartest people here and I wish you the best for the future.

name: Gowlapalli Rohit
tagline: I'M HARD TO GET TO KNOW AND NEAR IMPOSSIBLE TO FORGET

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Got introduced to Room No.331 and Venkata Kesav Venna. Most of the time went into unpacking and cleaning the room.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Call of Duty Finals - October 8 , 2024

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Room No 364  - Bakul Nivas , IIIT Hyderabad

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Sting -> Mountain Dew

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer:
"Hey B.A. pass aina,  
Are M.A. pass aina,  
B.Tech pass aina,  
Mari M.Tech pass aina,  
Congrats ayyo Super bhayyo anadam manesi,  
Manake teliyani future gurinchi foolish prashnenti?  
Next enti? antu golenti?"

testimonials.text: If anyone deserves credit for who I am today, it is this man. What started off as a simple team for IoT has grown into a lifelong friendship battle-tested through countless ups and downs. He is always my guiding light for whenever I feel clueless and lost. "Slightly" overworks himself. Please don't care about others' perception of you bhai..that's all. We don't judge you by your achievements. So, my dear Varadha, nee kosam..nuvvu eppudu pilichina nenu nee daggaraki vastha..nee okkadi kosam 🙋‍♂️

You have no idea how much someone writing "my penny" means to me. I didn't know who wrote that and was trying very hard to find it out. Now after I found that it was you, I couldn't be more happier than I'm now. Unpopular opinion, I always liked your jokes even when they are actually bad. I always liked talking to you be it about studies or any other discussions. I'll keep texting you after clg as well, and I hope you will reply with atleast 10 short msgs(like you always do).

Will miss the most senseless debates we had in 364. Most pessimistic person and the biggest reverse-jinxer. Doesn't know about his true potential (or atleast doesn't say it aloud). True Kassi. Clash of clans noob. COD pro (konchem). Oorike food deliveries pettukoni nannu influence chesav, na bank balance kaali aipoindi. One of the most dedicated guys I've ever met and you truly deserve the best. Na testimonial lo nuvvu rasina last line pachi abadham (ippudu edit cheyaku). #Vadapavhaterforlife

7th class nundi mee range academic intensity undi unte ee patiki abdul kalam ayye vadini. 8th class nundi mee range humor levels undi unte ee patiki oka nalugurini aina padesi unde vadini. 9th class nundi mee range cinematic knowledge undi unte ee patiki quentin tarantino ayye vadini. 10th class nundi mee range table tennis skills undi unte ee patiki roger federer ayye vadini. Inni domains lo expertise oke manishiki ela possible? Anduke, You are insane Rohit G, You are insane.

Piccha peak kassi ra nuvvu. Andhariki daily 24 hours unte neeku matram daily 48 hours untadhi. Nee antha multitasking impossible bhai: studies, sports, twitter, movies, ..and the list goes on..
College ki rakamundhe naaku parichayam ayina first telugu person nuvvu. Yes we had hiccups, but ee 4 years lo naaku best vibe neethone. 
Cant forget random sports & movie debates with you. 
I hope, Naa spelling mistakes correct chese chance neeku vasthune undali lifelong 😉.
wishing you a marvelous future

Neeku unna TAships anni odilesi DSA endk chesaavo, unna labs anni odilesi maa lab ki endk vachaavo kaani, bhale set aindi ra. You are a great friend to have ra. The kassiest person I know and the best person to take any advise. I know you will anyway reach the pinnacle of your career but koncham kassi tagginchukoni, enjoy chey raa parallel ga.

annaaa
true all rounder ra nuvvu naa uddesam lo nuvvu, kasi vishayam lo entha extreme god level kasi undo.. anthe funny and jovial guy hai re tu
nee kasi ni chusi chaala nerchukunna bhai, sahi me bol raha hu
asala neevi mourya vi cricket group lo battles epic ra 🤣
please swargalokam and telugu group ni alaane active rakho bhAAi
dil ke bohot khareeb hai tu, pakka hum touch me rahenge i have that feeling
good luck raa rohit, love you.

What a man, we started as enemies fighting over Radheshyam (which i still believe is a good film btw) and suddenly we meet in college as if we were known buddies. I vividly remember how we automatically held hands watching Ante Sundarniki second half and how we both faked our liking towards RRR (I am assuming, please dont scold) I always said to you yo enjoy life more, and I still mean it, you got the best job, you have a very good CGPA mitrama, inka chill avvu raa, you deserve it, i love you ra

Gowlaaaaa, you've been the best roommate I had, ra. You have no idea enni saarlu edchano, endhuku maarano room-mate ani. 2nd year dhaaka, ala silent ga undevadivi, but dhani tharuvatha nijanga, you were a treat to be around ra. Nuvvu, nenu elanaina hyd lo ne untam kabatti, I feel manam okka re-release kuda miss avvodhu ra, fix! Also, nuvvu naaku trip ki veldham veldham ani eppatinundo chepthunnav, adhi balance undhi, ee saari ninnu miss avvanivanu! Love you ra, Rohit!! 

P.S. SRH >>>> MI

Bhaai!! we have one thing in common always. Lets change that subject of common. I always remember how you keep WA groups engaging and active with fan wars and mockings, intha sarada sarada ga undadam antha easy kaadu. Thanks for helping me during my OA. Mee unity (internship mukhyam bigilu) and you as a pillar, I always admire and am thankful for your support to us. You were like "mana army ekkada undi" and answered "gate deggara okate entry" and that resembles you.
Thanks bhAAi for everything..

Online sem lo nee jokes super, thought you were fun. Unlike many, you're the same cool person offline! Nee jinxing ki oka dandam ra babu, how do you even do it ra?! But I honestly feel you don’t need to jinx that much because you're one of the most hardworking people I know and luck favours you already. Eppudu life goals ae kakunda, konchem enjoy cheyyi ra, don’t miss out like Manali again (though you got a valid reason). And try to reach your "other goals". Hyd lo unte, we'll have fun together!

I always enjoyed your jokes and I'll miss them a lot. The days we played cod are unforgettable. You are one of the most skilled persons that I knew, rooting for your success always. Manam unna common groups lo ni messages kosam wait chesthu unta. 🩷🩷

Most hilarious vadapav fan !!! 
Asalu aina Perth 171 ela telidu bhai neeku. Ade selfless intent tho enno sarlu k/d << 1 maintain chesav. Jokes apart one of the kassiest persons I have ever met....maintains CGPA of Rohit's BGT average :)
Hope we continue those WA cricket grp banters, COD sessions and especially those VK* based DMs but surely miss box cricket sessions :((

Gowla bhai.. you are the OG ra. Wish we played more TT together(your service still haunts me). I wish we had started talking so much earlier, realising this very late. Your dedication towards acads, tfi, cricket.. unmatchable bhai. Your sarcasm has gotten better over time.. thanks to Michael Scott😂. Literally every group you are in is active because of you, huge respect bhai. Please keep texting and recommending me good movies.. itlu thoti michael scott fan.

The real kassssi of our batch, ur aura is unmatchable man. mana cod sessions gaani, ved room lo sollu meetings gaani, last lo ninnu chala edipincha man sorry for that. will miss you ,stay happy stay safe...i know you wont stop untill u reach the top. stay hungry everyday beastmode ra nuvu.
45, MI is an emotion for us, Best Rohit Sharma supporter ever, Naaku telisinantha varaku You are the coolest topper ever, kind and kassi at the same time dont lose that, All the best!

If there is one person who can make you laugh until your sides hurt, it's Rohit G. His presence is guaranteed with humor-infusion and I'll personally never forget his epic roasting of Abhinav. But what's truly amazing is that beneath all that fun and wit is one of the most studious and dedicated individual I've ever met. Seriously I felt like he studied 24 hours a day!.
All the best for your future Rohit G. Go conquer it :)

Hello there, nerdy boy! KASSI. Your dedication to academics is inspiring. And coming to your endless movie discussions on Telugu Peeps, you could totally be a movie critic! Wish if we had more chances to get to know each other better. Keep shining as always !!

My go to person for every small doubt I had in the online semester and even offline sometimes. Asalu online sem lo nannu doubts adiginappudu ardhamkaledhu ..nuvvu antha thop ani clg ki vachakane thelsindhi. 
Meeru busy kakapothe touch lone undham😂. 
All the very best for your future !!
Most dedicated person I have very seen. Never understood, how you are so motivated in solving things...

Even though we interacted less, you have always been a good friend. You are incredibly talented and you have truly been an inspiration to me in academics. I have no doubt you’ll do amazing things in the future. Wishing you all the best!

A very good friend, very helpful, but naaku maatladataaniki bhayam. Anduke online lo ekkuva maatladukuntam. #kassi.One of the persons that i inspire a lot from. Pratisem lo 10 techukuni andarini toppers antaavu. Nee chuttu andariki positive energy spread chestav.. with ur jokes. Obviously TFI baagundaali..nenu kuda same batch.I hope we stay in touch and kalisinappudu kuda maatladukundam eesari. I hope success follows whichever path u take. Be happy and i'm always happy that i got to know you....
Though we haven’t spoken much, it’s been nice being part of the same journey. Wishing you all the very best for the road ahead.

Naa First TT inspiration. Ninnu chuse aatha nerchukovali ani decide ayya neetho aadinappudu aa bayam untunte untundi. Baa matladthav manchi jokelu veyadaniki try chesthav groups lo konni peluthay konni avvav anthe😅. COD kuda best bhai nuvvu. Hope we play all those some day again. Hyderabad lo untav kalusthu undu badminton adukundham. Alane games lo inspiration isthu undu naku. 
Nv twitter lo famous avvali ani korukuntunna bhai. 
Job lo kummey bhai all the best!!

Asala manam eppudu maatladatham anukole,  but 4-1 lo we had some good conversations. Asala eppudu complete motivation tho untav, endhulonaina best istav. Eppudu alane undu.
Night cricket teammate!! Also should mention about your jokes in Telugu Peeps group,  Tfi knowledge mottam kanipistundhi😂. 

Wishing you all the very best!!

Mr gowlapalli.. Enni samvatsaralakello telsu still maatladaniki 1-2 varak raavalsi vachindi.. But keeping this aside neetoh maatlade konchem sepu kooda nen naa lekka unta mastu enjoy chesta... Nee kelli vishyalu telsukovadam lo oo anandam undi ra... Naa walk inka pending undi gurtupettuko... Stay the way you are just negative thinking teeseyyi konchem anthe..... Trouble chestunta ninnu time ki reply iyyi.. I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need.. Marchipok

Bhai, I still remember the night before salaar morning show. We had so many fun and some serious and geniune discussions as well. Neetho entha time spend chesina inka cheyyalanipisthadi. Over achiever ra nuvvu. You are one of the most talented and hardworking guys I've ever known and I always wish you success in all your endeavours.

Asal you’re the one who can pull a joke or punchline out of anything — always been a fan of your humor! Beyond that, you’re also one of the most determined and smart people I know. Wishing you all the very best for the next chapter ahead — I know you’ll do amazing things! :)

One of the first friends I made on campus. "The beginning is the most important part of the work". Having a good friend like him at the start gave me a very good feeling about what college is going to unfold to become. Wish him all the best for his future. :). Thanks for making college a good time for me. Hope to retain this friendship till my last breath. :)

Rohit, my fellow PnS TA, is a great person to be around. Man is a livesaver when it comes to texting TAs stuff you dont wanna text. He was really cool with our horrible DASS client (I know that takes a lot). Keep up the good work

I respect you a lot ra. super smart and hardworking. I used to get super scared before PnS exams whenever I talked to you. I love your jokes and random tollywood references. I'll never forget the gender course, our discussions or the pulp fiction movie. Please dont forget me when you become a bigshot at goldman sachs.
me when gowlapalli message: navvu raledhu... just kidding 😁 it's been fun talking to you and good luck!
It has been so fun talking to you about all the stresss we had to face in GS on the way back to campus. Thank you for always being so helpful! Will keep meeting in GS :)

Neetho kalisi matladindi takkuva ayyina, matladina pratisari chala baa matladatav. Nee lame jokes ni miss avtamu. Telugu peeps lo nee memes nee msgs valla chala active ga undi aa group. Eppudu full kasi mode lo untav. Ds teammates avvadam anukunam kani avvalekkapoyam🥲.  Touch lo undu. All the best for your future.

name: Ashmit Chamoli
tagline: It's the Little Things that Count.

testimonials.text: bhai we took the decision to join this college together, been room mates for an year and had fun through out college...I would tell no one of your late night calls hehe

Best Room-mate ? Although the competition was pretty weak, but still, best times in E-227. Too much brainstorming over Leetcode, ML, Would you rathers to gym, maalgadi and what to order. Lets hope thodi akal aa jae dono ko before Stripe, wrna pehle din hi bahr milenge xD (iykyk).
Great guy, best brawlhalla duo, thoda secretive hai par badiya hai aadmi. Milte rahio Bangalore mein
Very nice guy with a gentle heart. Have a cool personality and would miss to hangout with you buddy.

Hey Ashmit!

We haven't interacted much, but I really loved the few times we did. You have a fun and jolly personality, and wish we could've hung out and games together more.

Stay in touch, and wish you the best in all your future endeavours!
survived BRSM and SE together 💪🏻. i love how smart you are. its like inbuilt. you dont work very hard or anything 💀 you just work smart which is p cool. all the best!!!!
Ashmit bhai, I wanna write so much about you but a lot of it doesn't suit the parivarik vatavaran of this forum. So I'll just sum up with saying that I love you. Bbye, milte rehna :)

Miss the Maalgaadi triple orders :) Can't bully you anymore for ur height little guy, koi aur dhundna padega. Wish you the best and praying for all the tech you own rn and in the future, "Electrician Final Boss"

Chomli bhai, you are the perfect example of the saying, "chota bomb, bada dhamaka." You're such a brilliant person and a great friend. I really wish we had become friends earlier in college. Talking to you is always so much fun—aap itne funny kaise!? Anyways, let's keep in touch (however we can). Wishing you all the best in everything you do, both in life and at Sprite!
Ashmit bhai you may not be the largest friend I have but you def have a very large impact. Chota packet bada dhamka 😘. Really hope you achieve it all, I am really glad to have you as a friend.

It was great working with you on the DS project. You were a solid and dependable teammate. I really appreciated how committed you were throughout. Also, thanks a lot for checking my paper when I couldn’t be there, it genuinely helped.Wishing you all the best for what’s ahead!

Hi Ashmit, it was very cool to find out someone from DPS was in IIIT, ki chalo koi to aur aaya lol. It's been a joy to talk to you whenever we did, and I hope we keep in touch after this as well. All the very best for your future, see you again!

Love having a friend like you. Still cant imagine how you manage to game with that laptop of yours😂. Bhai kabhi tumhe gussa nahi dekha, na kabhi udaas, so I feel you can control your emotions very well. Bass aise hi haste rehna bhai. Wishing you all the best for your future!!

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Walked inside the campus just before someone I was about to meet later but didnt know. Went into Bakul unknown of what was going to happen, but everything turned out just perfect the way it was. Met Ramesh and og SoG.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Whole night spent talking at the most random places in college and later realising the sunrise.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Gatherings and MTNLP.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I look 4 years younger now than when I joined college.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Not even I know, except the fact that I will not stop meeting all these people in the photos!

testimonials.text: Hi bestie ;b Thank you so much for making my college life as fun as it was. I am so proud of how far you've come, and even more proud that you continue to have the same kind heart you always did. From lib to lab, concerts to papers, gym to swimming, hyd to blr, we have grown together and without you nothing would have been as fun. Thank you for ensuring that I never had a dull moment, thank you for teaching me so much, thank you for it all - 500 chars aren't enough for you, hope a lifetime is <3

Dear Andam,
If I had to say this guy was my godfather in college, I would say it was you. And I'd bet a lot of others would say the same. Meeting you literally changed my college experience. Your kindness and the means you go to to help others are something I've always admired and found pride in -- This amazing person is my friend. One of the hardest working and inspiring people I've ever had the privilege of crossing paths with. Thank you for the amazing experiences over the years.

244 is etched in my head forever, pretty much defines the first few years of college, 244 wouldn’t be 244 without Adnan Qidwai. The  GuruTM, old guy teaching the apprentices @ Shrine about his ways, how to drink and what to drink, sabse pehla sutta, sabsi pehli parties, sabse pehle f(g) (ya f(jo bhi)) aur sabsi pehli green apple efy. Such an inspiring grind at LTRC, KCIS jana ab ajeeb feel hoga without you at your spot, no worries though, Friday ki Garib Rath hi to leni hai.

🔥 💯 this Nawabzada is quite possibly the nicest man I have known. Thanks for making 244 the happening place that it was. Thanks for showing me how to train my hamstrings. Every function with you was a joy and I will miss your presence very much 💔💔💔

I hope we'll stay in touch and keep meeting.

🦁 my bakul 2nd room roommate 🥀🥀🥀 . Half the stuff we got up to in college would never have happened without you around. Nothing will come close to the time all of us spent in 244; on any given day udhar actual room walon se pehle baki 10 log ke milne ka zyada chance tha 💔 All the bakul functions, the talks, everyone sitting down through the night to work on an assignment, or just play some games 💔. Thank you for making college so memorable. khl khtm h ab to 🤣💔🥀

Adnan,you were a steadfast friend when I felt most alone, and your encouragement allowed me to walk into the gym for the first time. Thanks to you,Absolut Vodka will always hold a dear place in my heart! Your striking turnaround and remarkable focus-from vape-fueled Library Leetcode sessions to knowing when to lock in and publish papers-have been truly inspiring. You are a man of clear priorities, and I'm profoundly grateful for your friendship. I still owe you a Subway,so we'll meet soon!
My man is the OG gym inspiration. The gym guy everyone aspires to be. Super humble, extremely well spoken, and always presentable. Love you man!

i will never forget the fun times we've spent when we were in bakul 24x. your music taste is really cool and you're an extremely underrated talented musician. stay in touch and i wish you the best of luck forever :))
Adnan, you're a great singer and a super funny guy!
Idk if you remember but we met first discussing assignment answers on discord in the online semester, came close with DASS, thanks for lending your room to play poker...and carrying our DASS project

most handsome man in ug2k21, best physique in ug2k21, smartie, cutie. Saaaale gym mat chod. anyways, LOVE YOU BROTHER, will miss you.
VG ki bitching ni rukni chiye

Bhai, take almonds for better memory : )

Baki 1-2 me hamne jitna time bitaya, was a wonderful experience,vo cycling karna, vo train me travel karna without ticket was epic 

Baki 2 year ke baad se, you disappeared from OBH, which made us a little bit separated.

Hope you will fill this gap and remember me in the future ; )

Stay Happy and connected
Life is better with true friends

we haven't talked much recently at all, but there was a time when you were one of my closest friends. i'm never forgetting those late nights in bakul, those evenings in gym, the first time you showed me how to squat with the kettlebell early in the morning, always willing to lend an ear, and just so nice, and also genuinely caring about people. that's always going to stay with me regardless of what happens. im happy that you seem to be doing well, and I hope that continues. atb for whatever u do

Asnad bhay 🤲🙏🛐 Life lessons I learnt from you:
1. God knew I'd be too powerful if I was mentally stable.
2. I learn from the mistakes of others who take my advice
3. The world would be a better place without me which is why I have to keep living

Primary cause of the trust issues during my initial days here due to the diabolical prank he pulled off on day 1 (It's just a prank bro. It won't emotionally scar you for the rest of your life bro. Trust me bro- 🤠)

Had a Lovely Time with you Adnan. You have such a beautiful voice and I hope we get to perform sometime again in the future. Stay the same, Sing more and hopefully our paths cross sometime in the future.

You have a Lovely Future ahead of You..
Good Luck for everything,
Poorvi
Eid Mubarak 🫂

Your attitude of always striving for more has probably been the most influential thing for me in college. One of the major reasons why grinding became slightly enjoyable was the daily whiteboard discussions. Do ya thang ke saath nallamalla forest me canyon race karne me bohot maza aaya tha, have to do more together. Bangalore ka jonathans dhoondte hai, phir spam karenge. Scooty shukar hai mil gayi end me :)

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Hanging out with friends and going uncles probably lol.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Gonna start earning now, so that should be fun.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Will be working for a bit and then apply for a master's/PhD degree.

testimonials.text: pranav, you’re my bestest friend, and i’m so grateful to have found you in college. i genuinely don’t know how i would’ve survived without you—college just wouldn’t have been the same. you’re so hardworking and determined, and your focus and passion are genuinely inspiring. i love spending time with you and i’m really lucky to have you in my life. you’re the smart to my dumb, the calm to my chaos. you’re always there when i need you. you mean a lot to me. i’m really going to miss you. love you.

pranav, you are the dumb to my dumber. you get a part of me not a lot of people understand and i am so glad that i can discuss literally anything with you. you are such a delight to talk to, a ball of happy energy everytime we go out partying, hype man, gossip buddy, uncles bestie. i will miss being absolutely retarded with you. i will miss the bitching sessions. i am soooo glad you are in hyd :) and i just know you are gonna be really successful in life so best of luck :) ilysm

Pranav I'm so so proud of how much you've grown and changed. From seeing you drink and smoke for the first time to seeing you publish your first paper I can't put into words how happy I am. All those hours at Khajaguda and god knows where else we spent discussing everything mean so much to me. I never realized strawberry kiwi moment would lead here. Thank you for all the house parties and your beautiful music taste. 

Keep researching and achieving everything you want to!

always gonna call you when i wanna watch movies because no one else i know loves gore like me as much as you do. idk how people see you as a doesn't talk much guy when we know how much you can talk. such a constant support and i could always count on you to rant about anything. the best boywheel of our girls gang hehe may you always keep doing this. i'll make you taste kallu soon dw. keep meeting us at least after college ends research kassi

pranavv, you have the best taste in movies and tv shows. thanks for watching house of the dragon and going to movies with me. our alc runs are part of my favourite memories in college. true diva but you make up for it by being really sweet and nice. your passion and dedication to your research is admirable. your work schedule is the most admirable. that osn project was the chillest project i've ever done thanks to you. you're the only one who gets my sleep schedule. also your tshirts rock

Pranav , you are that one friend with whom even I don't speak for months but will be on the same page the time we are together . It was a good thing that we choose the same college for our BTech because without you my last few sems would be horrible . I don't think I would get that kind of support from anyone. It is nice that you didn't go to BITS otherwise I would have can't do ece there just because of you.

Pranav, I've known you since MDP and seeing the real u in college was the most surprising thing ever for me. You're such a cool and chill dude. Impossible to dislike. Surprisingly good at racket sports. I love bonding over movies (in nolan we trust) with you. You are a true and loyal friend and I've seen enough firsthand to know that you'd have my back no matter what.

Hey Pranav, you are a really sweet and interesting person ra. You are such a hardworking and goal-oriented guy. Riding on scooty with you was so fun and I'll never forget the first time you tried to teach me lol. Our late night talks in the initial sems were really special and I am glad we ended up speaking the night we did. Going out with you is also so entertaining and we had many good times. Be the same cute and fun person you are ra.

Im really glad you ended up being our friend. Its all thanks to ykw on a random night that you, me and gundam (og 'boys') got close. The nights we spent discussing shit in hostel rooms where some of my best memories in college and id give a lot to have them back. We slowly became roommates too, discussing shit like movies and shows till late night instead of falling asleep. Thanks for dropping little bits of knowledge whenever I drop by MLL, Im Sure well hang out a lot more and stay in touch :)

Pranav!! We were once part of the boys, and honestly, those days were such a vibe. You’re sweet, lowkey hilarious (mostly because of your actions XD), sometimes totally clueless, and always either sleeping, doing research, or talking about Anu lol. Your dedication is insane, and I was surprised by your secret tennis + pickleball skills. Hope we stay in touch, and keep meeting for more pickleball games. Don’t disappear into a lab forever lmao <3
You're a funny funny guy. Spent some cool moments with you! Hope you find a lighter always, (to have a bright life xD)!

Man has an aura, like he cries before the exam, saying he won't pass, then proceeds to top the class or among his friends.

Works hard, never shows his efforts, never flaunts a humble saint 

Man will always belittle himself, act dumb deliberately in front of everyone (his way of superiority to others, I assume)

Eats beyond his size, good eating mate who can handle spies and a non-veg lover.

Will miss ur whining and ur weird sense of humour.
I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need...

The biggest snake known to mankind - starts a course saying you'll fail, then slowly raises expectations as marks roll in, ending with “I need to cover X course's grade with this one” by the time endsems finish.
Always poking fun at me having DASA money but then starts talking about his own expenses too :D On a more serious note, super responsible - also kept me grounded in multiple facets despite my shortcomings and gave a lot of good tips. Grateful to have you as a roommate for a while longer!

Bestttt friend I got through college,You are caring in your own way and chaalaa vishyaalalo I look up to you. Be yourself and will miss our random dlf nights and outings we two had, eppudu ninnu edoti dobbutu untaa and come to my house someday, All the best and stay in touch !!

kunchum maatladu kunchum maatladu ani adagadam thone aypoindi college. Ippatinunchaina maatladutu undu ekkuva. Lets continue to be in touch. Felicity appudu kalisi pizza thinnaam and last day kalisi bayata Luno lo thinnam. I wont forget both these days. Sometimes you are serious, sometimes funny, sometimes silent. But i enjoy being with you and talking to you and irritating you. Marchipoku nannu. Happy ga undu and peaceful ga undu until i irritate you. I wish you the best in everything you do...

rey satvik, konchem nannu gurthupettuko. snap lo snaps pamputhu undu, atleast. hyderabad vasthe kaludham. na contact save cheskuni unchuko malli miss aipoddhi na number. nuvvu ma room ki vachinappudu fun vachedhi. nuvvu chala cool and calm ga untav. I like it the most. miss youu.

Our shared experiences under Bhaktee were interesting times, and it was always nice talking with you. I will miss having someone who understands the struggles we face in our research, and more importantly, a friend who I know very well. It's a shame we couldn't do more together. It feels sad to watch you graduate and leave me in the dust, but I truly hope the best in your career and hope we cross paths once again.

testimonials.text: Rayaan! Pehle to mera mazaak udaana band karde kabhi xD. But you're a very jovial person who always makes our dance practices entertaining and fun. It's always fun dancing with you from tdc events to outreach to batch dances! Love your sarcasm lol!
One of the best dancers in the batch.... Grace mein karna koi terese seekhe.... Would miss seeing you dance.... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need....

Yo Rayaan — easily the best boy dancer on campus! You’ve got such a calm, chill vibe, and honestly, that’s one of your best traits. Always so fun to talk to, and you’re an amazing listener too. I’ve loved all our deep conversations — they’ve been the best. Wishing you all the success and good vibes ahead — stay awesome! 💃🕺✨

Rayuu I wish we had more time, more memories like the ones we finally made last sem, since 2nd year, it should’ve been this way. Now who will I teach lessons during walks and who’ll I rant to with my endless bhak bhak and who’ll patiently listen.. then roast me right after? or trust more than I even trust myself? You became that person. I’ll miss you so much, truly I wish you stayed longer. Love you always and thank you for being my constant when I didn’t even ask for it, anywysicntdesin500words

Ever-smiling rizzler, Vayu juniors ka favourite, dosti ki misaal, my OG song buddy, and just an innocent sweet personality. Always remembers every little detail about everybody and always takes care about his friends, always shows up for even the smallest thing. Great dancer, and always up for the craziest possible ideas. Keep dancing, and never lose your spark.

Hi Rayaan, what a great dancer! I had a lot of fun practicing and peforming with you whether during Felicity or Navrang, as well as discussing so many web series xD. You've a very fun and chill vibe. All the best for everything ahead, keep dancing, and yes we'll definitely explore Pune :)

Khan Sahaab, an amazing dancer, and an even more amazing friend. I truly enjoy irritating you the most. Your taunts are the only ones I do not take seriously. You are truly fun while also having a really high EQ, have a great taste in music, and know how to lighten up the opposite person's mood in seconds. Hope you earn a lot so that you can buy all the cars that you want :) Keep dancing. All the best for all your future endeavours. Keep in touch!!

Rayaan bhai we had a very good time in the last days of college. I could never expect the amount of fun that we all did in Vansh's room. 
Will try to repeat the same in future meets 😂!

Rayaan u r such and amazing and kind hearted friend , kbhi to kisiko no bolna seekh lo (ofc expect me) 😂. Will always remember those late night walks, all the fun we had together among which teasing you is my fav one xd. Lucky to have frnd like u and always having you by my side. All the best rayaan sir for your future, kbhi same city mai ae or bataya nhi tb be ready ready for the worst 😜.

364 Roomie. CP God. CG Grinder. One of my best friends. The world is unlucky to be unaware of his wit & humour. Introvert Guy. Introduced Telugu Twitter Community to me. Mobile Game Geek. Fastest at Calculations. Funniest at Societal Expectations. I feel I am the only person who knows him truly at the core. Truest TFI Banisa. Frankly I never knew what he thinks of me, but hates my Idol for sure.  Surely a Crorepati by 2027. He asked me to stop interacting with him after college; GP can confirm.

Orey Mourya, fake NBA fan, LeBron is the GOAT, Nadal is better than Djoker, and most importantly Stokes === Virat Kohli and finally George Russell >>> Verstappen. I honestly am making a clown of myself writing theseee, but I still find happiness in just opposing you hehe

Nee antha height avvalante em cheyyalantav mourya😂.... Jk.... Asal intha baaga ela chaduvutav nuv.... Ds lo entha chirak teppinchina Naa doubts ni solve chesinanduk thanks... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need

Firstly, so sorry for invading your privacy in gurugaon. Thank you for bearing with all of us. Someday in future atleast edo oka game (be it 1v1 or bowling) lo anna i hope i'll beat you and that day chala proud ga chepkunta andariki. That shahjahan mumtaz mahal discussion was the best. 

Also Du du du Max Verstappen forever.
All the very best and congrats to databricks for having you.

Noob gamer, asala sprinklr lekapounte ni lanti close friend naku dhorakakapodhunu. nenu ni midha enni jokes vesina, entha edipinchina u were cool. I'll definitely miss talking to u, watching movies with u and making fun of you. we had the best time in gurgoan, I enjoy your presence a lottt. malli ni roommate la undalani undhi. Miss you, please stay in touch.
Always...🩷

Best sports analyst and eppudainaa ye sport tho nainaa debate cheyyaali ante neetho maatlaadatam ee, naaku sambandinchinantha varaku nuvvu okka perfect person vi, ilaage undu, all the best and Banglore lo kummeyachu
Chillest person everrr!!! Still the smartest of our batch. Hope to stay in touch post graduation also. Owe you big time for many things ra, party matram teesukoledu ippati daka

One of the most lockdown VK* fans I have ever met.....Ee filter padithe aa filter petti random comparisons cheyadam, random stickers petti opposite fanbases (vadapav) ni target cheyadam too funny bhai.....Anytime DADA >>> VK*

Nene introvert ante naakante introvert vi ra nuvvu. 3 introverts roommates ga undabothunnam blr lo 💀💀, ela untamo emo.

Just oka suggestion, TAs tho godavapadinattu Team Lead tho matram godava padaku 😂
Hopefully we will get to watch SSMB29 in theatres togeather.

Wishing a humongous future.

Mouri dog..800 problems tho 1000 day streak and DBX ela kottaalo oka session teesuko anna 🔥🔥Prof ki mail cheyydam meedha kooda okati pls🔥🔥All-rounder on X ra nuvvu, whatever the topic is - sports, politics, movies. Mee roommate ni entha abuse chesaavu ra asalu. Lucky ga nenu akkade undi group lo vaadi accusations confirm chesaanu kaabatti saripoyindi🤣 CHILD-1089 is an emotion ra enthaina. DBX lo aina koncham healthy food (not chips) tinu pls. They need their future CEO to be safe🙏Kummeyi🤝

Eediki academics excel cheyyadam lo vachhe pleasure inka ekkadaa raadhu. Shadows lo brathukuthadu kabatti proper PR lekunda poyindhi veediki, in case PR undunte PK guru LOR tho CMU velle vadu. Inka academics gurinchi chepthu velthe 500 characters saripovu, so food habits gurinchi cheptha. Addamaina aaharam thine veedikemo ye health issues undavu, pure nutrition seek chese nenemo week ki osari sick avutha, that's the unfairity of life. CF, twitter and 2-player games kosam koseskuntadu.

Ee royy mouri ga , coc adatle ee  madhya. But whatever it might be nee antha dedication evari deggara chudale for grades.
Ede emaina neekante nenu tt, cod lo thopu. Databricks ki vellakaina okavel adte service nerchuko ra first  😂 . Enthaina manam games vishayam lo taggakudadu  ra
Cool hair bro, always xD

MUDIPI MY MAN. ILY. Chillest guy with the most brainrot humour, and I absolutely love it. Nobody could guess but bro is hella smart and used to be gymbuddy too.
Wish you all the best man. Keep cracking those uncomfortable unhinged jokes. You've got a truly fun personality

im so glad that in a rather poetic way, we ended up hanging out a lot right in the beginning and then right at the end of college. you're the only one other than me who unironically has great fashion sense. will missing mbappeing with you in 130. gl :))
Amazing guy. Your room, especially your bed, was always a vibe. Will miss staying in mct until the arrival of attendance machine (and then frantically calling everyone else). A*****e robbed you :(
hello future roomie. hopefully bangalore is gonna be a lot of fun together!!

I hope you enjoyed my beanbag buddy! Don't forget me, and please keep in touch❤️
Kabir bhai, one of the craziest and most adventurous people. Always resourceful and thanks for the help in prithvi too !

Most khatarnaak bike and car rider. Had some fun , some threatening experiences. Bhai baatein karne mein sabse aage rehta hai hamesha aadhi sach nikalti hain aur aadhi jhooth :) :)  Always ready to help anyone in need.Technically also my roommate. Had a great time with you Shamster.
our go to audio person in prithvi. sorry for troubling you with so many changes in audio haha. fun prithvi party times

bhopali ni**a

I know we'll all get caught up in our work going forward, but i know that everytime we talk to each other, it'll feel like everything is back to normal - you're one of those guys bhai. I'll see you in bangalore ni**a.

Shamlani mc, one of the first few friends from college , saari bt mai saath , aur ta ka chamcha , aur chandan sir ka beta , and the most hustling guy from our group

tu tab tab yaad aayega jab jab puff lunga aur tabhi yaad aayega jab mere lungs phat jayenge. sahi mein teri yaad aayegi jab jab potty nhi aayegi, nicotine kon dega. tu aadmi chutiya hain lekin insaan bohut bohut acha. dil bada hain tera, love you. aur bacho ko gadi se uda na mat. will miss you.

Kabir, first of all yes, you're still shorter than me, and no, maturity isn’t your strong point either XD. I’m gonna miss tying you rakhi this time but don’t worry... I’ll courier it so no escape! And since you’re placed and all grown up now, this time double the rakhi money okay? 😏 Jokes apart, you’ve always been special ...stay happy, stay annoying the same, and don’t forget your tall and mature sister!
Best bhopali guy I have ever met. Best project teammate to have. Chuna lagana ya koi jugaad karna ho to shamlani sir is the choice. Hope to see you in blr and let’s connect(🚬) there.

ch**i*a hai too par dil ka acha banda hai , shamster congrats naukri ke liye par lagta nhi too jyada der karega too business ke liye bna hai .

poker main tujse hi dar lagta hai baki too sab shi hai.

Bhai is one the most street spart peron i have ever seen. Kabir bhai always have a solution for any problem you take to him. Kabir bhai i took your advice and i mean it , it works bhai persistence is the key...
Thankyou kabir bhai
The most jugaadu guy on campus, if he’s around, boredom doesn’t stand a chance! I’ll never forget our Prism experience ,easily one of the most fun times I’ve had in Hyderabad. Gonna miss you, buddy.
A fun-loving person and someone who goes above and beyond when you really need him. I have always enjoyed interacting with you. Best of luck!

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: We came during COVID, so it started with quarantine. But being here as freshers, it felt new, a little scary, and exciting all at once.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Can’t pick just one—there are too many. Almost everything about this campus holds a memory I’ll always cherish.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Sitting in the amphi, walking around when it’s windy, and meeting friends at Felicity Ground.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I was pretty naive back then, but I’ve grown a lot more mature over time. Being around good people helped me face and overcome a lot of my struggles. It’s been a real journey.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Job, hopefully. Honestly, not totally sure—just taking it as it comes and seeing what life has in store for me.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Honestly, on my first day of campus , i had my doubts. Since everything had shifted online during COVID,It just didn't feel real. But that was four years ago. Things moved offline gradually. and once I actually stepped onto campus, it finally started to feel real and wondeful

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Scribble and Farewell

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Late Night Food.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: The biggest change since my first year has been in me. I started off confused, a bit hesitant, and unsure about where I was headed. Over the years, I’ve grown more confident—not just academically, but as a person. I’ve learned to take initiative, handle pressure, and trust myself more. It’s not just about what I studied, but how much I’ve evolved.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: I want to travel and explore everything I can—new places, new cultures, and new experiences. At the same time, I’m focused on growing in life, whether it’s through a job or starting my own business. I

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Day One :) I entered the Campus at 2 am. Some 10-11 people came running for me at the main gate. Those faces I saw only in photos before that. It feels good when I remember that moment, but soon I have to go to Parijat for quarantine because I don't have a COVID-19 negative certificate.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Trips :)

journal.answer: The birthday celebration of IIIT with Dubey Dilwale (our group) was one of the most memorable moments. It's definitely one of the things I’ll miss the most. Apart from this, the late-night walk and the gupshup with these people.

journal.answer: The bond with some people gets even more stronger.

journal.answer: Next toh dekhna padega abhi.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: The main gate was much bigger than expected. Was quarantined in Parijaat for 5 days, Squid Game vibes. The overstimulation from online messages. Installed Ubuntu on would-be roommate's laptop.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Sneaky, random night visit to the faculty quarters terrace. Coordinating Language Club events. Holi. Watching movies in friends' rooms.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Exploring the city by bus in the first year with friends. Late night DLF visits. 3 am maggi at David's. Interacting and learning from diverse group of people. Deadline extensions. Hostel life.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Became more confident and self-reliant. Learned the value of networking. Life happened.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: I'll spend some time in the industry first, and then definitely explore research.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Reached campus at 4 a.m. on Dec 4, 2021, with my parents, but the gate was closed due to COVID-19 protocols. Waited outside in the cold until 6 a.m. Got entry and was directly taken to quarantine at Parijat Hostel. Not the ideal start, but definitely a memorable one

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Some of my favorite memories from campus are the late-night walks to JC, spontaneous trips with the people who made every moment special, and simply spending time with friends who felt like family.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Friends :) ,Food and playing hockey

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I’ve learned that it’s perfectly okay to pursue whatever you want in life and to strive to become whoever you want to be — but also to let go gracefully when things don’t always go as planned. 🙂

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Not overthinking what lies ahead — just embracing the journey and letting life unfold, one moment at a time. And on a lighter note, whenever time allows, I’ll be off exploring the places on my ever-growing travel bucket list.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: First day on campus was super overwhelming but so fun! Felicity prep was in full swing—seniors running around, juniors getting pulled into Kalakshetra work. We spent the whole night making a huge “2022” out of cardboard and setting up lights. Met so many people and just vibed with the chaos!

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: One of my best campus memories has to be during second-year Felicity. It poured, the event was a mess, and everything was basically falling apart, but instead of sulking, we ran out into the rain and danced like maniacs to "Hey Macarena". Just us, the rain, and zero shame. A full-on movie moment.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: I’ll miss the late-night drives, the 5 AM convos, the endless “what if” questions, aimless walks, cards, movies, food, gossip, and just doing absolutely nothing yet having the best time.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Biggest change? Honestly, I still feel like the same mess as first year—but maybe a slightly more put-together one. I’ve become more confident, way more social, and finally stopped being scared of the stage. Now I dance like no one’s watching… even when everyone is ;). I’ve also learnt how precious good friendships are and that keeping in touch matters. So yeah, less fear, more fun, and maybe just a tiny bit more drama!!💃

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: What else—corporate life, adulting, pretending to have it all figured out while totally winging it… just going with the flow and hoping for the best!!!

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Was excited to meet my online friends, met chandana first, she had to show me around campus so many times, yet I would still get lost. Then met Arya, Vansh, Shambhavi and few of us went on a walk. Explored JC first among all the canteens and I loved it.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: The day few of us JC Waale stayed up till 5 am at Amphi dancing randomly, singing on the top of our voices, talking to shambhavi who was in parijaat from amphi just by shouting, playing garbha, and doing all sorts of other stupid activities.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: My group JC Waale, having meals with them, meeting at BBC, going out with them, having my girls in consecutive rooms, getting ready together, ice-cream nights, playing games, taking sessions. Will miss dance practices in basement, behind amphi, nilgiri, himalaya, and dancing on amphi stage.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Sleep schedule. Waking up till 1am at least became a routine. Also observed an immense upgrade in my time and stress management skills.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Hoping to make more friends as good as the ones I had in college. Hoping for a bright and happy future while making an impact in whichever field I will pursue. Excited to discover whatever is in store for me in future :)

Rey Adavi! nee peru vinte pissukodam pattukodam aa main ga gurtu vastay.Chala cute ga navvutav highknees nuvvu. First time vag mandi tinipinchav last days chala baa enjoy chesam asala.

Online sem lo chusi, evadu veedu spects esukuni intha amaikudu laa unnadu anukunna, kani over the sems nee adavithanam ento andariki chupinchavu ra......laziness ultra-pro-max during normal days....ade exam days lo aithe, nee antha clutch performance evaru deliver cheyaru whether it's SMAI, CT ends, IPA ends (with partially awake)....asalu naa NeSS and TAO project nee OG clutch performance valle nannu pass cheyinchav....TI lo anna kasta neat ga avvu ra, akkada kuda shek gaditho chesevi cheyaku

Everything positive ga teeskuntav. Manam spend chesina time, Charminar appudu ala chala sweet memories unnayi. Ninnu nee meeda jokes vesina time ni chala miss avtanu. Kodiga active ga unda ra, walking sariga chey. Msg chestu untu, miss you. All the best for your future.

But honestly neeku unna skills ki proper talent scout role teesukovachu ra nuvvu. Cutest smile ra needi emaina. Hani is the best😁

rey adivi banglore lo chuskundaam manam.

Hans, ninnu dobbatam naa guilty pleasure ra. Anduke dobbutu unta. Feel ayyindi unte sorry. But seriously every moment I've spent with you is gold ra. Chala Manchodivi. Maaraku alage undu. Take care ra. Bangalore lo dunneddam

name: Penukonda Naga Chandana
tagline: You are lucky to have me

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Felt like a new phase of life was about to start, and it did. New faces, new friendships, new experiences, new memories, new adventures, everything felt nice. Was scared but excited too.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Had too many best memories, can't decide amongst them. Most of the best memories were with my gang itself. Us meeting for chai every evening at BBC and playing random games invented by us, going on late night walks, celebrating birthdays, and so much more.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Definitely friends, sometimes the campus as well. The late night walks, the ice cream nights with my girlies, playing games, cracking jokes. Will miss the college events so much, especially dance practices in amphi, in the basement, in nilgiri, in himalaya.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I guess the campus has changed a lot since first year. New academic building, messes being shut, starting triple sharing in hostels.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Have a nice job for now. Wish to make new friends and memories as good as they were in college. Want to have a happy and healthy life and travel as much as possible. For the rest, I just want to go with the flow.
