Baavaa.. I'm the one who gave you that name ra, gurthunda? Appudemo nachaledu annav, ippudu verey peru tho pilisthe palkatledu. You are simply thop ra!! Owe you big time for my intern ra. Google ki ellaka kummey akkada.. career wise ane kaadu(adi elago kummuthav kaani) anniii...

Special person to me. Just be happy wherever u go and achieve all your dreams. There were happy times, sad times...but thanks for all the memories. One of the talented people and greatest achiever i know. truly happy for u for achieving ur dream company.I'll always be ur well wisher. Thanks for being there for me. I was happy thanks to you. Happy ga undu, healthy ga undu, and all the very best for ur future.

Baa!! nuv navvithe bujjiga untaav ra. nee smile ki pedda fans association ee undi. mana 3rd, 4th years >>>> 1st, 2nd years. cricket nets, badminton plays in bakul thopp undediii. mana intern time lo manaki unnantha sync nenu marichipolenu. oracle will be cmg soon. Thanks for being in my life. bengaluru lo we will continue our march with cricket and badmintion as well. Thanks for helping me during my OA. will meet you soon baa!!

The official BAVA of telugu janalu.First time EW-1 lo pakkana chusa ninnu.PRP subject tho room ki vacchav appat nundi prathi praparation lo part ayyav. chala change ayyav baava anni vishayalalo. Gurtu unda oka sari random ga gelikthe serious ayyav chala bayapadda appudu nenu edo cover chesa kani. Triund partner bava nuvvu❤️ Manali gave me best memories.last few days of the college chala memorable. Maybe one day everything come back to the same way again. touch lo undu banglore updates isthu undu

Baavs, I still remember our first interaction near 4th floor washroom, proper uncles la banian esukuni unnav......ee 4 years lo chala transform ayyav from ramudu manchi baludu to karuvu kaatraj...one of the best smiles he has in whole campus.....nuvvu oppukunna-oppukokapoina nuvvu matram vesedi chuck bowling eh.....and ninnu eppudu aa unforgettable over gurinchi gurtu chestune unta....nee bowling lo attack cheyadam chala kick vastadi....hope we continue our drippp box sessions in future too...

One of the most dedicated and hardworking people I know. Will remember those talks and random debates we had. Manam elaa kalisaamo naaku antha gurtuledu, but if we had met on the first day then we would have been besttt friends. Inko 2nd chance undaa chuddam, anyways achieve all your dreams and all the best raa, neeku cheppakapoinaa know that I will always be rooting for you

Bava, Abhishek valla room door open chesi ninnu chisinappudalla oka sense of anandam vasthadi ra naaku .Be it those random discussions or those 1st year 2nd year walks, online coding meetings, being teammates in courses etc.. anni chesam. You are one of the most talented and hardworking people I've known. And geniune too. Naaku chala inspiration undevadivi and I'm glad that you are going to be in bangalore. Kummedham bangalore lo.

Good frnd, chala memories unnayi. Chala motivation ichav low lo unnapudu. Placements appudu kalisi spend chesina time chala memorable. Ala randam walks, open gym lo kalisi spend chesina time chala enjoy chesanu. Da appudu kalisi assignments, inka ala dsac lo kalisi kurchuna time ni miss avtanu. All the best for your future.

I have enjoyed every laugh, talk, and badminton game with this man. I will relish this for a long time, if not a lifetime. 

And learnt a lot from you. In many ways that one can't easily count. Gonna miss everything!

Proud of you and wish you the very best. Stay in touch and keep savoring me with the Andhra snack whenever we meet!

bavaaaa
first lo ekkada ekkado unna im very happy you landed in nibba bros ra
neeku teliyakapovachu but nenu 3-1 time lo naaku intern inka raanappudu rooju intlo cheppevadini amma raviteja ani untadu, vaadu amma asala kasi ante entha perfect ga cheskuntado idi adi ani, that's how much i respect your work ethic ra bava.. ade flow lo google dengavu inka settt
asalaina player ra bava nuvvu, im happy you're now very clear and stable 😘
i love you bavaaa.. google sarukulu naaku istu undara vellaaka

Bawaa🥰😘 Most valuable all-rounder for Telugu Peeps ra nuvvu. Insane figures like 0(8) and 0(4)😭😭Ey maataki aa maata cutie ra nuvvu. Aa style uu aa maatalu🙏Single handed ga intern kottadam ante maatalu kaadu ra. Akkaditho aagaava ante biggest dinosaur pattesaavu ippudu. Crazy ra nuvvu. Kontha rasik angle kooda undhi ra neelo🥹😳Kasi gaadivi kooda ra nuvvu. 2 months gap vasthe college taruvatha evadaina enjoy chestaadu. Nuvventra pani vethiki techukunnavu😭Chill avvu bawa. Dhunneyi inka 💥🔥

One of the calmest friends I have—always smiling. We spent a lot of good times in your room, and I remember falling asleep multiple times on your bed while you had to sleep elsewhere. I wish you achieve all the success in life

Really enjoyed interacting with you, such a friendly person! Grateful for all the fun and for teaching me some Telugu words too. You've been a close friend and great vibe. All the best for your future and keep in touch!

Reyy i miss you raa, nee dedication gurunchi telsu but kalustu unda ra . 
Manam kalisi cricket adina rojulu, practice for night cricket 😎👌🔥. Captain nenu ina captain level performance ichav first match lo, nee valle tough competition ina icham anna feeling vachindi. Eppatikaina ninnu face to face meele weapon tho beat chestaa cod lo.

name: Tirumareddy D K Sai Abhishek
tagline: Powered by caffein, curiosity and TFI.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: I still remember walkings into campus after waving byes to my father. Struggling with all the luggage, that's when my friends came in helped me for the first tym. That night we all gathered had fun watched movie ..the memory is still fresh.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Many are there , whether they areall songs cramm in dances , or sankranthi ethnic wears, whether the trips we had or the bday parties we had . The Swiggy girf restaurant treats or the late night walks....all are the best memories.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Ill miss the coffee , the egg puff from vc, the double egg chicken fried rice from tantra, the cold coffee from jc...most importantly I'll miss the people who will stay back in hyd.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Everyone has changed...point someone and I can tell what changed them...mostly positive changes. And coming to change in me...I have grown emotionally backed by all the unforgettable events whether good or bad.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Idk let's see.

testimonials.text:
Thank you so much for being the right person at the right time. Your support helped me restart things when I was at my lowest. We strictly followed the rule of having ten-minute arguments in a fifteen-minute conversation😂, but it’s good that we never let the fights go too far. And end ki vacchesariki manchi friends ayipoyam.
DS teammates!! Chala nerchukunna nee daggara and I’ve started seeing many things from a different perspective. Wishing you all the very best. I hope we’ll stay in touch.

All your testimonials either saying dance or grace, but we really cant help coz they are so fucking good!My mom stopped watching my dance and watched you at a point when I showed her dance videos. Thanks for bearing my worst dance skills. We bonded so much in the last sem, nenu ninnu chaala annoy chesa and I enjoyed every bit of it (especially kissing infront of iykyk). Goa was literally nothing without you raa sheki, I lowkey enjoyed playing cricket with you on box last day, idk i felt so happy

The Greek god and the most eligible bachelor of UG2K21. We share a special bond, and he’s one of the funniest and most charming people I know. A Call of Duty legend, no doubt. Wishing him all the very best in everything he sets out to achieve!

Dance chestav... Art estav... TI techukunnav... Multi talented ra nuv... One thing I would miss the most neetoh dance eyyadam and ofcourse aa dance process lo vache chinna chinna godavalu.... Appatlo random walking estu esina sodi sessions kooda gurtunnayi naak... Intern raakapoyina enni hurdles unna nuv TI kottav choodu andariki prove chesav nuv edaina cheyyagalav ani... I am so happy for you... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need. Banglore lo kaluddam
Most graceful dancer I know raa, evaru unna nuvvu dance veste ninne choodaali, chaalaa mature and charming person. All the best raa ,Banglore lo kummeyacchu

Shek baby, Most multi-talented person on campus ra. dance venuma dance irruku, style venuma style irukku, art venuma art irukku, body venuma body irukku. Shh... inka chala unnay le. Gossip and Cover drive king ra nuvvu("mana batch" eyy). Thanks for Sprinklr interview.. and more importantly thank you soo muchhh for felicity ra.. em cheppagalanu inthakanna. Lastly Bakul boys ki devudu pampinchina varam ra nuvvu

abhishekkk..i really enjoy ur company ra.very funny,sometimes sarcastic but eppudu edipistu untav.very big fan of ur dance.vellipoyetappudu levu ani feel ayyaanu but ok eppudu kalustu undam. i hope our vibe stays the same. very happy knowing u and even more happy to be ur friend. manam antha ekkuva maatladukoledu but i hope we'll continue to stay in touch.Its fun to be with u and i enjoy myself.Miss all those memories. Jagrattaga drive cheyyi ippatinunchi ayna.eppudu happy ga undu.challaga undu.

Hey, model/domi/shek, what all nicknames did you have? I don't remember. Nee andaaniki ki, aura ki motham collge ee fan. ne dance and grace steps kaasta naaaku neerpava. nee room lo naaku aasrayam ichaav. Thank you. Bengaluru lo kuda nee dominance and aura spread cheyyi. lets meet soon in TI

Best roomie. Em ayye vadino nenu nv first year lo roommate avvu ani adagaka potunte. Maybe godavalu ayyay but I think those made things good. Happy you got good partner in this sem. Gossips vini naku cheppu bro bengaluru ki vellaka. 
Gym ki velladam miss avtha bro neetho. Neeku gurtu unte manam bitching cheskune vallam mana pados gurunchi that were the best memories I have with you. Night ala kurchoni bale untunde.  Chala hindi patalu nerpinchav paadukunnam patalu
I hope those days come again!

neetho spend chesina time anta chala enjoy chesanu. placements appudu, dsac corridor lo ala kurchovtam, bbc, dlf ala chala sweet memories unnay. placements time lo nuvvu ichina support and confidence chala help chesindi. Ninnu chala miss avtanu. Blr oste ippati lage appudu ninnu edipistanu. Ekkada unna eppudu touch lo undu. All the best for your future.

One of the first persons to call me as Prads....mana COD sessions chala drippp vasthayi (elago most of the times ninnu defeat chestune unta), especially those 2v2 gunfights and search and destroys....hope we continue our drippp sessions in future too shek master....

Okade manishilo inni talents asalu how ra? I think oka 2 yrs back naa bday morning astronomy club event undhi ante, ala lesi undi mrng varaku aaroju ochav, felt really grateful(em stars avpadaledu anuko). Smh ninnu dobbadam chala istam naku, anduke matladatam kante dobbadam ey ekkuva chesthu unta. Eppudu matladina chala manchiga, chala warm ga anpisthadi. Please please learn telugu ra. Oka varganiki inspiration nuvvu (iykyk). Thank you for coorganizing all the trips. Be very very very happy.

Nenu chepdam anukunnadi antha rasesav ra sexy boii. Literally you are one of the closest people around whom I felt geniunely loved, emunna room ki vachi vagesevadni. Sorry for anything and everything I did in this 4 years. We shared some incredible moments during Btech that I'll carry on for my entire life. Bangalore lo kummedham

college join ayinappudu telsina first cutie nuvve ra
btp and ew-1 lo chesina hardesttt carry ki dannam ra neeku, eppatiki marchipolenu
nenu neeku enni saarlu cheppina denguthunna anukuntav kaani peakkkk dancer ra nuvvu.. dance chesthunte 💦 properrr
and i knew from the beginning ra next level rizzz undi neelo ani, first wrong goal ki direct chesina ah rizz antha finally im very happy you found the right one ❤️
last 1-2 semesters ga peak fun aaya re tere sath, bohot maza aata hai re tere sath

Shekuu, badminton oka swag tho aadathav and cod lo i'm way better than you (adhi andhariki thelusu le, but chepthunna). nenu manam cod aade phase ni eppatiki marchipolenu, we had lots and lots of fun. gracemaster. naku thelisina vallalo best dancer, chudalanipisthundhi nuvvu dance vesthe. nuvvu chala baga nerpisthav ra dance, I saw your patience during the practice sessions 🫡 We had so much fun when we were together, bochi u me a deadly combo 😂. reel in manali. Best times. I'll miss you..

Shek...Hottest, smartest, most handsome ra nuvvu asalu. Fashion sense ante needhi ra asalu. Avathala janaalu padi chachipotunnaru nee style ki. Fellow Arcane enjoyer❤️ Konni pronounciations maatram chala cute ga untaayi ra neevi😳🥰 Obviously, nee testimonial ante dance mention cheyyakunda it's incomplete. Aa grace uu, aa ease uu wah🤌🤌Maanchi deep discussion sessions esaam baane. Hope you're in a much better place now. Mallu bava ni jaagrattaga chusuko..nee chetullo pedutunnamu🤧Papa kooda..😳

Mana bond lo few highs and few lows unna, the highs are super memorable ra! Those countless hours we spent on dance sessions, our overachieving attitude tho esina Lamborghini, and all those epic COD sessions – pure fun. But honestly, the most fun (though I shouldn't have 😅) was public ga ninnu dobbadam. Hyderabad ki elaago vastuntaav, let's make sure to have many more highs and create new, unforgettable memories!

Tu bohot zyaada crazy bandi hai xD. Will always remember our ground-floor room gossip sessions. You are so lively and smiley mallika, sabse cutest. And I'll always remember that one diwali jo saath mein bitaaye <3

Mallikaaaaaa — the total item of our group and our forever pareshan aatma! Please take a little less stress (and maybe a little more sleep ) — you’re already doing amazing, and there’s no doubt you’ll go even further in life. I’ll seriously miss your rants and those wild life gossip sessions — we could legit make a movie out of them. Our Goa NPC vibes will live on forever! Keep rocking, keep having fun, and you better keep meeting me, warna maar dungi 😤 Until next time — love you! ❤️

Hi Mallz Pallz. I've always felt like a badi behen with you, tera dhyaan rakhna came naturally to me. We have had so much in college, especially jab tu har baar merko mil jati thi jab mein walk karne jaati thi. You have been very kind and helpful to me alwayss. All the best for Chennai (Ik Chennai hi jayegi tu) and hope you have lots and lots of fun. Will miss you and your so many baatein in 3X speed.

Mallikaa, You are the most BT inviting person i have seen :lol:
Terko last year itna closely dekh ke ill suggest stay away from men and stay close to us :hehe: and get an organiser. I really hope you stay khush and never lose the spark that you have in you. I will miss tera phudkte hue pure campus me bhatakna and door se hii krte hue aana. I know we WILL keep meeting so tu bas ZINDA rehna taki mil ske :hehe:
Will miss your looking at your face everyday :hugs:
Keep your chin up and rock :kisses:
trolling and teasing you all the time in dsac and seeing your legendary gameplay in secret hitler would be missed by me and many

Helloo.... You are hands down the sweetest person I had the fortune of getting to know in college, and the person most difficult to let go of after 4th year... please take care of yourself wherever you go in life and keep in touch... always remember our TT score ;)

Don't let anyone wipe off that beautiful smile of yours. You have the chance to have a full life and I can't wait to see what you make of it. STAY SAFE, and don't ever forget us. I am always here if you want a ear and a shoulder.
I loved every minute of us hanging out. I'm gonna miss seeing you everytime I stepped out. Overall i'm gonna miss your serial drama of a life. Goa, Felicity and every moment we spent wouldn't have been the same without u.

Make good choices, princess <3
Love, Poorvi

Such an amazing dancer you are.... Very sweet person to talk with... Most under rated sports person also.... Stay the same way as you are.... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need

Little vayu buddy, thodi dumb but puri innocent.... are you still??
It was fun in sports events teaching you guys last moment, thankyou for sharing stuff and trusting even with issues haha, take care stay in touch

mallika DS ka trauma saath mein jhela 🫂. goa mein randomly milna was so funny. hum humesha kehte hai ki we should go out kabhi but kabhi hota hi nahi hai woh plan. job lagne ke baad pakka party karenge. all the best

Mallikaa.. Tujhe walk karte dekhna aur tera "hi guyssss" sunna hi kaafi hota tha to make my day. The most energetic person with the purest soul. Please bhai gussa karna seekh ja, itna bhi sweet nhi hona hota. Aur haan jaha bhi location aaye, Hyd aake milte rehna. All the best for your future and please hamein apni life updates dete rehna warna life sach mein boring ho jayegi.

Hi Mallika... You are among the first people I met on campus, back in 1-2. Since then, we've been in touch till the end. We got close mostly towards the end, and now you're one of my best friends and part of the best memories I shall take away from here. You are also one of the sweetest people I've met here. Please do not lose that; it's what makes you unique. Wishing you all the best for everything! We should stay in touch. (p.s.: please get placed in Hyd.)
mallikaaa, i am so glad i got to know you in the past year. doing ds w you was so fun. every time i see you, you have a bright smile that instantly makes my day better. keep smiling always :))

hello , tere sath baat krne main hmesha hi acha lgta hai  , apni walks miss karunga ohne , main to jyada bolta hi nhi tha kyunki teri life main itna drama tha too mujhe bolne ka mauka nhi mila , par mza ata tha . hyd hi aja too bhadiya hai oh hn par tune too nyi life start krni hai na :) . best of luck  , aur thoda shaanti se kam karra kar tension thodi kam liya kar cheezon ki sab kuch apne aap shi hojata hai .

You are a very sweet and interesting person. I enjoy talking to you, jaada baat nhi hui, but you are very open to all of us. You share things and try to talk to everyone. I really like this about you. Be like this: keep smiling, keep making new friends.
All the best for life, and let's catch up soon.

You're literally the sweetest!! Studying (reading one slide and then yapping for 15 mins) with you was so fun :) Wish we became friends much much earlier because knowing you has been so nice. Wishing you the absolute best in life.

Garg, one of the most unexpected introvert (mere liye full extrovert) friend I have made. All the late night walks we have done, I have loved eacch second of it. Teri zindagi me itna kuch hota hai ki mai kya batau, I learnt so mucch from your life of what NOT to do hehe. I wish we could have spent more time together but koini phone pe baat karte rahenge, kabhi mil bhi lenge, vaise bhi once in a while tu jab tension me hogi to phone karke bata hi degi. Will miss you a lot.

We used to run into each other every day, at canteen, in hostel, midway going to one of these places, and meeting you always made me smile. Always seen laughing, a fun loving personality who loves to be constantly busy with something - be it sports, walk with friends, or dance. Never lose your charm!

Hey Mallika. You are such a cutie, and such an amazing dancer too. Love the gossips we have, the dance practices we do together, the ECE RR's, handling Vayu drama and being there for each other always. Love the way you play around like a child, lively, filled with energy, and happy always. Wish I could dance more with you last sem. Whenever we meet, dance reel toh banti hain. Keep smiling, and hope you have a bright future and a successful career. All the best for all your future endeavours.

Mallika, one thing I admire about you, is that no matter the difficulty you dont give up on your dear ones. That is truly very remarkable. I remember the movies we watched, and the many games we played. Your love for outdoor sports, inspired me to start badminton, lol. I hope you have a very succesful life ahead. All the very best!!

How life treats us, mostly depends on us. Past situations(family issues) always try to pull us back, But its us who can beat them. We should only focus on ourselves whether today we are better than yesterday or not. Society would never let you progress and hence its you own duty to progress and ignore the rest of the people.Whatever people thinks about us should not be a matter of concern for us.My sincere advice for you was always that you just focus on yourself and don't get hurt from others😄

Mallika, the way you always say hello by waving your hand and with a big smile on your face is so infectious. Raat ko tera mere room me apne crises leke aana and hamara ghanto solution sochna meri ek core clg memory hai xD.will miss meeting you randomly on my walks and you asking, "mai bhi chalun" Thoda kam sugar khaya kar, roz ki 3 ice cream khati hai aur shaam me kehti hai zyada ho gya, but raat ko phirse ek khati hai. Thanks for comforting the stressed me. Always stay happy and cheerful, Ly!

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Started my journey in 352 and continued all the way with my roomie GVK for entire college life

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: My time spent during Megathon 2024 was my unique memory. The 2 hours may be one of my most happiest moments. My night rides with Bros, kandipappu discussions and life changing decisions in Room 264.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Room 264, Night rides, Jal House and army

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Think ECE standards are going down😭😭

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer:
IAS, IPS....
Lantivi kaakunda eedanna chinna udhyogam cheddam anukuntunnanu😅😅
But frankly teriyaade...

testimonials.text:
It all started with being known as the mysterious man Jalluri -> Gaali.
Baap of CVEST and never hesitated to ask anything from other which amuses me the most and maybe I should learn that from you.
Nee sweet fetish and cute food fantacies baguntay ra Gaali.
Chusko mari banglore lo kuda samosa ki split vestadu praddy gadu. SPC ayyi endaro jeevithalani teeram datinchav and eppudu ayna job threat vasthe neeku call chestha nee contacts vadi oka job ipinchu.
Final ga cheppali ante nv neelane undu.

Hey Ram Gopal!

I'll always remember you as the analog topper. I didn't know I was your first friend until you told me during Scribbl, which was a pleasant surprise. Glad to have gotten to know you over the four years, and hoping to continue staying in touch.

Wishing you the best in all your future endeavours!
Our bank and the best SPC (I was literally the opposite) thanks for inviting to your house and crazy memories playing box with you ra, how can i forget my night cricket days with you ra

Cutest person in the batch—kind, honest to the core, and an absolute gem. Known as Jasprit JG in the cricket circles for his fiery pace. One of the best people I’ve come across, always warm and genuine. Lives on the same floor and is someone I’ve had constant, meaningful interactions with. Wishing him all the very best for everything ahead!
Bhaai, big fan ni discipline and bowling action ki :), nee insta likes and interactions ki nenu secret fan ni..Stay positive and ilaage undu, all the best Banglore lo kummeyacchu

Mastu sarada manishivi ra nuv... SPC ga mastu help chesinav kooda.... Nee singing talent ee sem lone telsukunna keep gng... Honesty ki example jg nuv... Mundu nen iche salaha aa splitlu clear cheyinchuko nuv naak badhaitundi somehw... Bangalore ee kabatti kalustu undu... Nee scooty ni assal marchipon nen.... Nee life lo annitlo perfect ra nuv aa migilina okka aspect kooda neraveralani korukuntunna.. Will miss seeing you dance...Nuv like chese instagram stories ki kooda fan nen... I wish you ATB.

Gaali jalluri, ninnu choosthe intha thopu ela untaaru and intha erri** la ela untaaru ani okesaari anipisthadi ra. Career wise aithey ekkadiko vellipothav le nee gaali ki.. but nee kinda pani cheyalsina valle, papam.. kocham jaali choopincha ra valla meeda, nee gaali-ness tho champaeyaku. Career kakunda nee verey kalalu teeralani korukuntuna ra. Most loyal ra nuvvu (entha mandiki anedi vere vishayam). Lastly, vellu oorike denguthaaru kaani nuvvu ammayi aithey pakka pelli chesukune vadini ra.

Gaali reyyy.. you are one of a kind raa.. 4 years nundi chustunna.. asalu exams mundhu nee antha chill gaa evarni chudale ra gaali. Neeku unnantha tamil malayalam drip inka evvariki undadhu ra gaali. Nuvvu adukune appudu padadam is the funniest raa 😂. Inka ekkuva cricket adalsindhi neetho but okayy.. hopefully naaku banglore lo fix aypothe manam box inka badminton kumeddam. Nuvvu inka chinna pillodive(elantivatillono neeku telsuga).. emanna doubts unte nen cheptha😅😂. Inka nee talent ki 🙏

Hey, I don’t clearly remember how we talked first time but it was on WhatsApp. From then, you were a really good friend of mine. You helped me out a lot during the DVD course. Mee Semiconductor knowledge ki pranaamam. I don’t what would happen to our team without your help. You helped me out with off campus applications and all too. Thank you for everything. Stay the same, helpful natured and talented. Hope you achieve great success in ur future!

orey jg one of the first friends ra ikkada nuvvu
nuvvu nannu ah first day adigina question eppatiki marchiponu ra 🤣
peak fun ra gaali reddy neetho, ECE legacy continue chese aura ra needi kasi na kodaka
nibba bros vellina sagam plans nee valle ra, unite chesav andarini
pakka neeku dorike ammayi ni puvvullo petti chuskuntav ra, amara premikudivi nuvvu
bangalore lo inka ekkuva aadam cricket and badminton
sare mari, selavu

Proper 90s material.....fake sambar drippp....konchem update avvu ra JG.....konni konni vishyalo tondara padi bokka avtadu iykyk (excuse me).....TI lo anna konchem jagrata ga undu ra rey iykyk....dark humor maatram confident ga wrong interpretation chesukuntadu.....food taxes maatram unlimited....eh insta reel chusina pakka nee like untadi ani easy ga guess cheyochu....mana nets and box sessions maatram proper vibe untadi....jasprit JG....but elago naa batting appudu dinda la estav :))

journal.answer: mid-March 2022, don't remember the exact date.

You were the go-to quiz mate and also the go-to person for convincing TAs about deadline extensions lol. Be in touch and all the best for everything ahead!

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: It was peak of COVID, so my first day on campus was very quiet than expected. Most of the people wore masks, and there weren't many chances to talk to others.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Most memorable instances in campus include every night cricket tournament we played, where we enjoyed a lot sledging opponent teams, those iconic celebrations of my teammates, and those funny misfields made by us together created a fun atmosphere.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: One thing I'll miss the most is those frequent net sessions with my batchmates and those banters where we pull each other's legs and also those intense overnight Call of Duty sessions in hostel including those intermediate fights where we throw things on each other as a result of frustration.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I was too introvert and maintained very less network in the initial sems, but gradually was able to open up and also improved my friends-circle becoming extrovert to some extent and also improving my sense of humor.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Roast VK*

name: Ashish Chokhani
tagline: Building Systems, Solving Challenges, Creating Impact

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: On my first day at campus, I was a bit nervous about what lay ahead. After settling my luggage in my room, I met Ishit, my quarantine roommate. We quickly became friends, sharing stories about our hometowns and discussing our first-semester SGPA.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: My best campus memories include going out for classes and mess, evening walks after dinner, dinner outings, movies, games, table tennis, cricket, kaabo, bluff cards, evening jogs, exam-night discussions, birthday bombs, and celebrating birthdays with friends.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: The thing I’ll miss the most is playing COD with friends, Amogha visiting my room at midnight to remind us “yesterday has become today,” fun debates with Nikunj over Haldiram vs Bikanerwala, teasing Pronoy and Pranav, and the friendship I built with Umang, Harsh, Manuj, and Ishit.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: When I joined college, I felt underconfident, unsure how I’d manage the next 4 years. I focused only on academics, but as time passed, I met amazing friends and talented people who inspired me. Slowly, I realized my true potential and learned the importance of working smart and hard. Now, I’m confident, ready to face any challenge, and I never underestimate myself.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Looking forward to life’s challenges, I aim to meet amazing people and make lasting friendships. I’ll stay connected with old friends and college, while aspiring for greater heights. Staying motivated and becoming a problem solver will be my focus for the future.

testimonials.text: Ashish bhai...one of the fewest persons to address me as VSS...in the initial sems our interactions were much confined to academics related (I used to come to your room during assignments only 😅) but over the sems we enjoyed a lot through COD sessions and obviously those cricket sessions on FG/amphi dais 😂....miss those random discussions in the 24X corridors....all the best for your future...apple mein dhoom machana

It was enjoying to visit mess with you all guys and amount of fun we had celebrating birthday parties can't be counted. You are one of my best friends on campus, keep contacting! Don't forget.

Yes, his web series were very dear to him and he could not imagine a day without watching his favourite web-series shows while munching his sweets and biscuits. His room would be the goto place for celebrating birthday parties, which made some of my best memories there. All the best for your future bro!

I ended up spending more time in your room than mine because of the great vibes we had. I’d love to get some of your playlists sometime! Will always cherish those COD games and TT times. Let’s stay in touch. All the best!!

Had some of the best moments playing COD with you and thanks for letting me on some tricks. Will always cherish those long discussions at night. One of the most focused, hard working, smart and interesting people I came across in college, hope to keep in touch.

Ashish bhai — my ECE buddy, my assignment saviour, and my exam-time warrior! Jitne projects, submissions aur last-minute jugaads kiye hain saath mein… sach bolun toh tu nahi hota, toh ECE mein graduate hona mushkil ho jata. Full-on practical banda with a heart of gold — values dosti more than anything. Safar itna smooth raha, suffer hone ka chance hi nahi mila — all thanks to you! Cheers to your future, bhai — tu jahan bhi jaaye, circuit tera apna ban jaata hai!

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Scammed my covid report to get into bakul nivas (regret it now). Met many friendly people. Was scared if I could make friends (sigh of relief...). One thing I learnt over the years is that no matter the place, if you be your true self, you will converge to your perfect friend group :)

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Our group of 6 friends came from DLF and so did a storm, lights went out, trees fell, no other living soul in sight, paranormal activities, iykyk...

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Biriyani (the food + the experience). Period.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Started cursing (non-negotiable given the friend group)

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Will be in touch.

But tu hain bada sweet pookie. Dil ka saaf. Dinbhar hasta hua, khudki khushi dundta hua, bhatakta rehta hain ek room se dusre room. Tu kabhi bura nahi maanta hain, hamesha smiling, chilling and relaxing. KL Rahul paglu.
Ab toh tere flat pe hi party karenge harr rozz.And ab tere paani ki bottle khaali karunga main .... aur bharunga bhi nahi :)

Best co-black bro. Bhagwan kare tumhe jeevan mein achhi advice mile😂😂. Most experienced interviews giver. Sabka neta aur CLC head. Milte rehna vinkesh bhai. Finally tum gaon se nikalkar ek shahr mein bas gye ho vahan enjoy karo.

Bahut maza aaya TT khelne me, baate karne me. Will miss you bhai.
All the best for life, and keep in touch.
Top 3 roommates ive ever had🗣️
Nice 🐣...
very bad person. manipulated people
Simpesh bhaiiii. Epic character from barnala. Will miss you bhai. Keep up the joly nature

Will miss the ice cream walks a lottt. Vinkesh u r such an amazing or extrovert person , dsac m games khelna , those walks or ece rants will be missed a lot. Or haan sbse main kbhi bhoolna mat vesse to mai yaad karati hi rhungi call krke 😜. All the best for ur future.
Arya, stay super brainy as always and keep dancing !

Aakash co-captaincy was a fun time. Well apart from that, always have admired your work ethic and how you always prioritize your career first no matter what. Will continue to remember how you used to grind codeforces in every course whenever you got time.
Super inspirational my guy

Hii fellow Googler,

Tujhse toh milna hi hai Google mein 😎, but chalo college ke liye bhi kuch likh deti hoon!

I loved the time we spent together — bhai tu mast hai! I love the energy you bring, always saying yes to plans, so carefree and full-on fun, ek dum mast.

Looking forward to more fun moments in BLR. Stay the same Aryaaa!

— Prisha 💛

Arya!! Akash Captain!! Same branch, same house, same lab—basically twinning in every possible way. You've been such a chill and smart presence around, and it’s been great having someone with so much in common. Akash to ECE to SERC, it’s been quite the ride! Wishing you all the luck and happiness ahead!

Arya- my Aakash co-captain! Had such a great time managing the house with you — definitely one of the highlights of my time here. You’re super fun to talk to and always brought good energy. Let’s definitely catch up in Bangalore soon — looking forward to it! 💙

AAKASH HOUSE CAPTAIN.. We haven't interacted much, but the little we did, you seem to be a cool guy, you and vansh are incredibly funny people and everytime I got a chance to talk to you guys, it was always filled with laughter. Always keep smiling and all the best for your future

Arya Bhaiii you are on of my first and best friends on campus. I enjoyed teasing you with the name of Ananya in early semesters 😂.

You encouraged me to read books which proved to be a lot lot helpful. We had a great time playing badminton doubles in team and defeating Vansh. 
The last days we spent in your room watching videos was a lot of fun although you were little hesitant doing so 😂. 
My only reason to visit Banglore in future will be to meet you. "Baat krte rehna!"

Game night master, monkey-est harkatein, full of childish fun yet always the one who seeks to have a good deep talk with everybody. I can't count the number of times I rant about lab work to you! Always the patient listener, a great friend, and such a good poet and dancer and sportsperson and so much more. Can't wait to see you in Bangalore!

Arya, man you are really one of the most chill guy i have ever meet ekdam chill. Thats one of things i really learned from you. You are random and fun, i will really miss that. But lucky me i will get more of this in coming fall and forward. And your smile, (Not gay XD) but dont loose it, you look more cool with that. 

ps: we will be the desi boys in banglore!!!

Hey Arya, my best friend, an amazing shaayar/kavi and the most empathetic, disciplined and hardworking guy I ever met. You have made my college life so much more beautiful and happy. I love being your chudail and bossing over you for fun.You have brought many improvements in me. Your capability to understand people as well as take criticism and work upon it is truly commendable. Keep bringing smiles to everyone like you always do. Hope you have a great career and a bright and happy future. ATB!!

Hi brother,
Love your attitude to life and everything in it. Don't change man! Keep dancing doing what you love. Take care and stay in touch :)

The first friend of mine in college. I would never forget those fun days spent with you. You are such a fun loving person. Always participate in call the events and got brilliance everywhere. I have rarely seen multitalented personality like you.

name: Anushka Agrawal
tagline: i come back stronger than a 90s trend

testimonials.text: Anushka I've always been in love with your hair. You are super cute and smart, and I'm sure you'll do amazing things!

i had absolutely no idea who you were, just heard from others that you're exceptionally smart. then i got to know you during our dsa taship and somehow we got close since then. you're an amazing person and a great, helpful friend. i absolutely love our long late-night hangouts, shitting on your music tastes, and i must admit you're getting better at fifa too. stay in touch and make sure you keep coming campus from time to time. keep killing it everywhere, ik you will. will miss you loads :))

Hiii Anushka,
Bhai, you are just so sweet, caring, and cute — like someone I can totally rely on. You’re honestly one of the most helpful and genuinely best listener.
Tera chilana aaaa  is something I’ll always remember XD. I love the intelligent girl you are — seriously, I respect that a lot. Always stay the same hardworking yet carefree girly girl you are! 
Taylor Swift for the final touch.
 really loved the time we spent together — you’re mast and kaafi fun!
Bangalore mein milte rahengeee

*1 dB nuski voice* we haven't spent a lot of time in the early years, but I can still say that jo bhi thodu sa time we have spent together was one of the best days I had. *normal voice* You have been an elder sister to me when I was being a stupid kid. Thank you for all the help, support and *1 dB awaaz* love you have given. I'll miss doing AAAAAAA with you fellow chipkali killer. All the monopoly, dumb charades, contact, walks, late night talks are a special memory. Missing you already <3

Smartest girl of our gang and the sweetest too! My fellow Swiftie — watching the Eras Tour movie with you was soo fun . You’re super introverted, but once you’re a little tipsy, you're so much fun to talk to 😂 You’re always helpful, understanding, and just really easy to be around. Stay exactly the way you are — see you soon, and until then, keep shining and having fun! 💖

Nuska, we've grown really close in the past one year. I never imagined us having such deep talks like we did in last 2 semesters. My placement support system, chhipkali fearing partner.. I've been happy, sad, angry, vulnerable - everything in front of you. Thanks for caring for me always, stay the cute, beautiful and genuine soul that you are. Life was really good with you as my next door neighbour <3. Keep shining wherever you go!
hello , tera bina graduate too nhi hota main aur bohut log  , bohut pareshan kiya hai mene notes mang ke par thanku for everything :)

From sharing a floor to a room,we’ve come a long way.You’re the most caring person.I’d have missed many flights without you.You waited after meals,counted my Tikki bites😂,and sugg songs (most Eng ones I listen are your recs)and movies.I loved scaring you (so easy 😂) and clicking your weird pics (have hundreds).You stood by me during my lows.I regret those 15 days , really sorry.Waiting for the day you’ll just wear clothes made by you😂 our crochet queen.I’ll miss you.Thanks for everything❤️

There were too many ups & downs but I wish it wasn't this way. You hold a v special place in my life and i couldn't have asked for a better friend. Thank u for having my back... I wish we had a lil more time and memories! All the best- ik tu slay hi karegi kyuki tu 'anushka' hai- kohlipaglu or taylorpaglu!?! Hehe. 
Let's meet soon!

Youre really smart and really pretty and even though we dont hang out a lot, the times where we have were really fun. The swiftie night, playing badminton, and even doing econ project are memories that i will remember. I have faith that one of the artists that we like will finally come to india and we'll get to fight for tickets so we can go see them. Youre going to kill it in your new job. All the best!

Hey! I will really miss living scross from you ! It was wonderful to have you as a neighbour - you are so so amazing , supportive, fun, and also thodha ajeeb(the good kind dw) , I will miss how you could talk logically and make me feel better when i was feeling low (and i lowkey also wanted to see if you can wake up at 8-9 everyday lol ) I really hope you get all that you wish from in life - maybe even see a TS concert live one day. Teri bahut yaad aaegi bhai . Love you so so much !
XOXOXOXOXOXO

Anushkaa, my Taylor swiftie Gracie Abhrams best buddy... Every single moment jamming our favourite songs, singing along discussing album is something I will never forget. You are easily one of the smartest people I know, keep shining beauty. Felicity, All the Birthdays, The JC days, SLN were unforgettable because of you..

Keep slaying..
Love,
Poorvi

you’ve always been one of the purest,most generous people I’ve known—always full of love & care to give.i still have that sticky note u gave me while I was heading home after 1-2 ;it reminds me of a bond that meant a lot.from our endless virat + ts reel spams to screaming songs & being absolute chaos together—those days were the best.you’re so passionate about everything u do,and i’m so happy for everything you’ve achieved.we drifted,but i truly hope we find our way back. proud of u,always💖
Hey Anushka, it was amazing to work alongside you for the BTP. You're a really hardworking and passionate person. I hope you achieve all your goals! All the Best!

Thank you for carrying me in SMAI and the DSA TAship. You were a great teammate and someone I could always rely on. It was nice to have a familiar face during the internship as well. Of course I will never admit defeat in our debates over swift, I think once you listen to real music you will change your mind. I wish you luck for whats next and hope you start working on your music taste :-)

Hii Anushka! I know we only started interacting much later in college, but it has been very fun and enjoyable with you! You are too sweet to me honestly (irl at least, on the phone it is different lmao). You are a great and hardworking individual. It is truly awesome!
I wish you all the best in whatever you do in life and hope that we meet again. Who knows, maybe we run into each other in a bar. Then it will be funny :p
PS: I did get your stickers. Manipulated you and arghya haha :evil smile:

Hey Anushka, my first roommate and also one of my first online friends. ECE became little more bearable with you. Will miss all our projects and meets, discussions and ECE RR's together. You are truly one of the most hardworking and intellectually talented people I've seen. Hope you achieve all the you deserve and desire. All the best for all your future endeavours.

One of the most soft-spoken and intelligent people I know. I love the way you thrive for excellence. Loved having you around. I hope you achieve great heights in life! Also, literally the cutest drunk person! 😂

Keep in touch, byee!

testimonials.text:
Hi ra Surya, you are such a bubbly and sweet guy. Playing cricket in college and going out after winning is a special memory for me thanks to you. I like your confidence and how you are as a person. It is so fun to hangout and chill with you. We had so many good times together.
Please somehow take me to vizag one day sir, and till then stay the same entertaining and chill guy you are.

My Krishna from Krishna and his leela! I wish mee ladies ki Telugu vachi aa cinema choostadhi ani hehe. My cricket captain, but just so that you know, I have a higher win percentage and was the only person who broke your winning streak. Just imagine a college team and a batch team without me ra, i know you just can't imagine it. hehe. Please be better planned, dont give 500 commitments at one time, Swiggy lo 50 rupee orders aapu inka, baane sampadistunnav, food and life ni enjoy cheyyi mows!

hello captain 🫡 it's been super fun playing cricket with you throughout our 4 years together be it for aakash, the college team or our batch team (especially). you've been such a good captain honestly and one of the best players i've played with. i've loved talked to you mid games or anytime we meet, you are super funny and so fun to hangout with!! my only regret is not talking to you enough but i really hope we can change that in bangalore. thank you for the kisses you gave me 😭

My dearest bhai—one of the most honest and funniest people I know. Every conversation with him has been a highlight, always full of laughter and depth. Evolved into an ML God in the later years, working tirelessly on his research, yet still a true all-rounder. His sarcasm and body language are unmatched—easily my favorites. Wishing him nothing but the very best in everything ahead.
OH CAPTAIN! MY CAPTAIN!
forever captain...winning 3 back-2-back inter batches was really fun along with the story revealing pizza zone sessions

Asal maatal toh impress chese skill undi choodu mastu taakuva mandiki untadi adi... Eedanna batukutav NUV antha talent undi Neku... Nuv nelaki maatlade 5 mins kooda mastu njoy chesna ra nen.... I will miss those days... Nd not to forget nee cricket ki pedda fan nen... Autograph istara?...  Nuv akka akka ani naak sunnithanga naa tappulu oppulu cheptav choodu I love it honestly... farewell roju nuv cheppinavi inka gurtunnayi naak.all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need

Unironically found a whole new friend group because of your lauda actions, very grateful for that. Didnt get to spend as much time as I wouldve liked with you (completely a busy man) but whenever we did hangout, it was very fun. Always give us the most entertaining stories. Will miss those IPL dinners very much. Bangalore lo nee intlo unta 👍🏻❤️. Still traumatized by LPDE class and your spontaneous kisses. 😂 Thank you for letting me play crickettt, captain.

surya, best sports sec!! got us to host our first tournament ever. so glad we got close, loved sharing stories with you and just gossiping randomly while watching sports. it's safe to say that i did not know your game. true pulihora raja. thnx for being part of my college experience. keep in touch

Would give anything to play under your captaincy just one more time... or even bowl a spell with you. The way you managed to maintain team unity so effortlessly both on and off the field... truly awesome... your support was one of the main reasons i was able to perform however well i performed.... i love you so much, and thanks for the nickname ;)... keep in touch ra cutie :)

rey mood swings, okka line lo cheppali ante thop ra nuvvu. U can achieve anything u want to acheive ra.Just fix aithey chaalu.anything ante anything ey only academic kaadu.Most positive person I have met in my life ra.Seriously inspiring!! Akka ochaka mood swings baaga thaggipoyayi le oppukuntuna finally.Exam mundu mana kandipappu matram peaks ra,bakul ante first gurthoche moments ave. Lastly,clg lo nuvvu anubha vinchali anukuntunavi anni neeku dakkali ani korukuntuna & Pakka top clg lo MS fix!!

Cutest person i know ra asala. Last few sems occhi mee room lo undipodam is one of my college highlights ra. Be it box cricket or basketball, it was always fun to play with you ra. Let's stay in touch ra. Love you <3

My first friend here. I will always be grateful to you for CPRO. nuv lekapothe pakka fail. nuv online sem lo kalavakapoyunte I may not be the part of nibba bros or may be even telugu peeps (i cannot imagine how my life would be without nibba bros). I have learnt how to manage things, works and people mainly during our SPC tenure and adi naaku chaala avasara padindii and padutundii future lo. Bengaluru me janda pathenge. Nuv US ki vellaka neetho nenu chaala things teppistaanu, munde cheptunna.

Bathaiiiiii. Can't imagine my college without you. Asalu prathidaaniki nee daggara solution ela untadho naaku ardam kaadu. Ayina i wont stop calling you wherever you go and whomsoever you may be with. One request... nuvvu cream stone tinadam aapa ra please.. tini tini pothav raa. Also naaku steel plant chupistha annav.. still waiting for that. Kalusthu undham.. my life wont be the same without you as my roomie.(First roju nuv ankuntunnattu edavale ra nenu, anni fake news spread chesthav :cry:)

The best cricket captain and player I have played with, and an even better friend😊. I remember watching you bat for the first in an Aakash game and being just blown away. Never would have imagined the memories we would make together after that, from being destroyed in that first match against UG-4 to winning that last tournament. And even off the field, you were an amazing person and a dear friend😊.  You will always be "captain" for me. I love you man❤️, all the best, and stay in touch!

I admire you a lot ra, the way you talk to people, the way you boost people's emotions by your words. Your people skills top notch asalu.
Thank you, thank you so much for giving me one of the most important person in my life. And thank you so much for your effort in it. I hope nee dreams regarding MS, Research, Personal life everything should happen seamless ga. If i think about you, smh only one visual pops in my head, you in those stupid black goggles. All the very best surya!!

i had a lot of fun being deputy sports sec with you :) sports council was more entertaining because of you hehe, in both the years. wont ever forget teasing u in front of her when you would get all shy lmaoo. i wish the best for you <3 have fun!

Proud RCB-VK* fan and secret Lord Sanath fan....one of the fewest facebook uncles still not using insta and X ever known....cricinfo-cricbuzz stats discussions chala OG feels vasthayi.....anytime DADA, Sir Strauss are always better than VK*(stat-padder) in any format...last minute hand iyyadam nee speciality.....blr lo aina kalustu undu bhAAi hand iyyakunda

Arey I miss you the most ra. Literally em unna be it happy sad anything mee room door ala open chesta. Every day most random discussions pettevallam and literally chala enjoy chesam. Not to mention all the serious discussions we had and all the honest advices you gave. Pakka inko trip eddham. And pakka eesari party istha

Surya bhai nenu nibbas bros lo join ayyela chesindi nuvve. Nee nunchi chala nerchukovacchu ela plan cheskovali ela important vishayalu matrame focus cheyali ani. Nee transformation ki nee matlade skills ki salaam ra. Nv manchi positive vibe gadivi ekkadiki poina manchi vibe create chesthav. Future lo eppudu ayna advice kavali ante nee daggarike vastha istav ani.
MS ki poyaka marchipoku banglore lone sacchipoku hyderabad ki vasthu undu appudappudu vacchina clg ke kakunda maa daggariki raa koncham

Ayy cutie! Our legendary cricket team captain! Always cheerful and fun to talk to. Kaastha roju night batting ey kaakunda inkemaina chey ra! Anyways one of the best sports person I have seen, and epppudu any help kaavalanna you were there for us. Andaritho kalisi melisipotaav. Ilaage recchipo ra! All the best!

Neetho antha time spend cheyyaledhu bhai, feeling bad for that. But spend chesina koddhi time in bangalore and during batch trip was great.
Bangalore lo kacchitanga kalusukundam :) and lets enjoy.

Wishing a great future.
ur welcome lol 😅

Akka ani pilichina time ni miss avtuna ra. Neetho kalise di takkuva ayyina kalisina prati sare chala close anna feeling create chestav. Manam kalisi ala liberty ki vellina times ni chala miss avtanu. Appudu appudu kodiga unna ani gurthu pettuko. All the best ra.

Surya, You were the first friend I made in college online, of course. I still remember our first chats. Then I came to campus… and boom! You got too busy being the college casanova with your never-ending list of GFs 😂 Still laugh thinking about your fresher’s dance with koundiny lol 😂 But still, a sweet soul at heart. No matter how little we talked, I always wished you well. So, ippudaina matladu ra! Don’t forget your OG friend. All the best for everything ahead!

Arey naaku inka gurthundhi ra, first time maa room ki vachav, ninnu chusthe raamudu manchi baaludu type untavu anukunna, kani rasikudivi ani tharuvatha thielisindhi ;), ninnu chuse, I felt confident to go up and talk to random people ra. Your compliments, played a huge part in me consistently going to the gym ;), neetho matladthe unde stress antha pogadathav ra You comfort people easily ra, please keep doing that. Love you ra mawwss, call cheyyi and campus ki vasthu undu, nenu ikkade sastha.

Bhai nee gurinchi first vere image undedi... slowly vo galat hai ani telindi. you are the most loveable being ra...playboi until u met the right girl. happy for you man. will miss our late night discussions. placements tym lo chaala help chessavv. US lo settle ayeka marchipoku ra. bangalore lo mazze karenge ;) .

Telugollu andaru jinx sentiment enduku follow avutaaro teliyaali ante mundu maa Telidevara katha vinaali. Evadra 3V..nuvvu ra maatala maantrikudivi. Very honestly cheptunna..one of your biggest strengths ra adhi. Telugollaki dorikina goat captain ra nuvvu. Cutie nuvvaithe andarini antaavu kadha ra😔😭Akka mundu maa meedha chupinche PDA tho jaagratta😳Last Dec lo nuvvu cheppadam valle oka major issue solve ayyindi bhai. Inka chalane maatladukunnamu deep ga. Your effort will be worth it ra dw ❤️🥰
The glue of the Casual Strikers, and a great, helpful human. Wish I was there to play turf with y'all before leaving to say a proper goodbye and wish you all the best in person. 😄

Mayank, you are one of the sweetest persons that I know. The way you greet me everytime we cross each other shows the love and respect you have for me, I really enjoyed talking to you regarding your trips and vacations. Trust me, you gave very good insights regarding jaipur and rajasthan. Keep playing football and do support indian cricket team as well. Loads of love...💗💗
Sweet, Caring and Funny

Bhai itna masti jo hua hai ever since we were neighbours on 2nd floor and then became neighbours on 5th floor too. You were one of the first people I ever met on campus and you are super fun to talk to. Mast reh, do well, see you soon again:)
Truly one of a kind cringer. 6ft 100kg and possessing absolute 0 aura. Mayank the type of guy who will browse code-forces while taking a shit.

Hello Mayank bhai, yaad hai na wo yoga ke baad wala aamras, bhai kya mst din the wo. Hmara sath me badminton khelna reh gya pr aage pakka se chalenge. BC krte hue chai pr charcha aur khulkr apne vichar prakat krna - yahi hmara tareeka tha ek doosre ke sath samay bitane ka. Bhai sweet smile hai teri, ense hi hansmukh bane rehna, aur hn football jarur continue rkhna. Abhi ke liye itna hi, milte hai jald hi phir, chai ke sath baki batein poori krenge - Keep smiling :)
Was fun working together during the EW project (even though we did not get the best prof lol). Wish you the best for the future!!

What a great f-cking friend. No one pushed me harder to work than this mf (but whoever listens to him!). If only he could stop being cringe (i don't think him & being cringe are even seperable at this point). Very easy to talk to about emotional stuff (has great emotional depth!). Found a great friend for life!

Mayank bhai, hamara dosti second sem aur second floor me start hua tha. Aur cave ka safar toh badiya tha. You are a chill and humorous guy. It was great time playing football, pool and tt alongside you. Jogging bhi kiya tha saath me. Let’s stay in touch. All the best!!

Mayank was the first guy that I made friends with in this college and we have been friends ever since. Man has decent football skills, decent height, is decent looking but still no bitches (surely something to do with his humor). One of the few guys with whom I could share a joke just by a glance. Man is hardworking and true to face. Late for everything, will never answer a call or open room door. cp-best and recently trying very hard to get bitches. All the best for life bruv.

name: Siddhi Agarwal
tagline: Probably thinking about food or absolutely nothing

testimonials.text: Hello cutie.. you are the one and only best friend I had in this college. Had lots of fun with you.. I love your companion a lot... I wish you get whatever you want in your life.. Let's keep this beautiful relationship lifelong :) Thank you for being with me

never thought we'd end up being this close & here v are.u were there for my highs and lows & I could tell u things knowing I won't be judged.vo ws me baithke batein,roz ek mess/canteen jane ke liye ek durse ko manana,u making me a monopoly addict, bargaining w u in goa, and ofc thalassa-I lived my best moments w u.u  have such a pure heart not many ppl know of & I'm so grateful to know u this close.I wish u all things great in life and ik u're going to do so good.can't wait fr more trips w u🥹💖

Siddhi!! Kya hi bolu yaar tere baare mai , thanks for always being there yaar, my go to person to rant about how shitty things are going and then you explaning ki ho jayega sab and me still messing things up. Thank you so much for never giving up on our friendship , even after so many ups and downs , you were always there to listen , to understand.
You always made sure to ask if i am doing okay and making sure i have a friend who i can talk to anytime.
Always stay happy.
Apni ek party baaki hai!

Artsoc- is where it all started. Arguing w nancy, managing events, ranting in 401/5, rameshwaram, chilli potato and our endless food recommendation thread on chat. Ik I should contact lord siddhi for good recos in food. Bhyi itni bt hui hai humare saath, life was literally a disco party at one pt but we danced throughout (chahe hi rote rote). Ty for being there for me and ilysm!! Let's meet soon! And recreate monopoly trio.

Cee Dee, you're such a nice and caring friend. Had a lot of fun with you during intern, subah saath me office jana and college me biometric kabhi nahi lagana xD Thank you for making such sundar drawings during face painting. Will miss all the gossip sessions in your room while eating cheese khakhra. Monopoly sikhane ke liye thanks, bahot zyada kheli uske baad like insane xD. Stay as beautiful, genuine and supportive as you are. Aise hi bolti raha kar 😌

Siddhi madam, happy face, little worried aur always motivating. Thank you for that 'Motimahal Party', abhi meri bachi hui hai party - yaad rakhna sath chalenge.
The moments we spent, I enjoyed every of them, whether it was party or course ranting sessions. 
Ense hi hansmukh bani rehna jaisi teri abhi personality hai.

name: Arpit Pathak
tagline: Ek ek chai aur ho jaye?

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: I arrived on campus in Dec 2021, during COVID, and was quarantined in Parijat. Worried about language barriers, I felt at ease after meeting a staff member from Madhya Pradesh. That moment gave me comfort, and soon I connected with amazing people to begin my college journey.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Cricket, a long-lost hobby, revived with night matches and became a daily joy by final year. I remember the fun fights, unexpected players joining in, and the grand finale on a full ground—complete with a light-hearted prize distribution. Pure college magic!

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: The late-night ‘chai pe charcha’—be it 12 AM deadline rants at JC or 2 AM chai orders—was therapy. From sharing assignment pain to random deep talks, JC became our constant. Birthday celebrations, quick meetups, Raj Anna’s chai, and of course, the legendary Oreo shake—unforgettable.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer:
I’d say two big things changed. First, I started stepping out of my comfort zone—interacting more with people and exploring skills beyond just coding and academics. It really helped me grow in ways I didn’t expect.
Second… I tried to become more serious about studying. Keyword: tried. Let’s just say the effort was there, even if the results took a different path!

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Honestly, I don’t know exactly what life has in store. I’m starting with a job—something stable to build a secure foundation. But beyond that? It’s uncertain. I don’t know if I’ll chase the passions I’ve always dreamed about or take an unexpected turn somewhere along the way. All I know is, I want to stay open to possibilities and see where life leads me.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I used to be a shy kid with a lot of stage fear.Eventually I started opening up to people started to dance sing tried to join in clubs entertain people understood how to talk to people and how things work. Overall I guarantee that my first year self would be proud of me now.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: I have this random thought of making a video of campus in a horrific way. Since I would be in hyderabad I need to do that at some time and I don't want to end up being in a rat race and scratch my face for full time with tension so I need to learn new skills and focus on fitness.

testimonials.text: Table Tennis pro with a magical voice—truly a rare combo. Incredibly honest, kind-hearted, and always a joy to be around. I really hope we get to hang out often in Hyderabad and keep the good times going!

Broooo, The official bro of the batch, chaalaa mature and sweet person, Naaku table tennis nerpinchaav,  best teacher and who can forget about your singing skills! Elaa bro intha multitalented nuvvu, All the best nee future ki and hope you achieve all your dreams

Broo, nuvvu thop bro, joke ga kadu, badminton tt cricket cod, anni adesthav and thop adathav, nitho ivanni adetappudu chala fun ochindhi. Mainly nilo oka teacher untadu, evarikina doubt vasthe ventane chepthav studies lo ne kadu, naku dance lo konni steps cheppadam, tt nerpinchadam ivanni chala baaga explain chesthav and eppudu thakkuva cheyyale evarni. ground to earth untav. baaga chadhuvthav, full package bro nuvvu. I miss spending time with you and playing sports with you. <3

One of the first friends at college whom I admired from the start. Helped a lot in the whole online semester :)

One whom I looked upon in my entire college life in terms of work ethic and many things. Simple, humble, yet a well-wisher, one should always wish to have in their life.

Will definitely try to be in touch as both of us are in Hyderabad. I hope to see you grow so much more, because your success feels personal :)

Definitely neetho unna time matram pakka enjoy chesanu BRO nenu. Maybe we should have been more closer anipistundhi ippudu alochisthunte.
Ee 4 years lo okka saari kuda nee maggi taste cheyyaledhu 😭, inka malli taste cheyyataniki chance kuda raadhu.

Wishing a great future.

We had such a blast in wonderla had a lot of fun and the felicity buzz lo our crooked chethabadi idea crazy moments asal intha psych vishyaluu endukk telusuu bro neeku😂  but Every moment was chaos but too much fun. 
Anyway, Hyd ae kada manam kalusthu undaam and appud appud mana slang lo maatladtu, leda unna slang antha mottam maripoyela unna 😅. Hoping we get to relive that fun chaos again, just like the Mr. Perfect vibe!
And all the very best for the next chapter in your journey....

Broo.. unintentionally funny ra nuvvu. But seriously there is no only bois without you ra broo. Chal sarlu chala things lo help chesavu and we had many memorable things together. Miss avutha ninnu. Hyderabad lo mee pg vethukoni vasta

Gym Freak ante nuvvu ra! Self-development kosam neekunnantha dedication evariki choodale, hats-off ra 🙇‍♂️! Aa development lo konchem nee cat expression ni kuda maarcha ra, please 🙏!! Nee psycho thanam undaali le, thop ideas untaayi ra ayya, papers esi cockroach ni kaalchadam, goda meeda sanitiser esi fire tho designs eyyadam, intlo ememi chesthuntaav ra free time lo 😂. Kaani, the best singer ra nuvvu. Hyd ae ga, kacheri program pettukundaam.

Neetho kalisi open gym lo spend chesina time ni miss avtuna ra chala. Ala abhishek nuvvu nenu open gym lo random ga matladukuna maatalu ala kalisi dlf ki vellina moments ni chala miss avtanu. Nee food pics kosam waiting. Nibba bros ninnu enta roast chesina chala positive ga teeskuntav. Full kassi pro max, inka exams oste assala kanipinchav. Will miss you. All the best for your future.

you're one of a kind raa.. exams mundu nuvvu chadivinantha, chesinanni problems evaru cheyyaleru
nuvvu chaala deep person ra, loopala chaala thoughts and ambitions untaayi kaani bayataki cheppavu, but naa room ki vachi appudappudu chepthav chudu..bale anipistundi, chaala nerchukunna ra.. chaala depth undi neelo
The transformation you've undergone over the last 2 sems is truly thop ra.. not only gymming wise but overall ga mentally and physically oka super strong character ayyav, all the best raa

reyy nee lanti roommate ni miss ayite ra... nee dedication deni mida ayina peaks assala. asal 2-2 lo nee kassi peaks. gym kassi gaani, exams dedication gaani, projects submission gaani. magic nerchkunna wizar ra nuvvu. inkemundi dont let the singer die, nee self development journey gurinchi update istu undu iykyk. and also cooking chestu undu hyd vachinapdu thindaniki pakka vasta . will miss our bitching sessions. taker care, em taggaku ilaane kumeyyii qualcomm lo kudaa.

Most dedicated person I have ever seen. naku thelsi manishiki enni talents undacho avi anni cover chesesavu.. studies, sports, cooking, photography, singing.. inkemanna marchipoyi unte kshaminchey. Ela saar intha talented meeru. Thank you for all the table tennis lessons. Qualcomm lo kuda nee kalalanni pradharsinchi ala edhuguthu undalani korukuntunna. 
All the best for every thing in your future.

Bro ante multifaceted. He is a singer, academician, chef and a dancer. He is one of the legendary Ece students along with Vss Pradhith and Jalluri. Nibba bros lo most organised ga brathikedhi nuvve bro, nee lifestyle chusthe bhale kick vasthundhi asalu. Vocals by bro ante adhi inko levelu, whata voice bro needhi.. easily you are the paatala maanthrikudu of telugu peeps. Mana box sessions lo nee cricketing potential baitiki theesi mesmerize chesav. That's why you are the GOAT bro.

Inka gurtundi quarantine lo Andaram movie choostunte nuvvukodive mask petkoni ala silent ga unnav. Keeping aside all those one of the most hard working person I have seen.Nuvve lekunte enno assignments inka projects ayyindevi kademo.Evvaru nannu emanna tirigi em cheyakapovachu, kaani nuvvu em chesina edokati pakka ga cheyali anipistadi enduko.Banglore ki vastu undu Kalisi enjoy cheddam

Muggulu brooooo, ninnu chusina prathi saari naaku mana, goa trip ee gurthu vasthadhi ra, nuvvu nenu same shirt esam, gurthundha? I would kill to go back to that trip ra. Neeku unna consistency and grit, nenu evarilonu chudaledhu ra, nuv enni gym reels ki like kodathavo avvanni naake vasthayi ra. Nuv cat thagginchu, ammayilu eegalala nee chuttu thirugutharu. Enthaina, manam manam, hyderabad, kadha ra, we'll enjoy ra! Konni treks aiythe pakka plan cheyyali manam, call chesthundu, we'll go out ra.

😒🙄🤥🫥😑 Brooo..Entha baaga paadataavo bro asalu nuvvu. Nee vanta gurinchi chala hype vinna kaani eppudu tinadam avvaledu sadly. Gym grind gurinchi pakka maatlaadukovaali..Insane consistency🙏🙏Internship lo networking kosam nee advice ey follow aipotunna. Ikkade untaavu ga time kudirithe kalustu undu pls ❤️❤️

Blooo, too much fun bro neetho unte, our short singing stints, that broken guitar in your room, our face masks for farewell and manyy! One of the most dedicated and sincere person I have ever seen, and thanks for never giving me anything you cooked and giving food more to Parijat than me. Keep “loving” me (so that I also end up in Microsoft lol 😜 ) 
I will keep coming to your room from now, vandivettali!

Vishnu broo, ela bro intha diet control. Nenu entha anukunna na valla kavatle. Gym elago na valla avvadu kaani, manam tt aadukundam bro.
Eppatikaina nenu pro avta  🔥

BROOOO!!
Ne dedication vere level asala, chinchestav courses ani. Chaala baaga padtav, literally the NIGHTINGALE of telugu peeps. I still remember your "singles anthem" for prithvi octave night. We should definitely go to karaoke nights and jam together. You are a very fun person to talk with. Lets keep meeting frequently and all the best for Qualcomm !!

I really like how you sing, it was always a joy playing for you. Love your hard work and focus towards your career. You're approachable and super friendly, had fun talking to you. Let's keep in touch, and all the best for everything ahead!

Eyyy Vishnu, to be honest, you were the first person on campus I met who gave very valuable insights on Internships and how I need to hurry up and stay prepared. Very clean heart simple smiling guy, thanks for all the insights. The random Hello Hi and our random talks updating each other's work, were fun ra. Wishing you the most and more Vishnu :)

Vishnu bhai, hamare electronics expert. Aapke bina electronics courses ka haal bura hota 😅. Aapke wajah se laga ki electronics itna boring nahi, interesting bhi ho sakta hai. Stay the same, and all the best! 
Bas aise hi muskurate rehna 😊. Wishing you all the very best for the future

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Well, the first day on campus was a bit chaotic. Came to Hyderabad with my father, the utter crowd at the Secunderabad, and then the sudden transition in the views from Old Hyderabad to Gachibowli kept me in awe. It gave a glimpse of what kind of world I was entering.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: There is not one but many campus memories. The catch-up with the friends at 12'o o'clock, the sudden dance at Arpit's room, playing cards, watching a cricket match in the SPCRC rooms, there are so many. Getting placed is one of the core memories, but the casual moments stand out.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: The chit chat with "Dubey Dilwale" at the end of the day at Raj bhaiya's shop.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Acceptance. I have learnt to accept things without attaching much emotion to them. Many failures and setbacks forced this learning but it was worth the pain and the journey

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Will be joining HDW as a Data Scientist. I haven't planned much ahead as of now in terms of my career. But excited and nervous about what lies ahead. Looking forward to exploring various topics and corporate life.  Let's see what lies ahead.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: One of my favorite memories is to always go to JC/Davids late at night with my friends or just all the time we spent in CVIT, whether it be doing work, celebrating birthdays, or playing mafia or cricket with my friends in the lab itself :P.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: One thing I will miss the most are all my close friends who are graduating but most especially my extended CVIT gang. It really feels like my whole college started after I joined CVIT and I got close to all the amazing people at CVIT.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Just plan on doing some good research work and publish to good places.

wish you all the best in life, and in research!

I will miss all the fun times we had together, talking about random things, working on projects together, etc, etc. Thanks for always being there for me.

Extreeemly dedicated to work, but will always take out time for friends (and his coffee😀). Hopefully those 1000 arguments on lipreading will pay off one day, cuz all those websites we made for Jawahar sir are toh completely useless. Gonna miss running for Davids ki maggie at 4AM, and all the all-nighters we spent working, which we somehow called "productivity".

Before joining college I always wanted to get friends who can be nerd-sniped and with who I can spend hours discussing technical details. And it was really great to find you and all our other common friends. How can I forget our first offline meet, our discussion spiraled into a great conversation on group theory! If thought deeply, I feel we were becoming much better friends in last 2 years, after our friends groups completely merged. I am sure your sleepless nights will pay off

my cvit pookie <3.

sweetest, most hardworking and the smartest in one person. i respect and admire you a lot. humesha aese hi khush rehna aur phodte rehna :D
