journal.answer: Jaha zindagi le jaye

testimonials.text: Initially Chinmay looked like khados popular guy, but he is a very sweet guy. Man has taught me a lot including about myself, because I think we are similar in many ways. I give him a lot of props for tolerating me.

Pateria! Hamara gyan babu! Continue to be a smart ass but not bitchless please xD. You're a really fun guy and you'll always be my fellow Apex culprit(voh party bhi pending lol). Tere saath hamesha random but memorable adventures ho jaate hain, stay vaisa hi interesting and fun!

CHINMAY BHAIIII. I love your relentless support for my always and how you have always had my back. You're the one guy I know I could count on and won't snitch on me. From meeting each other over a game (Control) during quarantine to practically roomates on Bakul 3rd floor, there are infinite memories that I shared with you mere bhai.
Will always admire you for your truthfulness and resilience.

Chinmay bhai is always stuck in some "important matter" aur bhai somehow ham do masoom log mostly sang mein phas hi jaate hain but fortunately bach bhi jaate hain. The best source for all the college gossip. Can freely discuss anything with chinmay bhai. Will always remember DLF visits and the long discussions on the way.

Chinmayyy!!! terko itna miss krungi yrr, tere saare rakhi ke gifts vasoolne reh gye XD. Will send you rakhis har saal fosho. Dhyaan rkhna apna, you're too good of a hooman to engage in idhar udhar ki faaltu BT. Literally so proud of youuuu.
Milte rhenge to keep in touch in touch nhi bolungi, work hard and rock everything :hugs:.
certified londiyabaaz, Pratham ka personal model, very fun and amazing person to be with...thoda gussa control kar aur padhai karlia kar graduate hona hai

From being such a great teammate in DASS to playing soapy football on the batch trip , it’s been a great time. Thank you for  handling the situation so well on farewell night. All the best for what’s ahead! ✨
Will miss you bhai. Best roommate ever. Bangalore mein milte rahiyo. Will play tekken and beat you with panda again ;)

Yaar hai bhai tu! Kabhi nahi socha itne acche dost banjaayenge. From arch rivals to best friends, we came a long way bhai. All the chais, shawarmas, night rides, faaltu bakchodi, will never be forgotten. Kisi bhi din ho, kuch bhi ho, we always found a way to have fun! Also one of the best person who can handle any type of BTs bhai! itna trust toh kar sakta hu. All the best for future bhai! South Indians see ab toh dost banaale, mere jaise log mil jaayenge xD

Chinmuu.... Saare bike rides ke liye thanku so muchh... Har cheez mein mereko salah dene ke liye bhi thanku... Meri rant sunne ke liye mere liye stand lene ke liye.. meri random mood swings ko handle karne ke liye thanku ... Teri life jitni bhi bt mein ho tune hamesha mere liye tym diya hain.... Ek call ke doori pe hi tha tu bas... Best tyms are in apex never gonna forget them... Tu aise hi reh touch mein reh... Aari blr milne tayar rahna.... Bhool mat jaana mereko...
Chinmay sir, thanks for being the genuine, caring and helpful friend that you are. It's always fun around you, stay the same. Stay in touch and keep achieving wherever you go!

My one of my first friend I made in this college. Tere saath jab hi hota hu, bada maja aata hai. Mai kai baar cheeze zyada sochata nahi, fir gadbad ho jata hai, maaf karna agar kabhi koi galti ho gae. IDK what more to say 🙃🙃, baat karte rehna.

Chinmay, a cool dude, is that rare friend who instantly lifts your mood - a stress-buster with a heart of gold! Always ready to help without hesitation. So glad we became friends. He helped me a lot to get an internship. Stay as awesome as you are - the world needs more people like you!

Chinmay bhai aap kaafi handsom ho ye baat to sabko pata hai, but you are a person with a great heart!
wo gta, wo resident evil mein gaand fatna mujhe hamesha yaad rahega!
Gaming dosti is peak. Also greatful for online semester dosti!

Chinmay bhai is one of the most mature and humble people in our batch. He is kind of thoda thoda simp and a little bit facchi hunter, thoda attention seeker too hai, but overall a very nice guy, respectful and precautionary. Vo sutta marte time, gate close karna, kisi ko yaad rahe na rahe, par chinmay bhain jarur yaad rakhenge, he can make the aura anytime anywhere, baki politics the thoda dur raho.

Meet you soon bro, stay happy, stay safe

This guy was the first ever friend i had in clg, kitne saari late night talks ki thi hamne vc pe .. me, you, dilli, pratham and apan shapath liya karte the XD. Guy is the most helpful and friendly person in clg, be it 3am or 3pm, he is just a call away. tera bahut disco diwaane hogaya tha :( lekin end me amazon me intern lagake tune dil jeet liya .. aage aur machayenge apan 🔥
Tall Handsome Guy, popular among girls.We had good time in our room together. Best thing I like about you - You are always ready to help others.
Bhai you’re one of the best people I know. Thoda bt kam liya Kar, enjoy life, you deserve it😘😘

Thoda pehle se hi dost ban jane chahie the, lucky to have same house jiski vjh se we got to know each other, all the vayu meets were fun either sports ya freshers. U have got bhut hi mst personality hai along with maturity. All the best for future🥹🥹🥹 or mujhe yaad krte rehna

Chinmay bhai, you're an extremely nice guy and one of the sweetest people I've ever met. Bonding with you was just spontaneous,  and I'm so happy to have found you! Yes, we don't talk all the time, but it never feels like I've grown away from you. Thanks a lot for being there for me in difficult times. All the best for everything you do, and yes let's stay in touch :D

PS: R.I.P. Jenny

name: Patanjali Bhamidipati
tagline: It ain't over till its over!

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: I came when there was covid, but the only good part was there was no quarantine coz localll !!

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Cliched answer would be: Anything I did with friends, but on a retrospect, there was nothing better than them, so I will stick to the cliche.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: All the freedom I had in campus, now I should be back to the pretence of a good boy at home 👍

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I hope I grew in all aspects (guys please confirm) but probably I became more caring and I kinda like that now hehe

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Have to grind to graduate, hopefully get a job and be “settled”

testimonials.text: Patu , we were friend since child hood .Where every we are we used to speak almost everyday for the past 14 years and I know it will be the same in the future also . I hope we join in the same company for work /
Pattu! You are very charismatic and the favorite of many! Complete all rounder also! Stop being so nice xD also, leave something for the rest of us to be good at <3

I still remember when you texted me before an important match motivating me, and how we both had a match winning partnerships...that would be my most fav memory of you, apart from the hard carry job you did 3 years for our interbatch wins....the pizza zone stories were soo crazy.....best TA fr too

Hi ra Pattu, you are such a fun person to hangout with. Thank you for giving company in winning all the sports we played. I love our late night talks, especially during CLD exams lol. Your poem writing skills are exceptional xD. It is unfortunate how we never went to Vizag or any trip yet :( 
I am going to stay in your hotel only in Bangalore just how I stayed in your room the whole time in college lol. Stay the same athletic, cute person you are..

I misunderstood you a lot during initial days. But after i got to know you, despite all your quirks (i like those as well heheh), i could say you are one of the people that is so so so dear to me. I miss yapping random stuff with you, i remember once it was proper late at night and you said you wanted to sleep but i wouldn't stop my bak bak. You are that friend that taught me so much(both academics and iykyk). Pattu maan, i've been missing you a lot and i'll miss you so much in the future.

TFI Banisa and an all-rounder in the truest sense. Always a vibe to interact with—sharp, witty, and full of life. Watched RRR and Ante Sundaraniki with him, and those moments still stand out. An NLP God and someone who brings energy wherever he goes. I hope he keeps living life to the fullest and continues to charm everyone with his one-liners and unstoppable spirit. Love you mate!!

Hey cutieeee :))
What can I say? We’ve made so many memories together, from going to concerts, enjoying food at cafes, dancing together, playing pool, to late-night walks and our heartfelt conversations. You've been my biggest support in almost everything and I can’t thank you enough for always being there. I am going to miss you so much!! Wish you all the best for everything that lies ahead. You'll always have my support and I really hope our friendship lasts a lifetime. My SWEET HOME <3 :)

Met you on the first day of college, thought of you as a saint, turned out to be ladykiller. Thank you for all the memories, don't run off to the US (without me) need someone to keep me alive there. All the best for another year, looking forward to rock it with you in bangalore too. Keep playing cricket, basketball and whatever you play, keep rizzing girls, keep supporting Modi, and keep on being my friend.

pattuuuu! it's been so fun playing cricket with you throughout our 4 years. i always felt a little less pressure bowling knowing you'll come and clutch up later as always if i do mess up. you're so talented at every sport you play, its insane. ive loved hanging out with you and you're so so fun! thank you for all the memories <3

Vattu vaata vettu, thanks to manali, thanks to navrang, ivi lekapoyunte maniddharam antha vibe ayyevallam kademo and both would have been a little fun without you for sure. We always catch a common vibe and carry on with that. Memorable f1 sessions, I'll miss them and I'll always remember the moments of fun we had together and lets recreate Koi Koi sometime. Koi Koi

The second I walked out of 228, all the memories came rushing back—when we first moved into 218. We’ve been through a lot: grinding CLD courses throughout the night, random jokes about Balu, we wantedly went into quarantine in 1-2 because we wanted breakfast, grinding sci-1/sci-2 all-night, doing course-projects, discussing random spiritual/philosophical shit,  random research-ideas / judging people / CSAI-seminar XD—the list goes on. Best roommate and projectmate ever. Love You! (No more space)

Miss all those high budget extravaganza script discussions ra pattu. Honestly inkevaritho ila undademo inka. Had a lot of fun(and serious) discussions. Chala instances lo you were there for me thanks daaniki. Hyderabad ki vastu unta appudu inka fresh narrate chesta. Anthavaraku...Believe yourself 🤙(inside joke)

Pattu, I'm glad we got as close as we are right now ra. Us balling together, randomly jamming, laughing at all the cute, weird things marri does is very fun. Im just glad we have another year to hangout together and have fun. Love you ra

How my impression on you has changed over that past years, from 'shrek' to the poem about our 'eternal beauty'. Thanks for bearing me coming to hangout and calling you pretty much all the time. An honour to witness Le'Pattu. From watching movies in that room, studying for useless exams to falling asleep. Your room was THE hangout spot. Mostly because of you (and Malladi) ;). Really got some unforgettable memories and i'll always keep dishing out relationship advice for better or for worse. <3

pattu best volleyball player! my sports council bestie, it was so fun organizing volleyball together and arguing in meets the next year. i'm so glad we got close, you're very sweet and genuine (although dumb at times). thanks for listening to me. it was fun playing sports with you every evening and thnx for cheering me on. you were a major part of my college life. keep meeting me every now and then

First and probably the only George Russell (Daniel Ricciardo 2.0) fan I'll ever meet in my life. We only became good friends after Sem 4, thanks to F1. Still waiting on the "F1 Telugu Yuvatha" go-karting that never happened. Also, ben stokes gadiki antha scene ledu, he's just an older version of NKR. 

Will miss the arguments that we had in multiple groups (hope they continue). Very friendly guy and very easy to approach. Never change

rey vattu em cheppanu cheppu
close vallaki ivanni raayadam kashtam ra babu, but yes one of the closest guys on campus, 4 years lo chaala ne yedigamu
gatti place ki PhD ki velli inka vegas lo settle ayipo ra mee annaya laage.. and yes cricket lo nee win percentage is good only because jujubi teams tho ne aadevu kabatti, next year telusthundi neeku and arey munde cheptunna nenu next year kuda aadatha college ki
I still have no idea how you got all those wickets ra :).... mystery spinner... truly the most passionate guy in whatever sport you play... never change that ra

vatttuuu... my forever captain. the best allrounder ive known. sports,music,acads,movies whatnot. Manali trip was more beautiful.. thanks to the happiness and joy u spread. #koikoii..the vibe i get being with you is not expressable. ilaane nee pakkana vaallani happy ga unchutu nuvvu kuda happy ga undara. i hope wherever you go, happiness follows. Nuvveppudu kanipinchina oka energy untundhi.. hope that stays. Lets meet again ra. Miss you..

rey vattu, U are great person to hangout with ra. Had many great conversations with you. future lo kooda regular ga heart to heart plan cheddam. Love your sense of humor, hate your movie reviews. Just kidding.. pakka edo okaroju manchi short film plan cheddam.. nuvve director. Unna sports anni aduthu eppudu ground lo unna.. sem matram top chesthav.. simply thop ra nuvvu. Lastly, 1st class to MS.. assala plan cheyakunda bhale set aindi ra.. Next koncham plan chesi life long set cheddam.

hi da!

you're super cool and really talented, not to mention super smart!
you have so many different interests ranging from sports to acads to music - really inspiring

glad we have another year on campus!

keep rocking :D

Sports lunnav, dance chestav, music lunnav, studies lo topper, manchi job undi... Asal oka all rounder ki definition laagunnav ra naak nuv... Assal nuv naa pedda inspiration telsa clg lo... Neelo ten% anna avvali anipistuntadi... Ela pattu inni ela manage cheyyagalugutunnav.... Maamoolu vishyam kaad... Entha chirak pettina manchiga maatladatav... Salahalu istav help chestav... Itle undu... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need

the best spin bowler in college, the most difficult (and the most fun) to keep to😭, and one I am lucky enough to call my friend. The way you play under pressure is amazing, and batting with you a couple of times for some match saving partnerships are one some of my favourite memories from college. Off the field too you are one of the nicest, friendliest people I know, and all the pizza zone sessions are among the highlights of my college life. Linkedin is lucky to have you buddy, all the best❤️

Vats, aatagadivi(kreedalu lo ne) ra nuvvu. 5th year lo anna try to beat me in TT, F1, Karting raa. Ennisarlu karting ankunnam ra manam.. avanni vellekane manam graduate avdham please. You are a true all rounder raa. Mee mavayya car(thamaru chesina ganakaryam gurthundha) toh manam tirigina places and all.. those were all so good. Inka mee amma chesi pette food aythe inkem cheppakkarle.. just wow. Oreyy manam eesari ayina volleyball cup kodadham raa 😭😭. Also inka 6 treats ivvali naaku nuvvu.

vattesh Bro!! Best gimbal shots teesthav nuvve. Naatho padipinchav opika tho barinchav dobbettina baa sari chesav thank you bhai.
TT lo manchi aatagadive motivation icchav odinchadaniki. 
Nv aade sports lo sagam naku vacchina nenu eddado unde vadini bhai.
Edo roju meetho nenu kurchoni F1 chustha bro. Hyderabad lone utnav kabatti kalusthu undam tirugudham.
patttu, you’re such a fun person to talk to and won’t forget TAing anlp with you, still have to hear you play that sitar sitting in your room :P keep in touch ra

Its hard to find people who can talk to anyone and can have so many friends :). I truly admire your ability to maintain such a well-balanced life. I can't remember a conversation with you that wasn't fun. Thanks for always being helpful. Best TA fr lmao... Will definitely try to continue our tradition of going out for dinners. Will miss you bro, stay in touch

Pattu, you never cease to surprise me. You started off as the introverted bowling pro, then I saw your cringe (and horrifying) poetic side (i hope u rem what i mean), and the guy that ik now is completely different (thank god). You a sports all rounder, I've loved playing tennis with you. You're really funny lol. Ur calm side has really surprised me, the way I've heard others describe how you handle situations and your meditation too. Ik that ur a friend that has my back. Keep being the cutest.

pattu also referred as patcummins (in cricket circle). jolly and jovial man ra nuvvu. eppudu antha positive vibes ela!! how!!
manakunnatha 90's songs fettish i guess mana clg lo evvariki undadu. lets continue the vibe. 1 year tarvaata manam bengaluru concerts ki veldaam (ARR/Ilayaraja/Harris Jayaraj). Let's never miss anything.
Bye!! Bye!!----for a while

Patsss...Starting years of college lo nuvvu No spam lo doubts adugutunte, nenu vaati solutions neeku DM chesevaadni, but nuvvu reply icchevadivi kaadu, One of the finest guy ra nuvvu, last 2 years lo chala close ayyam, You're true All rounder ra pattu, nee gameplay(not only in sports) ki big fan ra, cool ga handle chestav situations ni. Random music discussion when you play tune with the broken guitar, hocket match,box cricket, manali lo nee photoshoot, that cricket reel ahh.please give ur phone

One of the great captains to work under (veedu okkadi kinde aada le 😅 ) who gave freedom to play just like Sir Strauss & Pat Cummins....most lockdown England and fake SRH (especially) fan....asalu avg insta reels chusi fake dripp ekkichukovadam is too funny bhAAi, emanna ante prime Warner vs prime Steyn antav 🤣 leda 87(25) antav (asalu match chusava)....will miss those drippp box and night cricket sessions bhai....hope we still continue it in future in blr....#yessizzatwoooo
my cld pookie <3.

Though we started rocky, I later realized what a good friend you are. Pedda VP aina, you're always reliable. Football lo neeku emi pedda teliyakapoyina (Lamine Yamal ra, Yamine Lamal evadra 🤦‍♂️), that FIFA WC '22 final was the best! Amazes me how you manage so many sports, naakante pedda patient laa untaaav! Hyd lone untaav ga, badminton football kuda nerpistha. And, wait, I am getting confused again about that Papaya and Pineapple 😅.

From the most hyped DSP concert that turned into a musical prank 😭 to our legendary (read: short-lived) language club era where we “coordinated” like pros 🤡—what a ride!  an amazing experience!
 We’ve had so many fun moments from literally 1st to last semesters. And seriously, you have to give K-drama a try — just one and you'll get hooked!
Also, Dora the Driver lives rent-free in my head 😂.
Anyway, since you’ll be in Hyd for another year, we better catch up appud appud!

Very sweet guy yaar. You have always been nice to me and greeted me with a smile and I really appreciate that. Keep playing all the sports you can and stay happy!
Wishing you a happy, healthy and successful life.

Ipdu 4 ayitundi ra early morning 4...im hella sleepy, i dont even remember y i am awake, still nee gurinchi alochiste all warm and sweet memories raa. mcleodganj, our dance practices( thop dancer ra nuvvu ), aruku, goaa lo late night bujjiness...and all. got closer to u this sem, niyabba exams em lenapdu maa room ki vacchevaadivi, morning exam unna kuda neetho 4 ki panchaayti petevaadni😭, anta fun untaadi neetho maatalu.will miss you man OnlyBois andaram pakkaa triplu veyaaali ra.

Orey Aajamu,
Naaku inka gurthu ra, first time, nee peru cheppinappudu, evadu ra ilanti peru pettukunedhi, kachitanga theda gaadu ayyuntadu anukunna, which was true actually. You were my first friend from college, and I am grateful that I we were able to stay strong. Manam vellina cinemalu, vesina jokes, share chesukunna trips eppatiki maravanu ra, and manam idharam local kabatti, lets meet for every memorable cinema fdfs. 
Love you ra, maws! Ellappudu idharam kalisi undali ani korukuntunna!!!

Vatanjali.. nuvvu thappa evaru vavani ani anaru ra. Most talented person I have seen. Sports lo edhi vadhalaledhu anukunta, studies, photography, language clubbb kudaaaa. Also, I'm a very big fan of your veenaa. Thanks for saving inlp and anlp courses. 
Hope we stay in touch. All the very best for everything in your future. Don't lose a friend like meee.

Jagam antha kutumbham veedidhi. Daarina velle prathi okkadu veediki hello cheppe veltharu. Such is his palukubadi and grace. His immense knowledge about politics, sport and cinema is always a surprise to me. Nene peddha cinematic encyclopedia ani anukuntu unta, veedu inkaa peddha encyclopedia. Onfield manchi confidence maintain chesthadu. Ante Vk* laga over cheyyadam undadhu, genuinely confident. It was a privilege getting to know him and playing along side him

He will never fail to match your freak. We both moved in and out of bakul together and moved into OBH together, and I have a feeling we might be moving out of there around the same too, I am glad I got to experience moving in and out, and all the other stuff that happened in between with him. I hope he doesnt forget me when he becomes a big shot. Hoping to keep in touch with you man

Thank you for saving me in all the NLP courses by being my project TA. You've always been so helpful, and understanding, Thank you for that. It is always a lot of fun talking to you!! Wishing you all the best for your future!

Chala jolly ga untadi neetho kalisina pratisari. Baa matladatav, close frnds anna feeling create chestav. Evvarikaina help kavali ante cheyataniki ready ga untav. Manali trip lo ayithe full enjoy chesamu, manchi ga phots diggam. And delhi lo ayithe day anta kalisi unnam andharamu, appudu full fun. Will miss those moments. Touch lo undu, all the best.

HIII PATTUUU. sports council was so much more entertaining because of you, it was so fun. you are such a gossip aunty and I love that honestly, its always super fun talking about random things with you. you are also so sweet and SO smart. i hope you keep having fun, keep playing all kinds of sports, and work v hard! all the best.

pattuuuu .... , ee saari cup raaledani badapadaku ra . I know you know mana team chaala strong. Next 3 years cup manake vache chances high. Lets enjoy the show.
Movies vishayam lo matram taggadu ra manam , em manchi movies lekapothe, nenu sasidhar ni set chesta for songs nuvvoka movie direct chesey.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer:
covid batch, so first day for us was quarintine in bakul with around 50 more boys, got to know each other, did the first overnight on the first night of college with all of them.

coming out of quarintine was felicity, practiced drums and played on the main stage 2 days after.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: ofc its not easy to pinpoint, but going on trips, watching sunrise after waking up all night, going to DLF at 5 in the morning and so much more with all the lovely people around

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: the people of the batch. as people started to move out of hostels and college post endsems, I realised how much I would miss them all. even though I hadn't talked much with someone, it still felt, I likely won't be meeting them soon, since there being is irreplaceable in my college life.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer:
learnt a lot of things, from seniors, from juniors, from batchmates and a little from the college as well. not sure if I am still "ready for my last job", but yes iiit did teach me a lot of valuable lessons that I would forever be grateful about.

other changes - kadamb is gone, thub backside is gone, old srujana is gone, soon the main gate road-forest will be gone, new acad building will be here,  maybe new hostel behind obh too

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: some nice hill top :D

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Luckily, first day on campus was during Felicity time and it was an amazing way to kick off college life. Met my Hyd gang on day 1 itself and met my roommate Ronnie who I knew from before so that was a good thing. Played basketball and explored different parts of college, also got lost in the forest

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Winning inter college basketball cup for the first time ever. Even though I was injured my team played so amazingly well and pulled off a crazy upset to win it all. It was such a satisfying moment to finally beat VNR and nothing could ever top that. Winning that trophy with the gang meant everything

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: I will miss playing all the sports possible. Inter batch, house and college were such fun times. Playing with my basketball guys and batch people was so entertaining and I dont think I can ever find such people to play so many sports again. Just randomly walking around and playing a sport is great.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: In the first offline sem, I was worried about grades and getting a job. More so, I was tensed about finishing my research in time. Gradually everything became very chill and I was able to manage it all while going out and playing sports and having a lot of fun. I have lot more confidence in myself now to get things done and I believe I made some amazing memories and friends which I dont think I ever thought was possible in first year. Overall there was so much growth and change since then.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: First I would have to complete research and thesis to be able to graduate, but after that mostly the plan is to work for a couple of years. By then I would start to miss college life so ideally would like to go to a college again for an MBA, preferably abroad. Then I would pick up a job again hopefully in some European country or US to explore different places and have a change. After that I would probably like to settle back in India and just have a simple, peaceful job..

Maharnav is a brilliant writer with a deep love for books (thanks to his CHD background!). A Linux wizard, he probably changes his OS like moods—there’s no distro he hasn’t mastered. Though clueless about post-degree plans, he’s certain about one thing: eating! A true foodie who can devour anything, anytime. A talented, quirky, highly moody, and endlessly curious soul! Will remember the good days at 460!!

Where do I even begin with this guy? Throughout the college years, our friendship swung between ultimate bros and mortal enemies—but deep down, we always knew it was the former (the latter was mostly his drama queen phase). He's the classic coconut type: tough on the outside, but one of the most dependable people I know, always ready to stand by his friends. Whether during class or at 3 A.M, he’s always there if he is needed. Unless he decides to jump, hopefully we will always be in touch :)

Maharnav’s love for long drives is legendary—always ready to hit the road, no destination needed. He’s got a thing for cool, fancy stuff and somehow always knows the latest gadgets and trends. Chill vibe, solid company, and a great friend to have around. Keep cruising, bro!

Man's living his life in the moment, literally. The moment he wants to change something in life, he changes it, including mobile, laptop, or even bulbs :)

Two skills that I find awe-worthy in him are his ability to drive cars (a very successful Ooty Trip thanks to him) and knowledge in a very *coughs* interesting *coughs* field (I will leave it there).
Can yap about anything. Overthinks a lot. Has a deep understanding of human nature, but doesn't use this knowledge often.

Maharnav, a resident of Room No. 460, was a person who believed in a simple philosophy "my way or the high way". He could be spotted readjusting his things every now and then - be it his Laptop's Operating System or his drawers internal structure, he would always be the person who would have entirely different viewpoints for every topic you would like to discuss. A helpful guy by nature, he could be seen cracking late night jokes with his cherished friend groups.All the best bro for your future.

Maharnav surprised me in ways more than one. Who knew that behind an intimidating looking dude was a cool, independent, caring and thoughtful person. He has extreme clarity in life, and what he wants to do with it. A very rare and interesting outlook Id say.  While we had spoken before, I really got to know him over the Ooty trip and is now an unforgettable memory for me. Im glad that I came lol.
All the best for your future endeavors. and Drive Safe lol

Maharnav is a truly out of this world kind of guy. He's a true man of culture and a god at grinding philosophy content. I wish I had met him earlier cause he's an absolute vibe to hang out with. See you around bro :))

testimonials.text: One of the first real friends ive had in college. I want to write so much but at the same time I can't because i cant express in words how much you mean to me. Im so sure youre going to be one of those friends that I still regularly talk to after college and whose kids will call me aunty or something cringe like that.

wont be mean cos i do enough of that irl. udk how much ur friendship has meant to me especially this year. i cant explain the weird things music makes me feel to anyone but u. our trips fill many of the holes this shitty college inherently creates. sometimes i just observe n admire in awe how effortlessly u always navigate through everything from acads to activities to research under pressure. im v glad ull be there in 5th year. u mean a lot to me & ty for being so nice it really means a lot :(

Hi Nanda, I met you the first time when you were silently playing GOAT on stage on your acoustic and I was like woahhhhh, thats goat. Since then I've seen you as an amazing guitar player, you make playing guitar so enjoyable on stage. Orgho may be the funny one but your the observer that makes it funny XD. You are a lovely friend, Im so glad you're sticking around for another year, please stop hitting me (jk, I dont even feel it :))

nanda i cant write anything enough to express how cool you are. u are literally good at everything be it sports music or debates but I love you for how kind and caring u are abt everyone. theres not 1 dull moment around you. i love how much you yap after eating lettuce my fav thing fr I learn new things from you everyday (10/10musictaste). my fellow south mess eater, pl keep coming over so we can do more cool things together. i want you to do so well in everything, ill always be there for you <3

nandaaa, i feel whatever i say for you would be too less. you're so smart, funny, talented, beautiful, the list goes on and on. but i have never met someone as talented in academics, extra-curriculars and people skills as you. you are also always so sweet and easy to hang out with. i love the feeling of having you around me and i hope i get to witness more of it in the coming weeks/months/years. i love you <3

i'm going to miss your (horrible) puns, incessant flirting and insanely hot guitar skills <3. so glad you made the objectively terrible decision to wake up for 6am sports and start a convo with me. "come room anytime 🫡" so we can do pilates and play tomb of the mask on arcade mode

hiii,
it's been been 4 years from the start of the college till date and everything we did in between from anti-ditch gang to octave practices to night rides to apex, it was always super fun. to more such memories 🥂.
hopefully I'll be able to convince you that mountains are more fun some day.

~ that good friend

Nanda is a kind of person who fits in any group and makes it better. She always radiates positivity and joy (except for the times she is sleep deprived, dear god stay away from her during those times). Had a great time in all outings that we did, playing football, burnout paradise, bowling (on second thought, not bowling). Hopefully we will be able to complete the list of activities we have decided on before graduating, which is a tough deadline cuz I'm sure she is going to break HSRC's records.

hello blue porcupine i approve of the heavy letterboxd usage. also love your shirts. one of the people who are really fun to play contact with because you know so much. my khabri for mallu cinema. its been so much fun being friends w u over the years. weve done so much together and youre probably the first person my parents remember from iiit. as goes without saying youre really smart & talented & good with people. i aspire to be that good. lets keep having fun together & have an awesome last yr

I'm ready for scene da Vijayanagar to Indiranagar every colony every street we'll hit bro. Idk how someone can be so cool and also so lame at the same time. Only Harsha laughs at your jokes re. But yes don't stop making them sometimes they work. U haven't seen the half of my brainrot, open NC reels group and watch. And yes it's not ending any time soon, lettuce and brainrot go hard u will not be able to stop laughing. Keep being awesome and lame, and also keep dreaming - Vijayanagar >>>>>>>>>>>>

Best music taste i've seen in a person! You're the perfect example of an all-rounder with a very sweet voice, great guitarist and tennis player too. I've loved performing with you in Spotlight, Meltdown and Unplugged, we've pulled off some good ones, and I hope we can perform together more for one last year. I love your high energy in everything like the early morning cycling we did one day, Goa was super fun too!
Keep cracking your stupid jokes it'll hopefully make us laugh one day lmao. #ESCN

nandaaaa, you're one of the coolest and most fun people i've met on campus. im so glad we've gotten closer in the last few sems cause like it would be so lame not knowing you properly fr. as bad as your jokes are, i hate to admit i will kinda miss them 😭. you're also insanely good at whatever you do and it's unfair someone can be good at so many things, goa was super fun with you and i know we will have so much more fun in bangalore as well.

nanda garu,hi da u r like so sweet even before we became proper friends u were sweet to me.even though it's just been a year u r like a closest friend to me.thank you for being so nice and making cringe jokes. U have amazing guitar, singing and music skills and taste. U r a friend who I can talk jokingly and then talk full serious.Goa was sooo fun.Learn to drive da I will too we shud go on a trip again.also it's crazy how i only talked to u at kadamb breakfast to like everyday.let's keep meeting

nandoz, amazing guitarist but on the vocals side, won't forget that hysteric (chandramukhi) laughter you have - impeccable, honestly should've done it at the hidden castle tunnel, people would've lost their shit, had so much fun in Goa - the candy cigs at the airport 😂, and will miss doing the sigma boy move without me whistling (obv better than anyone else), we still have to do that *proper* chugging contest ukwim
we need to hit nandos plan b in blr

Nandaaaa!!! You're insanely talented, and nice and funny (innum yen level varala aana); I'm glad that we got to hang out the past year and hope to continue! Goa was extremely fun and lets do more of those! lets play more tennis and maybe you might have a chance at beating me fr; Have fun at your internship and dont kassi too much!!

Your basketball game is still a bit awkward (especially that kick when you shoot! 😂), but it's definitely improving! We've got a year to fix it, so let's get to work on that form. And yeah, your love for curd and addiction to ORS is a lil much. Don't listen to the haters, ur jokes are very funny. It was great getting to know u over the last year. All the best for everything, keep rocking!

This woman makes the most astoundingly lame jokes all the time and has the audacity to congratulate herself for it. But, I laugh at the secretly (guess I too am lame, huh).

This being said, she's the most upbeat person I count among my friends and can bring a sort of uplifting energy to any, however brief, conversation. She's super fun to be around (not because of the jokes; note - herself not included) and I hope... Yada, Yada, she's not getting more effort out of me for writing a testimonial.
nanda, you're super cool and punny and amazing on the guitar. its been great hanging out, all the best for everything you do next!

Hi fellow fake tamilian :) You're one of the most effortlessly cool people I know, and hanging out with you is always a vibe. It was always fun to watch you sing and play music at lots of events (oggy fan from day 1). Im glad we got to become better friends in the past year through NC and I hope we get more chances to hang out more and keep in touch.

Nandaaaa.... You are such a fun, pretty and cute person. OnP practices were so much fun. You are such a cool guitarist .. wish I could have learnt thoda in the last 4 years hehe. but issokie we have got one more to go :P I am glad we got close and because really good friends. Looking forward to more wonderful memories and joyful experiences in Blr with you hehe. Love you loads babygirl <3

My Lesbian Rock Queen.. I'd convert for you.. it's the biggest compliment I can give anyone trust me.. Sexy and smart (bonus: looks smoking hot with an electric guitar on you).. You're an awesome person inside and out and can't wait to cause more chaos in our 5th year.. Always looking out for you..

Us jamming in my room with me in a cast, NIFT, all nighter rehersals, Felicity gosh soo many memories..

O&P is a big part of who I am and it's been an honor to share a stage with you.

Love,
Poorvi

Am so glad that I got to know you more through O&P. Had a lot of fun playing and jamming with you! I’d become a huge fan of your guitar pretty quickly, but spending more time has made me appreciate you so much more, everything from your energy, thoughfulness, and random unending giggle fits :D looking forward to another year!

nandaaaa, you're the prettiest multitalented most loving person with the corniest jokes. I've always admired your perseverence, how you stay strong through the toughest times, how you've always been a constant I can trust on and I love you. I hopee we can have some more fun adventures next year!! cheers to more

literally the jack of all trades (and the master of all) because you have dabbled in everything. Never ever going to forget your puns (even if I wanted to) and idt I will ever meet anyone who owns so much in blue. Best memory of us is definitely spending three hours in the line at wonderla :D
hiii nanda youre a real rockstar fr. i'll miss you putting on eyeliner for me for the rest of my life <3
coolest and most talented guitar player everrr, will never forget trying (and failing) to make an orange candle in parijatt :D
nandaa, youre really pretty and cool. its so cool how youre good at almost everything you do (ps: hs kassi). youre so pretty and nice, stay in touch <3

When I first heard you play at Spotlight, I thought, “Damn, she’s amazing! I should go talk to her.” But having an introvert for an ass didn’t help. Don’t know if I ever said it, but you’re an incredible guitarist and person. I don’t feel like I deserve all the respect and kindness you’ve shown me, but I’m truly grateful for it. You’re insanely talented and so easy to talk to. I wish we could have been better friends, but I know we’ll jam more in the future. (you will become a superstar first :)

"ALL ROUNDER AWARD GOES TO NANDA!!" was what I was expecting to hear haha. Well, you are insanely inspirational. Music (which you're absolutely GOATED at), public speaking, friendships, acads, leadership, everything. Super happy to know such a cool person like you and will always be a hype buddy for each and every of your great endeavours.
Keep shining and being the star you are!
One of the most talented women on campus frr!! I wish we had performed more together. I think you're a very fun and caring person. Stay in touch :)

Nandaaa! I was introduced to Lazarus and thus Porcupine Tree through you :))
Every single time playing and jamming with you was super fun, I wish it was more often fr tho. And yes, ik who to go after if my guitar randomly disappears :P

Nandaaa!! You're genuinely such a wonderful human being, and so incredibly pretty! I'll always fondly remember the fun times we shared, especially our moments in Apex and at Aadya Ma'am's party XD – those were great!
Please definitely keep in touch. :hugs:

Hey Nanda - you are one of the sweetest, smartest person I have met in this campus - never seen such a beautiful person inside out. You are always ready to help anyone - never seen such a genuine soul. Im so glad we met :) Stay cheerful, stay happy and lets stay connected :) So happy to be friends with you and get to know you. Best of Luck !!!

Genuinely surprised by amount of Telugu uk and heavily impressed also. Please collab once with the Guitar, I will try my best with the Veena. Also sorry for ditching at BPL, it happened so bad and I feel the remorse!

Hey Nanda, you are such a sweet and cool person. Best guitarist ik lmao. We came a long way from being forced to sit next together in class (thnx for waking me when attendance came) to OSN teammates. It was really fun working with you. I like your new interest in basketball lol, I believe you can soon be best player on campus. Also amazing Telugu you speak, too cute. You always seem to be smiling and so happy, continue to be the same :)

Nanda! How are you so amazing? You are honestly someone I have looked upto for being so smart and badass and insanely good at everything. I have really enjoyed the interactions we have had, and hope to have a lot more of those in the upcoming yeas. Keep being the amazing puntastic person you are <3

Heya:)
I'm not sure if you remember but we used to video calls in our first sem online, especially after cpro labs we tanked. You're so witty and pretty (rhyme intended); you've managed acads and co-curriculars so well, and I've always respected that a lot. I know you're gonna do really well in life, good luck for everything that's to come!

3rd floor neighbour throughout college. You’ve been very inspirational, Nanda, and I’ve loved bumping into you in the corridor and chatting. It was always nice waking up to the sound of you playing the guitar, it carried right through the wall :))

Heyy Nanda! Dude, you are so cool ngl. I can vaguely remember meeting you for the first time in B'lore meets, but then when I heard you play the guitar for the first time, I recall my mind being blown. To me, you have always been very sweet and awesome.
But I wish there was a way to wipe your memory... so that you can legit watch aot again.. without some third party ruining it -_-. 

Nevertheless, I hope you do well in whatever life has in store. Atb. Oh, and help me relearn the guitar plz, thx!

Nanda, you’re the actual sizzler! Always fun to talk to, and being neighbors for years has been lovely. You give total Ms. Perfectionist vibes and play the guitar like a pro. I still remember your freshers’ performance of Khwabon Ke Parindey – it was beautiful. You're such a sweet person. Stay in touch. Love, Kritika 💛

Hi Nanda! I always feel amazed and I admire your style when you play guitar. It's too good. It was Octave time when we met for Prithvi performance and I saw you performing guitar on the stage. Not only that but sports as well, you are really a great runner and true athlete. You are such a nice person and I wish you the best for your great future.

Yoo nandaa! One of the best singer of our college. Super chill you are. No matter how hard one tries to go against you, you always tried to remain calm and handle it chill asf! Was fun working with you in the apex. All the best bhai! After all, you are our hope in CHD
Had fun with you in the DESIS days. You are such a charming, confident, smart and beautiful woman, and it was always good to talk to you. Awesome guitar player too!

Hey Nanda! A superstar since day 1! You were one of my first friends here, and I can't believe how far we've come with all the sports we've played together. We still have a year left together and I'm looking forward to it! All the best for your future!

Nandos.... Such an amazing person you are... Honestly talking to you feels so damn good can't even describe..  Love the way to try to speak in Telugu... Love the way you present your self... I will miss you so much... Will keep cmg to campus to meet you.... Apex was best thing to happen to me... Nd i am grateful for all the memories... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need

Nanda Ma'am, been so long with you! You've stolen so many hearts in college and I know you'll do so in the future also ;) Always so pretty and talented how can anyone not like u <3 Stay funny and keep smiling :)
I was in awe when I heard you playing guitar in Freshers'. Kinda one of the reasons for me learning guitar. I liked the few conversations we had. Wish you all the best for your future!

Hi Nanda!
I’ve known you since first year, even though we didn’t get to interact much. But from everything I’ve seen, you’re easily one of the most talented (and prettiest!) guitarists IIITH has had. Your vibe and personality are just adorable — don’t ever change that. Hope we get to catch up properly soon in Bangalore. Love you, haha 💛

Hoi! Maurya - designated Shrine split guess poster - somehow an extremely consistent person , chaahe adhd nahi to jo bhi h sahi h aur guitar to baja hi leta h, thoda cooler apni kamre ki taraf karke chala liya kar aur paani daalke. bahar se order bhi thoda kam pls. movie nights puri attend kar liya kar.

Hoi! Really enjoy your energy. Bro is built like a spring - always moving and bounces back from anything whatsoever. Will definitely miss this energy whenever I do have to leave campus. And I hope you keep the same energy towards everything you do encounter in life. Will definitely miss your obsessions over little things, and the care you put in them. Wishing you the best for the future, and hope we can stay in contact for as long as possible! milte hai "begum"

One of the lucknowis. I dont know why but I knew that we would be good friends since the first time we met. You were quirky and random but quiet at the same time. Hey Maurya!
You are one of the few people I'm really glad to call my dear friend. You have been one of the most helpful, most supportive friends I've ever had. Glad to have been with you

hoi 🍄 my first roommate and the best coffee maker in college 💔 a great person, and a very out-of-the-box thinker. journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Covid, so I was locked in my room the entire time basically. Met a lot of cool people though like Anushka, Nanda, Kriti, etc.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Playing night cricket, the first match went into a super over, and we lost the second one, but the whole experience was really enjoyable. We played basketball after our second match, at around 2am.

journal.answer: All my friends (im objectifying them) and kadamb biryani

journal.answer: Got better at tennis and lying to my parents

journal.answer: No idea, ask me in a year when I'm actually forced to decide

testimonials.text:
Fav teammate and a great friend. You're probably one of the few all-rounders in college, a very fast learner in anything you do as well. You've always helped me out with acads or anything else where I was struggling in, thanks a lot for that. Your level of brainrot is a diff dimension fr.
Have had some really fun times with you in night cricket, BB nights, and even finishing off projects on time somehow. We should really go Wonderla.
Pls be drunk more lmao its fun. Shoutout to Zythum🙏

Hiii sanika, thanks for being a great friend, I enjoy coming to HSRC and working only cause of your company along with Nanda's and Orgho's. We have done so many things together and I remember them being bearable with you, like CV, SMAI TAship, Science 2 etc. Even playing Basket ball with you is fun, Im so glad your not leaving next sem, we can do so many more things together.

you're so cool and super fun to hangout with. im so glad we got closer in the last few sems and im super grateful for all the memories we've made together. you're also so good at everything you do, its actually insane (pls teach me how to surf and flip 😭). only lame thing about you is taylor swift but luckily other things about you make up for it :D.  goa was super fun with you and i know bangalore will be even more!!
We only jogged once, but I’ll never forget trying to keep up with you around campus—definitely a challenge! You’re such a sweet and quiet person. Stay the same, and I wish you all the best. 🌟

sanika damle u r the best, like u r mean and all but u r nice too. Its funny how ik u only for a year but u r like one of my closest friends now. I acknowledge that u like nuggets and that makes u more better person. Thank you for being such a nice friend and sorry for always calling u mean. Hope we keep meeting and pls keep being nice. Thank youuu.

Oh my god 🤦🏾. How're u so good at surfing and flipping in a trampoline park lmao. We only started hanging out a year ago, but yes ur very cool and funny sometimes, and yes despite all the work and all this past year truly has been the best year ever. Hopefully the hangouts never end (and we're definitely winning NC this year).

you're super nice and such a smart person to talk to  (except that your movie character taste is cooked, gone girl nah) will remember spending time playing poison and going out and you melting at zythum😂, and not eating the crusts on pizza, and you saying "oh god" :), thanks for holding down the fort in cv
don't zone out too many times, gl in blr and have fun at bellandur social

you're one of my oldest good friends. your music taste is ew but i will try and make it better before you graduate. going to ikea with you just for cheesecake is v memorable. you shoot really well from the midrange and im not lying when i say that i envy you for that; its really impressive. we should watch more sports together in lab its kinda fun. i hope we have a lot of fun in fifth year together. whenever you need me, ill always be a call or text away :)

500 chars is insanely low for this. if I sob while writing I blame you

You're unironically my best friend.

any time I see genuine, beautiful friendship in films, shows or songs, I think of you and me. our kids better call each other aunty and we'll go to Greece together at 50 years old for a vacation because there's no other friend I'd rather do all of it with.
 
if you ever forget that I'll yell at you and bring this up for you to see.

we lowkey made for each other ngl <3 

I love you :)

Such a sweet person to talk with... Also not to forget best TA... Thanks for always helping out and always being there... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need

You’re super fun and pretty and cute, and I’ve always loved your dark humor. I actually believe that in some other universe, we made it to the Eras Tour together and had the time of our lives. You’re really smart and well-spoken, and I wish you all the best for your future—you’re gonna do amazing things!
PS: I love you hair!

Sanika has mentioned that I was everything she heard me to be. I'm not sure whether that's such a nice thing (maybe it is, y'know? I sure do hope so). 

That pretty much sums up a Sanika - brutally honest while being nice about it. I have other things to say but since this is public and I do not wish to slander myself (she was still nice, ok?), mum's the word.

sanikaaaa you're such a fun person to be around. i miss hanging out with you all the time the way we once used to and i really wish we had never grown apart coz of whatever reasons. hopefully, in the coming year (and the years after), we get a lot more opportunities to sit in each other's rooms and gossip, grab that vc nimbu paani, and walk around the campus together. i am in awe of your dedication to do anything you set your mind to. wishing you all the wonderful things in life. ly <3

Sanikaaaaa (lmao "snakia")!!! you're very smart and a bit funny too; I just realised that we've known each other since first sem itself!!! I'm glad to have made a friend like you; Goa and tramp park was extremely fun! we should go on more adventures; You're gonna do great wherever you go, keep having fun and try to reduce you list + pls dont kill me ; also goodluck with JPMC you're gonna ace it and get the ppo

sanika, where do i even start? there's so much good stuff to say about you that i can't fit in 500 chars. you're incredibly smart, super funny and so kind. you're hard working and kinda nerdy and super fun to be around. its amazing how talented and artsy you are, whether its cooking or painting or crocheting. the way you can quickly pick up anything, whether its making balloon animals or bb or the india mini. you're incredibly caring of all your friends and i'm very lucky to know you.

I'll miss the hsrc hangouts and basketball (yes I should've come more often :/ ) and it's also funny and endearing to read the constant spelling errors in your texts :D hope we get more chances to meet in the future, and good luck with completing chd!

Very honest & strict TA you were. A bit more leniency on deadlines would've been cool! On the court, you're a mid-range assassin! 🏀 Now, if that defense matched NBA pros, you'd be deadly! Known you only since 6th sem, but you're a genuinely great friend. Never tasted your baking but heard it's legendary - you owe me treats & lessons! 🍰 And joining CVIT's cool, but I'm waiting to see what research u cook up here.
Sanika you're so pretty and sweet and I love your style!

Sanikaaa, over the years we've had so many adventures but the one that stands out the most to me is when we won the astronomy quiz with all of us wearing a single bee earing and then we got bees henna tatooed? You are so smart, you care deeply, and I loved the times we shared talking about tv series, etc. ik we haven't been in touch recently, but I do miss you a lot and I hope we can have more adventures next year and in the futuree. byee, love you!!

hi cutu. i love how talented you are and good at everything that you pick up. seriously its sports, acads, even things like crocheting. how are you THAT good at everything!!! so fucking glad I asked if you're joining iiit. keep thinking how lucky that was amongst so many groups and messages. oldest friend in college no contest. theres no way i can fit all the memories here so im not even going to try. ive been really lucky to have had you as a friend in college. one of the best i could have asked for. cool as hell and good at so so many things. I really admire the way you're able to deal with things by yourself and lock in. i hope you get everything you want ok bye

One of the first friends I had in college and one of the funniest people here :) JC era was so fun and I’m really glad I got to share that excitement and chaos of our first hostel room with you. Top 3 roommates of all time fr. We vibe well, let’s hang out more this year 🤭

name: Tanveer Ul Mustafa
tagline: Navigating a world that forgot to read the manual.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: It was Covid times, late in the night. Came to the campus with my dad and was suuuper sceptical at first, but the hostel and campus grew on me preeetty quickly.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Winning the Inter-House football tournament as a first year.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Ma Homies ;-;

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I'm significantly less socially awkward now :D

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Still got a year left, gonna rock it and the years ahead as well InshaAllah.

testimonials.text: Tanveer’s the kind of friend everyone needs—always up for random plans, late-night chilling, or impromptu cycling trips that somehow turn into adventures. Dependable, fun, and always in for the vibe. Grateful for all the spontaneous memories, bhai!

hi tanveer!

you're so smart + super hardworking + very cool! it's truly inspiring :D

from pool to bowling to football (only on ground for now, but I demand turf soon) to many many courses and projects together, we were up to some pretty cool stuff on campus! so glad we have another year to do all of it and more, and hopefully many more!

I feel so proud to call you my friend :)
keep on rocking!

Best food advisor, second best roommate. One of the most caring and empathic people I've ever met. Makes the worst (best?) PJs. It’s kind of genius how he stays fresh and clean without letting laundry get in the way—like, who knew a pile of clothes could be both wardrobe and interior décor?

if im ever confused what to order for dinner, you're automatically the first person i think of. you're one of the most pure souls i have ever come across in my life. you're a nice person and a great friend. playing football with you used to be so fun. and of course, FIFA. i probably wouldn't have even got FIFA if not for you. you're also an amazing science teacher lol. i look forward to having a great time with you in fifth year. let's go bowling again soon :P
A football legend running on 1% battery, then claims he's too full to eat more than a crumb. He's all about the high scores in gaming, but when it comes to love, he's strictly 'single-player mode'.

Tanveer is a one-of-a-kind specimen—wants a girlfriend but won’t ever try! A Gujarati who doesn’t speak Gujarati or eat sweets. Pool king who helped me level up my game (and win way more). We met as quarantine roommates and have been friends since. Famous for his deadly sliding tackles—both on and off the field! 🚀 #Legend

Tanveer is the most polite guy I’ve ever met — so polite, that I’m still not sure he’s physically capable of shouting at anyone. Also, unlike most boys he actually bathes everyday. Unfortunately, that level of hygiene never quite made it to his room. I’m pretty sure there are a few pieces of clothes and chip wrapper that were never displaced in 2 years. I’ll genuinely miss our dystopian discussions and accidental washroom meetups - random, frequent, scary at times but memorable.

Your Turkish horror movie suggestions were spot on – Dabbe: The Curse of the Jinn was a wild ride! I'm hoping for loads more horror movie nights in the upcoming year, even if they turn into comedies like our Nun II experience 🤣 Both our NLP courses were a blast thanks to you, especially with you carrying my assignments like a legend 🔥

Bohot sweet insaan hai tu. Apne fifa vale din best the, bakul mai khelte the, kya maja ata tha yaar. I love how you are always smiling and nice to  everyone. Football khelte rehna and khayal rakhna apna!

Hi bhai,
You have been a special person for me, whom I have met in college time. As I have seen, you have always kept your morals high and hope s o you keep those high in future as well. 
Despite you being not getting an intern, you kept calm but didn't use any wrong way to achieve. I surely pray to God, that you get a good placement soon.
Stay in touch ! In case of any help, you are always welcome bro.
Honest, diligent and super friendly person! Man brings a different vibe to the football pitch every time he plays too :D
Literally the sweetest guy ever and most lenient HS TA :))
fake friend

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Ended up recording the very first nightout on Day 1 itself. Me, Gundam, Keval and few more wanted to explore all of campus, and even went into the lake and jungle straightup. The best part is we ended up finding things which arent supposed to be where they are xD

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: I would say the fest days were one of the best memories in my campus life. All the last minute tensions, the fun of having an amazing fest, and a lot more was crazy amazing

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: I would honestly miss all my friends, the night rides we end up with, hunt for food, organising events, and all of these things. 3 months away during the internship alone made me realise how fun college life was, and how hard it is to even meet 10% of these friends once you are out of college.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: College taught me that I can actually manage decent size events easily. It was fun being in sooo many clubs, student bodies, etc and organising the college fest, helping the kids and all. So all of this made me what I am today, the one who can handle all of these things, made insane number of contacts.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Ese question nahi puchte! But hopefully I end up in google for a while. And then go with the flow :)

testimonials.text: My arch nemisis, I hate you haha. I never thought i would ever be this close to a telugu guy. One of the very few people who grew with me side by side. Thankyou for being by sidekick and also for the bike. Will miss DLF and Khajaguda ek sal ke bad. Take care
The best roommate i could ever ask for ra.... don't have to say anything else

I can not ask for a better friend than you. You have literally been there for me whenever I asked, and you have never said no to me. I wonder why or how you can trust me so much at times man. Even when I fail, he is always there with me, to help me out and calm me down. Wherever Yashaswi is there, things become so simple. We share the love of movies, and dialouges. He is always concerned about others, more than himself. Trying to make his close one always happy. Super grateful to know you ra!!

I'd like to thank SMAI for this friendship, that RR was the starting of this bonding! Will always remember mid sems mein padhai se zyada patte khelna lmao!! Thank you for always hyping my achievements even when they didn't feel like one! 😻

hiii pooookie,
Thank you for trusting me with your bike, even though I had a broken hand and for the night rides we went together and and ofc for introducing me to bandi ka chai raat ko 3 baje. aata hun jaldi bangalore, tumhari id se google mein vaapis khana khane =D

Yashaswii! How much ever you trouble me, still always a fun guy and have had the best memories during felicity with you, couldn't have handled all that pressure without you :p. You're a great event manager and I know you'll do some cool shit in the future too! Stay happy!

Hey man! 
Co-cooridnating (XD) Decore was fun. Did not think I'd meet a pure soul like you. Kabhi personally itna close nahi aaye but you were always there for whatever issue I encountered.
Admire you for your sweet nature and helpful attitude towards everyone. You've got a really pure heart and you should keep it that way.
keep shining my guy!

Yashaswi—
My first best friend on campus. Someone who's been there through both the good times and the tough ones, always showing up for the people you care about. You truly deserve the most and more!. All the best ra<3

yashaswiii

you're super cool and so smart! 

so glad we hung out on campus, and looking forward to another year on campus for us!

keep rocking :D

Eppudu unnav ra Naa kosam untav ani kooda telsu... My go to person... Naak nuv eppudu best ee... Blr ke vastunna... Kalusta... Marchipok nannu...ATB

cute boy ra nuvvu
nenu college lo close aina first people lo nuvvu okadivi ra.. ah time lo bhayam unde asala enti college enti idantha ani, thanks for everything
neetho unte fun untundi ra.. google lo ppo kottesi next year chill avvu
good luckk
Always there when you need something. A very helpful guy with a cheerful personality. The only person who motivates me to do LeetCode (please motivate me more).

Need something done? Yashaswi's your guy! The most resourceful person with contacts for everything. His hard work made Felicity spectacular, and working with him on events like our Batch Trip was always a blast. Bonus: The best Hindi speaker in the Telugu gang! Wishing you continued success!

Yashi :)
Wikipedia of IIIT. 
Adventure lover, be it the trek during star gazing, or rafting at the trip, brings life to the party, and always ready to stand for the team.
Oh, and those badminton shots you play look straight out of an anime fight scene.. lol xD
It is unreal how you take responsibility and manage so many things at once :).. Never lose that

Yashi, you’ve always been such a cheerful and amazing friend no matter what’s happening, you keep things light and fun. I’ve loved every moment at the SPCRC corner, and I’m sure we’ll have many more! Also, I secretly enjoy complaining about you to your mom every Sunday hope she’s still taking notes and about ur phone storage, I'm totally blame for turning ur phone into my personal photo album. but if u wanted space, maybe don't thand over ur phone.. cant help it. keep smiling and love u loads...

Yashaswi is someone who knows how to get stuff done. Remains calm even when stuff goes wrong and knows how to take control of it too. 

Was really fun working with him in organising Felicity and batch trip! (Also found out that he is good at football, at least, really good at soapy football XD)

Broo we look wayy too similar, your parents getting confused on that video call was the final nail in the coffin😂, won’t forget all the things we did at college and handling events at e cell was amazing, all the best and keep in touch!

Hi ra L N lol, you are a really nice person and you love bullying ppl so much lmao. it is fun to hangout with you and rooming with you is chill and peaceful. Playing cricket with you was fun and somehow you are cruising through CHD even though its supposed to be hard. We should go out to more fun places and do crazy stuff. Let us hope we both get PPO and both get Hyd new campus. It will be fun to explore that again lol. Keep being a chill bully lol :)

We chatted for some time in the initial days of college, and then again only in the last sem. You are an interesting guy with some interesting passions. Padhai toh hoti rahegi, keep chilling and enjoy your life! Be safe with your bike btw.

One of my first and closest friends ra, can’t forget all the late night drives, speedbreaker bumps and the food hunts we used to go on 😂. We should go on more rides and also get back to exploring new places.

Hey Yashaswi!

Hashtags indicate trends, but you are Hash, so you're the one who makes or breaks trends. IIIT God ra you are.

We've been friends since the first day (even before, given we briefly knew each other in FIITJEE), and we've been through thick and thin, high and low. Thoughts can't express how much I am grateful to you. Love you ra! Still lots more adventures to go through together, so always stay in touch.

Wishing you the best in all your future endeavours!

Hey Yashi,
The most extrovert I’ve seen in college, like you know literally everybody. You should be the first person anyone should contact for any kind of news including gossip about profs or even their personal lives. You’re an amazing, fun friend. Music course together was a lot fun. Please continue your guitar. I’ll always remember you as the guy who first bought a 1lakh+ bike first and then learnt how to ride a bike😂. Anyways, all the best to graduate asap. Hope all your wishes come true:)

Yashaswiii!!!

You are such a cutie, humara apna Kabir Singh! Loved hanging out with you and having you around. I wish you great success and hope you become my fellow Noogler!

Keep in touch, I know you will! Byee!

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: this was during quarntine, so kinda dead scenes. i remember talking to aryan and shashwat a bit (iirc ;-;). the el clasico was there that night but like really late so i watched that alone. oh lastly, somehow i really liked whatever kinda-dry veg curry they gave that day lmao

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: impossible to choose the best but ig the first time i just randomly stepped out of campus at midnight with anushka and harinie and returned hours later. nothing crazy now but was like a revelation then. and yes, the surprise birthday party that was thrown for me in 2-2 that was so unforgettable

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: what will i not miss ;-; but yeah hanging out on campus, going for random walks with friends at the most abysmal times in the night, and of course, one thing which i used to love that went away too soon - i miss jamming at srujana SO much. and last but not the least, the diabolical all-nighters :D

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: well, firstly i will have to mention my hair haha. but yeah a lot has changed, especially its insane how every one of us have changed. i have friends whom ive been close with from the onset and its crazy thinking how much we've all evolved, its quitcra00zy

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: well, thats a tough one. but yeah i really hope all my friends stay in touch, that would mean he world to me. i will miss all of them so much, the very thought that they won't be here saddens me. but theyre all great and so smart and talented so of course, they will now show what theyve got to the world and amaze everyone. but beyond things like success, i hope every one of them are happy with whatever they end up doing. and i will always just a call or text away if theyd like someone to talk to

testimonials.text:

such a yapper bhai. too nice, you should be meaner to people sometimes. i remember we started talking because of nolan movies in online sem lol. tpe would've been impossible without you. all the all-nighters and panics we had were finally worth it as i had good company and a good speaker on my team. thank you for carrying our presentations and also mmt. sorry for bullying you for marks hehe. hopefully we do our tpe outing sometime in the future, we have to do it for sure
Orgho, you're such a funny, lively guy to talk to! Your laughter is so infectious and there's never a dull moment with you! Also music god for real!

Orghooo.. we've bonded so much this past year. You're such a good friend, best co-TA and the coolest person (well a Weeknd fan can never be uncool hehe). Hope we keep meeting, also I need to try your pasta and see if it can change my opinion about pasta being mid xD.. take care and keep in touch

ORGHOEE truly the best yapper ik - I could talk to you about ANYTHING and that is a true gift. I'm so glad we met on discord and even more glad that you introduced me to letterboxd lol. My best memory of us is when instead of doing your group project - we spent the whole night singing god's plan

orgho u r the best, like u r nice, extroverted and very kind. Thank you for being such a nice friend. Getting drunk with u is like the best. orghy, had so much fun with you partying and playing bb, but not so much fun with your courses, plz take easier courses bro, will miss your amazing jokes when we're in the clouds fs, being able to play the keyboard with just feel is absolutely insane, that level is something else, would love to be able to do that, amazing music taste, but travis with his autotune, nahh 😂. whizling you is gonna be fun when I come to hyd, dw ill do it before you do

Orghooe!! Dear Rewanth,

And the way you spin your words is mind blowing. I feel privileged to have met you, and call you my dear friend.

journal.question: First day on campus?

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: Campus and hostel life. Mayhaps mess food.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Weight. I gained a lot. T_T

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: I hope I'm able to keep in touch with all the nice people I've met in my brief time here.

name: Aryaman Manish Kolhe
tagline: The only thing Time leaves you with is your memories

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Excited to see things that I've only heard of/seen in pictures, and also meet new people. For some reason we wore formals for our induction on the first day. Did not know that I would go on to make so many memories with the people I met that day - it is almost magical looking back.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer:
Taking part in Megathon in my first sem - got me closer to the gang (Lé Boys => Parivar).

Discussing complexity theory with seniors till 6 am. Hanging out with seniors and profs and learning probability theory (via poker).

Using Grover's search to ask someone out (trust me, this trick works)

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer:
Will miss discussing random things with seniors. Have really soaked a lot of inspiration from them.
Annoying friends till they say - 'isko kaun bulata hai yar?'
Will miss playing with friends for events like octave, unplugged, felicity
Will miss spotting Lily in labs and playing with her; RIP :(

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Learning how to deal with tough times, and also learning to rely on friends.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: What's next you say? First let's focus on writing a thesis and *actually* getting out of here :)

name: Kunal Kamalkishor Bhosikar
tagline: Not sure if I'm doing research or being researched by the universe.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: My first day on campus was really fun. It was the day before the first day of my 2-1 semester. I didn't know anyone on campus at the time, but I met all the LEs and their parents. After the parents left, we all started talking and sharing stories, and just like that became best friends.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: I think my best campus memory is a combination of all the moments I spent with my amazing batchmates. I don't think I can choose a single moment, as that wouldn't do justice to all the other times we laughed, learned, and had wonderful conversations together.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: One thing I'll miss the most is the random late-night conversations while "studying" before exams, when everyone is clearly procrastinating and refusing to accept the reality of the syllabus and exam weightage. All the while, we're busy calculating how much weightage is still left to pass the course

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: The biggest change since my first year is probably how the campus looks. I used to really like the 'Srujana' area and the greenery that surrounded it, it had such a peaceful vibe.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Struggle to graduate...

name: Aishani Pandey
tagline: Brains, sass, and a terminal window.

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Well I am LEEE and my first day was filled with excitement and nervousness as to how everything is going to be and how everything will turn out. Well, now I know that it truly turned out to be a great experience.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Well there are so many of them but if I were to list a few, it was hanging around with my core friends and just enjoying ourselves after completing an overbearing assignment and getting rid of our toxic teammates lol.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: I think the security the college provided in terms of comfort and freedom to make our life decisions - it can be anything, from courses to going out of campus anytime :)

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: I think I have grown to be more mindful and mature of things over the years (and also learned some corporate tactics lol) !! Overall - I improved a lot and I like this version of me.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Not decided but I hope I can make the college proud!!
