Anyways, wishing you best of luck for a fantastic future ahead. Hope you get to meet Sara Ali Khan someday 😁
Hi buddy. Nice to see you're setting up in LSI now and making the lab look great. We both got to ditch VIT together and I think we have really come to an awesome place :D

Man you really are probably the most helpful people I know - always going above and beyond to make sure no one around you has to face any discomfort. Loved working with you in Cansat - honestly I probably couldn't have done it without you lol. Hope we always stay in touch!

Well, the one and only guy who hugged me every time we met anywhere on campus, a friendly one though :)

Whether it was in SPCRC corridor, in front of Kadamb or while going to North, this is the man who always cheered everyone with a laugh or a smile. 

And the fine job he is doing to keep the whole SPCRC community intact and engaging is commendable. 

I wish I had spent more time with you discussing the range of topics, but, wish you the very best, my friend, for all your endeavours!

such a humble person. Always smiling, never seen you under stress. Veryt motivated to help others and build new new innovations. Also such a straight forward person. I have been lucky to have you as a friend. Will always stay in touch with you.

Aditya — truly a gem of a person. Never met anyone quite like him. The kind of friend everyone wishes for — helpful, cheerful, and always there with the right vibes. Bhai, tujhse baat karke hamesha dil halka ho jaata hai. Stay the same, never lose that beautiful personality of yours. Wishing you nothing but success and happiness ahead.
Ashwini, you are an amazing classical dancer love your expressions! You speak really fast and i find that so cool! Thanks for always being so nice !

"ASHWINI SO JAA!!!"

This is one of the most perennially tensed, sleep deprived person I have met! The only girl I know who was sad ONLY because she came 3rd in her class (and then she calls ME kassi!)

But most importantly, one of the most kind and nicest persons I have met. Keep smiling forever Ashwini, and all the best for your research!

So grateful to be your friend!

Sweetest and most innocent person found in the history of humans. So pure hearted and a genuine friend to so many people, always has a cute smile on her face. Super focused on the work she loves and has some of the coolest interests (astronomy, badminton). Can't wait to be your roomie xd.

Ashhhh! Im soo happy that we're friends;  you're an amazing person and are super smart; It was very fun doing ST and EW2 with you! Although we dont hand out as often anymore, i'm glad that we're still very close and are always there for the other; Have fun at microsoft, I'm sure you'll do great there as well!! Take things a bit easy, dont go too hard on yourself, lets catch up soon!

Ashwiniii, I swear you should be an influencer with how much I admire and look up to you. I think just by observing you in icassp, I must have learnt a million little things. I hopee you have the best timee exploring space and the galaxies far far away (but still remember me!!) !!

Hi ash... just remember... no matter where you are and what you're doing... you are always my sister... that will never change... hope you achieve everything you ever want to achieve in life.... i will be the happiest person when you win the noble prize (or the equivalent prize in signal processing or whatever)

Hey da, my best roommate. You have been a true support for me during all times. You understood me and matched my vibe more than anybody. From the late night talks about god, religion, relations,  family, kids, marriage, oh god we talked about soooo many things. Your passion towards astronomy is really inspiring. It motivates me to work hard for something that interests me and not to do things just for the sake of it. Living practically, I learnt from you. Hope you become a great researcher. ATB!

Hi Ash... You are among the few people in college I've found who think like me. It is always a pleasure to talk stuff with you; you seem so interested in almost anything I have to say:) Find your true calling and chase it! You have very unique and special interests in life, so pray you don't get stuck behind the wrong doors, doing generic stuff. You're like an elder sister to me, and I appreciate our bond. Wish you all the best for everything! We should stay in touch. P.S.: We have no idea.

A strong person... One of the finest dancers of the batch... Random ga corridor lo kalisi maatladukune conversations I will miss... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need
youre the sweetest and i'm so glad we talked. i wouldnt have passed without you teaching me probability, ashwini. stay just how you are!!!

Polar Bear! Gotta soak up some of that insane space stuff knowledge from you and Sreyas! Now that we actually have time let's hit the badminton court way more this year, and yes, pls drag me if needed! Always a good time hanging out with you ❤️

Very sweet and innocent personality. Love to debate with you and would miss our discussions a lot.
Hope you acheive your dreams (Which you will as you are very hardworking)

Sonalii :)
The best teacher I ever had. Everyone needs someone to help spot their mistakes and grow as a person. You have been that person for me. At home, its very simple, we have parents. But out here, it really takes someone who actually cares about you to help you not just find the mistakes but correct it as well
Its funny, how we started out almost as research partners, through quantum talks, to how much our friendship has evolved today ;)
Thank you, Closest person tp me in college :)

One of the most down to earth people I know. Loved getting you to know you through second year and love that we both share a love for all things sweet <3 Keep being interested in everything space and all the best!!

Ashwini I don't know if it counts as positive or negative but I feel you are too kind towards everyone else and often put yourself after them. You are a very kind hearted girl and wonderful person. Baki bhul chuk maaf kar dena🙏🙏. Hope we can still be in touch

Hi kiddo! Our mini sheldon. Despite all your OCD chesthalu and all, it has always been fun to hang around with you, a little innocent annoying kid xD. Inka evaraina best friends unnara neeku? Anyways, cheers for what lies ahead!

You're one of the most interesting people on campus, thanks to your infectious enthusiasm for space, astronomy,stargazing, and your determination to spot stars even when they aren't completely visible. It always put a smile on my face whenever your phone rang with the Interstellar theme.I’ve always enjoy our conversations at Yukthahar with you and Vaibhav, whether it was about research or how are things going with “papa”. Stay curious, stay cool, and keep shining like the stars you love so much.
Had fun interacting with you. Stay curious. Best of luck for your future!

Full of positive energy, always fun to talk to! Its always a great time together in Yuktahar. You guys somehow always make me laugh to death. I was amazed hearing what stuff you are working on - really made me rethink what I was doing with my life :)). For a week after that I just wanted to join astronomy, leaving all cvit and stuff (always had an interest since school). Hope you discover all the stars/planets/whatever it is you are searching for :)).
Atb for your future! Keep smiling! :))

My fellow kannadiga, You are such a ray of sunshine and an adorable presence in my life. Loved conducting all the events with you and the rest of the group. Cheers to one more year, love :). Stay the same...

Hey Ashwini!

The astrophysics enthusiast of our group. You've transformed significantly over the years (in a good way!), from constantly wearing masks and being very studious, to being more casual and staying up late. It's been great to know you over the years, and I hope the astro kid within you goes on to kindle your curiosity!

Stay in touch, and wish you the best in all your future endeavours!

hey!! The 1.5x girl 😂. Nee matlalu decode cheyali ante memu 1.5x speed lo audio ni tune cheskovali. Very active and eppudu matladina baa respond avthav and nee kassiness ni take a bow.
Learned many things from you. Hope you graduate soon and achiece many things.
All the best!!

If you ever want someone to tell you their honest unfiltered opinion on something, look no further. Ashwini was the first person whom I got to know on campus, and she is the one who introduced me to many of my friends I have now. Her interest in different subjects will always continue to inspire me, and always teaches me something new🖖 . She has a way to talk to people, where we vibe with her interests, and presents herself really well. Keep smiling Ashwini, happy to have a friend like you.

Eyyyyy Ashwini!!!😅 Always the slowest in the mess (yes, even when you are done before us) Idk how one person can be this Kassi🙏Koncham lab maatrame kakunda bayataki kooda raavachu telusa. Pls teach me how to maintain a good sleep schedule. Inko 1 year undi ga hopefully will be able to learn (P.S. not gonna happen, this is IIITH we're talking about💔) See you around!

Hey Ashwini! Hindi TA and Badminton partner. We couldn't finish our last match with win but that's all right. You keep playing badminton maybe later we will play again. It was such a great experience having fun with you especially those poem sessions and the discussions. Keep rocking and share some more new stories and your writings when we meet again, till then - Keep smiling :)

Hi Ashwini,
It was awesome hanging out with you since 2nd year. I've even started writing for myself in a small journal after you told me I should. Hope you keep studying space and astronomy and achieve what you want to!
P.S. For once I will say it here (RP == ...) Not >>

Ashwini!!

You are the most well-spoken and sorted person I've met. Keep on growing and achieving more and more!

Keep in touch! :hugs: Byee!

journal.answer: Awkwardly clicking pic with that "First day at IIIT" banner, while the dustbins in the back photobombed! :D

testimonials.text: Hey pragya you are really cool and sweet! Love your smile too !

Yaar, tujhe pata hai? hamare dost kabhi same nahi the but we always managed to have a lot of fun saath mai - be it just hanging out, or courses and research ki RR karna or jindagi ke baare mai random baatein karna ya fir logo ke baare mai bitch karna, xd. 

Shit happens and jindagi badalti hai, but through all of it, having a understanding friend is the best thing one can have and I have always felt very comfortable talking to you about anything and everything and I hope you felt the same.

Such a sweet person to talk with.... Though we didn't spoke much... Jitna interaction i had with you was mast... Stay the same as you are ... I wish you all the best for your future and I hope you get everything you need
Very hardworking and a sweet person with a fun personality. A very good teacher as well (Thanks for carrying me in TAO). Hope you acheive your dreams!! Do stay in touch : )

Hello bestieee! Expect nahi kiya ki apan itna zyaada baat karenge! But it has always been a great time with you and Adi together. All those crazy nights right before exam, us ending up playing more than studying, and surviving the exams was crazy! Wish we could spend a lot more time in our 5th year. All the best broo!

Hi cutie, You are such a ray of sunshine everywhere you go.. I absolutely love talking to you, bitching about courses, research and so on.. Cheers to causing more chaos next year.. Stay the same, hun..

I too will miss our chai pe charcha, and yes, forever just a text away :)
And whenever we meet, you're gonna be the one taking us out for food haha, I'm gonna leave it to the pro. All the best for everything and stay in touch :))

Hey Pragya!

Silent worker is probably the closest title I can think of for you, from whenever I saw you during my visits to meet friends at SPCRC. While we haven't had prolonged interactions that often, from the few times we did talk about work, friends and life, I can say you're also a great conversationalist. You'll also be one of the first people I'll contact to learn about amazing places for dining and treats, so stay in touch!

Wishing you the best in all your future endeavours!

You have been a constant friend to me in all these years and I have learnt a lot from your thought process and maturity in handling situations. You have come to know Hyderabad more than me in these years, so now I have to ask suggestions from you, on where to visit😁😁. One quality that I appreciate about you a lot, is that you know what you want. I have not ever seen you in a dual state of mind. Its a very nice quality. Wishing you all the very best👍👍.

Yoo! It was awesome hanging out with you, especially in the last semester.
Don't worry, we will set up that le meet one day. Keep the research dream going! Take care :)

journal.question: First day on campus?
journal.answer: Ek kaala suar room mein ghus aaya kyoki samne he room tha uska bhi. Playing cards with Lathar, Suar(Sarthak) and Krishna.

journal.question: Best campus memory?
journal.answer: Doing anything that was illegal or breaking any college rule.

journal.question: One thing that I will miss the most?
journal.answer: The freedom of roaming around college and meeting friends anytime. Going to their rooms without any plan, playing games, talking for hours( sarthak ke sath baat karte karte subha hojati thi), and making random plans. That fun, that bond.

journal.question: Biggest change since first year?
journal.answer: Since first year, I've become a lot more confident and responsible. Also, I've lost 15kg since first year. In my first year, I was more fun-loving, full of jokes, and made friends super easily. I could mix with anyone without thinking much. Now I've become a bit reserved. I don't make friends that easily, and that humour, that charm - vo thoda kam ho gaya hai. But I guess that's part of growing up too.

journal.question: What next?
journal.answer: Abhi ek or saal bacha hh mera.
